Name: Deutsche Bahn
Company description: Welcome! Deutsche Bahn is an international provider of mobility and logistics services and active in over 130 countries. We design and operate the transport networks of the future. With the integrated operation of transport and infrastructure and the intelligent linking of all modes of transport, we move people and goods – on the rails and roads, by sea and by air. With some 300,000 employees, of which roughly 200,000 are based in Germany, we are one of Germany’s largest and most diverse employers. Each year we seek to fill jobs in more than 500 different occupations with up to 8,000 enthusiastic new employees, who help us to connect people and markets. Together we want to change mobility. Do you want to be on board? Welcome!  Learn more:  Information about Deutsche Bahn: www.deutschebahn.com  Careers at Deutsche Bahn: www.deutschebahn.com/karriere Impressum & Legal notice: http://www.deutschebahn.com/impressum-datenschutz

Name: ÖBB
Company description: ÖBB. Heute. Für morgen.  Für uns. Rund 1,3 Mio. Reisende, und ca. 1.300 Güterzüge sind täglich mit den ÖBB unterwegs. Darüber hinaus sind wir einer der Top-Arbeitgeber Österreichs. Knapp 42.000 engagierte Mitarbeiter:innen sowie zusätzlich rund 2.000 Lehrlinge sorgen täglich dafür, dass unsere Züge und Busse ihr Ziel erreichen.  Wir sind Wirtschaftsmotor, internationaler Konzern, verlässlicher Geschäftspartner, Innovationstreiber und Klimaschützer. Aber vor allem sind wir eines: ein attraktiver Arbeitgeber. Kaum ein anderes Unternehmen bietet so viele unterschiedliche und spannende Jobmöglichkeiten wie die ÖBB. #JobsmitSinn

Name: Trenitalia
Company description: Trenitalia, the Ferrovie dello Stato Group's company for the transportation of passengers and the provision of logistics services for goods, is one of Europe’s largest rail operators. Trenitalia's mission is to provide services, in a domestic and European context, able to satisfy demand for the mobility of travellers and the transportation of goods.

Name: ECT Rotterdam
Company description: Hutchison Ports ECT Rotterdam is one of the leading and most advanced container terminal operator in Europe. The company handles a majority of the containers at the port of Rotterdam. ECT operates two terminals to this extent: the Hutchison Ports ECT Delta and the Hutchison Ports ECT Euromax at the Maasvlakte (directly on the North Sea).   European Gateway Services is a part of ECT Rotterdam, and offers its clients an extended network of inland terminals and extended gates that are connected to the deepsea terminals in Rotterdam through high-frequency rail and inland shipping services. Extra services are added to these efficient connections, especially in the area of customs clearance.

Name: NMBS Internationaal - SNCB International
Company description: NMBS Internationaal - SNCB International is a leading provider of international train travel services, specializing in group travel for parties of ten or more. The company aims to facilitate seamless and enjoyable travel experiences by offering tailored group booking services, including dedicated contact personnel, meal options on board, and the ability to reserve before the standard booking period opens. Its target market includes schools, businesses, and travel agencies looking to organize group trips across Europe, with popular destinations such as Paris, London, and Amsterdam. SNCB International partners with various train operators, including Eurostar and TGV, to provide a comprehensive range of travel options, ensuring that clients benefit from competitive pricing and flexible travel arrangements. The company's mission is to promote sustainable travel by encouraging the use of trains as an eco-friendly alternative to air travel.

Name: Hanzevast
Company description: Hanzevast is een toonaangevende speler in de scheepvaartsector, actief sinds 1999, met een focus op het faciliteren van internationale handel over zee via haar wereldwijd opererende rederij, Hanzevast Shipping. Het bedrijf biedt een breed scala aan diensten, waaronder de inkoop, exploitatie en verkoop van schepen, en het commercieel, operationeel en technisch beheer van schepen in haar scheepsfondsen. Hanzevast heeft meer dan 25 jaar ervaring in het beheren van investeringsfondsen, met een indrukwekkend totaal van € 3,4 miljard aan vastgoedfondsen en € 600 miljoen in scheepvaartfondsen. De missie van Hanzevast is om integriteit, transparantie en klanttevredenheid te waarborgen, terwijl het zich richt op duurzame investeringen en het creëren van waarde voor haar klanten. De klanten van Hanzevast omvatten zowel particuliere als institutionele beleggers die op zoek zijn naar stabiele rendementen in de scheepvaart- en vastgoedmarkten.

Name: Nederlandse Spoorwegen
Company description: NS is de Nederlandse spoorwegmaatschappij die zich richt op het aanbieden van betrouwbare en comfortabele treinreizen voor zowel binnenlandse als internationale reizigers. De missie van NS is om het openbaar vervoer toegankelijk en aantrekkelijk te maken, met een sterke focus op klanttevredenheid en duurzaamheid. Het bedrijf streeft ernaar om een veilige en schone reiservaring te bieden, hoewel er in de afgelopen jaren kritiek is geuit op de netheid en onderhoud van de treinen. NS bedient een breed scala aan klanten, waaronder dagelijkse forenzen, toeristen en zakelijke reizigers, en werkt samen met verschillende partners in de vervoerssector om een geïntegreerd mobiliteitsaanbod te creëren. De focus ligt op het verbeteren van de dienstverlening en het verhogen van de klanttevredenheid, terwijl het bedrijf ook rekening houdt met de financiële uitdagingen en beleidskeuzes die de spoorsector beïnvloeden.

Name: Arriva Nederland
Company description: Arriva Nederland is een toonaangevende speler in de openbaarvervoersector, die zich richt op het bieden van duurzaam en innovatief vervoer. Met een sterke focus op de ontwikkeling van talent, biedt het bedrijf diverse stage- en afstudeermogelijkheden aan studenten van verschillende opleidingen, waarbij persoonlijke begeleiding en een leertraject centraal staan. Arriva streeft ernaar om een positieve impact te maken op de samenleving door maatschappelijk verantwoord te ondernemen, met initiatieven die kansen bieden aan mensen met een afstand tot de arbeidsmarkt. Het bedrijf werkt samen met verschillende partners en organisaties om zijn doelen te bereiken, waaronder het verminderen van CO2-uitstoot en het verbeteren van de duurzaamheid van zijn operaties. Arriva's missie is om een groen hart te hebben en bij te dragen aan een betere wereld, wat ook weerspiegeld wordt in hun hoge scores op de CO2- en MVO-prestatieladders.

Name: Connexxion
Company description: Connexxion wil de beste keuze zijn op het gebied van regionaal personenvervoer in Nederland.  Met zorg brengen wij mensen op hun bestemming met toegankelijk, duurzaam en veilig vervoer! Wij willen mobiliteit voor iedereen toegankelijk en beschikbaar houden. Want wij geloven dat mobiliteit essentieel is in ieders leven. Het verbindt je met de wereld om je heen en geeft je de vrijheid om te gaan en staan waar je wilt. Met onze innovatieve diensten bieden wij comfort en gemak afgestemd op individuele behoeften.  Binnen Connexxion leveren wij de volgende diensten: •	Connexxion Openbaar Vervoer verzorgt dagelijks het vervoer per bus in diverse regio’s en per trein over vier regionale lijnen.  •	Connexxion Taxi verzorgt, verspreid over heel Nederland, het taxivervoer voor speciale doelgroepen, zoals leerlingen in het bijzonder onderwijs en gebruikers van het wmo-vervoer. Ook Schiphol Taxi en business taxi zijn diensten die Connexxion Taxi levert. Connexxion maakt, samen met Witte Kruis, onderdeel uit van Transdev. Transdev is een wereldwijde speler op het gebied van personenvervoer en zorg.

Name: Banedanmark
Company description: I Banedanmark skaber vi forudsætningen for, at hundredtusindvis af danskere hver dag kan tage toget, og transport af mange tusind tons gods. Lige nu bygger vi en helt ny attraktiv, grøn jernbane, mens vi holder den gamle kørende. Vi sætter strøm til banen, så der kan køre klimavenlige tog. Vi indsætter nye, digitale signalsystemer og bygger en højhastighedsbane til Europa. Og vi styrer togtrafikken og informerer om den på stationernes skærme og højtalere på fjernbanen.  Banedanmark er en styrelse under Transportministeriet med mere end 2.500 medarbejdere. Hovedkontoret ligger på Carsten Niebuhrs Gade 43 i København, men vi har dygtige og dedikerede medarbejdere i hele landet.  Vil du også være med? Læs mere på www.banedanmark.dk/job  RETNINGSLINJER FOR BANEDANMARKS LINKEDINSIDE Tak, fordi du er aktiv i debatten på siden. Vi ønsker en åben dialog, og vi vil meget gerne have kommentarer, forslag og feedback. Banedanmarks LinkedIn-side skal være et godt sted at være for alle. Derfor har nogle få retningslinjer for siden: • Indlæg, som er injurierende, hadefulde, racistiske, diskriminerende, krænkende eller truende, eller på anden måde i strid med dansk lovgivning, slettes. Gentagne overtrædelser medfører udelukkelse fra siden uden varsel.  • Kommentarer til opslag, der ikke har noget med opslagets emne at gøre, slettes.

Name: Správa Železnic State Organization
Company description: Pursuant to Act on Rail Systems, Správa železnic provides operation of the nation-wide and regional railways owned by the state, their operability, modernization and development to the extent necessary to ensure the transport needs of the state and transport services. Správa železnic is the manager of assets comprising the railway infrastructure.

Name: VR Logistiikka
Company description: VR Transpoint is a leading transport operator specializing in rail logistics for freight traffic, with a strategic focus on enhancing its core businesses of passenger and freight transport. Recently, the company has divested its road logistics unit to the investment firm Mutares, allowing it to concentrate on rail transport and improve its competitive edge in the market. VR Transpoint's mission is to streamline its operations and create a neutral environment for competition by divesting non-core assets, such as station and depot properties. The company serves a diverse clientele, particularly in heavy industries, and is committed to delivering high-quality logistics solutions tailored to their needs. With a dedicated workforce and a strong emphasis on customer relationships, VR Transpoint aims to strengthen its position in the Nordic logistics sector while ensuring continued growth and innovation.

Name: Vy
Company description: Vy is the largest land-based transport company in the Nordic region, operating extensively in Norway and Sweden across various sectors, including rail, bus, freight, and tourism. As a wholly state-owned entity, Vy's mission is to provide efficient, accessible, safe, and environmentally friendly transport solutions, making it easier for individuals and businesses to choose sustainable travel options. The company is dedicated to reducing greenhouse gas emissions and has set ambitious targets to achieve net-zero emissions by 2050, reflecting its commitment to sustainability and innovation. With a workforce of over 12,000 employees, Vy serves a diverse clientele that includes daily commuters, international tourists, local municipalities, and freight customers. The company collaborates with various stakeholders, including government entities like the Ministry of Transport and the Norwegian Railway Directorate, to enhance public transport services and infrastructure. Vy's partnerships extend to the tourism sector, where it works with organizations such as Fjord Tours Group AS to develop unique travel experiences that showcase Norway's natural beauty. Vy emphasizes operational excellence and customer satisfaction, continuously striving to improve service delivery through innovative digital solutions and sustainable practices. The company's vision focuses on creating a seamless travel experience while promoting inclusivity and equality within its workforce. Vy is recognized as Norway's most sustainable transport brand, reflecting its dedication to minimizing environmental impact and fostering a culture of safety and responsibility. Through its comprehensive range of services, Vy aims to lead the transition towards greener transportation solutions, positioning itself as a key player in the Nordic transport sector while contributing positively to society and the environment.

Name: Keolis Nederland
Company description: Keolis Nederland verzorgt openbaar vervoer in Almere, Utrecht en op de treintrajecten Amersfoort - Ede-Wageningen, Zwolle - Enschede en Zwolle - Kampen. Dat doen we met ongeveer 1100 medewerkers, 250 bussen en 23 treinen. Onze klanten zijn onze gasten. We brengen hen graag ontspannen en veilig naar hun bestemming. Onze ambitie is om (on)gewoon goed te zijn. In het bieden van een veilige reis, up-to-date informatie en een chauffeur die optreedt als perfecte gastheer of gastvrouw. Daarnaast investeert Keolis in goed werkgeverschap (PSO trede 2, certificaat Gender Equality). Keolis hecht grote waarde aan integriteit, veiligheid en duurzaamheid. In Gelderland en Overijssel lanceerden we de grootste e-vloot van Europa in één keer. Keolis Nederland is een 100% dochteronderneming van de wereldwijde opererende mobiliteitsonderneming Keolis. Ieder jaar vervoeren we met 68.000 medewerkers bijna 3,5 miljard reizigers in 13 landen.  Feiten en cijfers  Hoofdkantoor: Deventer. Vestigingen: Almere Buiten, Almere Haven, Amersfoort, Bunnik, Ede, Enschede, Hengelo, Mijdrecht, Montfoort, Zwolle. Medewerkers: 1100  Bussen: 450  Treinen: 23  Spoor: 115 km  Reizigers (2023): 44 miljoen

Name: Noerpel-Gruppe
Company description: Noerpel bringt´s – und das seit über 140 Jahren. Bis heute ist unser Unternehmen inhabergeführt und wir sind stolz darauf, dass in der Noerpel-Gruppe Innovation und Wachstum mit Tradition Hand in Hand gehen. Vertrauen und Verantwortungsbewusstsein gegenüber Kunden und Mitarbeitern sind die Basis unseres Unternehmenserfolgs.  Rund 3.700 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter begeistern unsere Kunden täglich mit umfassendem Know-how und Leidenschaft für das, was sie tun und erwirtschafteten dabei einen Umsatz von rund 710 Mio. €. Karriere bei der Noerpel-Gruppe Sie denken unternehmerisch, handeln selbstständig und sind lösungsorientiert? Sie haben Ideen und sind bereit neue Wege zu gehen? Sie arbeiten mit Leidenschaft an Ihren Aufgaben und übertreffen gerne die Anforderungen? Wir freuen uns darauf, Sie kennenzulernen. Transport - Noerpel bringt's Ihr Herz schlägt für Dynamik und Bewegung? Sie sind ein Macher und packen proaktiv an? Sie denken grenzenlos und brennen für spannende Aufgaben in einem dynamischen Umfeld? Dann bringen Sie mit uns 5,3 Millionen Sendungen im Jahr auf die Straße, die Schiene, die See oder in die Luft und bewerben sich bei uns. Logistik – Noerpel kann’s Sie wissen grundsätzlich immer wo Ihr Schlüssel ist, Sie nutzen Stauräume optimal und haben immer den Überblick? Sie mögen Struktur und leben Logistikprozesse im Alltag? Erleben Sie Logistik in einem professionellen Unternehmen und bewerben Sie sich bei Noerpel. Personaldienstleistungen – Noerpel schafft’s Wir vermitteln täglich Helden des Alltags: fleißige Hände, hochqualifizierte Kräfte, lösungsorientierte Macher und Experten ihres Faches. Sind Sie eine/r dieser Heldinnen und Helden? Dann kontaktieren Sie uns oder unterstützen Sie als Profi bei der Vermittlung von Fachkräften.

Name: SJ AB
Company description: SJ AB is a leading train operator in Sweden, specializing in night train services that connect travelers to major European cities, including Hamburg and Berlin. With a mission to provide comfortable and eco-friendly travel options, SJ EuroNight offers various travel classes, including private compartments and couchettes, catering to diverse passenger needs. The company aims to enhance the travel experience by ensuring seamless connections with other European train operators, making it easier for clients to navigate their journeys. SJ AB primarily serves individual travelers, families, and tour operators, promoting sustainable transportation while delivering exceptional customer service. Through its commitment to safety and comfort, SJ AB strives to make every journey an adventure worth remembering.

Name: NS International
Company description: NS International is a leading provider of international train travel services, connecting travelers from the Netherlands to various European destinations, including Belgium, France, Germany, and beyond. The company aims to make train travel easy, comfortable, and sustainable, offering a range of services such as online ticket booking, customer support, and travel information. With a focus on enhancing the travel experience, NS International partners with various rail operators, including Eurostar, TGV, and Intercity, to provide seamless connections and a variety of travel options. Its target market includes leisure travelers, families, and business professionals seeking efficient and eco-friendly transportation solutions across Europe. By prioritizing customer satisfaction and accessibility, NS International strives to be the preferred choice for international rail travel.

Name: Malta Public Transport
Company description: MALTA PUBLIC TRANSPORT is the national bus operator responsible to operate all public transport services by bus on the Maltese islands. We form part of an international network of transport companies present on four continents with over 40,000 employees. With over 120 years of experience in efficient management of urban transport as well as regional, national and international bus, coach and rail transport, our philosophy is to maximize on this international experience and adapt it to the local context wherever we operate, including Malta.

Name: Trenord
Company description: Trenord is a prominent railway company operating in Lombardy, Italy, specializing in regional, suburban, and airport train services. Established in 2011 as a joint venture between Trenitalia and Ferrovie Nord Milano, Trenord is dedicated to enhancing mobility and sustainability across the region. The company operates an extensive network of over 2,200 daily train services, connecting major cities and towns, including direct routes to Malpensa Airport, and serving approximately 190 million passengers annually. Trenord's mission focuses on providing efficient, reliable, and accessible transportation solutions while promoting environmental responsibility and customer satisfaction. The company caters to a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and individuals with disabilities, ensuring that all passengers can travel comfortably and conveniently. Trenord offers various ticketing options, including integrated tickets, season passes, and special concessions for families and seniors, making it easier for users to access its services. Collaborating closely with local authorities and transport agencies, Trenord aims to create seamless travel experiences and improve service quality across its network. Trenord is committed to sustainability, actively working to reduce its environmental impact through initiatives that align with the United Nations' Sustainable Development Goals. The company emphasizes modernizing its fleet and infrastructure, including the introduction of hydrogen-powered trains, to meet the evolving needs of its users. Trenord also engages in community support initiatives, partnering with local organizations to promote sustainable travel and enhance regional tourism. With a workforce of approximately 4,720 employees, Trenord fosters a culture of safety, health, and continuous improvement, striving to be a leader in the railway sector while contributing positively to the communities it serves. Through its innovative projects and commitment to operational excellence, Trenord aims to enhance the overall travel experience for all its passengers, positioning itself as a cornerstone of the Lombard mobility system.

Name: TUC RAIL
Company description: TUC RAIL is a dynamic company specializing in the railway sector, focusing on multidisciplinary and environmental studies, land acquisition, utility management, and infrastructure projects including railways and roadworks. The company is committed to promoting sustainable mobility and aims to integrate innovative solutions from the early stages of project development, ensuring high-quality outcomes that meet client needs. TUC RAIL serves a diverse clientele, including public and private sector partners, and emphasizes collaboration within multidisciplinary teams to deliver comprehensive design and planning services. With a strong emphasis on employee development and a supportive work environment, TUC RAIL fosters a culture of communication and autonomy, making it an attractive workplace for professionals in the field. The company is also dedicated to diversity and inclusivity, welcoming individuals from all backgrounds to join its mission of enhancing transportation infrastructure.

Name: EAV Ente Autonomo Volturno
Company description: EAV Ente Autonomo Volturno is a public transportation company based in Campania, Italy, specializing in the operation of bus and rail services. The company is committed to modernizing its fleet, as evidenced by its recent acquisition of six new buses, bringing its total to 198 out of a planned 365 operational vehicles. EAV's mission focuses on enhancing public transport accessibility and sustainability, with future plans to introduce 150 additional buses, including 60 electric models, as part of a regional modernization initiative. The company serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters and tourists, and collaborates with regional authorities to improve transportation infrastructure and services in the area. EAV aims to provide reliable and efficient transport solutions, contributing to the overall development of the region's mobility landscape.

Name: RET
Company description: Public Transport Company in the region of Rotterdam. RET offers metro, light rail, tram, bus and ferry services in the Rotterdam metropolitan area. Over 600.000 passengers on a daily base. RET is responsible for operation as well as maintaining infrastructure.

Name: Ferrovie Dello Stato Italiane S.p.A.
Company description: Ferrovie Dello Stato Italiane S.p.A. (FS Italiane) is Italy's primary railway company, responsible for managing and operating the national railway infrastructure and providing comprehensive passenger and freight transport services. Established in 1905, FS Italiane has played a pivotal role in shaping Italy's transportation landscape, focusing on enhancing mobility and connectivity across the country. The company's mission is to promote sustainable and efficient transport solutions while ensuring safety, comfort, and innovation in its operations. FS Italiane serves a diverse clientele, including individual passengers, businesses, and public institutions, and collaborates with various partners, including regional governments and international transport organizations, to improve service quality and expand its network. The company operates through several specialized subsidiaries, including Trenitalia for passenger services and Mercitalia for freight transport, allowing it to cater to a wide range of customer needs. FS Italiane is committed to sustainability, aiming for net-zero emissions by 2040 and actively investing in renewable energy and eco-friendly technologies. Its vision emphasizes the importance of integrating rail services with urban development, transforming railway stations into community hubs that enhance local economies and promote social inclusion. Through strategic initiatives and significant investments in infrastructure, FS Italiane seeks to lead the transition towards a greener transport system, contributing to the economic and social development of Italy. The company is dedicated to fostering a culture of safety and continuous improvement, ensuring high standards of service delivery while addressing the challenges of climate change and urbanization. With a workforce of over 96,000 employees, FS Italiane is positioned as a key player in the European transport sector, striving to enhance the overall travel experience for its users and support the sustainable development of the regions it serves.

Name: Lineas
Company description: Lineas est le plus grand opérateur privé de fret ferroviaire en Europe, spécialisé dans le transfert de marchandises de la route vers le rail, contribuant ainsi à réduire les émissions de CO2 de 90 %. Avec son siège social en Belgique et des succursales en France, en Allemagne et aux Pays-Bas, Lineas a construit le plus grand réseau ferroviaire privé d'Europe, offrant des liaisons rapides, quotidiennes et fiables à ses clients. L'entreprise s'engage à rendre les chaînes d'approvisionnement climatiquement neutres et joue un rôle stratégique dans la logistique européenne, soutenue par des partenariats avec des acteurs majeurs tels que BASF et PSA Antwerp. Lineas vise à renforcer la compétitivité industrielle en Belgique et en Europe, tout en poursuivant une transformation interne pour améliorer sa rentabilité et sa performance financière. Avec près de 1700 employés, Lineas est déterminée à devenir un leader dans le transport ferroviaire durable et à répondre aux besoins croissants de ses clients dans divers secteurs économiques.

Name: Zarząd Transportu Metropolitalnego
Company description: Zarząd Transportu Metropolitalnego (ZTM) is the governing body responsible for organizing public transportation within the Upper Silesian-Zagłębie Metropolis. The company aims to provide efficient, modern, and environmentally friendly transport solutions that enhance the quality of life for residents. ZTM operates a network of urban transport services, including buses and trains, and offers a range of ticketing options, such as the integrated Metroticket system, which allows passengers to travel seamlessly across different modes of transport within the metropolitan area. The organization collaborates with various municipalities, transport carriers, and local businesses to promote public transport usage and support sustainable urban mobility initiatives. ZTM's target market includes local commuters, event participants, and employers looking to provide transportation benefits to their employees. Through its services, ZTM strives to reduce traffic congestion, improve air quality, and foster a culture of public transport use in the region.

Name: Chemion Logistik GmbH
Company description: Chemion Logistik GmbH, based in CHEMPARK Leverkusen, specializes in providing efficient logistics solutions, particularly in the transportation and handling of goods via rail and road. The company is committed to streamlining logistics processes through innovative technologies, such as its GATE system, which offers automated truck processing for quick and hassle-free entry into the CHEMPARK. Chemion's mission is to enhance operational efficiency for its clients by minimizing wait times and simplifying the logistics experience, thereby reducing stress for drivers and operators alike. The company serves a diverse clientele, including businesses in the chemical and manufacturing sectors, and collaborates with various partners to ensure comprehensive logistics services. With a focus on safety and compliance, Chemion is dedicated to maintaining high standards in the handling of goods, including hazardous materials, while fostering a user-friendly environment for all stakeholders involved.

Name: ADIF
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 3 Calle De Sor Ángela De La Cruz, 28020
Company description: Adif, el Administrador de Infraestructuras Ferroviarias, es una entidad pública empresarial dependiente del Ministerio de Transportes y Movilidad Sostenible. Ejercemos un papel principal como dinamizador del sector ferroviario, haciendo del ferrocarril el medio de transporte por excelencia y facilitando el acceso a la infraestructura en condiciones de igualdad. Tiene como objetivo potenciar el transporte ferroviario español mediante el desarrollo  y la gestión de un sistema de infraestructuras seguro, eficiente, sostenible desde el punto de vista medioambiental, y con altos estándares de calidad. Adif asume: La administración de infraestructuras ferroviarias (vías, estaciones, terminales de mercancías, etc.) La gestión de la circulación ferroviaria. La adjudicación de capacidad a los operadores ferroviarios. La percepción de cánones por el uso de la infraestructura, estaciones y terminales de mercancías. Todo ello, desde el compromiso de responsabilidad social con los ciudadanos basada en principios éticos relacionados con la gestión y con el papel de la empresa en la sociedad. Tiene como eje vertebrador la transparencia y el diálogo con los Grupos de Interés, y su finalidad última es contribuir a la sostenibilidad del desarrollo que propicia nuestra actividad, desde una perspectiva integral.

Name: LTG
Company description: LTG grupė yra viena didžiausių įmonių grupių Lietuvoje, administruojanti šalies geležinkelių tinklą. Jungiame žmones ir verslus, veždami keleivius ir krovinius, valdydami ir nuolat atnaujindami geležinkelių infrastruktūrą, inžinerines bei IT sistemas. Nuo pat Nepriklausomybės paskelbimo augame kartu su Lietuva. Ko pasiekėme iki šiol? Tapome didžiausia Baltijos šalyse geležinkelių grupe, aktyviai prisidedame prie Lietuvos verslo plėtros užsienyje, taip pat sėkmingai bendradarbiaujame ir už Lietuvos ribų. Šiandien LTG grupės komandą sudaro ~ 6 000 darbuotojų, atsakingų už sklandų krovinių ir keleivių judėjimą – ir už tai, kokią valstybę kuriame šiandien.  -----  LTG group is one of the largest groups of companies in Lithuania, administering the country's railway network. It connects people and businesses by transporting passengers and goods, managing and constantly updating rail infrastructure, engineering and IT systems. Since the declaration of independence, we have not stopped growing and progressing together with Lithuania. What have we achieved so far? We have become the largest railway group in the Baltic States that actively contributes to the development of Lithuanian business abroad, and also successfully cooperates outside Lithuania. Today the team of LTG group consists of ~ 6 000 employees responsible for the smooth movement of freight and passengers.

Name: Iarnród Éireann Irish Rail
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, Amiens Street, d01 v6v6
Company description: Iarnród Éireann (Irish Rail) is the national railway system operator of Ireland. Established on 2 February 1987, it is a subsidiary of Córas Iompair Éireann (CIÉ). It operates all internal intercity, commuter and freight railway services in the Republic of Ireland, and, jointly with Northern Ireland Railways, the Enterprise service between Dublin and Belfast.

Name: AutoAfleveren.nl
Company description: Wegens het gebrek aan aandacht bij het afleveren van een (nieuwe) auto, is AutoAfleveren.nl in het leven geroepen. Middels de aanwezige kennis en ervaring in de automotive die deze ondernemers en medewerkers hebben, is AutoAfleveren.nl gericht op zowel het vervoeren van de auto richting de nieuwe berijder en/of klant, als ook de totale aflevering die daarbij hoort. Waar menig bedrijf zich enkel richt op het transporteren van de (nieuwe) auto, richt AutoAfleveren.nl zich op het totaalplaatje. Wij verzorgen het transport van A naar B en geven vervolgens een gedegen instructie over de auto. Wij vormen hét visitekaartje van uw bedrijf bij zowel het transport en de aflevering van de (nieuwe) auto. Bent u benieuwd wat wij voor u kunnen betekenen? Vraag dan vrijblijvend informatie op en wij vertellen u graag waarom u gebruik kunt maken van de kwalitatief hoogwaardige diensten van AutoAfleveren.nl.

Name: Rhomberg Sersa Bahntechnik GmbH
Company description: Rhomberg Sersa Bahntechnik GmbH is a leading company in the railway technology sector, dedicated to advancing sustainable mobility solutions. With a mission encapsulated in their vision "Enabling Future Mobility," the company focuses on enhancing the competitiveness of rail transport as the most sustainable means of moving people and goods. They prioritize environmental responsibility and resource conservation, implementing innovative practices to minimize greenhouse gas emissions and promote renewable energy usage across their operations. Their clientele includes various stakeholders in the railway industry, and they collaborate with partners to develop cutting-edge technologies that support their sustainability goals. Rhomberg Sersa Bahntechnik GmbH is committed to fostering a culture of safety, integrity, and compliance, ensuring a healthy work environment for its employees while actively engaging with stakeholders to address key sustainability issues.

Name: Bakker Logistiek Groep
Company description: De Bakker Logistiek Groep is een onderdeel van de ruim 100 jaar jonge Bakker Groep. Naast logistiek houdt de Bakker Groep zich bezig met bedrijfswagens en vastgoed. Met 4 vestigingen in midden Nederland is 'bedrijfswagens' één van de grotere dealers van het merk DAF. De Bakker Logistiek Groep is een prominente speler op de markt van gespecialiseerde logistieke dienstverlening. De omzet van circa 150 miljoen Euro wordt gerealiseerd met ruim 1200 personeelsleden. De Bakker Groep bestaat uit: Bakker Transport Bakker Logistiek Bakker Bedrijfswagens Becker Logistiek Broersma Logistiek Huybregts Logistiek

Name: Abellio Rail Mitteldeutschland
Company description: Die Abellio Rail Mitteldeutschland GmbH ist ein Eisenbahnverkehrsunternehmen mit Sitz in Halle (Saale) und „DIE Eisenbahn in der Region“. Das zu Abellio Deutschland gehörende Unternehmen betreibt seit Dezember 2015 das Saale-Thüringen-Südharz-Netz (STS). 640 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter sorgen auf insgesamt 12 Linien, die u.a. von Halle bis nach Saalfeld und Kassel-Wilhelmshöhe sowie von Leipzig bis Erfurt und Eisenach führen, für sichere, verlässliche und komfortable Mobilität der Reisenden. Auf dem 1.096 km langen Liniennetz erbringt Abellio ein jährliches Leistungsvolumen von 10,4 Mio. Zugkilometern. Es kommen 38 moderne Triebfahrzeuge zum Einsatz. Eigentümer von Abellio ist die BeNEX GmbH, eines der führenden Beteiligungsunternehmen für den Bahnverkehr der Zukunft. Neben Abellio hält der BeNEX-Konzern Beteiligungen an sechs regionalen Bahnunternehmen in Deutschland (WestfalenBahn, agilis, cantus, nordbahn, metronom und ODEG) sowie an der BeNEX Akademie.

Name: Boreal Norge AS
Company description: Boreal Norge AS is a leading provider of public transportation services in Norway and Northern Sweden, specializing in sustainable solutions that encompass bus, ferry, and rail operations. The company is dedicated to leading the green transition in mobility, with a mission focused on delivering environmentally responsible transport options while prioritizing safety and quality. Boreal has made significant strides in reducing greenhouse gas emissions by expanding its fleet to include electric buses and vessels, aligning 70% of its activities with environmental objectives. The company's vision, "Let’s go together," underscores its commitment to collaboration with employees, partners, and clients in fostering a greener future. Boreal serves a diverse clientele, including municipal and county authorities, regional governments, and various organizations, enhancing public transport services across both urban and rural areas. Its target market includes residents, tourists, and businesses, reflecting a broad commitment to meeting the growing demand for eco-friendly transportation options. The company is owned by the green infrastructure fund Core Infrastructure III S.A.R.L., which supports Boreal's sustainability goals, including achieving net-zero emissions by 2040. In addition to its focus on electrification, Boreal is committed to maintaining high social and governance standards, ensuring ethical practices and compliance with human rights regulations throughout its operations. The company aims to be an attractive employer, emphasizing employee well-being, safety, and promoting equality and diversity within its workforce. Through innovative strategies and a strong commitment to sustainability, Boreal Norge AS is positioned as a key player in shaping the future of public transport in Norway and beyond.

Name: Transdev Sverige AB
Company description: Transdev ger människor frihet att resa när de vill och hur de vill. Vårt erbjudande spänner över 13 transportslag och varje dag möjliggör våra över 80 000 medarbetare mer än 10 miljoner resor i 20 länder. I Sverige är vi en av de största operatörerna inom persontrafik, med närmare åttio års erfarenhet. Dagligen görs flera hundratusen resor med oss från Haparanda i norr till Österlen i söder – med buss, tåg, spårvagn och båt. I samarbete med trafikhuvudmän driver vi upphandlad persontrafik i hela landet. Vi erbjuder också kommersiell trafik under varumärkena Blidösundsbolaget, Flygbussarna, Snälltåget och Styrsöbolaget. Vi eftersträvar långsiktiga partnerskap med trafikmyndigheter och företag, och de säkraste och mest innovativa transport­lösningarna. Tillsammans utvecklar vi framtidens person­trafik för att bidra till en hållbar utveckling och ger människor frihet att resa på sina egna villkor.    Vi är Transdev – the mobility company.

Name: HTM Personenvervoer N.V.
Company description: HTM Personenvervoer N.V. is the public transportation company serving the Hague region, operating a fleet of trams, light rail vehicles, and buses since 1864. With a commitment to sustainability and economic growth, HTM transports over 300,000 passengers daily across its extensive network, which includes 115 buses, 212 trams, and the unique Randstadrail light rail system. The company aims to provide safe, comfortable, and environmentally friendly transportation options, including low-emission natural gas and electric buses. HTM caters to a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and event attendees, offering tailored services such as the HTM Congreskaart for conferences and events. With a focus on enhancing mobility in the region, HTM plays a vital role in connecting communities from Wateringen to Scheveningen and beyond.

Name: Simon Loos
Company description: Simon Loos is een toonaangevende logistieke dienstverlener in Europa, die zich richt op het trainen van chauffeurs door middel van innovatieve leermethoden zoals de pilot 'Learning on the Job'. Deze unieke aanpak stelt chauffeurs in staat om hun code 95-opleiding te volgen tijdens reguliere werkuren, waardoor ze praktische vaardigheden kunnen ontwikkelen zonder extra tijd te verliezen. Het bedrijf bedient een breed scala aan klanten, waaronder supermarktketens zoals Albert Heijn en Lidl, en richt zich op zowel ervaren als onervaren chauffeurs die behoefte hebben aan extra ondersteuning en training. Simon Loos streeft ernaar om de kwaliteit van de chauffeursopleiding te verbeteren en tegelijkertijd de operationele efficiëntie te waarborgen, met als doel een betrouwbare en duurzame logistieke oplossing te bieden.

Name: Noot Personenvervoer
Company description: Noot Personenvervoer behoort tot de grotere personenvervoerders in Nederland. Gevestigd in Ede heeft Noot zich gespecialiseerd in groepsvervoer en rolstoelvervoer. Dagelijks komt u ons tegen in Gelderland, Utrecht, Zeeland, Noord Holland en Zuid Holland met kinderen, ouderen en mensen met een beperking. Op weg naar scholen, de dagbesteding, een zorginstelling of elders; de voertuigen van Noot herkennen zich snel. Verder hebben wij een uitgebreid en gevarieerd aanbod op het gebied van bus-, auto- en touringcarverhuur. Tevens verzorgen we touringcarreizen, dagtochten, schoolreisjes en bedrijfsvervoer.  Bij Noot Personenvervoer hechten we bovendien grote waarde aan een goede relatie met onze medewerkers. Zo hebben we ons eigen opleidingscentrum waar we investeren in top kandidaten, bieden we verschillende relevante trainingen aan en genieten onze medewerkers van een plezierige, collegiale werkomgeving.  Oftewel, Noot voor al uw personenvervoer en autoverhuur. Voor meer informatie nodigen we u uit onze website te bezoeken of contact op te nemen met het algemene nummer: 0318 - 623 500.

Name: NTEX AB
Company description: NTEX AB is one of Sweden's largest privately owned freight forwarding agents, specializing in customized transport and logistics solutions both domestically and internationally. Founded in 2003 by Thomas Ström, the company has grown to employ over 1,000 people and operates in 13 countries, with a turnover of approximately SEK 3.8 billion. NTEX is committed to sustainability, aiming for net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2050, and focuses on reducing its environmental impact through innovative transport solutions and collaboration with customers and suppliers. The company serves a diverse clientele, including businesses requiring efficient logistics for various modes of transport, such as road, sea, air, and rail. With a strong emphasis on safety, employee development, and social responsibility, NTEX strives to create a positive impact on society while maintaining competitive and cost-effective services.

Name: AMT - Mobility And Transport Authority
Company description: The Mobility and Transport Authority is an Independent Economic Regulator that operates throughout the national territory. Its mission is to regulate and supervise the mobility and transport sector for land, river, rail, and their respective infrastructures, as well as the economic activities in the commercial ports and maritime transport sector, considered services of general economic interest and network-based activities. This is achieved through its powers of regulation, supervision, inspection, and sanctions, with responsibilities regarding the protection of consumer rights and interests, and the promotion and defense of competition in the private, public, cooperative, and social sectors, according to these statutes and other legal instruments. The activities of the AMT impact the lives of citizens and businesses. Its action is directed at operators of railway, road, maritime, river, port, and logistics services and infrastructures, encompassing the transport of passengers and goods. The AMT promotes more efficient, safer, decarbonized, digital, accessible, non-competitive, and more sustainable mobility, building a better and more inclusive mobility and transport system and market for all citizens and businesses.

Name: TX Logistik AG
Company description: TX Logistik AG is a private railway logistics company founded in 1999, specializing in intermodal rail freight services across eleven European countries. As a subsidiary of Mercitalia Logistics, part of the Ferrovie dello Stato Italiane group, TX Logistik is committed to providing efficient and tailored rail solutions for both continental and maritime transport. The company operates a robust network, recently expanding its services between Lübeck and Italy, with a focus on transporting trailers, containers, and tank containers. With a workforce of 650 employees and a significant operational capacity, TX Logistik aims to meet the growing demand for intermodal transport solutions, ensuring timely and reliable service for its clients, including major logistics partners like Spedition Bode. The company's mission is to enhance connectivity and sustainability in freight transport, leveraging modern locomotives and a dedicated team of professionals to deliver high-quality logistics services.

Name: TPER SPA
Company description: TPER S.p.A. is a leading public transport company based in Bologna, Italy, specializing in the organization and management of local public transportation services, including bus, rail, tram, and cable-car operations. Established in 2012 through the merger of ATC Trasporti and Fer Trasporti, TPER is dedicated to enhancing mobility solutions in the Emilia-Romagna region, particularly in urban areas like Bologna and Ferrara. The company's mission is to provide efficient, safe, and sustainable transport services that meet the diverse needs of its passengers while promoting environmental responsibility. TPER serves a wide range of clients, including local municipalities, regional authorities, daily commuters, tourists, and residents who rely on its services for their transportation needs. The company operates an extensive bus network with 324 lines and has seen significant ridership recovery, serving approximately 150.7 million passengers in 2023. TPER collaborates with various stakeholders, including Trenitalia and local authorities, to deliver integrated transport solutions and innovative mobility initiatives, such as electric vehicle sharing. With a strong commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, TPER continuously invests in fleet modernization and infrastructure improvements to enhance service delivery. The company operates under public service obligations, ensuring that transport services remain accessible and affordable, even in economically challenging situations. TPER's vision is to foster sustainable transport solutions that contribute positively to the quality of life and environmental conditions in the communities it serves. By integrating environmental, social, and governance (ESG) principles into its operations, TPER aims to address the evolving needs of urban mobility while ensuring a reliable and efficient transport network for all users. Through its strategic initiatives and partnerships, TPER S.p.A. plays a vital role in the development of regional transport infrastructure, positioning itself as a key player in the public transport sector in Italy.

Name: CP - Comboios De Portugal EPE
Company description: CP - Comboios de Portugal E.P.E. is the national railway operator in Portugal, dedicated to providing essential passenger and freight transport services across the country. The company operates under a public enterprise model, wholly owned by the Portuguese state, and aims to enhance mobility and connectivity while ensuring safety, efficiency, and sustainability in its operations. CP's mission focuses on delivering high-quality rail services that meet the diverse needs of its clientele, which includes daily commuters, tourists, and businesses. The company is committed to modernizing its fleet and infrastructure, with significant investments directed towards improving service quality and operational efficiency. In 2023, CP transported approximately 173.3 million passengers, reflecting a growing trust in its services and a significant recovery in demand post-pandemic. The company collaborates with various partners, including government entities, local municipalities, and other transport operators, to enhance service delivery and promote sustainable transport solutions. CP's target market encompasses urban, regional, and intercity travelers, highlighting its role as a key player in Portugal's transportation landscape. With a vision to foster integrated mobility that is simple, personal, and environmentally friendly, CP has introduced innovative offerings such as the Green Rail Pass, aimed at promoting accessible and affordable travel. The company is also focused on environmental sustainability, aiming for carbon neutrality by 2050 and actively engaging in initiatives that reduce its ecological footprint. Through continuous improvement and innovation, CP strives to meet the evolving needs of its users while contributing positively to the communities it serves and the broader goals of decarbonization and urban mobility.

Name: Albtal-Verkehrs-Gesellschaft MbH
Company description: Albtal-Verkehrs-Gesellschaft MbH (AVG) is a leading transportation company based in Karlsruhe, Germany, that specializes in the operation of public transport services, including trams and trains. Established in 1957, AVG has been instrumental in the development of the "Karlsruhe Model," which effectively integrates urban tram networks with regional rail services, significantly enhancing connectivity for commuters and travelers. The company's mission is centered on providing efficient, sustainable, and customer-oriented transport solutions, while also fostering a positive learning environment for its employees through diverse training and apprenticeship programs. AVG serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, students, and tourists, and collaborates with various partners within the Karlsruhe Transport Association (KVV) to ensure seamless mobility across the region. The company is dedicated to environmental responsibility and community engagement, aiming to contribute to the sustainable development of public transport in the area. AVG operates modern dual-system city trains and regional transport services, focusing on enhancing mobility by providing reliable public transportation solutions that connect urban and rural areas. In addition to its core services, AVG actively engages in community initiatives, such as training programs for refugees to become train drivers, reflecting its commitment to social responsibility and workforce development. By fostering partnerships with local authorities and suppliers, AVG continuously seeks to improve service quality and operational efficiency. With a strong emphasis on promoting sustainable transport options, AVG is well-positioned to meet the evolving needs of the Karlsruhe area and its residents.

Name: Traffic Service Nederland
Company description: Traffic Service Nederland (TSNed) is een toonaangevend bedrijf dat zich richt op het verbeteren van verkeersveiligheid, doorstroming en bereikbaarheid in Nederland. Met meer dan driehonderd medewerkers verspreid over tien vestigingen, biedt TSNed een breed scala aan diensten en producten voor zowel tijdelijke als permanente verkeerssituaties. De missie van het bedrijf is om ervoor te zorgen dat iedereen veilig onderweg is en aan het eind van de dag weer veilig thuiskomt. TSNed werkt samen met diverse overheden en aannemers, en richt zich op een dynamische markt waarin veiligheid en efficiëntie voorop staan. De organisatie staat bekend om zijn hands-on mentaliteit en no-nonsense aanpak, waarbij teamwork en persoonlijke ontwikkeling centraal staan.

Name: Vervoerregio Amsterdam
Company description: Vanaf 1 januari 2017 gaat de Stadsregio Amsterdam verder als Vervoerregio Amsterdam. Met deze nieuwe organisatie blijven de vijftien gemeenten zich inzetten voor een optimale bereikbaarheid van de Amsterdamse regio. De Vervoerregio Amsterdam draagt bij aan goede verbindingen tussen bestemmingen binnen de Amsterdamse regio, zodat mensen zich per openbaar vervoer, fiets of auto snel, veilig en comfortabel kunnen verplaatsen. Daarvoor bundelen de vijftien gemeenten hun kennis en bestuurlijke kracht. De gemeenten Aalsmeer, Amstelveen, Amsterdam, Beemster, Diemen, Edam-Volendam, Haarlemmermeer, Landsmeer, Oostzaan, Ouder-Amstel, Purmerend, Uithoorn, Waterland, Wormerland en Zaanstad vormen samen de Vervoerregio Amsterdam.

Name: Tielbeke Logistiek
Company description: Primair heeft Tielbeke drie typen logistieke dienstverlening: Transport, Distributie en Warehousing. De synergie tussen de drie typen dienstverlening maakt het mogelijk een totaalpakket aan hoogwaardige logistieke dienstverlening aan te bieden en creëert een sterke mate van flexibiliteit richting onze opdrachtgevers. In een veranderende wereld waarbij alles steeds meer met elkaar in verbinding staat en mensen 24/7 bereikbaar zijn, zal ook de behoefte om te consumeren het komende decennium blijven groeien. De logistiek vervult hierin een cruciale rol bij het voorzien van de consumentenbehoefte over de hele wereld. Gezien de maatschappelijke uitdagingen aangaande mens en milieu, de snelheid waarmee innovaties en vernieuwingen worden geïntroduceerd en de constante druk om te voorzien in efficiëntere en duurzamere logistieke oplossingen maakt Tielbeke op dit snijvlak hét verschil. Tielbeke heeft zich gehuisvest in Lemelerveld en Zwolle en heeft extra standplaatsen in Zwolle, Heerenveen en Heteren. Binnen de organisatie werken ongeveer 420 medewerkers. De cultuur van de organisatie kenmerkt zich door een hoge mate van betrokkenheid, flexibiliteit en gedrevenheid. We willen ons werk naar maximale tevredenheid van de klant uitvoeren en daarbij het beste uit onze mensen, middelen en innovaties halen om nu en in de toekomst efficiënte en duurzame logistieke oplossingen te bieden.

Name: GoCollective
Company description: At GoCollective (formerly Arriva), we are in this journey together. With our approximately 2,000 employees spread across the country, we work to create good and cohesive public transport. We operate buses, trains, and harbor buses—and have been doing so for over 20 years. As the country’s largest private operator with more than 80 different nationalities employed, we are an important knowledge actor in the political arena, and we are happy to share our experience. Our diversity is our greatest strength, and every day our employees go to work with dedication, responsibility, and the strong customer focus that characterizes GoCollective.

Name: Eurailscout
Company description: We use modern measurement and inspection trains and handheld equipment to carry out measurements and analyses on the track, working on behalf of infrastructure managers in a wide range of countries. Our customer located in the Netherlands, Denmark, Germany and France, as well as in many other European countries.

Name: Koleje Mazowieckie - KM Sp. Z O.o.
Company description: Koleje Mazowieckie - KM Sp. z o.o. is a regional railway operator in Poland, established in 2004 by the Mazowieckie Voivodeship Government and PKP Przewozy Regionalne, marking it as the first government-owned railway company in the country. The company commenced its transport operations on January 1, 2005, primarily serving the Mazovia Region. With a mission to provide safe, reliable, and punctual transport, Koleje Mazowieckie has emerged as a leader in the Polish passenger rail market, serving over 61.5 million passengers in 2023 alone. The company is dedicated to modernizing its rolling stock, having recently completed a record order for 61 electric multiple units, which reflects its commitment to enhancing service quality and capacity. Koleje Mazowieckie targets a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, students, and tourists, while promoting eco-friendly travel options. The company actively engages in social and cultural initiatives, such as the "By Train to Culture" campaign, which fosters collaboration with cultural institutions and local businesses to promote regional tourism and public transport usage. In 2023, KM introduced various initiatives, including a 35% discount transportation service for employers and a video interpreter service to assist passengers with disabilities, showcasing its inclusive approach to customer service. With a fleet of over 330 vehicles and nearly 800 trains operating daily across 16 railway lines, Koleje Mazowieckie is committed to expanding its technical facilities to meet the growing transportation needs of local communities. The company collaborates with financial institutions like BGK and PKO Bank Polski to secure funding for new, environmentally friendly trains, contributing to sustainable public transport solutions. Through strategic partnerships and continuous investment in infrastructure, Koleje Mazowieckie aims to strengthen its market position and enhance passenger satisfaction, solidifying its role as a key player in the regional transport landscape.

Name: Lindesbergs Kommun
Company description: Lindesbergs kommun växer och söker löpande nya kunniga och engagerade medarbetare som vill vara med och utveckla Lindesbergs kommun till att bli en ännu bättre plats att bo och leva på. Här arbetar ca. 1 800 medarbetare med olika uppdrag på cirka hundrafyrtio arbetsplatser. Det finns en stor bredd på verksamheter och yrken och gott om möjligheter att växa i din yrkesroll. Kanske skulle just du passa som: Lärare, Sjuksköterska, Socialsekreterare, Förskollärare, Enhetschef, Kock, Ekonom, Strateg, Personlig assistent eller Biståndshandläggare? Vi har många olika spännande uppdrag att erbjuda! I Lindesberg finns även ett rikt föreningsliv, en levande landsbygd och en vacker natur som ger dig goda förutsättningar för både arbete och fritid. Kommunikationerna är goda och en resa hit med buss eller tåg från Örebro tar cirka 30-45 min. Välkommen att utvecklas i vackra Lindesbergs kommun!

Name: AMT
Company description: AMT is a public company owned by the Municipality of Genoa and the Metropolitan City, responsible for the planning, management, and commercialization of multimodal transport services (road, rail, cable, and maritime) within the metropolitan area of Genoa. The company is dedicated to implementing the Sustainable Mobility Plan and innovating transport solutions and technologies to enhance urban mobility. AMT aims to excel in its responsibilities, focusing on providing clean and orderly communities where waste is viewed as recoverable materials to be transformed and reintegrated into the production cycle sustainably. Its clientele includes local residents and businesses, while its partnerships extend to various public and private entities involved in urban development and environmental sustainability. The target market encompasses the entire metropolitan area, including over 30 municipalities in the Liguria region, reflecting AMT's commitment to regional and interregional circular economy initiatives.

Name: NordWestBahn GmbH
Company description: NordWestBahn GmbH is a regional railway company operating in Germany, primarily focused on providing reliable and efficient train services across various routes in the Weser-Ems region. The company aims to enhance public transportation accessibility and promote sustainable travel options, aligning with its mission to connect communities and support local economies. NordWestBahn serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and families, while partnering with local municipalities and transportation authorities to ensure seamless travel experiences. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and environmental responsibility, NordWestBahn is dedicated to improving the quality of rail transport in its target market, fostering a more connected and eco-friendly future.

Name: Captrain Italia
HQ Location: Italy, Milano, Assago, Viale Milanofiori Strada 3, 20090
Company description: Captrain Italia è la filiale italiana del Gruppo SNCF focalizzata sul trasporto ferroviario delle merci.  Il Gruppo SNCF, controllato dallo Stato francese, con 202.000 impiegati in 120 nazioni costituisce un punto di riferimento per la mobilità e la logistica a livello mondiale. Il Gruppo si focalizza su due importanti attività: Infrastruttura e Servizi. Captrain Italia si posiziona sul mercato nazionale ed internazionale proponendo soluzioni e servizi personalizzati per i traffici ferroviari merci, sia combinati che convenzionali. Nata in Italia nel 1998 come società di rappresentanza commerciale, Captrain Italia ha ottenuto la licenza ferroviaria ed il certificato di sicurezza nel 2006, divenendo la prima filiale del gruppo SNCF in Europa ad operare come impresa ferroviaria.  Captrain Italia costituisce un tassello importante nella rete europea del Gruppo che garantisce una copertura capillare ai Clienti internazionali. L’affidabilità dei traffici europei è favorita dell’utilizzo di locomotive interoperabili e da prestazioni logistiche svolte nel pieno rispetto della sicurezza delle persone, delle merci e dell’ambiente. Grazie alla presenza di un reticolo di unità locali in continuo sviluppo (tra cui Milano, Torino, Genova, Trieste, Ventimiglia, Modena, Verona, Pescara, Modane, Treviso), ad una flotta di vagoni e locomotive e soprattutto ad uno staff altamente specializzato e motivato, Captrain Italia offre soluzioni competitive a livello nazionale ed internazionale su tutti gli assi alpini.  Il centro logistico Cargo Docks di Modena, l’officina Tiber.co specializzata nella manutenzione del materiale rotabile ad Asti e la società di manovre Cargo Rail Italy completano il presidio della catena del valore al servizio dei Clienti.

Name: JAS-FBG S.A.
Company description: JAS-FBG S.A. is one of the leading logistics operators in the Polish market, specializing in tailored solutions that meet the dynamic needs of its clients. The company offers a comprehensive range of services within the transport and logistics sector (TSL), including international and domestic road freight, rail, sea, and air freight, as well as an extensive warehousing network. With a focus on flexibility and synergy, JAS-FBG utilizes modern transport means, a network of customs agencies, and advanced IT solutions to ensure efficient service delivery. The company is committed to maintaining high standards of service quality and timely deliveries, catering to a diverse clientele across various industries. JAS-FBG also emphasizes compliance and ethical practices, providing mechanisms for reporting legal violations and ensuring the protection of whistleblowers within its operations.

Name: VR City Traffic Sweden
Company description: VR City Traffic Sweden är en del av finska VR Group sedan 2022. Vår verksamhet omfattar upphandlad kollektivtrafik, tåg, buss och spårvagn, i Sverige. Vårt systerbolag, VR Long Distance Traffic Sweden (tidigare MTRX) bedriver linjetrafik med tåg mellan Stockholm och Göteborg.  VR Group, som ägs av finländska staten, har 160 års erfarenhet av att köra tåg, spårvagnar och bussar och är ledande inom spårburna och elektrifierade transporter. Med totalt 9 000 medarbetare i Finland och Sverige är VR idag dessutom en av Nordens största aktörer inom kollektiv- och fjärrtrafik, logistik och underhåll. VR City Traffic Sweden sköter Skånes Pågatåg, Östgötapendeln och bussar och spårvagnar i Stockholmsregionen. Med 1 500 engagerade medarbetare, 400 bussar, 122 tåg och 65 spårvagnar, skapar vi moderna och klimateffektiva transportlösningar, där säkerheten alltid kommer i första hand. Som resenär hos VR ska du uppleva att vi gör allt för att din resa ska kännas trygg och servicegraden hög. Som en del av VR Group blir vi större, starkare och ännu bättre på att utveckla och erbjuda effektiva och gröna lösningar, lösningar som blir allt viktigare för klimatomställning och välstånd. Att ersätta dieselbussar med eldrivna är bara ett exempel på vad VR gör just nu.     VR:s mål är att bli bäst i Norden, att växa och vinna nya marknadsandelar. Det gör vi genom att hitta nya innovativa lösningar som får ännu fler att resa kollektivt. Häng med på vår resa!

Name: Samer & Co. Shipping
Company description: Samer & Co. Shipping today is a leading company in shipping and forwarding, with over 600 employees and overseas companies in Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Hungary, Montenegro, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Turkiye.  Established back in 1919, it is headquartered in Trieste, whose port is known as the gateway to Europe, and offers services covering four business areas:  1. Ship agents & brokers for liner and tramp vessels, cruise ships, mega yachts, providing assistance to crew, vessel clearance, dry-docking operations, and acting as General Agents for the most important Mediterranean Sea Highway, connecting Europe and Turkey. 2. Port terminal operators in the Customs Free Port of Trieste, specializing in ro-ro vessels, intermodal trains, heavy lifts, project cargoes and reefer goods. 3. International freight forwarders: As FIATA and IATA agents, Samer provides turnkey solutions, from the sea/air/land freight, groupage, storage (general and reefer), to the door-to-door delivery, worldwide. It also specializes in heavy lifts and project cargoes, owns logistic warehouses and gives assistance as customs broker and providing cargo insurance.  4. Claims settling agents, Lloyd’s of London agents since 1932, P&I correspondents for the most prestigious clubs, performing surveys and inspections with own personnel.  P.I: IT00047110325

Name: Üstra Hannoversche Verkehrsbetriebe ag
Company description: ÜSTRA Hannoversche Verkehrsbetriebe Aktiengesellschaft (ÜSTRA) is a leading public transportation company based in Hannover, Germany, specializing in the operation of city buses and light rail services within the Hannover metropolitan area. With a workforce of 2,328 employees, including 1,644 commercial workers, ÜSTRA is dedicated to providing reliable, efficient, and environmentally friendly transport solutions to its customers. The company serves over 470,000 passengers daily, making it a vital component of the public transport network in the Hannover region. ÜSTRA's mission is to enhance urban mobility while promoting sustainability and innovation in public transport, ensuring safety and comfort for all passengers. The company collaborates closely with regional authorities and partners, including the Greater Hannover Transport Association (GVH), to develop integrated transport services that meet the needs of local commuters, students, tourists, and residents. ÜSTRA is committed to sustainability, as evidenced by its ongoing transition to electric buses and the introduction of affordable ticket options like the nationwide Deutschlandticket. The company's vision focuses on fostering a modern and accessible public transport network that adapts to the evolving mobility needs of the community. Despite facing financial challenges, ÜSTRA continues to innovate and improve its services, with plans to form a joint operation with regiobus starting January 1, 2025, aimed at streamlining services and enhancing connectivity for passengers. The company's dedication to customer satisfaction is reflected in its repeated recognition for high service quality. Through strategic initiatives and ongoing investments in infrastructure and technology, ÜSTRA strives to contribute to a greener and more accessible urban environment, positioning itself as a leader in the public transport sector.

Name: ODEG - Ostdeutsche Eisenbahn GmbH
Company description: ODEG - Ostdeutsche Eisenbahn GmbH is a prominent regional railway company operating primarily in northeastern Germany, specifically in the states of Berlin, Brandenburg, and Mecklenburg-Vorpommern. The company specializes in providing both passenger and freight services, with a strong commitment to enhancing mobility and accessibility for all. ODEG's mission revolves around delivering reliable and comfortable transportation options, catering to a diverse clientele that includes daily commuters, tourists, and local residents. The company actively engages in community initiatives, offering special programs aimed at older adults and career changers, thereby fostering inclusivity in public transport. In collaboration with local authorities and partners, such as the Verkehrsgesellschaft Mecklenburg-Vorpommern (VMV), ODEG continuously seeks to expand its services and improve the overall travel experience for its clients. The company places a high priority on environmental sustainability, exemplified by projects like the eco-friendly Bitterfeld station, which incorporates a photovoltaic system and green roofing. ODEG serves approximately 27.7 million passengers annually, connecting urban and rural areas through efficient and sustainable public transportation solutions. The company is dedicated to social responsibility, as demonstrated by its training programs for future train drivers and service staff, ensuring a skilled workforce to meet the growing demands of the regional transport network. ODEG fosters a family-like work environment, welcoming new talent and encouraging employee participation in shaping the future of mobility. With a focus on customer satisfaction and community engagement, ODEG aims to be a key player in the ongoing transformation of public transportation in the region, emphasizing compliance with ethical standards and environmental responsibility in all its operations.

Name: Eurobahn GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: Seit 1999 betreiben wir unter dem Markennamen „eurobahn“ modernen öffentlichen Schienenpersonennahverkehr (SPNV). Seit dem 01. Januar 2022 lautet unser Unternehmensname analog unserem Markennamen, die eurobahn GmbH & Co.KG. Wir verantworten insgesamt vier Verkehrsnetze in Nordrhein Westfalen, Niedersachsen und grenzüberschreitend in die Niederlande. Das gesamte Streckennetz umfasst rund 16,7 Millionen Zug-Kilometer. Seit Dezember 2016 bedienen wir zudem die innerdeutsche Strecke des Thalys zwischen Köln, Aachen und Dortmund. Um den internationalen Hochgeschwindigkeitszug mit bis zu 320 Stundenkilometern steuern zu dürfen, werden unsere Triebfahrzeugführer*innen zusätzlich hochqualifiziert weitergebildet.  Mit rund 900 Mitarbeitern (Stand: Januar 2023) – davon knapp 2/3 im Bordbereich tätig– befördern wir täglich rund 100.000 Reisende im Regionalverkehr.

Name: Aarsleff Rail A/S
Company description: Aarsleff Rail A/S er et førende dansk jernbaneentreprenørselskab. Vi har kompetencer inden for alle banetekniske discipliner og har gjort det til vores speciale at udtænke, planlægge og udføre alle former for infrastrukturprojekter på og omkring det danske jernbanenet.  Vi har fokus på effektive og innovative løsninger, og vores standarder for projektledelse og professionelt samarbejde er høje. Det gælder både før, under og efter projekterne, og vi stræber altid efter at levere den bedste løsning til vores kunder. Vi har søsterselskaber i Sverige og Norge og udfører opgaver i alle landene, ligesom vi arbejder i Tyskland. Vi beskæftiger ca. 750 medarbejdere og indgår i den internationalt positionerede Aarsleff-koncern. Læs mere om os på www.aarsleffrail.com

Name: Conway - The Convenience Company S.A.
HQ Location: Spain, Castille-la Mancha, Quer, Calle Vega Del Henares S/n Parcela Nº6, 19209
Company description: Conway es una empresa líder en el mercado de la conveniencia en España. La compañía opera en los sectores de la restauración organizada, servicio al viajero y tiendas de conveniencia de todo tipo. El modelo de negocio de Conway está basado en mejorar la eficiencia y rentabilidad del negocio de sus clientes proporcionándoles soluciones como mayorista y soluciones de distribución logística integral. Más de 7.600 clientes (restaurantes, minimarkets, estaciones de servicio, aeropuertos, estaciones de tren, etc...) en España, Portugal y Francia confían en la amplia gama de productos de Conway, en su logística flexible y sus servicios diseñados a medida.  Queremos contribuir al éxito de nuestros clientes ofreciendo un servicio integral tanto en el sector de Restauración como en el de Conveniencia: un modelo de negocio probado y exitoso, enfocado a mejorar la rentabilidad de nuestros clientes, en el que integramos todas las funciones relevantes de la cadena de suministro. Para ello, ofrecemos nuestro know-how como mayoristas y gestores de la cadena de suministro, tras más de 25 años de experiencia en el mercado español. La compañía respeta la legalidad vigente, vela por la igualdad de oportunidades entre hombres y mujeres, por su desarrollo profesional a través de planes de formación multidisciplinares establecidos con carácter anual, y por el equilibrio personal y laboral de sus trabajadores. Conway pertenece al grupo Lekkerland, que opera en cinco países europeos. En 2020, Lekkerland contaba con más de 85.800 puntos de venta y 5.000 empleados. El volumen de negocio superó los 13.100 millones de euros. Desde 2020, Lekkerland forma parte del Grupo REWE, uno de los principales grupos de alimentación y turismo en Alemania y Europa. En 2020, el Grupo REWE alcanzó una facturación de 75.000 millones de euros. El Grupo REWE, fundado en 1927, está presente en 22 países europeos con unos 384.000 empleados.

Name: HOPTRANS
HQ Location: Lithuania, Ramučiai, 13 Silvestro Zukausko St., lt-54464
Company description: HOPTRANS is a constantly growing transport and logistics company serving its clients with own 1600+ trucks all over Europe.    Established in 1993, Hoptrans earned its name as being reliable, innovative and customer-oriented international #logistics provider. We specialize in road, air, rail, sea, #multimodal & #intermodal freight and organize entire projects for E-commerce business.   Our core strength lies in the strategic utilization of our own assets, ensuring a seamless and controlled process from start to finish. This approach not only guarantees reliability but also allows us to uphold the highest standards of #operational efficiency. We prioritize client satisfaction through a laser-focused approach, consistently adapting to their requirements with unparalleled flexibility. With a steadfast dedication to total #process control, employee excellence, client-centricity, flexibility, and swift problem-solving, our aim is to ensure smoothest possible #transport and logistics services.

Name: ΣΤΑΘΕΡΕΣ ΣΥΓΚΟΙΝΩΝΙΕΣ Α.Ε.
Company description: Urban Rail Transport S.A was founded on June 17th, 2011. The new company incorporated the three rail companies that existed up to that point: AMEL S.A (metro system operation), ISAP S.A (urban rail), and TRAM S.A. (tramway). The incorporation of all three companies to one, aims at reducing costs through economies of scale and at providing integrated services that will promote the use of public transport throughout Athens, both for residents and for visitors. Our primary goal remains to identify and meet the needs of our customers in the most efficient way. As a company, we wish to deliver a safe, reliable, environment friendly and comfortable means of transport. Rest assured that our staff strives daily to raise the quality of our offered services, to the highest standards.

Name: Reining Transport
Company description: Reining is een complete logistieke dienstverlener gespecialiseerd in Volumevervoer en Warehousing. Wij zijn continu op zoek naar optimale oplossingen voor logistieke vraagstukken. Door onze schaalgrootte en professionaliteit kunnen we de gehele logistiek voor een klant uitvoeren. Daarbij denken we niet in standaardoplossingen. Reining verplaatst zich in uw situatie en denkt voortdurend met u mee om tot de juiste aanpak te komen van uw vraagstuk. Een belangrijk motto van onze dienstverlening is leveringsbetrouwbaarheid. Wij kunnen dat garanderen door de vastlegging en voortdurende toetsing van gemaakte afspraken en werkprocessen. Wij zijn een innovatief bedrijf en zijn ons goed bewust van de hedendaagse milieuproblematiek. Maatschappelijk verantwoord ondernemen staat bij ons dan ook centraal in de bedrijfsvoering. Reining in cijfers  - 375 FTE  - 330 trucks  - 100.000 transport orders  - Warehouse: 100.000 m²  - 4 Europese vestigingen

Name: Riksja Travel
Company description: Riksja Travel is een reisorganisatie die zich al meer dan 20 jaar richt op het aanbieden van individuele reizen naar meer dan 70 bestemmingen wereldwijd. Met een sterke focus op verantwoord reizen, stelt het bedrijf unieke reisroutes samen die zijn ontworpen om reizigers een authentieke ervaring te bieden, weg van de massa. Klanten kunnen hun eigen reis plannen met handpicked accommodaties en activiteiten, waarbij lokale ondernemers worden ondersteund. Riksja Travel is trots op zijn team van 120 bestemmingsexperts, die hun persoonlijke reiservaringen delen om reizigers te helpen bij het creëren van hun ideale avontuur. De organisatie streeft ernaar om de wereld een beetje mooier te maken door samen te werken met lokale partners die de cultuur en natuur van hun land respecteren en bevorderen.

Name: Regionalverkehre Start Deutschland GmbH
Company description: Direkt im Regionalnetz, direkt am Kunden Die Mobilität der Zukunft liegt auf der Schiene. Schon heute schlägt das Herz des Nahverkehrs im weitverzweigten S- und Regionalbahnnetz. Millionen Menschen nutzen täglich die Angebote auf der Schiene, um stressfrei, umweltfreundlich und kosteneffizient ans Ziel zu kommen. Die aktuelle SPNV Ausschreibungspraxis und die Länderhoheit haben zu einer neuen Dynamik im Eisenbahnverkehr geführt. Zahlreiche Unternehmen betreten die regionalen Märkte und wetteifern um Aufträge, Kunden und die Markthoheit. Diese unterschiedlichen Angebote sind für Fahrgäste schwer zu durchschauen, jeder neue Marktteilnehmer beeinflusst den Aufbau zukunftsfähiger und flexibler Mobilitätsstrukturen. Die Regionalverkehre Start Deutschland GmbH mit Sitz in Frankfurt am Main bricht diese Situation auf. Wir bewerben uns mit bedarfs- und lösungsorientierten Konzepten um die Ausschreibungen für regionale Schienenverkehrsverträge und betreiben die gewonnenen Verkehrsnetze mit einem klaren Blick für aktuelle und zukünftige Beförderungsbedarfe. Wir engagieren uns mit passgenauen Lösungen direkt vor Ort, brechen das traditionelle Bestandsdenken auf und schaffen so Freiraum für Lösungen, die das Schienennetz, den Kunden und die Zukunft der Beförderung enger miteinander verknüpfen. start wurde 2016 als Tochter der DB Regio AG gegründet. Obwohl wir in unserer Arbeit jederzeit auf die Kompetenzen unserer Konzernmutter zurückgreifen können, ist start zuallererst ein agiles Unternehmen mit Start-up-Atmosphäre.  Unser Anspruch an die Wertschöpfung liefert die vom Aufgabenträger definierte Qualität zum bestmöglichen Preis. Das Ergebnis ist ein klarer, anforderungsgerechter und kosteneffizienter Personennahverkehr, der insbesondere in ländlichen Gebieten eine unverzichtbare Alternative zum Straßenverkehr darstellt. Die Attraktivität der Schiene wird nachhaltig gesteigert und für den Fahrgast zum wichtigsten Argument für den Umstieg. Impressum: startgmbh.com/impressum

Name: SŽ
Company description: Slovenian rail freight and passenger operator and infrastructure manager. Passenger transport division – Provides the inland and international transport of passengers and offers many attractive possibilities for private and official journeys by train. Freight transport division – Offers the transport of goods in Slovenia and abroad, and not just on the railway but also in combination with other types of transport.  Infrastructure division – Takes care of the running and general repairs of the Slovenian railway infrastructure, and of railway traffic management.

Name: National Express Rail GmbH
Company description: National Express Rail GmbH is a prominent railway transportation company operating throughout North Rhine-Westphalia (NRW), Germany. The company specializes in providing reliable and efficient rail services, including regional express and local train lines, with a commitment to modern technology and passenger comfort. National Express aims to enhance mobility in the region, ensuring workplace security and competitive pay for its employees, including train drivers and administrative staff. The company values inclusivity and welcomes applicants from diverse backgrounds, reflecting its mission to create a supportive work environment. With a focus on customer satisfaction and operational excellence, National Express serves a wide range of clients, including daily commuters and travelers, while partnering with local authorities and transportation networks to improve regional connectivity.

Name: OUIGO España
Company description: Llega OUIGO, una forma diferente, cómoda y económica de viajar. Nuestros trenes de alta velocidad y sus  billetes a bajo precio van a hacer que Madrid, Barcelona, Zaragoza y Tarragona estén más cerca que nunca. Redescubre con nosotros el placer de viajar.

Name: Graz-Köflacher Bahn Und Busbetrieb Gmbh
