Company description: Graz-Köflacher Bahn und Busbetrieb GmbH (GKB) is a prominent transportation company based in Graz, Austria, specializing in rail and bus services in the West Styria region. The company is set to launch its electric train operations on the S6 line of the Styrian S-Bahn starting August 4, 2025, marking a significant milestone in its commitment to modernizing public transport and enhancing regional connectivity. GKB aims to provide efficient, environmentally friendly, and customer-oriented mobility solutions, with a focus on improving travel times and service frequency, particularly in conjunction with the upcoming Koralmbahn project. Its clientele includes local commuters, tourists, and businesses, while partnerships with regional authorities and transport organizations help facilitate a comprehensive public transport network. GKB's vision is to lead the way in sustainable mobility, contributing to the economic and social development of the region.

Name: HSL Helsingin Seudun Liikenne
Company description: HSL Helsingin seudun liikenne vastaa 66 prosentista Suomen joukkoliikennematkoista. HSL:llä on tärkeä rooli pääkaupunkiseudun asukkaiden arjessa: meidän liikenteessämme tehdään yli miljoona matkaa päivittäin bussilla, junalla, metrolla, ratikalla tai lautalla. Liikevaihtomme on noin 600 milj. euroa vuodessa. Meitä joukkoliikenteen ammattilaisia on reilu 400 ja olemme ylpeitä työstämme. Liity joukkoomme kehittämään helppoa, toimivaa ja luotettavaa Helsingin seutua. HSL Helsinki Region Transport is responsible for about 60% of all public transport journeys in Finland. HSL plays a key role in the everyday lives of the metropolitan area residents:  every day, over one million journeys are made on our bus, train, Metro, tram and ferry services. Our annual turnover is about 600 million euros. HSL employs over 400 public transport professionals that are proud of their work. Join us to develop well-functioning Helsinki region with reliable services for easier everyday life.

Name: ARRIVA Slovakia
Company description: ARRIVA worldwide ARRIVA is European provider of passenger transport and was acquired by Deutsche Bahn in August 2010. On European market ARRIVA operates in 14 countries local buses, inter-urban commuter coaches, local, regional and national train services, trams and waterbuses. ARRIVA in Slovakia ARRIVA operates in Slovakia since 2008 and is the strongest private player in bus multimodal transport provider in Slovak Republic. Actually operates in four regions regional transport and in 19 cities city transport, bike sharing systems in Nitra (ariva bike) and in Žilina (BikeKIA). Operation is guaranted by: ARRIVA NITRA a. s., ARRIVA Nové Zámky, a. s., ARRIVA Michalovce, a. s., ARRIVA Trnava, a.s., ARRIVA Liorbus, a.s.. ARRIVA employs in Slovakia 2.400 employees and operates more than 1.350 buses.  ARRIVA in Slovakia transports more than 70 million passengers and drives more than 72 million km yearly. The ARRIVA group contains following companies in Slovakia: ARRIVA Slovakia a.s. ARRIVA NITRA a.s. ARRIVA Nové Zámky, a.s. ARRIVA Michalovce, a.s. ARRIVA Trnava, a.s. ARRIVA Liorbus, a.s. ARRIVA Service s.r.o.

Name: LOTOS Kolej
Company description: LOTOS Kolej Sp. z o. o. - Spółka Kapitałowa Grupy LOTOS S.A.

Name: De Jong Intra Vakanties
Company description: De Jong Intra Vakanties is een toonaangevende reisorganisatie die zich richt op het aanbieden van unieke en op maat gemaakte vakanties, met een sterke focus op de Verenigde Staten. Het bedrijf heeft als missie om reizigers te inspireren en te ondersteunen bij het plannen van hun ideale vakantie, waarbij ze praktische informatie en tips verstrekken om de reis zo soepel mogelijk te laten verlopen. De Jong Intra Vakanties streeft ernaar om reizigers een onvergetelijke ervaring te bieden door middel van zorgvuldig samengestelde rondreizen en vakantiepakketten, waarbij zowel de natuurlijke schoonheid als de culturele diversiteit van de bestemmingen worden belicht.  Het bedrijf bedient een breed scala aan klanten, van gezinnen tot avontuurlijke reizigers, en richt zich voornamelijk op de Nederlandse markt. De Jong Intra Vakanties werkt samen met diverse partners in de reisindustrie om een uitgebreid aanbod van bestemmingen en thema's te bieden, wat bijdraagt aan de kwaliteit en klanttevredenheid. Met een sterke nadruk op het creëren van authentieke ervaringen en een zorgeloze vakantie, overtreft het bedrijf de verwachtingen van haar klanten door hen te voorzien van gedetailleerde informatie en persoonlijke service. De Jong Intra Vakanties is daarmee een betrouwbare keuze voor reizigers die op zoek zijn naar unieke en onvergetelijke vakanties naar de Verenigde Staten.

Name: IVU Traffic Technologies AG
Company description: IVU Traffic Technologies has been working for over 40 years with more than 500 engineers to ensure punctual and reliable transport in the world’s metropolises. In growing cities, people and vehicles are constantly on the move – a logistical challenge that calls for intelligent and secure software systems. The integrated standard products of the IVU.suite work to plan, optimise and control the deployment of buses, trains and employees, provide passengers with real-time information, secure connections, collect data and ensure efficiency. IVU. SYSTEMS FOR VIBRANT CITIES.

Name: WVG-Gruppe
Company description: Wir sind die WVG-Gruppe. Wir sind viele: die kommunalen Verkehrsunternehmen RLG (Regionalverkehr Ruhr-Lippe GmbH), RVM (Regionalverkehr Münsterland GmbH), VBK (Verkehrsbetrieb Kipp GmbH), VKU (Verkehrsgesellschaft Kreis Unna mbH) und die WLE (Westfälische Landes-Eisenbahn). Und eben die WVG (Westfälische Verkehrsgesellschaft mbH) mit Sitz in Münster als Geschäftsführungsgesellschaft. Unser Verkehrsgebiet umfasst die Kreise Borken, Coesfeld, Steinfurt, Warendorf, Unna, Soest und den Hochsauerlandkreis sowie die beiden kreisfreien Städte Hamm und Münster mit insgesamt rund 2,3 Millionen Einwohnerinnen und Einwohnern. Damit sind wir in Deutschland das größte Regionalverkehrsunternehmen in kommunaler Hand. Optimale Organisation Mit einer dezentralen Steuerung vor Ort in Betrieben RLG, RVM, VBK, VKU und WLE und der Zusammenfassung aller sinnvoll zentralisierbaren Aufgaben in der Geschäftsleitung mit Sitz in Münster, setzen wir als WVG-Gruppe für unsere kommunalen Eigentümer eine optimale Organisationsstruktur um: kurze Wege, örtliche Kompetenz und alle Vorteile einer großen Unternehmensgruppe. Passgenaue Mobilitätsangebote Wir arbeiten innovativ und flexibel an Lösungen für die Herausforderungen von heute und morgen. In enger Abstimmung mit unseren Eigentümern, Kundinnen und Kunden entwickeln wir passgenaue und nachhaltige Mobilitätsangebote. Ob mit dem Bus oder Zug, ob für unsere Kreise, Kommunen oder Unternehmen – wir sind #TeilderLösung.  https://www.wvg-online.de/impressum https://www.wvg-online.de/datenschutz

Name: Van Rooijen Logistiek
Company description: Vanuit onze vestigingen in Eindhoven (NL) en Turnhout (B) bedienen wij onzen opdrachtgevers. Ons werkgebied is voornamelijk de Benelux en Duitsland in de sectoren Fast Moving Consumer Goods, zoals food en zoetwaren, personal care products, consumer electronics, farmaceutische, medische producten (GDP), cosmetica, displays, textiel etc.  Door de mogelijkheid van opslag, warehousing (125.000m2)  en transport vanaf 1 kilogram tot volle vrachten, kunnen wij onze klanten bedienen volgens het one-stop shopping principe. We realiseren dit met ca. 600 Van Rooijen medewerkers en 240 eigen trekkende eenheden in een continue dienst. Van Rooijen beschikt op haar terrein over de Rail Terminal Eindhoven welke opgericht is in 2001 en een dagelijkse verbinding heeft met de Rotterdamse haven (ECT Maasvlakte en Hanno-Uniport). Op de terminal worden uw containers gelost en verder verwerkt.

Name: Greenwheels
Company description: Our history and purpose In 1995 Greenwheels started car sharing service in The Netherlands with the ambition to make streets more liveable by reducing stationary cars on the street and improve the efficiency of car usage. A recent study (vananaare.nl) shows that every new Greenwheels member takes 14 cars off the street and every Greenwheels car is being shared by approximately 30 active drivers.  Our locations A lot of people and businesses have joined our platform. Nowadays they share almost 2.800 cars in The Netherlands, making us the #1 car sharing company here.  Customers We serve private customers across The Netherlands. We also provide car sharing services to businesses and organisations, which a portfolio containing freelancers, SME's and a few of the biggest corporations in the Netherlands. There's the option to make use of our public fleet (cars on the streets), as well as their 'own' cars that can be shared amongst company employees only. Our partners We work together with other mobility partners, including NS, Mobiliteitsfabriek, and Shuttel. Their mobility services include the offering of Greenwheels. With NS we provide door to door services that can include train, OV bikes and Greenwheels cars. How it works Our app can be used to register an account and to book and open a car. Registering and booking is also possible via our website.

Name: DSW21
Company description: DSW21 provides local transport in Dortmund - buses and trains ensure movement. Dortmund is also one of the largest metropolises in Germany, a city that lives and makes structural change tangible. The DSW21 Group as an infrastructure company is part of this city and its development. Entrepreneurial action is required in order to provide services of the best quality every day. In addition, it is important to initiate and advance new projects to develop the Dortmund location. Lighthouse projects like the PhoenixSee are visible signs of the quality of implementation. The employees of the 21er Group are committed to this city and the location. Imprint: https://www.bus-und-bahn.de/impressum

Name: Transdev Ireland
Company description: Transdev is one of the largest public transport operators in Europe with a reputation for delivering high quality local public transport. Transdev is active in all aspects of public transport provision from the organisation and management of major projects to the development of passenger services and the operation of networks. Every year 3.3 billion passengers' travel on Transdev's tram, metro, train, transport on demand, bus and coach networks. In Ireland we operate Luas  - Dublin’s Light Rail Tram System. Last Year 48.5 million passenger journeys were made on  Luas. Our teams here and abroad use our wealth of local knowledge and international experience to bring public transport services to the heart of communities.  Whether you're commuting to work or school, or just taking a leisurely trip, we work hard to make your journey smooth and enjoyable!

Name: HEBO
Company description: DIT IS HEBO MARITIEMSERVICE... HEBO is een Maritieme dienstverlener in de breedste zin van het woord. Dagelijks houden onze teams zich bezig met olie- en calamiteitenbestrijding, transporten, hijswerkzaamheden, bergingen en een scala aan ondersteunende diensten op en rondom het water. En dat zowel in binnen- als buitenland.  Onze sterke punten: ✔ Specialistisch equipment voor élke taak ✔ 24/7 bereikbaar ✔ Sterke focus op risicobeheersing We zijn altijd op zoek naar de meest veilige, efficiënte en aantrekkelijke oplossingen voor onze klanten. Kwaliteit, veiligheid en duurzaamheid staan bij ons centraal.  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- DIT MAAKT ONS ZO'N INTERESSANTE WERKGEVER: Ben je op zoek naar een veelzijdige baan, waarin je de kans krijgt om te groeien? Hou je van afwisseling en een no-nonsense werkcultuur? Hou dan onze LinkedIn pagina goed in de gaten en blijf op de hoogte van de nieuwste vacatures! Daarom is HEBO zo'n leuke werkgever: ✔ Veel variatie in je werk, geen dag is hetzelfde ✔ Een gezond en betrouwbaar bedrijf ✔ Volop kans voor persoonlijke groei en ontwikkeling Meer weten over HEBO? ↠ Ga naar www.hebo.eu of mail naar info@hebo.eu

Name: ARRIVA TRANSPORT ČESKÁ REPUBLIKA A.s.
Company description: Arriva is the bus market leader in the Czech Republic, operating in majority of districts in the country. Today, Arriva has an overall share of 20 per cent of the bus market and has an emerging position in the rail market.  Bus: Entered bus market in 2006 Rail: Entered Rail market in 2013 2000 buses and 35 trolleybuses 5 trains 3200 employees 115 million passengers annually

Name: Toyota Material Handling Nederland
Company description: Toyota Material Handling Nederland is een toonaangevende leverancier van heftrucks en logistieke oplossingen, gericht op het verbeteren van veiligheid en efficiëntie binnen magazijnactiviteiten. Het bedrijf heeft recent een strategische samenwerking aangekondigd met de Belgische startup BlooLoc, die een geavanceerd Real Time Location System (RTLS) heeft ontwikkeld, wat bijdraagt aan de optimalisatie van processen en de veiligheid van werknemers. Met een sterke focus op continue verbetering, zoals weerspiegeld in hun toepassing van het Kaizen-principe, streeft Toyota Material Handling naar duurzame bedrijfsvoering en heeft het een Gouden medaille van EcoVadis ontvangen voor zijn inspanningen op het gebied van milieu en ethiek. Hun klantenbestand omvat een breed scala aan bedrijven die afhankelijk zijn van efficiënte en veilige logistieke oplossingen, en het bedrijf richt zich op het bieden van innovatieve technologieën die de productiviteit van truckvloten verbeteren. Toyota Material Handling Nederland is vastbesloten om zijn klanten te ondersteunen met hoogwaardige producten en diensten, terwijl het zich inzet voor een duurzame toekomst.

Name: SETA S.p.A.
Company description: SETA S.p.A. is a prominent public transport operator in Italy, specifically serving the provinces of Modena, Reggio Emilia, and Piacenza. Established on January 1, 2012, through the merger of several local transport companies, SETA has become a key player in the public transport sector, providing essential bus and trolleybus services to over 1.5 million residents across a territory of 7,565 square kilometers. The company's mission is to enhance the quality of life in the communities it serves by ensuring accessible, efficient, and environmentally sustainable transport solutions. SETA is committed to continuous improvement and innovation, investing significantly in fleet modernization and advanced technologies to enhance service quality and safety. The company serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, students, and individuals with disabilities, ensuring that public transport remains a viable and attractive option for all. SETA collaborates closely with local authorities and mobility agencies to align its services with regional needs, integrating its operations with regional rail networks for seamless travel. With a strong emphasis on sustainability, SETA has implemented eco-friendly practices, including the use of hydrogen and electric vehicles, to reduce carbon emissions and improve urban livability. SETA also prioritizes employee welfare and development, offering comprehensive training programs and initiatives to support social inclusion, particularly for marginalized groups. The company actively engages with local communities and partners, fostering job opportunities and promoting responsible public transport usage. Through its commitment to transparency, customer engagement, and corporate social responsibility, SETA aims to position itself as a leader in sustainable public transport solutions in the Emilia-Romagna region.

Name: Taxi Dorenbos
Company description: Taxi Dorenbos, gevestigd in Norg, is een veelzijdig mobiliteitsbedrijf dat zich richt op het bieden van hoogwaardige transportdiensten, waaronder taxi- en touringcarverhuur, Schiphol vervoer, en schade- en bergingsdiensten door heel Nederland. Met een sterke focus op klanttevredenheid en een service met een glimlach, streeft Dorenbos ernaar om de koning van de klant te zijn in alles wat met mobiliteit te maken heeft. Het bedrijf werkt samen met diverse partners, waaronder BOVAG garages en Total tankstations, en bedient een breed scala aan klanten in de regio Drenthe en Groningen. Dorenbos B.V. is toegewijd aan het waarborgen van privacy en gegevensbeveiliging, en biedt transparante communicatie over de verwerking van persoonsgegevens. Met een missie om mobiliteit toegankelijk en betrouwbaar te maken, blijft Taxi Dorenbos zich inzetten voor het verbeteren van hun diensten en het voldoen aan de behoeften van hun klanten.

Name: Unicom Tranzit
HQ Location: Romania, Ilfov, Voluntari, Bd. Pipera Nr. 1-ia Et. 3-5, 077190
Company description: Unicom Tranzit is one of the top 3 private rail freight carriers and forwarders operating in Romania since 1994. We are part of the Unicom Group. The company’s philosophy is based on the following principles: • our clients are treated as partners and we are aware that our success depends on their success; • we try to attract and train people who want to excel and are able to capitalize on our material resources and to value especially themselves; • we maintain a fleet of performant and diversified rolling stock, capable of efficiently meeting the requirements of rail transport. As mentioned before, one of the strengths of our company is the competence of our team. This is made up of positive, intelligent people, keen to continuously improve the way we work and find the best solutions for our clients. Their training allows us to offer superior quality services that we strive to improve on a permanent basis. We want to distinguish ourselves through the consistency with which we fulfill our commitments to our customers. We act on the principle that every customer is entitled to have the following expectations from us: • to carry out in a timely and safe manner the engaged services; • to maintain a relationship based on trust and transparency, fully informing the customer about any problem that has arisen and promptly acting to solve it; • to learn from and adapt to our customer's requirements in order to help our customer optimize his business and logistics processes; • to efficiently manage our resources and support our customer in his effort to be as competitive as possible on the market. The rail transport system can be viewed as a vascular system of the modern economy. Its role is to bring the necessary resources to the right place at the right time. In this system, our company represents several arteries that, when we fulfill our mission, the parts that depend on us (our customers and partners) grow, develop and thus we thrive together.

Name: Ferrocarrils De La Generalitat De Catalunya
Company description: Ferrocarrils de la Generalitat de Catalunya (FGC) is a public transportation company that operates a network of rail services in Catalonia, primarily focusing on the Barcelona-Vallès and Llobregat-Anoia lines. The company is dedicated to providing efficient, safe, and sustainable transport solutions, with a mission to enhance mobility for all users, including students through its specialized school train service. FGC also emphasizes the preservation of its historical railway heritage, showcased in its exhibition spaces like the Espacio de la vía métrica and the Espacio Expositivo de la Cochera de Rubí, which display vintage locomotives and educate the public about the evolution of rail transport in the region. Its clientele includes daily commuters, students, and tourists, while partnerships with educational institutions support its initiatives for school transportation. FGC aims to foster a more sustainable and accessible transport system, contributing to the overall improvement of urban mobility in Catalonia.

Name: Easytrip Transport Services
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Dordrecht, 122 Jacobus Lipsweg, 3316
Company description: Keeping your fleet moving smoothly, across borders and through every step of the journey - that's our promise. Easytrip Transport Services, a member of 360PAY group, is an expert in delivering mobility services. As a one-stop-shop we facilitate your day-to-day journeys, providing convenience, choice and competitive pricing on a broad range of services:  -	Toll payment: Enhance your travel experience with our flexible Toll solutions designed to optimize your journeys across Europe. Benefit from extensive range of local and interoperable devices covering 29 countries. -	Parking payment:   Pay for secure parking facilities across Europe, ensuring the tranquility of your drivers and the safety of their loads with the convenience of our Toll Boxes.  -	Ferry – Train- Tunnels Bookings: Benefit from exclusive 24/7 online portal to simplify your connections between Road, Train, and Sea transports. Book across 700 lines and all Alpine Tunnels with just few clicks!  -	VAT and Excise refunds: Get your VAT & Excise Duty refunded quickly and easily! Let Easytrip team of more than 50 Experts handle the VAT paperwork for you in over 30 countries and Excise refund in 7 countries.  -	Telematics: Maximize your profitability with our Telematics solutions tailored to your fleet management needs. -	Posted Drivers support: Get your certificate for all your cabotage and cross-trade journeys in Europe and be compliant with the European Mobility Package. -	Fuel Cards: Fuel up at more than 29.000 gas stations in 36 European countries. With a wealth of over 35 years of broad knowledge and presence in the International Transports sector, we help you manage your operations with ease from mobility to financial services. With 17 local teams through Europe, serving over 16 000 customers, we have a dynamic and multilingual team constantly striving to provide you with the best service. Our aim is to exclusively treat each client to always deliver the right tailored solutions.

Name: ÖBB-Personenverkehr AG
Company description: ÖBB-Personenverkehr AG is a leading provider of passenger transport services in Austria, operating as a subsidiary of the ÖBB Group. The company specializes in delivering safe, reliable, and environmentally friendly rail and bus transportation solutions, with a mission to enhance mobility and connectivity for all citizens. ÖBB-Personenverkehr AG serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and business travelers, and collaborates with various partners, including local governments and transportation authorities, to improve service quality and expand its network. The company is committed to sustainability, aiming to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and promote public transport as a viable alternative to road travel. In 2024, ÖBB-Personenverkehr AG achieved a significant milestone by welcoming over 511 million passengers, reflecting a growing trend towards public transport usage. The company is dedicated to continuous modernization, investing significantly in new rolling stock and infrastructure projects, such as the upcoming Koralm Railway, to ensure a reliable and efficient transport system for the future. ÖBB-Personenverkehr AG emphasizes safety, punctuality, and customer satisfaction, striving to provide high-quality services that meet the evolving demands of its customers. The company actively engages in research and development initiatives to integrate innovative technologies and improve operational efficiency. Its vision includes achieving climate neutrality by 2040, with interim targets for reducing emissions and increasing the electrification of its rail network. ÖBB-Personenverkehr AG also focuses on accessibility, aiming for 90% of passengers to travel barrier-free by 2027. Through its commitment to sustainability and innovation, ÖBB-Personenverkehr AG plays a crucial role in promoting eco-friendly travel options and enhancing the overall quality of public transport in Austria.

Name: CargoNet AS
Company description: Intermodal transport based on rail is our core business. Our customers are carriers, freight forwarders, shipping companies and logistics companies. In 2014, CargoNet relieved the roads in Norway of about 525 articulated lorries every day, throughout the year.   Our shuttle trains carry trailers, swap bodies and containers from 20 to 45 feet as well as tanks. CargoNet carries freight for industry and commerce in an efficient shuttle net of intermodal terminals in Norway with connections to/from Sweden and the rest of Europe.

Name: Gruppo Spinelli
Company description: Il Gruppo Spinelli è dal 1963 sinonimo di logistica, grazie alla sua presenza diffusa e capillare su tutto il territorio nazionale. Le business units del Gruppo permettono di offrire servizi integrati che rispondono alle esigenze di tutta la filiera logistica: terminal portuale, trasporto intermodale, camionistico, warehousing, aree di deposito, riparazione, compravendita container ed operazioni doganali.  L’attività storica del Gruppo è quella del trasporto su gomma che si svolge nelle basi operative di Genova, Padova, Livorno, Milano (Arluno), La Spezia (Santo Stefano Magra) e Reggio Emilia (Dinazzano) e si avvale di oltre 600 mezzi di proprietà.  I centri intermodali di Reggio Emilia, Padova e Milano movimentano ogni anno circa treni che trasportano le merci verso i più importanti porti italiani: Genova, Livorno e La Spezia, dove sono localizzate altre strutture intermodali di proprietà.  La divisione GPT del Gruppo Spinelli opera nel Porto di Genova offrendo servizi di imbarco/sbarco di containers, ro-ro e merce varia e movimentando annualmente volumi superiori ai 500.000 TEUs. Le recenti acquisizioni di quote di Terminal Rinfuse Genova Srl e di Salerno Container Terminal-SCT S.p.a, hanno ulteriormente sviluppato la divisione terminal. La divisione Depositi offre attività di riparazione, deposito, movimentazione e compravendita containers. Tale attività è svolta in strutture presenti presso i terminal interni di Milano (Arluno), Reggio Emilia (Dinazzano), Vignole Borbera, La Spezia, Livorno e nel porto di Genova e di Genova Pra’-Voltri.  Centro Servizi Derna srl e Consorzio Genova Distripark di Prà-Voltri si occupano dell’attività di warehousing, trasporti convenzionali ed eccezionali, depositi nazionali doganali e merci varie, imballaggi industriali. Saimare S.p.A. opera nel settore delle spedizioni con una presenza diretta nei principali porti italiani, tra cui Genova, Savona Vado, La Spezia, Napoli, Livorno, Cagliari e Gioia Tauro.

Name: Trenitalia Tper
Company description: Due nomi una sola società: Trenitalia Tper (70% Trenitalia 30% Tper) è la nuova impresa ferroviaria che si è aggiudicata la gara europea, bandita dalla Regione Emilia Romagna, per la gestione del trasporto ferroviario regionale. Con oltre 1450 dipendenti e la flotta di treni regionali più giovane d’Italia, garantisce ogni giorno 900 collegamenti: un’offerta capillare che copre tutta la regione con alcune estensioni Lombardia, Liguria, Piemonte, Veneto e Marche. Fino a 165mila persone trasportate giornalmente.

Name: TheTravelClubNederland
Company description: TheTravelClubNederland is a pioneering travel agency dedicated to promoting sustainable tourism by crafting unique travel experiences that respect people, nature, and culture. The company's mission is to minimize the ecological footprint of travel while maximizing the positive impact on destinations, ensuring that future generations can enjoy the beauty of the world. Catering to environmentally conscious travelers, TheTravelClubNederland offers personalized travel advice and alternatives that reduce carbon emissions, such as train travel and eco-friendly accommodations. The agency collaborates with local communities and suppliers to foster responsible tourism practices, focusing on biodiversity, cultural preservation, and local economic support. By encouraging travelers to make informed choices, TheTravelClubNederland aims to create memorable journeys that contribute positively to both the traveler and the visited locations.

Name: Brescia Mobilità SpA
Company description: Brescia Mobilità SpA is a key player in the transportation sector, focusing on the development and management of urban mobility solutions in Brescia, Italy. The company is dedicated to providing efficient and sustainable public transport services, including buses and trams, to enhance the quality of life for residents and visitors alike. With a mission to promote environmentally friendly transportation options, Brescia Mobilità SpA aims to reduce carbon emissions and improve urban mobility through innovative solutions. The company collaborates with various partners, including Alstom and Hitachi Rail, to implement advanced technologies and infrastructure projects that support its vision of a connected and sustainable urban environment. Its target market includes local commuters, tourists, and businesses that rely on efficient public transport systems.

Name: Croatian Railways
Company description: Railroad company. Employs  Transport, Civil , Electrical , Informatics, Mechanical and other engineers. It's goal is to provide support and development of Infrastructure essential for rail transport. It is state owned, public company, constantly undertaking process of restructuring.

Name: Koleje Śląskie
Company description: Koleje Śląskie Sp. z o.o. to regionalny przewoźnik kolejowy, który koncentruje się na zapewnieniu dostępnego i komfortowego transportu kolejowego dla wszystkich pasażerów, w tym osób z niepełnosprawnościami. Misją firmy jest eliminowanie barier w dostępie do usług transportowych oraz tworzenie przyjaznego środowiska dla podróżnych, co jest integralną częścią jej strategii. Koleje Śląskie dążą do ciągłego doskonalenia swoich usług, w tym poprzez rozwój cyfrowych narzędzi, takich jak strona internetowa i aplikacja mobilna, które są zgodne z najwyższymi standardami dostępności. Klientami firmy są zarówno mieszkańcy regionu, jak i turyści, a partnerami lokalne instytucje kultury, z którymi współpracują w ramach programów promocyjnych. Dzięki innowacyjnym rozwiązaniom i zaangażowaniu w dostępność, Koleje Śląskie stają się liderem w regionie w zakresie transportu kolejowego.

Name: Rhein-Main-Verkehrsverbund GmbH
Company description: Rhein-Main-Verkehrsverbund GmbH (RMV) is a pivotal entity in the public transportation landscape of the Frankfurt Rhein-Main region, responsible for the planning, coordination, and financing of local transport services. The company is dedicated to promoting sustainable and efficient mobility solutions that cater to the needs of the community while contributing to the reduction of CO₂ emissions. RMV serves as a crucial link between various transport providers, political decision-makers, and passengers, striving to create an integrated and user-friendly transportation system. With a focus on enhancing public transport accessibility, RMV facilitates the movement of over 700 million passengers annually through a network that includes buses, trains, and innovative on-demand services. The company's mission emphasizes the importance of environmentally friendly transportation options and the improvement of infrastructure and service quality to meet the increasing demands of the region's population. RMV collaborates with local transport companies, municipalities, and stakeholders to eliminate barriers to public transport access, encouraging more residents to utilize its services. Among its innovative initiatives are the development of a cloud-based journey planning system, the introduction of the JobTicket to promote sustainable commuting, and the RMVplus app, which allows users to book various mobility services seamlessly. Targeting a diverse clientele that includes commuters, students, seniors, and tourists, RMV offers tailored mobility packages to businesses, enhancing employee satisfaction while contributing to environmental sustainability. The company is also at the forefront of pioneering projects, such as autonomous shuttles and alternative propulsion systems, leading the way in the mobility transition and climate protection efforts. With a vision for a sustainable and interconnected transport network, RMV is committed to facilitating a smooth transition towards multimodal mobility solutions that benefit the entire region.

Name: Trigion Traffic Support
Company description: Trigion Traffic Support is een toonaangevend bedrijf dat professionele verkeersbegeleiding biedt voor bouw- en infraprojecten. Met een team van gediplomeerde beroepsverkeersregelaars staat de organisatie garant voor de veiligheid van wegwerkers, de bereikbaarheid van bouwplaatsen en een optimale verkeersdoorstroming. De missie van Trigion Traffic Support is om een veilige werkomgeving te creëren en verkeershinder te minimaliseren, terwijl de visie gericht is op het onderhouden van goede contacten met diverse stakeholders voor een positieve bijdrage aan projecten. Hun klanten omvatten wegenbouwbedrijven en overheidsinstanties, en ze bieden een compleet dienstenpakket, waaronder instructie, projectmanagement en 24/7 ondersteuning. Trigion Traffic Support streeft ernaar om met hun expertise en ervaring een efficiënte en veilige verkeersbegeleiding te realiseren, zodat alle betrokken partijen zich kunnen concentreren op hun eigen taken.

Name: Zugvogel Speditions GmbH
HQ Location: Austria, Tyrol, Strass Im Zillertal, 190 Gewerbegebiet Nord, 6261
Company description: Zugvogel Speditions GmbH is a forward-thinking logistics company dedicated to sustainable transport practices that minimize environmental impact by reducing CO2 emissions and energy consumption. With a strong commitment to sustainability, the company employs energy-efficient vehicles and optimized route planning, ensuring that ecological responsibility is at the forefront of its operations. A key initiative is its subsidiary, Zugvogel Renewable Logistics GmbH, which specializes in comprehensive logistics solutions focused on renewable energy, essential for a greener future. The company collaborates with sustainable partners and utilizes advanced technologies, such as AI, to enhance efficiency and reduce fuel consumption. Zugvogel Speditions GmbH serves a diverse clientele, emphasizing intermodal transport solutions that combine road, rail, and sea transport to further decrease carbon footprints. Through ongoing employee training and internal environmental initiatives, the company fosters a culture of sustainability within its workforce.

Name: Entur AS
Company description: Entur AS is a Norwegian company that specializes in providing ticket sales for public transportation, including train journeys within Norway and across Europe. The company acts as an intermediary, allowing customers to purchase tickets through various channels such as the Entur app, the Entur website, and ticket machines at train stations. Entur's mission is to facilitate seamless travel experiences by offering comprehensive ticketing solutions while ensuring that customers are informed about the terms and conditions associated with their purchases. The company collaborates with multiple transport operators, including Vygruppen AS, SJ Norge AS, and GoAhead Norge AS, to serve a diverse clientele that includes both domestic and international travelers. By prioritizing customer service and real-time travel information, Entur aims to enhance the overall efficiency and convenience of public transport in Norway and beyond.

Name: Intermodaltrasporti
Company description: Our company was founded in 1987 by Pietro Fiorini and today is the leader of a group of companies operating in integrated logistics and multimodal transport. Among the most competitive companies in Europe, we work integrating road, rail and sea transport, using upstream and downstream warehouses and terminals for storage and transit time of goods. The choice of intermodal management allows us to offer logistics solutions that are efficient in terms of time, cost and eco-sustainability. The continuous process of growth and innovation, the international vocation, the use of highly qualified resources, the exclusive service level and the substantial specific investments in the sector make us a competitive, solid and reliable reality. Our mission is to create highly innovative and reliable solutions, customer-oriented in compliance with high-quality standards for all services offered. Through high-level partnerships with Europe's leading rail and maritime operators and thanks to our thirty years of experience in the field, we are able to offer quality, environmentally friendly freight traffic management that meets all customer needs. A solid logistics network and a large fleet of bulk and tank containers allow us to plan for the same shipment the ideal combination of different modes. The standardised loading units adapt to the technical and specific needs of the different types of transport, guaranteeing an efficient traffic system with a considerable reduction in the impact on the environment. Our company carries out its activities in an environmentally friendly way, minimizing CO2 emissions and making rail and sea transport the main vectors of use. Today we transport about 80% of our goods by rail and ship.

Name: Smet
Company description: SMET, led by CEO Cav. Domenico De Rosa, is a prominent player in the logistics and transportation sector, specializing in road, rail, and maritime services. The company is committed to enhancing road safety and promoting responsible driving behaviors, as evidenced by its support for the recent reforms to the Codice della Strada aimed at increasing penalties for dangerous driving and improving regulations for new drivers and electric scooters. SMET's mission revolves around fostering a culture of safety and responsibility among road users, particularly the youth, through education and proactive measures rather than solely punitive actions. The company collaborates with public and private sectors to improve infrastructure and implement advanced technologies, ensuring a comprehensive approach to road safety. SMET serves a diverse clientele, including individuals, businesses, and governmental organizations, all of whom benefit from its expertise in logistics and commitment to sustainable practices.

Name: Skånetrafiken
Company description: With Skånetrafiken, Skåne’s public transport service, you can travel to pretty much any town in Skåne. Furthermore, using the Öresund train, you can travel across the strait to Copenhagen, as well as all the way to Gothenburg,  Halland, Kronoberg and Kalmar counties. Skåne shall be open for everyone. We open up for possibilities and experiences. We open up for meetings, and a sense of belonging and community. We aim to make it easy to travel by any of our 14,000 daily bus and train departures. Please do follow us here to keep up to date with our news and upcoming vacancies. Working with us, you can deal with exciting social planning. Develop our public transport and infrastructure. Influence the everyday lives of hundreds of thousands of people.  If you are looking for work as a train host, train driver or bus driver, you will find vacancy information on the websites of the respective transport companies. All our bus and train services are outsourced and run by private bus and train companies.

Name: Skandia Container Terminal
Company description: CONTAINER  Scandinavia's largest container port lies in Gothenburg and is also the only port in the Nordic region with deep-sea direct calls to all parts of the world. Most of the goods are on their way to or from other parts of the world, either directly by transoceanic ship or by feeder ship via the continent. Skandia CT AB in the Port of Gothenburg has specific resources and competencies to meet these requirements. WE CREATE COMPETITIVE TRANSPORT SOLUTIONS  Quay productivity for ocean going ships of at least 100 units/hour.  Excellent geographical location to reach all parts of Scandinavia and the Baltics.  27 daily rail shuttles between the Port of Gothenburg and logistic locations in Sweden and Norway.  Containers can be collected within 30 minutes of unloading.  1.5 hours from open sea to quayside.  Excellent bunker service including low-sulphur bunker.  Focus on development in distribution via rail and road.  24-hour service.  Two separate, wide fairways contribute to a safe approach.  10 berths with a water depth tp 14.2 metres.

Name: CFI - Compagnia Ferroviaria Italiana S.P.A
Company description: CFI nasce nel 2007, dalla iniziativa dell'Amministratore Delegato Giacomo di Patrizi e da un gruppo di imprenditori privati che hanno creduto nelle potenzialità del trasporto ferroviario ed hanno deciso di investire in questo settore. In pochi anni CFI ha saputo ritagliarsi un ruolo di primo piano nel trasporto ferroviario, raggiungendo una quota di mercato del trasporto merci di tutto rispetto che la colloca ai primi posti tra le imprese ferroviarie private. Tutto ciò grazie ad una copertura operativa capillare del territorio nazionale, che ha permesso a CFI di raggiungere i piu importanti clienti, i distretti industriali, i porti e i terminal intermodali Italiani. Ad oggi, siamo la principale azienda ferroviaria italiana a capitale completamente privato. Offriamo ai nostri clienti servizi di trasporto ferroviario affidabili, flessibili ed al giusto prezzo.  Abbiamo una flotta di 600 carri ferroviari e un parco locomotive Siemens nuovissime.

Name: CIÉ - Córas Iompair Éireann
Company description: Córas Iompair Éireann (CIÉ) is a commercial semi-state company and the largest provider of public transport services in Ireland.  In excess of 281 million passenger journeys are undertaken annually on the CIÉ network and the group employs over 10,000 people nationwide. CIÉ provides services through its subsidiary companies: Bus Átha Cliath / Dublin Bus (https://www.dublinbus.ie) provides bus services in the greater Dublin area  Bus Éireann (https://www.buseireann.ie) provides intercity and regional bus services outside of Dublin as well as city bus services in Cork, Galway, Limerick and Waterford Iarnród Éireann  / Irish Rail (https://www.irishrail.ie) provide Intercity, commuter and DART rail services throughout the country and jointly together with Northern Irish Railways the Dublin to Belfast Enterprise Service  In addition, CIÉ Tours (https://www.cietours.com) is Ireland and Britain’s largest tour operator offering inclusive and fully guided vacations into Ireland and the UK.  CIÉ is proud of the part we continue to play in the provision of public services the difficult times of Covid-19 and grateful for the efforts of all members of staff across the group during this time. Through the operation of our public transport services, the development of our lands based upon Transport Orientated Development principles and the roll out of our new Sustainability Strategy, we will play an increasingly important role in contributing to the State’s economic, environmental and social goals especially during the recovery phase from Covid-19.

Name: Sectorinstituut Transport En Logistiek
Company description: Sectorinstituut Transport en Logistiek (STL) is een organisatie die zich richt op het verbeteren van de instroom en het behoud van personeel in de transport- en logistieksector. Opgericht door en voor de sector, biedt STL ondersteuning aan werkzoekenden, studenten, werknemers en werkgevers door hen te helpen bij het vinden van banen, het kiezen van opleidingen en het ontwikkelen van vaardigheden. De missie van STL is om mensen met plezier aan het werk te laten gaan en te blijven, terwijl ze ook de vitaliteit, veiligheid en ontwikkeling van medewerkers bevorderen. STL werkt samen met diverse partners en organisaties om een breed scala aan diensten aan te bieden, waaronder werving, training en advies, gericht op het creëren van een duurzame en inclusieve arbeidsmarkt. Hun klanten omvatten zowel individuele werkzoekenden en studenten als bedrijven die actief zijn in de transport- en logistieksector.

Name: ASSET Rail
Company description: ASSET Rail - partner in spoorwegonderhoud. Een hoge beschikbaarheid van het spoor is van groot belang voor een punctuele treindienst. Gedegen en vooruitziend onderhoud is daarvoor essentieel. ASSET Rail maakt dit mogelijk.  ASSET Rail staat voor verbetering van de betrouwbaarheid, beschikbaarheid, onderhoudbaarheid en veiligheid van railinfrastructuur. ASSET Rail integreert duurzaamheid in alle stadia van ontwikkeling en gebruik. ASSET Rail beschikt over specialistische kennis van alle relevante vakdisciplines binnen de railinfrastructuur. Opereert van concept naar realisatie en van onderhoud tot sloop. ASSET Rail fungeert als aanbieder en contractmanager met advies voor onderhoud, vernieuwing, monitoring en realisatie. Lees op deze website meer over de activiteiten van ASSET Rail. Maak kennis met de mensen die dit mogelijk maken.  Wilt u ook uw kennis en ervaring inzetten voor ASSET Rail? Kijk dan snel naar de mogelijkheden die ASSET Rail u biedt.

Name: Eisenbahnen Und Verkehrsbetriebe Elbe-Weser GmbH
Company description: Eisenbahnen Und Verkehrsbetriebe Elbe-Weser GmbH (evb) is a transportation company that operates bus and rail services in the Elbe-Weser region of Germany. The company is dedicated to providing reliable and efficient public transportation solutions, aiming to enhance mobility for its customers while promoting sustainable travel options. With a focus on customer service, evb offers various ticket purchasing options, including online sales and direct purchases from bus drivers, ensuring accessibility for all passengers. The company collaborates with regional transport associations, such as the Verkehrsverbund Bremen/Niedersachsen (VBN), to integrate its services within broader public transport networks. Targeting both local commuters and travelers, evb strives to meet the diverse needs of its clientele while contributing to the development of regional transport infrastructure.

Name: Lokaltog
Company description: Lokaltog leverer effektiv togtransport, som hænger sammen med Sjællands andre kollektive transportmuligheder. Hvert år kører Lokaltog A/S med mere end 9,4 millioner passagerer. I det daglige vedligeholder vi 58 tog og 338 km spor. Lokaltog driver 9 lokalbaner:   110R/210R Østbanen 410 Tølløsebanen 510R Odsherredsbanen 710R Lollandsbanen 910 Nærumbanen 920R Frederiksværkbanen 930R Lille Nord 940R/960R Gribskov- og Hornbækbanen.

Name: Rotterdam Rail Feeding B.V.
Company description: Rotterdam Rail Feeding (RRF) is a railroad company specialized in high quality short line and feeder rail services. Our highly flexible and skilled employees are one of our biggest strengths. With our dedicated locomotives equipped with the required safety systems we operate in the Netherlands, Germany and Belgium.  Because of our unique strategy we have become the leading independent rail service provider in the Port of Rotterdam and on the main corridors towards the German and Belgium borders. ‘At RRF, customers are the focus of our operations. We listen carefully to what customers say and work hard to develop creative, flexible logistics packages that address the individualized service needs. This will result in cost reduction and higher margin for the customer.’ A lean organization, designed to be close to our customers Our staff is well-educated and trained to meet your requirements, with the capacity to deal with almost any situation. Within RRF we apply best practices to conduct business with personalized involvement and a commitment to strong relationships with our customers and other stakeholders. We have the local touch that characterizes the entrepreneurial spirit of our organization. Like we say in Rotterdam: Geen woorden maar daden……!

Name: Captrain Portugal
Company description: Captrain Portugal S.A., originally called Takargo, appears as the first Portuguese private operator in rail freight transport. It is committed to implement a culture of excellence focused on customer satisfaction, valuing employees, complying with safety rules, and following good environmental practices.

Name: AW Groep
Company description: AW Groep richt zich op het ontwerpen, inrichten en onderhouden van infrastructuur en groen. Wij ondernemen met lef, aandacht voor de mens en draagkracht van de aarde. Een no-nonsens familiebedrijf met focus op kwaliteit en tevredenheid. We spelen steeds in op uitdagingen met creatieve en verrassende oplossingen. Spreekt jou dit aan? Wacht niet langer en #wordAWer!

Name: Metro Ligero Oeste S.A.
Company description: Metro Ligero Oeste S.A. is a prominent transportation company operating in the Madrid metropolitan area, specializing in light rail services. The company is dedicated to providing efficient and reliable public transport solutions, with a focus on sustainability and customer satisfaction. Its mission is to enhance urban mobility while minimizing environmental impact, and it aims to be a leader in innovative transport solutions. Metro Ligero Oeste serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and residents, and collaborates with various partners within the public transport network to ensure seamless connectivity. The company is committed to maintaining high standards of service and accessibility, making it a vital component of Madrid's public transport infrastructure.

Name: Bring Intermodal AS
Company description: Bring Intermodal er Bring-spesialistenes felles løsning for miljøvennlig og kostnadseffektiv fremføring med tog. Bring Intermodal syr sammen og tilrettelegger intermodale transportløsninger for kunder med store import og eksport volumer både nasjonalt og internasjonalt. Med unik spisskompetanse og optimale løsninger for transport frakter vi varene dine over hele Norge og Europa. Vi kan tilby tog løsninger, bil løsninger med semitrailere, containere og 25,25 meter modulvogntog. Vi tilpasser oss dine behov og har hele tiden fokus på at du som kunde alltid skal ha de beste og mest effektive valgmulighetene på markedet. Konsernets målsetning er at 80 prosent av all frakt til områder med jernbane skal gå på skinner. Målbare miljøgevinster gjøres tilgjengelig for deg og dine kunder. Via miljøvennlige løsninger med høy kvalitet skaper Bring Intermodal forutsigbarhet og økt konkurransekraft for våre kunder.

Name: SEMAF
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 20 Paseo De Las Delicias, 28045
Company description: SEMAF es el Sindicato Español de Maquinistas Ferroviarios. Representamos al 85% de todos los Maquinistas en España. Fundado en 1986 para trabajar por los avances profesionales, laborales y sociales de los Maquinistas. SEMAF ostenta la Presidencia y la Secretaría General de ALE - Federation of European Train Drivers Unions, desde donde trabaja con los organismos europeos para el desarrollo del Ferrocarril en la Unión.

Name: Ertsoverslagbedrijf Europoort C.V.
Company description: Ertsoverslagbedrijf Europoort C.V. (EECV) is een toonaangevende speler in de havenlogistiek, gespecialiseerd in het overslaan van bulkgoederen zoals ijzererts en kolen. Gevestigd in de Europoort van Rotterdam, opereert het bedrijf op een 100 hectare grote terminal waar jaarlijks ongeveer 24 miljoen ton grondstoffen worden verwerkt en vervoerd naar de staalindustrie in Duisburg, Duitsland. EECV, opgericht in 1967 en eigendom van thyssenkrupp Steel AG en Hüttenwerke Krupp Mannesmann GmbH, streeft naar een duurzame toekomst door bij te dragen aan de productie van groen staal met behulp van innovatieve technologieën. Het bedrijf richt zich op de ontwikkeling van zijn medewerkers door middel van interne opleidingen en groeimogelijkheden binnen diverse operationele functies. EECV bedient een breed scala aan klanten in de staalindustrie en werkt nauw samen met partners in de logistieke sector om een efficiënte en veilige afhandeling van bulkgoederen te waarborgen.

Name: Ovet BV
Company description: OVET BV is a leading provider of logistics services specializing in the transshipment, storage, and processing of dry bulk goods, including ores, solid fuels, biomass, and fertilizers. Established in 1957, the company is committed to delivering tailored solutions that extend beyond standard services, fostering collaboration with clients to address complex logistical challenges. With strategically located terminals in Vlissingen and Terneuzen, OVET offers seamless access to the North Sea and extensive European hinterland, ensuring efficient transport via water, rail, and road. The company prides itself on its flexibility, operating advanced mobile cranes and handling a diverse range of shipping needs, from inland vessels to capesize ships. OVET is dedicated to sustainability, actively participating in the circular economy by integrating useful by-products into its operations, contributing to a greener future. Its mission is to provide timely, complete, and high-quality services, while its vision focuses on continuous improvement and innovation in logistics solutions.

Name: Vlexx
Company description: Vlexx is a dynamic railway company based in Mainz, Germany, specializing in providing regional rail transport services across Rhineland-Palatinate, Saarland, and Hesse. Established in 2014, Vlexx has quickly become an essential partner in regional mobility, focusing on sustainable and efficient transportation solutions. The company's mission is to enhance public transport accessibility while prioritizing environmental protection, as evidenced by their commitment to reducing energy consumption and waste through innovative practices. Vlexx serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and local communities, and collaborates with various public transport authorities to improve service offerings. With a strong emphasis on employee engagement and development, Vlexx actively recruits talent to support its growth and operational excellence.

Name: SWEG Südwestdeutsche Landesverkehrs-GmbH
Company description: SWEG Südwestdeutsche Landesverkehrs-GmbH is a prominent transportation company based in Baden-Württemberg, specializing in providing reliable public transport services through an extensive network of buses and trains. The company's mission is to enhance mobility in the region while prioritizing sustainability and innovation, aligning with the broader goals of the mobility brand bwegt. SWEG serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and local residents, and collaborates with various partners, such as the Karlsruher SC, to promote public transport and community engagement. With a commitment to maintaining a high standard of service and infrastructure, SWEG aims to be a leading employer in the transportation sector, offering a range of career opportunities and fostering a positive work environment for its employees.

Name: Transportbedrijf De Rooy
Company description: Innovatieve transportoplossingen. Technisch steeds weer een stap verder. Maatwerk voor onze klanten. Dat is ons doel. Jarenlange ervaring, technisch inzicht, weten wat de markt vraagt en grote betrokkenheid. Kwaliteiten waarmee De Rooy een toonaangevende positie in geheel Europa heeft verworven. Het bedrijf heeft zich sterk ontwikkeld en groeide door de jaren uit tot een multinationale marktspeler met een zeer duidelijk omschreven expertise: custom made transport.

Name: IFE Doors Knorr-Bremse GmbH
Company description: IFE Doors Knorr-Bremse GmbH specializes in innovative boarding solutions for the railway industry, focusing on accessibility and efficiency. Their flagship product, the ZeroStepBoardingSystem, is designed to facilitate seamless access for individuals with mobility impairments or heavy luggage, addressing the challenges of boarding and alighting from trains. The company's mission is to enhance inclusivity in public transport by providing barrier-free entry systems that comply with evolving regulations. IFE's target market includes intercity and high-speed train operators, and their solutions are engineered to improve traffic flow, reduce boarding times, and increase overall reliability without the need for complex active components. With a commitment to quality and innovation, IFE Doors aims to set new standards in passenger accessibility and comfort.

Name: Leo Express
Company description: Leo Express is a carrier that has been operating modern trains on important long-distance routes in the Czech Republic and Slovakia since 2012. 🚄 Since 2018, the company also connects Prague and Krakow in Poland with regular trains. 🚂 In 2019, the company also launched a regional train service in the Pardubice Region.  Leo Express also operates a bus service currently connecting Slovakia and Ukraine. 🚌 For the latest jobs at Leo Express, please visit www.le.com/kariera. 🧑💻

Name: Aircoach
Company description: Aircoach is Ireland's leading private bus and coach operator and provides a range of high frequency, quality scheduled coach services to and from Dublin City Centre and Dublin Airport.  We operate 6 key services connecting Dublin Airport with Dublin City Centre and its suburbs, as well as non-stop express services connecting Dublin Airport with Cork and Derry/L'Derry via Belfast.  Across the UK and Ireland, First's bus businesses provide approximately 2.5 million journeys a day for customers across a broad range of operating environments. This wide range of services includes commercial urban bus networks, inter urban routes, Park & Ride services, private hire, rail replacement services and further key airport connections including Heathrow RailAir, Glasgow Shuttle and Bristol International Flyer. Aircoach is committed to delivering high quality public transport services and has been instrumental in increasing the level of public transport usage in Ireland over the last number of years. We also have extensive experience of providing car park and shuttle bus services including operating all car park shuttle bus services on contract to Dublin Airport Authority. We are forecasting to carry over 2 million passengers this year on our high quality services to and from Dublin City Centre and Dublin Airport. Our current services include: Dublin Airport Bus – Dublin City Centre – Donnybrook - Leopardstown Dublin Airport Bus - Dublin City Centre  Dublin Airport Bus - Port Tunnel - Ballsbridge – Booterstown – Blackrock – Dalkey Cork - Dublin City Bus – Dublin Airport Derry/L'Derry Bus - Maghera - Belfast International Airport - Belfast – Dublin Airport – Dublin City

Name: NERTUS
Company description: NERTUS Mantenimiento Ferroviario y Servicios, empresa del Grupo Siemens y Renfe, fue constituida en 2002 con el propósito de ofrecer servicios integrales de mantenimiento para material rodante ferroviario. Su creación marcó un hito en el sector, al establecer un modelo de colaboración innovador y sin precedentes en aquel momento. Actualmente, con más de 700 personas en el equipo, seguimos dedicándonos al mantenimiento de trenes en todo el territorio nacional y al desarrollo de proyectos nacionales e internacionales de diseño e implantación de sistemas de señalización ferroviaria. Nuestro compromiso sigue siendo ofrecer servicios de máxima calidad y eficiencia, orientados a la innovación y la mejora continua. En el centro está el equipo humano, que representa los valores de Nertus: honestidad, transparencia, espíritu de equipo, motivación y compromiso personal.

Name: Mertz Transport AB
Company description: Mertz Transport AB är ett oberoende transportföretag med nationell täckning som alltid sätter kunden (BtB) i fokus.  Relationer är ryggraden inom Mertz. Vi utmanar och ifrågasätter gärna, allt med syfte att förbättra förutsättningarna för en framgångsrik lösning för både våra kunder och leverantörer. Det är just detta som är en stor anledning till att vi utvecklats och expanderat kontinuerligt sedan starten 1971. Och vi vill också gärna själva bli utmanade! Mertz utbildar och utvecklar ständigt all personal för att alltid leverera så hög kvalité och service som möjligt. Detta gör att alla på företaget känner yrkesstolthet och levererar tjänster på högsta nivå till våra kunder. Personalen på Mertz är handplockade och enbart de bästa får lov att representera oss och bära vårt namn. Mertz Transport AB har idag en bilpark med drygt 150 egna fordon anpassade till alla behov. Genom vårt distributionsnätverk erbjuder vi kompletta dörr-dörr lösningar inklusive last mile i egen regi eller med någon av våra noggrant utvalda underleverantörer. För att serva vårt nätverk har vi Crossdockverksamhet i Malmö, Göteborg och Stockholm samt ett stort antal strategiskt placerade distributionspunkter. Som ett komplement till våra transporttjänster sköter vårt affärsområde Rail driften av Malmö Kombiterminal, Vagnslastterminal samt omfattande tågväxlingstjänster i Malmöområdet. Vi kan därför stolt som ensam aktör erbjuda one-sto- shop lösningar inom järnväg i kombination vägtransport utifrån Malmö. Vi är idag cirka 280 anställda.    Mertz Transport AB skapar helt enkelt transportlösningar åt företag med krav på kvalitet och service!

Name: Morska Agencja Gdynia Sp Z O.o.
Company description: Morska Agencja Gdynia one of the oldest companies in the sectors of transport and logistics operating in the Polish market. Our company guarantees delivery of cargoes to any place in the world - by sea and on land. Thanks to our long experience and creativity of our staff, Morska Agencja Gdynia is a brand which cooperates with exporters and importers from all over the world, shipowners, shipping lines, freight forwarders, ports, maritime offices, customs and immigration, banks and financial institutions as well as insurance companies.       We organize road and sea transport of several thousand containers a year, freight vessels, arrange road and rail transport, deal with heavy and over-size goods, dry and liquid loads as well as with general cargo. Our company ensures storage and distribution of our customers' goods in modern warehouses and also provide bonded storage. The company's offer also includes offices to let. For years we have been a correspondent of protection and indemnity clubs. We work as an emergency agent for the benefit of foreign insurance associations, supporting them during settlement of claims in road, rail and sea transport. Polish Seafarers are offered attractive and safe work. Each year our company arranges about 1500 contracts for officers and ratings to the vessels of reputable shipowners from Germany, Great Britain, Denmark, Ireland, Greece and the USA. Our professional team may challenge any task related to logistics of international trade. To learn more contact with our experts: Bartłomiej Rozmus, tel: +48 58 785 37 42, handlowy@mag.pl Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MorskaAgencjaGdynia/ Youtube: http://bit.ly/2DSwHvr http://bit.ly/2DNyzGn http://bit.ly/2Fn6LFh

Name: VIAS Rail GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Düren, 271 Kölner Landstraße, 52351
Company description: Unter der Marke VIAS betreiben die VIAS GmbH, VIAS Logistik GmbH und VIAS Rail GmbH unter dem Dach der familiengeführten RATH Gruppe mehrere Wettbewerbsnetze im Schienennahverkehr. Der Betrieb der VIAS begann im Jahr 2005 mit dem Gewinn der Odenwaldbahn, die bis heute betrieben wird. Seit 2010 fährt die VIAS auch auf der RheingauLinie, seit 2017 auf dem Erft-Schwalm-Netz (Linien RB 34 und RB 39) und seit 2022 auf dem Niederrhein-Netz (Linien RE 19 und RB 35). Seit Dezember 2023 betreiben wir zudem das Ruhr-Sieg-Netz. Der Hauptsitz des Unternehmens ist in Düren (Rheinland), der zweite Sitz befindet sich in Frankfurt-Griesheim (Hessen).  Auf dem Weg zu einem Job, der Sie zu immer neuen Zielen führt? Willkommen im Team der VIAS. Seit knapp 20 Jahren sind wir erfolgreich auf der Schiene unterwegs. Ob in Nordrhein-Westfalen, Hessen oder Rheinland-Pfalz: Unsere Netze stehen für nachhaltige Mobilität und zuverlässigen Personennahverkehr – und für eine faszinierende Arbeitswelt, die begeisterten Bahnern, Technikern, ITLern und Klimarettern vielseitige Entfaltungsspielräume bietet. Denn wir fahren nicht nur die Züge, sondern halten die Fahrzeuge auch instand und übernehmen den Fahrzeugservice. Klingt nach Zukunft? Dann los!

Name: KLOG Transport Solutions
Company description: Presente nos cinco continentes, em mais de 120 países, a KLOG Logística é uma empresa cem por cento nacional, a operar no setor da logística e transporte há 11 anos. Com uma rede de três agências, com 200 colaboradores, no mercado nacional e uma vasta rede internacional de parceiros e agentes, a KLOG garante soluções globais, integradas e personalizadas, atuando em diferentes segmentos: terrestre, marítimo, aéreo, multimodal (short sea e rail) e logística contratual. Depois de, em 2022, ter atingido uma faturação que ultrapassou a barreira dos 100 milhões de euros, a empresa está focada num futuro cada vez mais sustentável, reforçando a aposta nas soluções intermodais. Ao apostar em parcerias com operadores de referência a nível internacional, a KLOG oferece cada vez mais possibilidades de transporte intermodal – em particular por via marítima e ferroviária –, garantindo soluções de transporte mais vantajosas em termos de tempo, custo e, acima de tudo, ambientalmente mais verdes -- KLOG is a Portuguese company, that operates in in the logistics and transport sector for ten years, in more than 120 countries on the five continents. With 200 employees in the national market and an international network of partners and agents, KLOG ensures global, integrated and customized solutions, operating in different segments: land, sea, air, multimodal (short sea and rail) and contractual logistics.  After reaching a turnover of over 100 million euros in 2022, the company is focused on an increasingly sustainable future, reinforcing its commitment to intermodal solutions. Promoting more partnerships with international operators, KLOG aims to offer more possibilities for intermodal transport – by sea and rail –, ensuring better transport solutions in timing and costs, as well as environmentally friendly.

Name: QLS
Company description: QLS Pakketdienst & Fulfilment is dertig jaar geleden in Dordrecht opgericht en is van origine een familiebedrijf wat met veel passie en zorg haar intrede heeft gemaakt in de branche van logistieke e-commerce. QLS typeert zich als een organisatie die stapsgewijs toonaangevende en innovatieve ontwikkelingen heeft doorgemaakt en daardoor heeft uit kunnen groeien tot het vooruitstrevende logistieke e-commerce bedrijf wat het nu is.  QLS streeft er middels haar twee typerende dienstverleningen naar om al haar klanten binnen de e-commerce te kunnen bedienen, ondersteunen en te ontzorgen. Middels de pakketdienst dienstverlening ondersteunt QLS webshops met het verzenden van uw pakketten. Door de gratis ophaalservice, het eigen ontwikkelde verzendplatform en de snelle verzending, waarbij pakketten de volgende dag voor zowel Nederland als België worden bezorgd, is Pakketdienst QLS uw logistieke verlengstuk van uw webshop.  QLS Fulfilment ontzorgt uw webshop door het gehele logistieke proces uit handen te nemen. Alle processen met betrekking tot inslag, opslag, orderpicken, inpakken, verzenden en retouren worden geheel door QLS overgenomen. Ons vooruitstrevende DNA maakt het mogelijk dat QLS constant in beweging is en de processen kan optimaliseren en automatiseren. Hierdoor kunnen wij bestellingen razend snel verwerken en verzenden. Door onze familiaire insteek, persoonlijke betrokkenheid en vooruitstrevende werkwijze is zowel QLS Fulfilment als Pakketdienst QLS uw ideale logistiek partner.

Name: Skyss
Company description: Skyss is owned by Hordaland county authority. Skyss' purpose is to plan, purchase and market public transport services. Contracts for the operation of bus routes and the Bergen light-rail system (Bybanen) are awarded to traffic companies via tender competitions. Skyss is responsible for planning itineraries, developing ticket systems, information and marketing.

Name: NETINERA Deutschland GmbH
Company description: NETINERA Deutschland GmbH is a leading private railway company in Germany, known for its commitment to providing reliable and efficient rail transport services. With a mission to enhance mobility and connectivity across the region, the company operates a fleet of modern trains that serve millions of passengers annually. NETINERA focuses on fostering a safe and supportive work environment for its employees, offering comprehensive training programs and career development opportunities. The company primarily caters to commuters and travelers in northern Germany, connecting key cities such as Hamburg, Bremen, Hannover, Uelzen, and Göttingen. Through strategic partnerships and a dedicated workforce, NETINERA aims to continuously improve its services and expand its market presence in the competitive rail industry.

Name: Umbria TPL E Mobilità
Company description: Umbriamobilità born from the fusion of the previous 4 trasport company operating on the region: FCU, SSIT, ATC and APM. The FCU Operate on Train, around al the Umbria region, SSIT operate around Spoleto, ATC operate around Terni; Apm operate around Perugia. Apm manage also ships on the trasimeno lake. FCU differently from the other companys offer public trasport with train.

Name: Tabaknatie NV
Company description: Tabaknatie, een familiebedrijf resulterend in één visie met snelle beslissingen, heeft zich door de jaren heen weten te positioneren als een wereldwijd marktleider in opslag, transport, logistiek en andere gerelateerde activiteiten rond organische en andere hoogwaardige producten. Vandaag beschikt Tabaknatie over gespecialiseerde magazijnen met een totale oppervlakte van meer dan 1.000.000m², deze bieden de meest geavanceerde technologieën voor opslag en behandeling alsook voor uw logistieke –en transport vraagstukken. Dit stelt ons in de mogelijkheid om een hele waaier aan high-quality services aan te bieden aan onze klanten.

Name: Westbahn
Company description: WESTbahn Management GmbH is a prominent railway company based in Vienna, Austria, dedicated to providing efficient and accessible train services. The company aims to enhance travel experiences by ensuring that its website and mobile application comply with accessibility standards, reflecting its commitment to inclusivity. WESTbahn primarily serves passengers traveling between major cities, including Vienna and Munich, and is focused on continuous improvement of its services to meet the needs of all users, including those with disabilities. The company collaborates with various partners to optimize ticket purchasing processes and enhance customer satisfaction. With a vision of making rail travel more user-friendly and reliable, WESTbahn is committed to maintaining high standards of service and accessibility for its diverse clientele.

Name: Veenstra|Fritom
Company description: Veenstra|Fritom ontzorgt en creëert logistieke rust voor u. Wij zijn al bijna 100 jaar uw partner in transport,  warehousing , logistieke oplossingen, zeevracht en luchtvracht. Met onze oplossingsgerichtheid, flexibiliteit en persoonlijke communicatie, zorgen wij voor het grote verschil als uw logistieke partner. Door ons totaalaanbod aan diensten nemen wij u het volledige logistieke proces uit handen. Veenstra|Fritom levert logistieke rust aan bijna 1000 relaties.  Kiest u ook voor volledige ontzorging en overweegt u het uitbesteden van uw logistieke proces? Veenstra|Fritom zorgt ervoor dat u er geen omkijken meer naar heeft. Met de juiste kennis in huis, verlopen de logistieke processen gemakkelijk en flexibel. Zo kunt u de focus houden op waar u goed in bent en doen wij de rest. Onze relaties waarderen onze betrouwbare en solide oplossingen. Medewerkers zijn trots -grutsk- om bij Veenstra|Fritom te werken en zetten zich altijd voor de volle 100 procent voor u in. We staan open voor anderen, zijn vriendelijk en gaan altijd voor een eersteklas resultaat. Fritom staat voor dé slimme en innovatieve logistieke dienstverleners die altijd op zoek zijn naar de beste logistieke oplossingen. Dit doen we door nauw samen te werken met onze zusterbedrijven. De fakkeldrager op het gebied van logistieke dienstverlening, dat wil de Fritom Group zijn. Daarbij staan we in de top 30 van de logistieke dienstverleners in Nederland. Deel van uitmaken? Bekijk ook eens: werkenbijveenstrafritom.nl

Name: Styrsöbolaget
Company description: Styrsöbolaget är för de flesta göteborgare ett välkänt rederi och ett starkt varumärke - vi ligger i topp i Västtrafiks mätningar av resenärers upplevelse av service och kvalitet. Vår huvudverksamhet är passagerartrafik i Göteborgs södra skärgård och hamn som vi kör på uppdrag av Västtrafik. Vår flotta består av 19 fartyg och varje år reser ca 5,5 miljoner passagerare i södra skärgården och i älvtrafiken. På uppdrag av Göteborgs stad kör vi även frakttrafiken med gods och nyttofordon från Fiskebäck till Södra skärgården. Vårt senaste tillskott, Västtrafiks nya, elhybridfärja ELVY förväntas minska bränsleförbrukningen kraftigt. Styrsöbolaget ingår sedan 2004 som ett dotterbolag i @Transdev Sverige AB , som är verksamma inom trafikslagen båt, buss, spårvagn och tåg. Transdev kör både upphandlad och kommersiell trafik. Välkommen att resa med oss!

Name: Trentino Trasporti S.p.A.
Company description: Trentino Trasporti S.p.A. is a public transportation company based in Trentino, Italy, specializing in the operation of buses, trains, and cable cars, including the Trento-Malé-Mezzana railway. The company is committed to providing high-quality transport services that are accessible to all, including special provisions for individuals with disabilities and cyclists. Its mission focuses on enhancing mobility within the region while ensuring customer satisfaction and safety. Trentino Trasporti collaborates with various local authorities and organizations to deliver essential public transport services, catering to a diverse clientele that includes students, workers, and tourists. The company is also dedicated to transparency and ethical governance, as evidenced by its comprehensive policies and agreements aimed at improving employee conditions and service quality.

Name: Rail Traction Company
Company description: Rail Traction Company SpA (RTC) is a private railway company founded in February 2000 in order to exploit the opportunities arising from the liberalization of the rail transport market in Italy and Europe. Rail Traction Company was the first private company to provide a freight service along the Brenner axis. RTC guarantees rail transport services to logistics and freight operators who organise complete trains both in the sector of intermodal freight transport (containers, swap bodies, semi-trailers) and conventional transport. Bolzano and Verona are the crucial nodes of national and international rail traffic and they are the home respectively of the registered office and the operative headquarters of the company.

Name: Europcar España
Company description: Europcar es especialista en el alquiler de coches en España y el mundo: cuenta con más de 100.000 oficinas de alquiler de coches presentes en más de 150 países. Alquila un coche en aeropuertos, en estaciones de tren, principales ciudades y poblaciones. Europcar ofrece una amplia gama de vehículos que se adaptan a tus necesidades.

Name: SMART Railway Technology GmbH Germany
Company description: Be it aboard the São Paulo metro or on the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express: our ideas travel the whole world on over 10,000 vehicles. We develop and manufacture innovative power electronics for global railway transportation with great accuracy and a lot of passion: every day, our more than 160 employees contribute to changing the market of a forward-looking branch. What we do We develop and manufacture innovative auxiliary power converters for international rolling stock. Our product portfolio ranges from single devices such as battery chargers or air conditioning inverters to complete auxiliary power converters for passenger cars and multiple-unit trains.  We are a subsidiary of Beijing Dinghan Technology Group Co., Ltd. and are headquartered in Kassel, in the very center of Germany.

Name: Naar Bespoke Travel
Company description: Naar Bespoke Tavel è un tour operator con sede a Milano specializzato in viaggi su misura e pacchetti dinamici fondata nel 1996 da Frederic Naar.  Fin dagli albori, NAAR si è contraddistinto sul mercato per la componente tecnologica a servizio delle agenzie di viaggio, il supporto professionale del team, l’attenzione ai dettagli e la selezione di partner di qualità.  Nel panorama italiano si conferma come il punto di riferimento per la costruzione di viaggi su misura, viaggi di nozze, fly & drive, fly & train, viaggi multi-destinazione, in Nord e Sud America, Caraibi, Messico, Europa, Penisola Arabica, Africa, Oceano Indiano, Asia, Oceania e Oceano Pacifico.  Tradizionale ma con spirito innovativo, NAAR declina l'eleganza e l’esperienza in viaggi su misura di medio e alto profilo, e per adattarsi alle tendenze del settore e anticipare le esigenze dei viaggiatori rinnova costantemente l'esclusivo software che rende il processo di creazione dei viaggi semplice, veloce ed intuitivo. La sinergia di esperti product manager, team di prenotazione, programmatori e un’ampia rete vendite, fa di NAAR uno dei più rinomati ed affidabili tour operator italiani.  La sede centrale è a Milano, con filiali operative a Roma, Napoli e Palermo, mentre dal 2019 ha esteso il suo modello di business al mercato francese, e dal 2024 ha aperto in Germania e in Benelux.

Name: Grupa Delta Trans
Company description: Grupa Delta Trans is a comprehensive logistics and transportation company specializing in both domestic and international freight services. With a fleet of approximately 300 vehicles, the company offers a wide range of transport solutions, including full truckload (FCL) and less-than-truckload (LCL) shipments, as well as sea, air, rail, and road freight services. The company's mission is to enhance workplace safety and minimize occupational hazards, as evidenced by their recent project aimed at improving air quality in welding environments. Grupa Delta Trans serves a diverse clientele, including individuals and businesses across Europe, and collaborates with a network of reliable agents and subcontractors to ensure efficient service delivery. Their commitment to professionalism and compliance with regulations is supported by a team of experienced personnel and advanced telematics systems for real-time tracking of shipments.

Name: IAT A/S
Company description: Thank you for visiting the IAT Company Page. We invite you to explore the many facets of IAT, a family-owned international freight forwarder & shipping company founded in 1931. EUROPEAN ROAD FREIGHT Flexible and tailored solutions for full loads, part loads and groupage to and from the Nordic countries, Great Britain & Ireland and the Continent. GLOBAL SOLUTIONS FOR AIR FREIGHT, SEA FREIGHT & COURIER IAT is part of a trusted airfreight partner network, offering full track & trace for small or large shipments by air or courier. Global shipping LCL & FCL with bonded warehouse.
