TRANSPORT & LOGISTICS OF CLASSIFIED GOODS IAT solves all classified goods logistics assignments with full flexibility, saftey & service.   ● Chemical industry & waste products   ● Own tankers & trailers   ●  ADR certified, specially trained drivers   ● Global network TMC INTERMODAL   ● Intermodal total concepts with global agency network   ● Combinations of road, sea and rail for Inter European & oversea transports   ● Environmentally friendly and competitive transport solution of liquid, classified chemicals   ● Approval for foodstuff and animal bi-products   ● Up to 27 tonne payload for international transports COMPLETE STORAGE SOLUTIONS FOR CLASSIFIED PRODUCTS   ● Approved tanks for receipt, storage, handling, labelling & shipping SERVICE CENTER & WORKSHOP IAT offers the most modern tank cleaning facility in Denmark for cleaning of tanker, tank containers and pallet tanks. In addition, our workshop and resident mechanics can assist with any and all repairs you may need. ------------------ CONTACT US Please do not hesitate to contact us for further information by email: iat@iat.dk or by phone to +45 7913 1000.

Name: Tamoil Nederland B.V.
Company description: Tamoil Nederland B.V. is een toonaangevende speler op de Nederlandse brandstofmarkt, met meer dan 225 tankstations verspreid over het land en een ambitie om te groeien naar 300 locaties. Sinds de oprichting in 1993 onder de merknaam Tamoil, heeft het bedrijf zich gericht op het leveren van hoogwaardige brandstoffen en een uitstekende klantenservice. Tamoil streeft ernaar om een duurzame en klantgerichte ervaring te bieden, waarbij het gebruik van technologie, zoals de Tamoil app, klanten extra voordelen en kortingen biedt. Het bedrijf werkt samen met diverse partners en is actief betrokken bij maatschappelijke initiatieven, zoals het ondersteunen van kankeronderzoek via evenementen als Alpe d'HuZes. Tamoil richt zich op zowel particuliere als zakelijke klanten, en biedt hen een breed scala aan producten en diensten, waaronder tankpassen en loyaliteitsprogramma's.

Name: Pultrum Rijssen BV
Company description: Pultrum is een veelzijdige logistieke dienstverlener met jarenlange ervaring in nationaal en internationaal transport, exceptioneel transport en bouwlogistiek. Wat uw vraagstuk ook is, wij gaan als krachtige partner graag aan de slag met een passende en innovatieve oplossing. Met onze toegewijde mensen, ons moderne wagenpark, onze uitstekende service én slimme automatisering ontzorgen wij u volledig. Flexibiliteit, transparantie en een hoge kwaliteit staan daarbij voorop. Zo kunt u zich richten op wat voor u écht belangrijk is.

Name: Wagenborg Passagiersdiensten
Company description: Wagenborg is een onderdeel van het familiebedrijf Royal Wagenborg, waarvan het hoofdkantoor in Delfzijl is gevestigd. Jaarlijks vervoeren wij met onze veerboten, watertaxi's en sneldienst ruim 1,5 miljoen passagiers en zo’n 200.000 auto's en vrachtauto’s. Een ambitieuze veerdienst die al meer dan een eeuw ieder seizoen passagiers van en naar de Waddeneilanden Ameland en Schiermonnikoog vervoert. En dat in een ongeëvenaard dynamisch natuurgebied. Veilig en verantwoord varen op Werelderfgoed de Waddenzee met respect voor de natuur. Dat zien we terug in alles: in ons beleid, in onze werkwijze en in onze medewerkers die graag de handen uit de mouwen steken. In april 2014 heeft de Minister van Infrastructuur en Milieu aan Wagenborg Passagiersdiensten voor de looptijd van 15 jaar de Concessie Waddenveren Oost verleend. Al met al zijn wij al ruim een eeuw een betrouwbare partner van de overheid. Ook na 2029 willen wij de concessie graag behouden. Daarom leggen wij de lat steeds een beetje hoger als het gaat om het niveau van service, kwaliteit, veiligheid en klantentevredenheid. Wij willen dat onze passagiers zich prettig voelen aan boord en varen met eersteklas materiaal. Veiligheid, kwaliteit en continuïteit staan voorop. Daar kunnen onze reizigers en medewerkers op rekenen.

Name: RAILREST
Company description: RAILREST provides high standards services on Thalys high speed trains. We provide lounge services in Paris and Brussels.

Name: WECON GmbH
Company description: WECON GmbH is a specialist in commercial vehicles and container technology. Our company is one of the leading manufacturers of swap bodies and trailers for intermodal transport. WECON develops customised solutions for transport by road and rail. Our employees advise customers throughout Europe and design, produce and assemble products in Westphalian Ascheberg as well as in Strumień in Poland. Besides These core competencies, our family-run, medium-sized Business is committed to producing versatile, high-volume vehicles characterised by their extremely low design and high load capacity. When customers come to us, they get customised vehicles with swap or rigid bodies. Qualified engineers and mechanics work at WECON on the basis of a proven modular system that is flexibly structured to meet the needs of Transport companies. Quality and variety are among the central cornerstones of WECON production. The product range includes high-volume swap bodies, swap boxes, swap systems for motor vehicles, swap trailers, container chassis, high-volume swap containers, semi-trailers and high-volume vehicles, plus multiply stackable containers for road, rail and water transport. WECON builds variants in accordance with individual customer requests. The company built its reputation on swap bodies for intermodal transport by road and rail.

Name: PONY EXPRESS COURIERS
Company description: PONY EXPRESS COURIERS SAME DAY BIKE COURIERS SAME DAY VAN COURIERS NATIONWIDE INTERNATIONAL MEDICAL COURIERS CONFIDENTIAL SHREDDING SERVICES Pony Express is the market leader in Dublin, Ireland for couriers and transport services. Pony Express provides urgent same day deliveries for documents, parcels, pallets and freight. Our overnight division provides nationwide delivery of parcels and pallets to all 32 Counties of Ireland. Pony International provides a Economy Road deliveries to Europe, and Express Air service for documents and parcels to Worldwide destinations. We also offer a worldwide import/export service, including a rail service from China to Ireland. Pony Express, also operate a full haulage division, operating a mixed fleet of rigid and 40" trucks, with our primary market being temperature controlled distribution. Pony Express also provides on site and off site confidential document shredding services.

Name: Koleje Dolnośląskie
Company description: Koleje Dolnośląskie S.A. zostały utworzone przez Samorząd Województwa Dolnośląskiego w celu zapewnienia sprawnego systemu kolejowej komunikacji regionalnej. Naszym priorytetem jest rzetelna i fachowa obsługa pasażerów oraz podniesienie komfortu podróży i punktualności. Pomaga nam w tym nowoczesny tabor i dobrze wyszkolony personel. Dla nas klienci są najważniejsi. Chcemy, aby czuli się u nas dobrze, wiedzieli, że o nich zabiegamy i liczymy się z ich opinią. Wszystkie nasze działania koncentrują się na zmianie postrzegania regionalnego transportu kolejowego. Niewątpliwie mamy przed sobą jeszcze bardzo dużo pracy do wykonania, niemniej jednak każdego dnia staramy się tworzyć Twoją przyjazną kolej

Name: Itabus
Company description: Itabus S.p.A. is a prominent Italian bus transportation company that operates a comprehensive network of over 2,200 daily connections across the country, catering to both domestic and international travelers. Established under the direction of Italo – Nuovo Trasporto Viaggiatori S.p.A., Itabus aims to enhance mobility and accessibility by providing high-quality, comfortable, and eco-friendly travel options. The company focuses on connecting major cities and popular tourist destinations, particularly during peak travel seasons, thereby supporting the growth of Italy's tourism industry. Itabus serves a diverse clientele, including tourists, business travelers, and individuals with reduced mobility, and collaborates with various partners to offer intermodal travel solutions that integrate bus and train services. With a commitment to safety, comfort, and sustainability, Itabus continues to expand its services and improve the travel experience for its customers.

Name: Italy Car Rent
Company description: Italy Car Rent is a dynamic car rental company based in Bolzano, Italy, dedicated to providing efficient and customer-focused vehicle rental services. The company’s mission is to simplify the car rental experience, offering a wide range of vehicles that cater to various travel needs, from compact city cars to spacious SUVs. With operations in 15 locations across major airports and train stations in Italy, Italy Car Rent ensures convenient pick-up and drop-off directly at terminals, enhancing the overall travel experience for its clients.  The company prioritizes customer satisfaction and data protection, adhering to GDPR regulations to safeguard the privacy and security of its clients' personal information. Targeting both leisure and business travelers, Italy Car Rent aims to deliver a seamless rental process characterized by competitive pricing and exceptional service. Its diverse fleet includes popular models such as the Opel Mokka, Fiat Panda, and Toyota Yaris, ensuring that clients can easily find the right vehicle for their journey. Italy Car Rent caters to a wide range of clients, including tourists exploring Italy's beautiful landscapes and attractions, as well as business travelers requiring reliable transportation. The company operates at key locations, including Bergamo and Olbia airports, providing convenient access to vehicles. Committed to excellent service, Italy Car Rent offers 24/7 assistance, transparent pricing with no hidden costs, and comprehensive insurance coverage, making it a trusted choice for those looking to rent a car in Italy. Through its dedication to quality and customer care, Italy Car Rent continues to grow as a preferred option for travelers seeking hassle-free and affordable car rental solutions.

Name: MEV Eisenbahn-Verkehrsgesellschaft MbH
Company description: Die MEV Eisenbahn-Verkehrsgesellschaft mbH ist ein neutraler Partner für alle Bahnen in Deutschland und Europa. Züge fahren, Wagen prüfen, Verkehre steuern – unsere Mitarbeiter sind Profis für den Schienenverkehr.  Effiziente Aus- und Weiterbildung, das Beherrschen neuer Fahrzeugtechnik, die Nutzung moderner Kommunikationsmittel und eine mitarbeiterorientierte Unternehmensphilosophie sind die Bausteine, auf denen die Einsatzbereitschaft unserer Lokführer, Wagenmeister und Disponenten beruht. Unsere MEV-Lokführerschule führt die regelmäßige Schulung unserer Mitarbeiter durch, bildet Lokführer und Wagenmeister neu aus und steht mit ihren Kapazitäten allen Eisenbahnen offen. Qualifizierte und motivierte Mitarbeiter sind die Grundlagen unserer Erfolges. Kommen Sie ins Team! Besuchen Sie uns auch auf: www.mev-karriere.de Besuchen Sie uns auch auf facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MEV.Eisenbahner/ Besuchen Sie uns auch auf Instagram: https:/www.instagram.com/mev_eisenbahn/

Name: Cyprus Public Transport
Company description: Cyprus Public Transport is a new transportation company in Cyprus operating in the Public Transportation Sector. The company is part of an international network of transport companies present on four continents with over 40,000 employees. With over 120 years of experience in efficient management of urban transport as well as regional, national and international bus coach and rail transport, our philosophy is to maximize on this international experience and adapt it to the local context wherever we operate including Cyprus.

Name: SJ Norge
Company description: Train operator. We drive Norway's most beautiful railway lines under the brand name "SJ NORD". These are the Dovre line, the Nordland line, the Røros line, the Rauma line, the Trønder line, the Meråker line and the Salten Pendle. We focus on delivering quality and excellent customer service.

Name: TX Logistik Transalpine GmbH
Company description: TX Logistik Transalpine GmbH specializes in intermodal transport solutions, focusing on the NiKRASA system, which facilitates efficient and sustainable freight movement across various modes of transport. The company's mission is to enhance the intermodal transport experience by providing comprehensive resources and support for transporters, terminal operators, and rail service providers. TX Logistik aims to streamline logistics processes and improve connectivity for its clients, which include a diverse range of businesses in the logistics and transportation sectors. By partnering with key stakeholders in the industry, TX Logistik is committed to promoting innovative solutions that meet the evolving needs of its target market.

Name: Loconi Intermodal S.A.
Company description: Loconi Intermodal SA is one of the largest Polish intermodal operators specializing in handling containerized cargo to and from Polish ports. We organize the transport of containerized cargo in a timely, environmentally friendly, and safe manner, efficiently combining rail transport over the longest possible distance with road transport for the last-mile segment. Currently, Loconi operates up to 280 intermodal connections per month on six main routes. The company also offers rail transport to most European Union countries. In 2024, the company achieved an impressive volume of 270,000 TEUs. In December 2024, Loconi Intermodal officially joined the PSA International group.

Name: Transurb
Company description: Transurb is a private company from Belgium active in Rail and Urban Mobility solutions and Rail Simulation dedicated to Training. * RAIL SIMULATION AND ADVANCED TRAINING SOLUTIONS  Transurb Simulation was born 20 years ago by combining the considerable expertise of Transurb with a young and dynamic team. The department specialises in the design, manufacture and delivering of bespoke rail simulation solutions. With its acute sense of pedagogy and innovation, Transurb Simulation offers modern and empowering solutions to companies aiming for state of the art training tools to support their education program. * RAIL & URBAN MOBILITY SOLUTIONS With 40 years of expertise  in technical assistance and project management, innovation engineering, ERTMS integration or support for certification, Transurb  successfully delivers projects worldwide. Working in total independence with any supplier, the department puts customers first by building long-term relationships, based on close cooperation and mutual understanding.

Name: SwetsODV
Company description: SwetsODV heeft besloten haar activiteiten te splitsen en als twee aparte organisaties verder te gaan onder de namen ODV Maritiem en Swets Group.  ODV Maritiem blijft zich bezighouden met het leveren van personeel voor bediening van nautische objecten, scheepvaartbegeleiding, nautisch beheer en bemannen van veerponten. Swets Group blijft zich bezighouden met het leveren van personeel voor de binnenvaart, offshore en passagiersvaart.

Name: CSP Spain
Company description: ➖ COSCO SHIPPING Ports (Spain) Terminals is an outstanding sea and intermodal port operator in Spain with two maritime terminals in Valencia and Bilbao, two railway terminals in Zaragoza and Madrid (Conterail), a Rail Operator  and the property of the maximum shareholding of CSP Logitren.  ➖ CSP Spain became the only container operator with this portfolio in its offer, having the capacity to offer first-class door-to-door solutions, with its own low standards of high competitiveness, quality and agility to its wide range of clients.

Name: Verkehrsbetriebe Peine-Salzgitter GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Salzgitter, 28 Am Hillenholz, 38229
Company description: Die Verkehrsbetriebe Peine-Salzgitter GmbH ist eine 100%ige Tochtergesellschaft der Salzgitter AG sowie der zentrale Logistikdienstleister des Konzerns. Neben den innerwerklichen Eisenbahntransporten an den Stahlstandorten Salzgitter, Peine und Ilsenburg, führt VPS zahlreiche bundesweite Transporte für die Stahlgesellschaften des Konzerns durch. Die rd. 700 Mitarbeiter der VPS bewegen mit aktuell 57 Lokomotiven und etwa 1.800 Güterwagen etwa 42 Mio. t Güter auf der Schiene pro Jahr.  Die VPS zählt zu den bedeutendsten und zu den erfahrensten Eisenbahnverkehrsunternehmen Deutschlands. Sie stellt das zehntgrößte von ca. 150 deutschen Eisenbahnunternehmen dar und verfügt über ein jahrzehntelanges Praxis-Know-How. Neben den zahlreichen Logistikdienstleistungen, betreibt die VPS den Binnen- und Industriehafen in Salzgitter Beddingen und wirkt bei der Entwicklung innovativer Eisenbahntechniken mit.

Name: Koleje Małopolskie
Company description: Koleje Małopolskie sp. z o.o. to polski przewoźnik multimodalny, który rozpoczął działalność w 2014 roku, po uzyskaniu licencji na przewozy kolejowe. Firma obsługuje regularne połączenia kolejowe w Małopolsce, w tym trasy łączące Kraków z Wieliczką, Miechowem, Tarnowem oraz innymi miastami, a także wprowadza innowacyjne rozwiązania transportowe, takie jak Małopolskie Linie Dowozowe. Misją Kolei Małopolskich jest zapewnienie komfortowego, ekologicznego i dostępnego transportu dla mieszkańców oraz turystów, co potwierdzają rosnące liczby pasażerów, które w 2023 roku przekroczyły 60 milionów. Współpracując z lokalnymi samorządami i instytucjami, firma dąży do rozwoju infrastruktury transportowej w regionie, a jej oferta skierowana jest zarówno do codziennych podróżnych, jak i grup zorganizowanych. Koleje Małopolskie stawiają na nowoczesność, wprowadzając nowoczesne pojazdy oraz udogodnienia dla osób z niepełnosprawnościami, co czyni ich usługi bardziej dostępnymi dla wszystkich.

Name: Wezenberg Groep
Company description: Your specialist in fresh logistics, warehousing & new and used trailers Wezenberg Transport Wezenberg Transport Is een transportbedrijf dat zich heeft gespecialiseerd in het geconditioneerd vervoeren en distribueren van AGF producten en levensmiddelen, zowel nationaal als internationaal. Het moderne en goed onderhouden wagenpark voldoet aan de laatste eisen op het gebied van milieu, geluid en veiligheid. Verder is zij in het bezit  van diverse certificaten zoals HACCP en GMP. Ook heeft Wezenberg Transport een Lean and Green award mogen ontvangen. Deze award vormt een erkenning voor de inspanningen die Wezenberg levert om de CO2 uitstoot tussen 2010 en 2015 te reduceren met minimaal 20%. Agrarisch Logistiek Centrum Agrarisch Logistiek Centrum IJsselmuiden (ALC) is een op- en overslag bedrijf gespecialiseerd in de bewaring en handling van geconditioneerde producten. ALC heeft de beschikking over Ultra Low Oxygen (ULO)  cellen voor langdurige bewaring van o.a. appels en peren, maar ook mechanische koelruimte is ruimschoots aanwezig. Tevens beschikt ALC over opslagcapaciteit van 35.000 palletplaatsen ten behoeve van droge goederen. Voor meermalige verpakkingen (fusten) heeft ALC een drietal industriële wasmachines. ALC is HACCP gecertificeerd. Wezenberg Atrop Verkoop van nieuwe en gebruikte opleggers, vrachtwagens en aanhangwagens. Nieuwe opleggers worden op klantwens samengesteld.

Name: AF TRANS International Forwarder
Company description: AF TRANS is an international logistics operator with 11 offices aroung the globe, including United Kingdom, Poland, UAE and countries of CIS region. We provide wide range of services: Sea, Rail, Road, Air transportation, as well as transportation of oversized and project cargo, insurance, warehousing. Betting on technologies and development AF TRANS team can guarantee the high quality of our services. The main goal is to promote the development of our Clients' business through the efficient organization of logistics services.

Name: Avecra Oy
Company description: Avecra Oy is a restaurant catering company owned by VR Group. Avecra Oy operates in train catering in long-haul passenger trains and restaurant, kiosk and cafe services at Finnish railway stations. Avecra employs 350 professionals, who are at your service daily on more than 160 trains and 14 restaurants and kiosks in Finland. Operations started in 1978 by name Liikenneravintolat Oy. Avecra became the name of the company in 1992. Avecra Oy on is owned by VR Group Ltd. Avecra Oy the member of IRCG (International Rail Catering Group).

Name: Eisenbahn-Bundesamt EBA
Company description: Das Eisenbahn-Bundesamt (EBA) ist die zentrale Aufsichtsbehörde für die Eisenbahninfrastruktur in Deutschland. Es hat die Aufgabe, die Sicherheit, Effizienz und Qualität des Schienenverkehrs zu gewährleisten, indem es die Einhaltung von gesetzlichen Vorgaben und technischen Standards überwacht. Die Mission des EBA besteht darin, eine sichere, zuverlässige und umweltfreundliche Eisenbahninfrastruktur zu fördern, die den Anforderungen der Nutzer und der Gesellschaft gerecht wird. Zu den Hauptkunden des EBA zählen Eisenbahnunternehmen, Infrastrukturbetreiber sowie staatliche Stellen, die im Bereich des Schienenverkehrs tätig sind. Das EBA arbeitet eng mit Partnern wie der Deutschen Bahn AG und anderen Verkehrsunternehmen zusammen, um die Herausforderungen der modernen Mobilität zu bewältigen und die Schieneninfrastruktur nachhaltig zu entwickeln. Die Zielgruppe des EBA umfasst sowohl öffentliche als auch private Eisenbahnbetreiber sowie regionale und nationale Verkehrsbehörden, die auf die Expertise des EBA angewiesen sind, um ihre Infrastrukturprojekte erfolgreich umzusetzen. Durch die Implementierung von Regulierungsrahmen und Investitionsstrategien zielt das EBA darauf ab, die Qualität und Kapazität der Schienenverkehrsdienste zu verbessern. Das EBA spielt eine entscheidende Rolle bei der Genehmigung und Überwachung von Eisenbahninfrastrukturprojekten, um die Sicherheit und Effizienz des Schienenverkehrs zu gewährleisten. Darüber hinaus fördert das EBA Innovationen und Modernisierungen im Schienenverkehr, um die Wettbewerbsfähigkeit und Nachhaltigkeit des Sektors zu steigern. Die Vision des EBA konzentriert sich auf die kontinuierliche Verbesserung der Qualität und Zuverlässigkeit des Schienenverkehrs, um den Bedürfnissen der Passagiere und der Gesellschaft gerecht zu werden. Durch umfassende Inspektions- und Bewertungsprozesse trägt das EBA zur Aufrechterhaltung der Integrität des deutschen Schienennetzes bei und unterstützt die Entwicklung eines modernen und integrierten Verkehrssystems.

Name: ITC Antwerp NV
Company description: ITC Antwerp NV was initially established in 2008 as a joint venture between RUBIS, an independent international operator specializing in the downstream petroleum and chemical sector, and MITSUI, a global 360 degree business solution provider. Shareholdings are through Rubis Terminal (a storage operator wholly owned by RUBIS), MITSUI & CO. Europe PLC, and Intercontinental Terminals Company “ITC” (a petrochemical storage terminal company based in Houston, USA - ITC is wholly owned by Mitsui).  Recently, Mitsui acquired full ownership of the facility and rebanded the company to ITC Antwerp NV. We are located in the port of Antwerp on the left bank of the River Scheldt at the Doel Dock, near the entrance of the Deurganck Dock with excellent access to sea, road and rail infrastructure. We have been in operation since October 2010. Our terminal is equipped in accordance with the latest standards for the storage and transhipment of liquid chemicals, liquefied gas and petroleum products. For more information, please visit our website www.itcantwerp.com

Name: Athens Urban Transport Organization S.A.
Company description: Athens Urban Transport Organization S.A. - with the distractive title O.A.S.A. S.A. -  is a public utility company. Its key mission is the strategic and operational planning, coordination and control of the public transport carried out by (ground and underground) public transport means in the Attica Region. O.A.S.A. S.A. was established under Law 2175/1993 (Α΄211) and is subject to Law 3920/2011 (A' 33), Law 3429/2005 (A' 314), Law 4389 / 2016 (A' 94) and Law 4548/2018 (A' 104). O.A.S.A. S.A. is the sole shareholder (participation rate 100%) of its subsidiaries transport companies O.SY. S.A. and STA.SY. S.A. The three companies constitute the O.A.S.A. Group. • OSY S.A. is the distinctive title of the company called “Road Transport S.A.”, that provides urban transportation services with thermal and trolley buses in the Attica Region. • STA.SY S.A. is the distinctive title of the company called “Urban Rail Transport S.A”, that provides urban transportation services with metro, underground and tram in the Attica Region. In accordance with the provisions of article 380 of Law 4512/2018, O.A.S.A. S.A. shares (and its subsidiaries O.SY. S.A. and STA.SY. S.A) are owned by the HELLENIC CORPORATION OF ASSETS & PARTICIPATIONS S.A. (HCAP S.A.) after a transfer from the Greek State.

Name: Agilis Verkehrsgesellschaft MbH & Co. KG
Company description: Seit Dezember 2010 bzw. Juni 2011 sind unsere Züge im Auftrag der BEG in den beiden Verkehrsnetzen Mitte (entlang der Donau) und Nord (Oberfranken) unterwegs. Inzwischen ist agilis für rund 10 % des bayerischen SPNV-Marktes verantwortlich. Dabei garantieren unsere rund 400 Mitarbeiter/-innen der beiden agilis-Verkehrsnetze tagtäglich Qualität und Kundenservice. Und das zahlt sich aus: Im Qualitätsranking der Bayerischen Eisenbahngesellschaft belegt agilis schon seit Jahren Spitzenpositionen.

Name: GRE German Rail Engineering GmbH
Company description: In der GRE German Rail Engineering GmbH sind seit über 35 Jahren alle Kompetenzen für die Planung komplexer Eisenbahn- und Straßeninfrastrukturprojekte gebündelt: Mit Ingenieurbauwerken, Verkehrsanlagen des Schienen- und Straßenverkehrs, bahntechnischer Ausrüstung und Hochbauten bearbeitet die GRE German Rail Engineering sämtliche Schlüsselgewerke im eigenen Haus. Kompetenz im Projektmanagement sowie Consultingleistungen runden das Portfolio ab. Einsparungen bei gleichbleibend hoher Qualität, Schonung von Ressourcen und die Minimierung von Betriebs- und Unterhaltungsaufwendungen sind Herausforderungen, denen wir uns ebenso stellen wie der Verwirklichung einer technisch innovativen, dauerhaften und sicheren Anlage.  Wir sind Teil von Dorsch Europe, die mit gut 1.500 Mitarbeitenden an 26 Standorten zu den großen Ingenieurdienstleistern in Europa gehört. Gemeinsam mit unseren Kunden und dem kollektiven Wissen unserer weltweit über 7.500 Expertinnen und Experten gestalten wir unter dem Dach von Dorsch Global nachhaltige Lebensräume für die heutige und die kommenden Generationen.

Name: Societatea De Transport București STB S.A.
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Nr. 1 Bulevardul Dinicu Golescu
Company description: With over 150 years of experience, Societatea de Transport Bucharest STB S.A. is the largest operator of public surface transport in Romania and also the main operator of public surface transport in the Municipality of Bucharest and Ilfov County, having one of the most extensive transport networks in Europe, with a route length of 1651 km double track . As the main transport operator, STB SA is able to meet the various mobility needs of citizens through a wide range of transport services provided with a fleet of approximately 2000 vehicles (buses, trolleybuses and trams), in recent years investments have been made major both in the renewal of the inclusive fleet with hybrid buses, and in the adoption of modern, digitized payment and information solutions aimed at increasing the quality of the transport services offered. The tariff offer was made more flexible by implementing the concept of metropolitan lines (which brings together all urban, regional and express lines), as well as by applying the time tariff, creating several types of subscriptions and integrating the tariff offer with that of Metrorex, but also with the train in within a pilot project implemented on the Bucharest - Otopeni link. To pay for travel, STB S.A. uses a modern charging system, based on contactless card technology. Also, payment for the trip can be made via SMS, through the 24Pay mobile application, as well as with the contactless bank card. At the same time, to improve the travel experience, STB S.A. made the InfoTB app available to users for real-time travel planning, including information on metro connections. The mission of STB S.A. is to provide surface urban public transport services for the citizens of the Capital, guided by sustainability criteria, contributing to a development that responds to mobility needs in a dynamic continuum.

Name: VLOOT
HQ Location: Belgium, Flanders, Ostend, 2 Sir Winston Churchillkaai, 8400
Company description: VLOOT is een rederij gespecialiseerd in overheidsvaartuigen. Ze maakt via het agentschap Maritieme Dienstverlening en Kust deel uit van de Vlaamse overheid en staat mee in voor een vlot en veilig scheepvaartverkeer. Ze richt zich voornamelijk op de publieke sector, maar ook de private sector doet beroep op de nautische expertise van VLOOT. VLOOT zet een veertigtal vaartuigen in en stelt meer dan 500 collega's te werk op vijf verschillende locaties: Oostende, Nieuwpoort, Antwerpen, Gent en Vlissingen.

Name: Airflo
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, De Kwakel, 11 Betula, 1424lh
Company description: We are a Perishable Logistics Company committed to delivering perishable products in a punctual and reliable manner.  Airflo offers transport via air, road, ocean, or rail focused on but limited to fruit, vegetables, flowers, and fish. Our unique procedures and facilities ensure that product remains and is delivered fresh.  With facilities in Holland, Kenya, and Zimbabwe, we can offer freight services to various parts of the world.   We would be pleased to hear from you, please get in touch at info@airflo.nl

Name: CargoBeamer
Company description: The CargoBeamer Group is a logistics service provider in the “combined transportation road-rail segment” based in Leipzig, Germany. Thanks to the company's technology of railcars, handling terminals and logistics software nearly all standard semi-trailers of all types can use the train – without additional conversions and reinforcements for the trailer and even without a driver and tractor unit. CargoBeamer trains currently run on five different routes including locations in Germany, France, Italy, Poland and the UK. In the medium-term CargoBeamer will realize a European route-network of high-performing and innovative transhipment facilities at important transport hubs. This will secure sustainable rail-transport for hundreds of thousands of semi-trailers per year – reducing CO2-emissions and relieving environment and society.

Name: T&T
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Naples, 1 Via Vicinale S. Maria Del Pianto Complesso Polifunzionale Inail Torre, 80143
Company description: T&T (Technology & Transportation) nasce a Napoli nel 2007, ereditando le competenze e le conoscenze di dominio di professionisti con notevole seniority sia nel settore dell’Information & Communication Technology sia in ambito trasporti, in particolare in attività di consulenza e supporto nella verifica e validazione dei sistemi ferroviari (SCMT Sistema di controllo della marcia del treno, e ERTMS European Rail Traffic Management System), nell’analisi e gestione del rischio, nella definizione dei requisiti RAMS, nelle metodologie di sviluppo di applicazioni “safety e mission critical”.  L’organico aziendale è formato da 50 ingegneri altamente qualificati, che garantiscono  elevati standard qualitativi e professionali sia nel consulting sia in laboratorio. In ambito ferroviario, T&T offre i suoi servizi sia alle Aziende Produttrici di Sistemi Ferroviari sia agli Enti di Trasporto, pubblico e privati, gestori di tali Sistemi.  L’azienda opera, inoltre, nella progettazione e nello sviluppo di soluzioni informatiche ad alto valore tecnologico, nell’automazione industriale e nella formazione del personale.

Name: PJ Messtechnik GmbH / PJ Monitoring GmbH
Company description: PJ Messtechnik GmbH and PJ Monitoring GmbH are specialized companies based in Graz, Austria, focusing on advanced measurement and monitoring solutions for the railway industry. Their mission is to enhance safety and efficiency in rail transport through innovative testing and calibration technologies, including mobile systems for on-site assessments. The companies serve a diverse clientele, including railway operators and manufacturers, and collaborate with various partners to develop cutting-edge solutions such as the WaggonTracker and automated brake testing systems. With a commitment to precision and quality, PJ Messtechnik and PJ Monitoring aim to lead the market in measurement technology, ensuring that their clients benefit from reliable and efficient rail operations.

Name: FORWARDIS
Company description: As an expert in rail and the transport chain, FORWARDIS builds for you the most efficient solutions adapted to your needs, and ensures the end-to-end monitoring of your logistics. In the range of available solutions, rail offers competitiveness, safety, energy savings and carrying capacity. Combined with other modes of transport (river, road, sea) or not, rail freight is a specific competitive field, requiring expertise and in-depth knowledge of the players that FORWARDIS has.

Name: The Office Of Rail Transport
Company description: The Office of Rail Transport is a regulatory body responsible for overseeing and ensuring the safety, efficiency, and reliability of rail transport systems. Its mission is to promote a sustainable and competitive rail sector that meets the needs of passengers and freight customers alike. The organization works closely with various stakeholders, including rail operators, infrastructure managers, and government entities, to develop policies and regulations that enhance the overall performance of the rail industry. By focusing on innovation and best practices, the Office of Rail Transport aims to foster a modern rail network that supports economic growth and environmental sustainability. Its target market includes both public and private sector clients involved in rail transport, as well as the general public who rely on rail services for travel and goods transportation.

Name: DLG Uab
Company description: The group of international logistics companies “Delta Logistics Group” offers all logistics services: international transportation by all types of transport, consolidation and warehousing and customs clearance services. The company has offices in Vilnius and Moscow. International transport Transportation of full load, partial load and oversize cargo from all Europe to Russia and CIS countries. Consolidation for clients from Russia and CIS countries. Multimodal transportation “Door-to-door” transportation anywhere in the world. Selection of vehicle type and itineraries based on the specificity of the cargo. Sea transportation Transportation of full load and partial load cargo in containers. We maintain cooperation with the sea ports in Helsinki, Klaipėda, Riga, Sankt Petersburg, Vladivostok, Vostochnyj, Novorosijsk, Kotka. Rail transportation Transportation of full load, partial load and oversize cargo, containers in the following directions: Finland, Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia, China. Avia transportation “Door-to-door” cargo transportation anywhere in the world. Warehousing Possibility to store all types of cargo. Warehouse terminals are open day and night (24/7). Responsible storage of cargo, loading, weighing, palletizing, packing, sorting, marking, order assembly, labeling. Customs clearance Services are provided at the customs of Vilnius, Moscow area, Smolensk, Briansk, Blagoveshchensk, Vladivostok, Rostov, Pskov and also in Sheremetjevo and Domodedovo airports.

Name: Magetra
Company description: Magetra is een dynamisch bedrijf dat zich richt op logistiek en transport, met een sterke focus op het creëren van een stimulerende en flexibele werkomgeving voor zijn medewerkers. Het bedrijf streeft naar samenwerking en integriteit, waarbij elke stem binnen het team wordt gewaardeerd en bijdraagt aan het collectieve succes. Magetra bedient een diverse klantenkring in de transportsector, waaronder nationale en internationale klanten, en werkt nauw samen met leveranciers en partners om wederzijds voordelige relaties op te bouwen. De missie van Magetra is om goederen onder de best mogelijke omstandigheden te beheren en op tijd te leveren, terwijl de visie gericht is op voortdurende aanpassing aan nieuwe trends en het bevorderen van een cultuur van respect en toewijding. Met een breed scala aan functies, van chauffeurs tot HR-medewerkers, biedt Magetra volop kansen voor professionele groei en ontwikkeling binnen een collegiale sfeer.

Name: Televic Rail
Company description: Televic Rail, based in Berlin, Germany, has been a leader in developing innovative passenger information systems for the rail industry for over 35 years. The company is dedicated to delivering reliable communication solutions that enhance the travel experience, with a mission centered on innovation, agility, and sustainability. Televic Rail's technology is utilized in more than 60,000 vehicles worldwide, showcasing its commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. The company serves a diverse clientele, including rail operators and transportation authorities, and collaborates with various partners to ensure its products meet the evolving needs of the market. With a focus on creating value and building trust, Televic Rail aims to shape the future of passenger information systems while fostering a supportive and dynamic work environment for its team.

Name: PAX Groep
Company description: PAX Groep richt zich op de coördinatie en uitvoering van logistieke projecten in de bouw en industrie. Van exceptioneel transport tot verscheping en van intern transport tot montage. Door het combineren van logistieke disciplines bieden wij een integrale oplossing op de meest uiteenlopende logistieke vraagstukken. Geen lading te groot, geen land te ver. Slimme en efficiënte oplossingen, uitgevoerd met een maximum aan discipline. Dat is hoe wij het doen.

Name: NSB-konsernet
Company description: NSB AS operates as a transport company in Norway. Its activities primarily comprise passenger traffic on trains and buses, as well as freight traffic on railways. It has operations in Norway, Sweden and Denmark. Norges Statsbaner was founded in 1854 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

Name: Railpool
Company description: RAILPOOL is one of the leading railway vehicle leasing companies offering real expertise for full service from a single source. The company was founded in Munich in 2008 and now operates in 19 European countries. RAILPOOL is one of the largest providers in Europe with around 500 locomotives and 148 passenger vehicles and an investment total of around 2.3 billion euro. The RAILPOOL fleet covers 85,000,000 kilometers every year and makes an important contribution to the modal shift to rail. RAILPOOL has its own warehouse with more than 4,000 different spare parts and components of an investment value of around 20 million Euros. RAILPOOL. Flexibility For Rent

Name: Evofenedex
Company description: Evofenedex is een invloedrijk kennis- en adviescentrum dat zich richt op de groei van duurzame handel en toekomstbestendige logistieke ketens. Opgericht in 2017, verenigt het meer dan 10.000 leden die actief zijn in de logistiek en internationale handel, variërend van grote chipmachinefabrikanten tot bedrijven die bijen internationaal versturen. De missie van Evofenedex is om kennis om te zetten in kunde, met een sterke focus op mens en milieu, en om leden te ondersteunen bij het navigeren door de uitdagingen van digitalisering, verduurzaming en geopolitieke veranderingen. Het bedrijf biedt een breed scala aan diensten, waaronder kennisdeling, lobbywerk en innovatieve producten, en werkt samen met Europese partners om de belangen van zijn leden te behartigen. Evofenedex streeft ernaar om een sterke positionering van de handel en logistiek te realiseren door collectieve actie en samenwerking binnen de sector.

Name: Algeposa
Company description: The integration of sea and rail activity under single management and the closeness of the rail terminals to the consumption and production centres converts us in a leading comprehensive logistics operator. An operator which collaborates with the main European rail ways and holds a leading position in the transportation of iron and steel products, general cargo and bulk cargo. The Group is present at the most representative ports on the Iberian Peninsula and has rail terminals spread out in the most strategic points. Border areas (Irún - Hendaya, Port Bou - Cerbere - Perpignan), Madrid,Valencia, Barcelona, etc.

Name: SETRAM Logística Vehículo Terminado
Company description: Gestión Logística Integral Sector de Automoción. Transporte de turismos, Industriales y Prototipos. Flota de 300 camiones para transporte de 400.000 vehículos anuales entre España y Europa. Especializados en transporte Confidencial.  Centros Logísticos de Distribución Nacional en Barcelona, Madrid, Sevilla y Valencia. Con capacidad de 1.000.000 m² para el almacenaje de vehículos, PDI, Taller, Chapa y Pintura y otros servicios técnicos. Instalaciones Portuarias en Puerto de Barcelona para gestión de 250.000 m² para almacenaje, carga y descarga de buques y trenes con 220.000 operaciones anuales, Talleres de PDI, preparación de Flotas, mantenimiento e instalación de accesorios. www.setram.com www.setramoperadologisticomultimodal.com  @_setram  https://www.youtube.com/user/gruposetram/videos

Name: Frigo Group
Company description: Frigo Group Logistics is een toonaangevende speler in de sector van koel- en vriestransport, met een sterke focus op het waarborgen van de kwaliteit van diepvriesproducten. Met een vrieshuis in Nieuw-Vennep en een breed scala aan logistieke diensten, waaronder volledige ladingen, groupage en palletvervoer, bedient het bedrijf klanten door heel Europa, met speciale expertise in geconditioneerd vervoer naar Spanje en Portugal. De missie van Frigo Group is om klantgerichte oplossingen te bieden die voldoen aan de unieke eisen van hun klanten, terwijl ze tegelijkertijd de hoogste kwaliteitsnormen handhaven door middel van uitgebreide certificeringen en training van personeel. Het bedrijf investeert voortdurend in innovatie en duurzaamheid, met geavanceerde technologieën en energiezuinige voertuigen om de ecologische voetafdruk te verkleinen. Frigo Group werkt nauw samen met diverse klanten, waaronder Hekos Oriental Food, en richt zich op het opbouwen van langdurige relaties gebaseerd op vertrouwen en wederzijds voordeel. Door hun flexibele en efficiënte aanpak zijn ze goed gepositioneerd om te voldoen aan de groeiende eisen van de markt en de uitdagingen van de toekomst aan te gaan.

Name: Albatravel
Company description: Albatravel is part of Worldwide Hotel Link Group and it is a European tour operator leader in the B2B market. With the assistance of our worldwide offices we provide the best service and assistance to more than 20,000 travel agencies registered on our platform albatravel.com with a a clear B2B strategy. Our mission is the distribution of the best tourist services (hotels, flights, trains, escorted tours, sightseeing, transfer) at the most competitive rates, using high and modern technologies. Our in-house technology allows all our content to be easily available via our platform, with the same simplicity and convenience that has always distinguished us. We look forward to a bright future ahead. Our values are our advanced and reliable technology, high profitability, a commercial flexibility and a 24/7 customer support service.

Name: Nordicon
Company description: No 1 in the Nordic Region As the leading neutral consolidator in the Nordic region, we are proud to offer the most extensive number of direct services to and from the Nordics. With offices in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, and our own warehouses in Gothenburg, Sweden as well as local terminals in each country, Nordicon organizes the consolidation of freight to more than 500 export destinations, and from more than 300 import locations around the world. Besides its core LCL (Less than Container Load) business on ocean and rail with focus on direct consolidation services, Nordicon also offers FCL (Full Container Load) and a range of other transport-related services such as warehousing, air freight, and trucking. With tailored solutions for forwarders, FCS, we create a logistic chain and monitor cargo flows to match our customers’ specific needs and requirements. “No 1” does not only mean that we have the most competitive range of services, but also that we are dominant in IT solutions as well as customer service. Our aim and promise to our customers are to constantly strive for development and improved service. To learn more about our services and what we can offer, please visit www.nordic-on.com, or contact us directly and we will explain why our services are such a popular choice! Welcome to our world of consolidation!

Name: GTS Rail
Company description: GTS Rail is the GTS group rail division, which has been operating in liberalized market since 2008. Its mission consists in providing high quality and efficiency traction services both for goods and for passengers. Today's "real" level of liberalization allows to provide services only for goods. GTS services are addressed to any kind of train and customer. GTS Rail aims at becoming a best practice in the railway world, which, unfortunately, is still characterised by the presence of public, semi-public, national and foreigner subjects. Efficiency and quality are at the basis of our operational model: they do not remain abstract concepts, rather they pervade our everyday work, values and corporate culture.  When thinking at railways, the ensuing image and sensation are negative, by definition, since many companies and people have experienced dramatic or even disastrous situations. GTS has the strong will to reverse the common idea of railways as a second-rate, low-quality and obsolete system. We operate in a 100-years-old market showing a great potential, which has not managed to express itself yet. Suffice it to think that only 4% of goods is transported by train, and the transport of people is inefficient. "GTS Rail perfectly knows which is the key factor to become a successful company. The railway world is characterised by an incredible passion: our aim is to let all of our co-workers express such passion. If we manage, this means we will have achieved our challenging goals".

Name: Paratori Genova
Company description: Paratori was established in 1973 and has decades of experience in the transport sector. We carry out transports at both a national and international level, with offices at both Genoa in Liguria and Olgiate Molgora near Milan Our fleet consists of euroliners, covered low loaders for the transport of steel and other static cargo, flat trailers, containers, swap bodies and refrigerated trailers. We are constantly expanding our fleet with newer equipment and different types of trailers, all of which means that we are able to offer a personalised service to all of our customers Thanks to our warehouse and overhead crane we are also able to offer storage and cargo management services Our intermodal department, offering transport via rail, sea and air, has had a huge impact on our reduction of the emission of CO2 and other greenhouse gases

Name: EVM RAIL
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Verona, 17 Via Della Scienza, 37139
Company description: EVM Rail intende sviluppare e promuovere servizi ferroviari e ricercare nuove soluzioni di trasporto su rotaia da offrire ai propri clienti come alternativa vantaggiosa ed ecologica alle altre forme di trasporto, come per esempio quello su gomma. EVM Rail si propone come un’Impresa Ferroviaria estremamente snella, focalizzata e notevolmente specializzata nella produzione di treni tradizionali completi trasportanti merci rappresentate prevalentemente da materie prime (come per esempio i cereali, il ferro, ecc.), senza escludere dal proprio business la possibilità di effettuare il trasporto intermodale di unità di traffico combinato (contenitori, semirimorchi stradali ecc). EVM Rail è in grado di offrire ai propri clienti, grazie all’esperienza pluriennale dei propri esperti ferroviari, servizi di consulenza con l’obiettivo ricercare nuove sinergie e soluzioni innovative.

Name: Simwave
Company description: Simwave is a company active in operating comprehensive maritime simulation training centres equipped with simulators based on world-leading simulation technology.  Our customers require training or assessing on simulators and do not choose to develop and maintain own in-house simulators for various reasons. By using our own naval architects and a team of 3D modellers, Simwave offer you facilities where you can use your own mathematical ship models in your own port-environment. Bring your own instructors, we take care of all technical, operational and hospitality support. Simwave centres are flexible centres, it adapts to your own corporate branding.  Our focus is not only on the navigation, engine and ship management related training but also on the emergency response training on board of cruise ships, such as advanced firefighting -and crowd control training. Because of the fast-growing technology, we have made it possible to integrate these applications.  Simwave operates global and independently and will fully relieve customers by running best-of-class facilities. It is a one stop shop for certified maritime training and we can offer the full scope of possibilities: hiring our facilities or a turnkey solution, all tailor made to your requirements and expectations. Your crew will love to train!

Name: Mol Cy NV
Company description: Sedert de oprichting van MOL in 1944 profileert ons bedrijf zich als een onderneming die technische uitdagingen niet uit de weg gaat, meer nog dit is ons handelsmerk geworden. Actieve productontwikkeling, een innovatieve aanpak en doorgedreven internationalisering hebben het bedrijf gemaakt tot wat het nu is: meer dan 400 gedreven werknemers die samen instaan voor de realisatie van een hoogwaardig productgamma. Een team van gespecialiseerde technici staat in voor de dienst-na-verkoop, in binnen- en buitenland. MOL beschikt over het ISO 9001-2008 getuigschrift, het Caterpillar Certified Supplier label en een lasproces certificatie volgens EN 15085 (lassen van spoorweg-voertuigen en componenten). Deze erkenningen zijn het resultaat van onze voortdurende kwaliteitsbewaking en constante verfijning van productiemethodes. De industriële voertuigen van MOL vinden een wereldwijde afzet: Europa, Afrika, Het Midden Oosten, het Verre Oosten, … behoren tot het actieterrein.

Name: RTC Transport A/S
Company description: RTC Transport A/S, operating as NTG Uluslararası Lojistik A.Ş, is a leading international freight forwarding company that specializes in providing customized transport solutions across various modes, including road, rail, air, and ocean. With over a decade of experience, the company is dedicated to connecting Turkey with the global market through reliable and efficient logistics services tailored to meet the specific needs of its clients. RTC Transport A/S aims to deliver exceptional service by leveraging its extensive network of experienced partners and local offices in more than 20 countries, ensuring timely and effective communication. The company serves a diverse clientele, offering services such as road freight, project transport, express delivery, and comprehensive air and sea freight solutions, all designed to facilitate seamless logistics operations for businesses worldwide.

Name: MÁV-csoport
Company description: A MÁV-csoport a magyar állam tulajdonában lévő, 150 éves múlttal rendelkező vasúttársaság.  A folyamatosan fejlődő, mintegy 30 tagú vállalatcsoport széles körű tevékenységet folytat: többek között közel 7000 kilométernyi vasúti pályahálózat és az ahhoz kapcsolódó kiszolgáló létesítmények üzemeltetését, karbantartását, valamint a forgalom irányítását végzi, személyszállítási közszolgáltatási feladatokat lát el (naponta közel 3000 vonat, az éves utasszám megközelíti a 142 millió főt). Emellett vontatási szolgáltatásokat nyújt teherszállító vasúttársaságok számára, vasúti járművek karbantartásával, gyártásával is foglalkozik.  Informatikai rendszerek teljes körű kialakítása, működtetése, és fejlesztése éppúgy a profiljába tartozik, mint a pénzügyi, számviteli és kontrolling tevékenység, valamint a humánerőforrás gazdálkodás.  A több mint 37 ezer főt foglalkoztató MÁV-csoport az ország egyik legnagyobb felelős munkaadója és gazdálkodója.

Name: Camco Technologies
Company description: Camco Technologies contributes to the overall productivity, performance and safety on container, intermodal & rail terminals delivering high-end visual and micro-location based process automation solutions. For exception-free automated handover processes, terminals benefit from our advanced and well engineered solutions: OCR truck & rail portals, crane OCR systems, kiosks, MLT, seamless overall integration with TOS providers.

Name: Vivi - Vienā Vilcienā
HQ Location: Latvia, Riga, Riga, 8 Pērses Iela, lv-1011
Company description: AS "Pasažieru vilciens" under the brand "Vivi" is the only passenger-carrying railway company in Latvia, operating both electric and diesel trains on various lines throughout the country. It was formed in November 2001 by bringing together two separate companies, PPU "Elektrovilciens" and PPU "Dīzeļvilciens", under one name, creating the first subsidiary of Latvian Railways (Latvijas dzelzceļš). As of October 2008 JSC “Pasažieru vilciens” is an independent state-owned company. "Vivi" currently operates ten routes (four electric, six diesel) with its main operating base being the capital city Riga.

Name: LOCON Logistik & Consulting AG
Company description: Wir stellen die Weichen auf Zukunft!  Die LOCON Logistik & Consulting AG mit Hauptsitz im Technologiepark Berlin-Adlershof ist ein privat geführtes, mittelständisches Eisenbahnverkehrsunternehmen. Seit unserer Gründung 2002 zeigen wir, was mit und auf Schienen möglich ist. Unsere Hauptarbeitsfelder sind der Güterverkehr und die Baulogistik. Schnelle Entscheidungen und Flexibilität zeichnen uns aus. Seit Gründung und bis heute arbeiten im Vorstand echte Eisenbahner. So verbindet LOCON unternehmerisches Denken mit Erfahrung und Praxiswissen. Den Vorteil erleben unsere Kunden auf jeder Strecke und in jedem Baufeld. Die LOCON Unternehmensgruppe ist Teil der EP Logistics International a.s. Mehr Infos dazu unter https://www.eplogistics.cz/de

Name: Transport Business
Company description: Transport Inform is a leading information hub focused on the transport and logistics sectors across the CIS and Eastern Europe. Our center provides comprehensive insights, analytics, and updates on various modes of transport including automotive, rail, maritime, and air. Through our extensive resources, we help businesses navigate industry challenges, from logistics automation to cybersecurity, ensuring they stay ahead in a rapidly evolving market. Connect with us to stay informed about the latest innovations and trends driving the transport industry forward.

Name: INTEREUROPA d.o.o.
HQ Location: Croatia, City Of Zagreb, Zagreb, 3 Josipa Lončara, 10090
Company description: INTEREUROPA d.o.o. is a main offerer of logistic services in Republic of Croatia for 60 years. The residence of the company is located in Zegreb, Josip Lončar 3 Street, with branches in Zagreb, Varazdin, Rijeka and Split and offices in Zadar, Osijek, Kutina and Pleso. Solving complex logistic solutions we base on the collaboration with the reliable partners all around Europe and World, verified personnel, as well as with highly trained employees with professional knowledge from different logistic fields and complete technological an IT support. We reassure the whole mosaic of logistic services which include road, rail, air, sea, express delivery, warehousing and custom services. INTEREUROPA d.o.o. is a regular member of FIATA (International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations), IATA ( International Air Transport Association) and WCA ( world's largest and most powerful network of independent freight forwarders). INTEREUROPA d.o.o. vodeći je ponuđač logističkih usluga u Republici Hrvatskoj s tradicijom od 60 godina. Sjedište tvrtke nalazi se u Zagrebu, Josipa Lončara 3, s podružnicama u Zagrebu, Varaždinu, Rijeci i Splitu, poslovnicama u Zadru i Osijeku te ispostavama Kutina i Pleso.  Rješavanje kompleksnih logističkih rješenja temeljimo na suradnji s našim provjerenim partnerima širom Europe i svijeta,  provjerenoj kadrovskoj strukturi, na visoko osposobljenim zaposlenicima sa stručnim znanjima iz različitih logističkih područja te na cjelovitoj tehnološkoj i informatičkoj potpori. Osiguravamo cijelu lepezu logističkih usluga koje uključuju cestovni, željeznički, zračni, pomorski i expressni promet, skladišne i carinske sluge.  Redovni smo članovi FIATA (Međunarodnog udruženja međunarodnih otpremnika), IATA (Međunarodne udruga za zračni prijevoz) te WCA  kao najveće mreže neovisnih špeditera na svijetu.

Name: NEXTRAIL GmbH
Company description: NEXTRAIL GmbH is a leading consultancy firm specializing in the railway sector, providing strategic and technical expertise to enhance rail infrastructure and operations. With a mission to drive innovation and efficiency in railway systems, NEXTRAIL focuses on developing technologies and strategies that support both conventional and digital signaling and safety systems. The company serves a diverse clientele, including major railway operators and infrastructure managers, and collaborates with industry partners to implement cutting-edge solutions such as the European Train Control System (ETCS) and Automatic Train Operation (ATO). NEXTRAIL's team comprises seasoned experts with extensive experience in management consulting, project management, and system integration, ensuring high-quality service delivery across various projects. The firm is committed to advancing the future of rail transport through sustainable practices and technological advancements, positioning itself as a key player in the digital transformation of the railway industry.

Name: LODISNA
Company description: We are a versatile company, constantly evolving and developing, which has been operating throughout Europe since 2007. We cover all of our customers’ specific requirements for transport and logistics, meeting the most demanding quality standards. We use our own fleet of over 200 trucks plus semitrailers to provide express and standard (one way and round trip) transport services throughout Europe. We also provide personalised consultancy services for dangerous goods transport plans in accordance with the laws in force. Storage, goods management, order processing and stock management. We plan and manage any type of air, sea, rail or intermodal transport route. We carry out the entire design and development process for our turnkey projects. One of our specialities, in which we have more than 13 years of experience, is the express transport of full truck loads. We ensure minimum transit times for long distances thanks to our two-driver system, which makes our flows faster and more efficient. We consider quality one of the strategic pillars of our entire business. It enables us to provide exclusive services for the most demanding sectors. Day after day we further the implementation of exhaustive quality controls, in order to improve all our processes, always meeting our customers’ specific requirements.

Name: Comodality Group
Company description: Comodality Group is a logistics company providing full range of logistics services, including airfreight, ocean freight (LCL/FCL), trucking, rail solutions, warehousing, customs clearance and many related services. The name Comodality stems from a notion introduced by the European commission in 2006 in the field of the transport policy to define an approach of the globality of the transport modes and of their combinations. For the European commission the co-modality refers to a "use of different modes on their own and in combination" in the aim to obtain "an optimal and sustainable utilisation of resources".  Comodality was founded in Copenhagen in 2010 mainly focusing on project cargo from Scandinavia to the North American market. In 2017 the company change the strategy and focused on airfreight, ocean freight, trucking and railroad solution and other value adding services. The Comodality Group have fully owned offices in Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Germany, The Baltic Countries, Czech Republic, Poland and Spain.

Name: Szybka Kolej Miejska W Warszawie
Company description: Szybka Kolej Miejska (SKM) działa na terenie aglomeracji warszawskiej, stanowiąc istotny element Warszawskiego Transportu Publicznego. Jest szóstym – w oparciu o liczbę pasażerów – kolejowym przewoźnikiem w Polsce. Zapewnia mieszkańcom stolicy i okolicznych gmin wygodny dojazd do pracy czy szkoły. Eksploatując nowoczesne pociągi i realizując kolejne inwestycje taborowe, oferuje atrakcyjną alternatywę wobec samochodu, zmniejszając negatywny wpływ miasta na środowisko. Pociągami Szybkiej Kolei Miejskiej można podróżować po Warszawie, dojechać do lotniska im. Fryderyka Chopina i podwarszawskich miejscowości: Otwocka, Legionowa, Radzymina, Sulejówka czy Pruszkowa.

Name: Eurail
Company description: Eurail is a travel company that specializes in providing rail passes for international train travel across Europe, allowing travelers to explore multiple countries with ease and flexibility. The company's mission is to make European travel accessible and enjoyable for everyone, promoting the convenience of train journeys as a sustainable and scenic way to experience the continent. Eurail's target market includes tourists and travelers seeking to discover Europe, particularly those interested in multi-country itineraries. The company partners with various national rail operators to offer a wide range of train connections and reservations, ensuring that clients can navigate the extensive European rail network seamlessly. With a focus on customer support and community engagement, Eurail aims to enhance the travel experience by providing valuable information and resources to its users.

Name: Heetch
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 29 Carrer De Balcells, 08024
Company description: Heetch started back in 2013 on the parking lots of Parisian nightclubs, where founders Teddy and Mathieu would showcase their nocturnal ride-sharing service to young customers who’d missed the last train.  One court case* and two fundraisings later**, our professional 24/24 ride-hailing app covers more than ten countries and is growing very fast, particularly in French-speaking Africa. We aim to create healthy and culturally relevant markets wherever we go, which implies guaranteeing a fair income to drivers and affordable prices to passengers… while taking care of our employees. This indisputable challenge unites the teams and keeps us going everyday! *Google it, it’s an epic story! **We are backed by €54 million raised from renowned investors and a part of the #FrenchTech120   As we are growing really fast, we have lots of job opportunities. If you are looking for a company with a strong culture and amazing values, have a look at our website! We are always looking for talented and driven people to join us.

Name: Hutchison Ports Europe Intermodal
Company description: In our growing European network, we make container transport reliable, cost-effective and sustainable. Hutchison Ports Europe Intermodal offers shipping lines, logistics service providers and shippers high frequent rail and barge services between a growing network of inland terminals and deep-sea terminals in Rotterdam and other ports. HPEI also offers many additional services, such as transport without customs documents, storage, empty depot and last mile trucking.  Simply let us know when you want to receive your containers - or, in the opposite direction, when your containers need to be in the port - and we will take care of everything!

Name: Avis Autonoleggio Italia
Company description: Avis Autonoleggio Italia, part of the Avis Budget Group, is a leading car rental company in Italy, offering a comprehensive range of vehicles to meet the needs of both private and business clients. The company's mission is to provide high-quality service, ensuring flexibility and transparency in pricing, with a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction. Avis stands out with its loyalty program, Avis Preferred, which rewards frequent customers with exclusive benefits and discounts. The clientele of Avis includes individual travelers, families, and corporate clients, reflecting its ability to cater to a diverse audience. Strategic partnerships with airports and train stations enhance accessibility to rental services throughout the country, making it easier for customers to find and rent vehicles. With over 10,250 locations in Italy and worldwide, Avis Autonoleggio Italia is dedicated to making the car rental experience simple and convenient for everyone. The company aims to enhance mobility and travel experiences while prioritizing safety and reliability, ensuring that clients can trust Avis for their transportation needs. Through its commitment to exceptional service and customer care, Avis continues to solidify its position as a leader in the car rental industry.

Name: BMF Port Burgas
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Burgas, Burgas, 1 Knyaz Alexander Battenberg Str, 8000
Company description: BMF Port Burgas is a private port operator of Port Terminal Burgas East II and Port Terminal Burgas West – parts of the national public Port Burgas. Located in the region of Burgas Bay on the Black Sea Coast, BMF Port Burgas is the closest to the Bosphorus deep-water port. It offers excellent access (deep-water berths, all-year-round navigation, and no nautical restrictions) and can receive Panamax-type vessels. With its 19 berths and a total quay length of approx. 3.3km., BMF Port Burgas is one of the largest and deepest ports in the Black Sea region and there can be handled and stored various kinds of cargo. It is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment and extensive rail and road connections, as well as a highly qualified and experienced management team and staff. Different types of bulk, general, liquid, grain cargo and containers are handled on the territory of BMF Port Burgas. Thanks to its clear focus on innovation in cargo handling, BMF Port Burgas has significantly increased the cargo traffic through the port terminals both as volume and as diversity. BMF Port Burgas operates 24/7 all year round

Name: KNVvL
Company description: Koninklijke Vereniging voor Luchtvaart De KNVvL is opgericht op 19 oktober 1907 als Vereeniging ter Bevordering van de Luchtscheepvaart. Al heel gauw werd de vereniging hernoemd in Nederlandse Vereniging voor Luchtvaart (NVvL). De eerste aanschaf was de ballon "Rotterdam" en het aantrekken van de gebrevetteerde ballonvaarder kapitein der genie P.J. Post van der Steur. Nadat men eerst in 1908 een Nederlandstalig aanhangsel meegaf bij het Belgische blad La Conquête de l'Air van de Belgische luchtvaartvereniging, ging men in 1909 over tot het uitgeven van een eigen blad Het Luchtschip wat enkele maanden later al weer werd herdoopt in De Luchtvaart. Eveneens sloot men zich in 1909 aan bij de Franse overkoepelende organisatie FAI. Vanaf 14 november 1912 mocht men het predicaat Koninklijk voeren. De Koninklijke Nederlandse Vereniging voor Luchtvaart, de KNVvL is de overkoepelende organisatie voor alle luchtsporten en luchtvaart hobby's in Nederland. De KNVvL is als sportbond aangesloten bij het NOC*NSF en de internationale federatie FAI. De KNVvL bestaat uit de volgende afdelingen: Aerobatics Algemene luchtvaart afdeling (ALA) Ballonvaren Gemotoriseerd vliegen Historische Luchtvaart Luchtvaartkennis Luchtvaartwetenschappen Modelvliegsport Parachutespringen Schermvliegen Zeilvliegen Zweefvliegen

Name: Europrim Group
Company description: Europrim Group este mai mult decât o casă de expediții. Din 2005 ne poziționăm printre cei mai importanți furnizori de servicii logistice si de transport din România, oferind clienților noștri servicii de calitate, rapide și eficiente, la prețuri competitive. Parteneriatele strategice cu elita transportatorilor naționali și internaționali susțin misiunea grupului de a asigura servicii logistice personalizate, oriunde pe glob. De la transport rutier, feroviar, maritim și aerian ori intermodal, până la comisionariat vamal și depozitare, aducem calitatea, siguranța și fiabilitatea la un nivel și mai înalt prin certificările și distincțiile obținute de-a lungul anilor de experiență în industrie: suntem membri certificați IATA, FIATA și TIACA, agent exclusiv United Shipping, Inc. pentru România și Bulgaria, membri Cargo Partner Network, Largo+ și GLA. Și totul datorită culturii organizaționale sănătoase, echipelor unite și procedurilor de lucru bine puse la punct. ----------------------------------------------------- Europrim Group is more than a freight forwarder. Since 2005 we have been one of the leading providers of logistics and transport services in Romania, offering our customers quality, fast and efficient services at competitive prices. Strategic partnerships with elite national and international carriers support the Group's mission to provide customized logistics services anywhere in the world. From road, rail, sea, air and intermodal transport, to customs brokerage and warehousing, we bring quality, safety and reliability to an even higher level through certifications and distinctions earned over the years of experience in the industry: we are IATA, FIATA and TIACA certified members, United Shipping, Inc. exclusive agent for Romania and Bulgaria, Cargo Partner Network, Largo+ and GLA members. And it's all thanks to our healthy organisational culture, close-knit teams and well-developed working procedures.

Name: ShoreLink AB
Company description: Effektiv logistik för en starkare industri i norra Sverige ShoreLink är en ledande aktör inom transport och logistik i norra Sverige med verksamhet i Skellefteå, Piteå, Luleå och Kalix. Vi ser till att gods rör sig sömlöst – till sjöss, på räls och väg – med tjänster som spänner över skeppsklarering, spedition, lastning, lossning samt maskin- och transportlösningar. Med rötterna i Piteå och nära samarbete med regionens tunga basindustri erbjuder vi skräddarsydda, hållbara lösningar för varje kund. Vår moderna fordonsflotta, engagerade team på cirka 250 medarbetare och en omsättning på 300 Mkr gör oss till en stabil och framåtblickande partner. Vi tror på smart logistik som förenklar vardagen, driver utveckling och stärker industrin – alltid med lokal närvaro, lång erfarenhet och stort engagemang.

Name: Railtrans International A.s.
Company description: Railtrans International a.s with a headquarters located in Bratislava, Slovakia, was founded in November 2011. RTI holds a license for provision of rail transport services according to Law Nr. 514/2009 as Amended and according to Safety Certificate in Slovakia, Czech Republic, Hungary and Austria. And as a first Eastern/Central European private rail freight company holding a license to operate in Germany. The aim of our company is to contribute to continuous quality improvement of our customer services through employment of new approaches and technologies, and to create motivation space for decrease of costs and perspective increase of customer satisfaction.

Name: DN Logistica Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Catania, Via Filippo Anfuso, 95121
Company description: DN Logistica è un’azienda di trasporto merci intermodale, trasporto merci su strada e logistica integrata, con base in Sicilia e attiva da decenni su tutto il territorio nazionale. DN Logistica, inoltre, è l’unica azienda siciliana a disporre di un moderno polo logistico ferroviario privato, a ridosso dello scalo merci di Catania-Bicocca e con grandi magazzini dedicati alla movimentazione delle merci in arrivo nel terminal: una grande novità per il mercato della logistica  in Sicilia, con notevoli vantaggi di tempi e di costo per i clienti. In un contesto di mercato profondamente mutato negli ultimi anni, DN Logistica si propone non più come semplice trasportatore, ma nella veste di azienda partner per i trasporti intermodali di merci e per l’esecuzione dei servizi di raccolta, stoccaggio e consegna su tutto il territorio italiano. DN Logistica opera nelle seguenti aree di attività: - trasporti di merci su strada e intermodali : una moderna flotta mezzi coordinata dal centro operativo, in grado di servire l’intera penisola ricorrendo all’utilizzo combinato di camion, treni e navi per garantire celerità e flessibilità nella distribuzione delle merci; - depositi industriali e servizi logistici : magazzini per lo stoccaggio e la conservazione sicura dei prodotti e la piccola distribuzione ai clienti finali; - piattaforma logistica di 30.000 mq alla zona industriale di Catania con polo ferroviario privato, in una posizione strategica per la distribuzione in tutta la Sicilia. Eroghiamo questi servizi valorizzando i nostri punti di forza: - professionalità di tutto il nostro personale amministrativo ed operativo; - efficienza nei tempi e nelle modalità di trasporto delle merci; - sicurezza a garanzia della merce dei nostri clienti.

Name: De Burgh
Company description: De Burgh is al meer dan 60 jaar een begrip in de regio Eindhoven dankzij de complete, persoonlijke service. Je bent hier niet alleen het juiste adres voor de beste bedrijfswagens (bestelwagens en vrachtwagens), maar ook voor onderdelen, reparatie en onderhoud. Dat de klanten centraal staan, wordt elke dag weer bewezen. De ruime openingstijden en de 24-uursservice zijn daar twee perfecte voorbeelden van.  De Burgh heeft 3 vestigingen in Eindhoven, Acht en Son en is onderdeel van de LenGo Automotive Group. Momenteel is LenGo Automotive Group met meer dan 1.700 medewerkers actief in drie landen: Nederland, Polen en Rusland. In alle landen richten wij ons op de totale dienstverlening voor de bedrijfswagenbranche met het merk DAF als voornaamste vertegenwoordiging. Daarnaast voeren we onder meer de merken Fiat Professional, IVECO, MAN en Kässbohrer. LenGo Automotive Group beschikt over een zeer uitgebreid servicenetwerk met moderne, goed uitgeruste werkplaatsen. Ondanks alle uitbreidingen blijft LenGo een echt familiebedrijf waar medewerkers en vooral ook klanten zich thuis voelen.

Name: Captrain Netherlands B.V.
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Rotterdam, 103-b/c Albert Plesmanweg, 3088gc
Company description: Welkom bij Captrain Netherlands! Captrain Netherlands B.V. is sinds 2007 actief als spoorvervoerder in Nederland. Binnen de Captrain Deutschland Group concentreert het transportbedrijf zich op het organiseren en uitvoeren van regionaal en grensoverschrijdend spoorvervoer met een focus op de haven van Rotterdam, de grootste diepzeehaven van Europa en de op twee na grootste haven van de wereld. De nauwe verwevenheid met de buurbedrijven van de Captrain Group is uw garantie voor een betrouwbare en efficiënte productie van uw logistieke diensten in het regionale vervoer en het langeafstandsvervoer.

Name: Loodet
Company description: Als specialist in het op- en overslaan, sileren en ompakken van food, feed, ADR en niet-ADR geclassificeerde vaste goederen, nemen we u als Loodet B.V. ook het gehele logistieke proces van opslag, overslag en transport uit handen. Een correcte en efficiënte afhandeling van uw goederenstromen is onze zorg. Zo nemen we u veel werk uit handen. Het naleven van de juiste wet- en regelgeving is voor ons als BRZO/VR-plichtig bedrijf immers dagelijkse kost. Waardoor u zich kunt richten op uw corebusiness: de in- en verkoop van goederen.

Name: Wandelnet
Company description: Wandelnet is een organisatie die zich richt op het bevorderen van een toegankelijk, levendig en aaneengeschakeld netwerk voor voetgangers in Nederland. Met de missie om wandelen te positioneren als meer dan alleen een vervoersmiddel, streeft Wandelnet ernaar om de maatschappelijke voordelen van lopen te benadrukken, zoals het bevorderen van biodiversiteit, klimaatadaptatie en de lokale economie. Het bedrijf biedt beleidsmakers en ontwerpers concrete instrumenten en richtlijnen via hun PLAN, dat hen helpt bij het creëren van veilige en aantrekkelijke loopruimtes. Wandelnet werkt samen met diverse partners en richt zich op een breed scala aan klanten, waaronder gemeenten, ontwerpers en wandelaars, om de kwaliteit van wandelroutes en -omgevingen te verbeteren. Door obstakels te minimaliseren en de beleving van de openbare ruimte te optimaliseren, draagt Wandelnet bij aan een cultuur waarin wandelen een vanzelfsprekende en gewaardeerde activiteit is.

Name: Transport- En Containerbedrijf Wielemaker BV
Company description: Wielemaker werd in 1916 opgericht. Sindsdien is Wielemaker zich voortdurend blijven ontwikkelen om als dienstverlenend bedrijf optimaal te kunnen functioneren. Thans vormen regionaal, nationaal en internationaal transport, groepage, exceptioneel transport, inzameling van afval en reststoffen en containerverhuur de belangrijkste pijlers van de onderneming. Daarnaast verhuurt Wielemaker zo'n 16.000 m² overdekte opslagruimte. Wielemaker streeft naar duurzame relaties. Het is namelijk een wederzijds belang, ontwikkelingen van opdrachtgevers te kennen en daarop te anticiperen zodat een optimale transportoplossing geboden kan worden. Een team van bijna 70 enthousiaste medewerkers staat nu klaar om zich in te zetten voor een optimale uitvoering van uw opdrachten. Door onze jarenlange ervaring is er een enorme expertise opgebouwd. En daar kunt u van profiteren!

Name: Euskotrenbideak-Ferrocarriles Vascos S.A.
Company description: Euskotrenbideak-Ferrocarriles Vascos S.A. is a prominent transportation company in the Basque Country, specializing in the operation of rail and tram services. The company is dedicated to providing efficient and sustainable public transport solutions, aiming to enhance mobility for residents and visitors alike. With a focus on customer satisfaction, Euskotrenbideak offers various fare discounts, such as a 40% reduction for trips paid with specific transport cards, and a 50% discount for youth profiles. The company serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and local residents, while collaborating with regional partners to improve transportation infrastructure and services. Euskotrenbideak's mission is to promote sustainable urban mobility, contributing to the overall development of the Basque region.

Name: Be-Trans
Company description: Nationaal & internationaal container transport. BE-Trans spitst zich toe op het transport van 20ft tot 45ft, high cubes, reefers en kipcontainers. Ftl en groupage service in gans Europa.

Name: Niederbarnimer Eisenbahn
Company description: Bei der Niederbarnimer Eisenbahn (NEB) blicken wir auf über 120 Jahre Tradition und Innovation im öffentlichen Nahverkehr zurück.  Täglich sind unsere Mitarbeitenden an Standorten in Berlin und Brandenburg im Einsatz sowie auf der Schiene unterwegs. Als Betreiber des Heidekrautbahn-Netzes und zehn weiterer Regionalbahnstrecken setzen wir auf moderne Antriebstechnologien und nachhaltige Mobilität.
