With offices in four different locations: Poland, Romania, Turkey and headquarters in Gothenburg, our increasingly diverse team consists of a total of 50 employees.   We offer qualitative, precise transport solutions combined with an excellent personal service. Our network is wast and leaves no blank spots on the map. We transport everything from machinery and clothes to food and dangerous goods. We know that the industry needs to develop and be challenged to reach a higher quota of sustainable transports. With innovation, growth and sustainability as strands in our own DNA, our ambition is to be a part of the solution and the journey to revolutionise the logistics industry is already in full swing.

Name: Rail Baltica
HQ Location: Latvia, Riga, Riga, 2b Satekles Iela, lv-1050
Company description: RB Rail AS is a multi-national joint venture of the Republics of Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania, which has been established to implement Rail Baltica – the first pan-Baltic infrastructure project of its kind. RB Rail is the central coordinator for the Rail Baltica project.

Name: Driessen Speciaal Transport BV
Company description: De Driessen Groep werd in 1942 opgericht door Hubert Driessen en heeft zich in 75 jaar ontwikkeld tot een innovatieve organisatie waarbij de wensen van de klant centraal staan. De Driessen Groep is een familieonderneming die bestaat uit een aantal bedrijven die een specifieke vorm van dienstverlening aanbieden. De Groep is aktief in speciaal transport,grondwerken, machineverhuur t.b.v. spoorwegonderhoud en techniek & service. Speciaal transport Driessen Speciaal Transport BV verzorgt dagelijks de meest uiteenlopende transporten. Een groot aantal eenheden is actief in het transport van prefab beton in West-Europa Het uitvoeren van speciaal transport in West-Europa. Specialist in het transporteren van prefab elementen

Name: Mitsui Rail Capital Europe GmbH
Company description: Mitsui Rail Capital Europe GmbH is a transportation/trucking/railroad company based out of 290 Landsberger Str., München, Bavaria, Germany.

Name: FLC
Company description: FLC – An actively developing company from Latvia that offers multimodal logistic solutions (sea, land, rail and road) in Eurasia. Our company has a wide network of agents and partners around the globe, as well as its own warehouse complexes in Latvia.  Our employees have high professionalism, skill and experience. They always follow the principles of high responsibility and also use individual approach to each task. The team is continuously working on improving the efficiency of logistics solutions that they provide. Our main goal is to be a dynamic and efficient freight forwarding company whose experience, logistics solutions and their implementation ensure the most efficient and safe delivery of customer`s goods, striving to ensure that our customers are fully satisfied with the quality of our services.

Name: Djoser
Company description: Djoser is een reisorganisatie die zich richt op het aanbieden van unieke en avontuurlijke rondreizen naar diverse bestemmingen, met een sterke focus op cultuur, natuur en lokale ervaringen. De organisatie biedt een breed scala aan reizen, waaronder groepsreizen naar Zuid-Amerika, de Verenigde Staten, India, Nepal, Egypte, en Afrika, waarbij de nadruk ligt op het ontdekken van de rijke geschiedenis, adembenemende landschappen en levendige culturen van deze regio's. Djoser heeft als missie om reizigers de vrijheid te geven om op hun eigen manier te verkennen, terwijl ervaren Nederlandse reisbegeleiders hen begeleiden naar zowel populaire als verborgen parels.  De organisatie richt zich voornamelijk op avontuurlijke reizigers, waaronder zowel solo-reizigers als gezinnen en vrienden, die op zoek zijn naar authentieke ervaringen en een combinatie van georganiseerde tours en individuele vrijheid. Djoser werkt samen met lokale gidsen en partners om een diepere verbinding met de bestemmingen te creëren en biedt een flexibele reisstructuur die deelnemers in staat stelt om hun eigen programma te bepalen. Met een gemiddelde groepsgrootte van 16 deelnemers, zorgt Djoser voor een persoonlijke en intieme reiservaring, waarbij de nadruk ligt op het ontdekken van lokale culturen en het ontmoeten van mensen. Djoser staat bekend om haar deskundige reisbegeleiding en biedt een breed scala aan excursies en activiteiten die de rijke cultuur en natuur van de bestemmingen benadrukken. De organisatie heeft meer dan 40 jaar ervaring in de reisbranche en streeft naar klanttevredenheid door authentieke en duurzame reiservaringen te garanderen. Djoser richt zich op natuurliefhebbers, cultuursnuivers en avontuurlijke reizigers die op zoek zijn naar een unieke en onvergetelijke reiservaring, met respect voor lokale tradities en gemeenschappen.

Name: HGK Shipping GmbH
Company description: HGK Shipping – unter diesem Namen firmiert seit Anfang August 2020 Europas größtes Binnenschifffahrtsunternehmen. Im Verbund der HGK Gruppe kombinieren wir durch moderne Konzepte die Verkehrsträger Schiene, Wasserwege und Straße zu nachhaltigen Transportketten und sind Teil einer der führenden Akteure im intermodalen Güterverkehr. Mehr als 2500 Menschen arbeiten heute von Rotterdam bis Basel unter dem Dach der HGK-Gruppe.

Name: Costruzioni Linee Ferroviarie Spa
Company description: Costruzioni Linee Ferroviarie Spa (CLF) is a leading Italian company specializing in railway infrastructure, particularly in the field of railway armament. Established in 1976 through the merger of three cooperatives, CLF has grown to become a key player in the national market, driven by a commitment to technological advancement and innovation. The company has expanded its operations internationally since 1996, with significant projects in Poland marking the beginning of its global strategy. In the early 2000s, CLF focused on high-speed rail projects, investing in modern technologies to enhance its competitive edge. With the acquisition of Sifel Spa in 2010, CLF solidified its position as a comprehensive global player in the railway sector. In 2013, CLF became part of the Strukton Group, further strengthening its capabilities and market presence. The company serves a diverse clientele, including public and private sector partners, and is dedicated to delivering high-quality railway solutions that meet the evolving needs of the transportation industry.

Name: Sogemar
Company description: Sogemar, with over 50 years of experience in the sector, acts as a sub-holding, leading Contship Italia intermodal and logistics subsidiaries, coordinating Hannibal, Oceanogate, Rail Hub Milano and driveMybox activities.

Name: Jobs @ ARS Altmann AG
Company description: As a successful forwarding and logistics company, ARS Altmann AG is one of the leading service providers for automotive logistics in Europe with headquarters in Wolnzach. In addition to the transport of vehicles by rail and road, we also take care of the entire service around the automobile and vehicles of the high & heavy sector. For more than 40 years we have been passionate about our work and fulfill our orders with the highest quality, flexibility and absolute reliability. Impressum:  https://www.ars-altmann.de/en/imprint/

Name: Terramar
Company description: Terramar is a seasoned freight forwarding and logistics company with over 33 years of experience in providing comprehensive transport solutions across sea, road, rail, and air. With a mission to simplify logistics for its clients, Terramar operates modern warehouses in key locations in Poland, including Gdańsk, Gdynia, and Pruszków, and offers a full suite of services, including customs agency support, oversized cargo transport, and specialized handling of hazardous materials. The company prides itself on reliability, safety, and a dedicated account management approach, ensuring that clients receive personalized support throughout the logistics process. Terramar serves a diverse clientele, including businesses involved in international trade, and collaborates with trusted carriers and logistics operators to deliver competitive pricing and punctual service. Its vision is to be a reliable partner for generations, facilitating seamless logistics operations and enabling clients to focus on their core business growth.

Name: Italtrade Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Catania, Vi Strada 9 Zona Industriale, 95121
Company description: Italtrade, una delle principali aziende a livello internazionale, leader nel settore logistico, è in grado di soddisfare ogni tipo di esigenza relativa ai trasporti e alla logistica. La forza dell'azienda nasce dalla conduzione familiare tramandata di generazione in generazione, grazie all'intuito imprenditoriale del suo fondatore. La politica aziendale, dell'Italtrade, da anni è attenta alrispetto dell'ambiente. In questa "ottica ecologica" la Italtrade investe in innovazione disponendo di muletti elettronici, impianti fotovoltaici, treni e sistemi di raccolta rifiuti differenziata con l'obiettivo anche di un contenimento e risparmio di costi. Per il trasporto merci a lunga distanza, oltre al trasporto marittimo e stradale, la Italtrade li integra avvalendosi di un proprio raccordo ferroviario che puo' contenere fino a 400 mt. di treno presso la sede di Catania.

Name: Iorio Trasporti E Logistica Spa
Company description: Da sempre sulle vostre strade. AMBIENTE: LA SOSTENIBILITÀ È UNA SCELTA. La nostra concezione “green economy” ci impone di sottolineare il rapporto tra sostenibilità e innovazione. L’azienda Iorio Trasporti controlla le emissioni in atmosfera degli scarichi prodotti dai motori a combustione, selezionando in merito i tipi di automezzi impiegati e sottoponendoli ai controlli previsti dalla legge. L’intento dell’ azienda è quello di lanciare un forte messaggio di ecosostenibilità. E per fare ciò si è scelto il treno come mezzo a basso impatto ambientale. Il trasporto intermodale, infatti, garantisce un abbattimento del CO2, di circa il 21%.  Noi lavoriamo al servizio del cliente, ma anche al servizio dell'ambiente. BUSINESS FAMILY: IL VALORE AGGIUNTO. Siamo il tipico modello di impresa a conduzione familiare, la medaglia al valore che ci contraddistingue ancor più all’ interno del nostro settore. La famiglia evidenzia ancor più il grado di coesione dell’ azienda, determinando così la condivisione degli obiettivi aziendali. Ciò porta ad una solida collaborazione da parte del dipendente e ad un incremento della produttività. ETICA DEL PERSONALE: DIPENDENTI COME PATRIMONIO DELL'AZIENDA. Proporre un nuovo modo di fare impresa è la nostra mission. Da sempre, infatti, offriamo sicurezza e cordialità ai nostri lavoratori, i quali mettono a disposizione le loro conoscenze, competenze e capacità a favore dell’ azienda. Tutto ciò è una garanzia per la condizione di stabilità dell’ impresa. Garantiamo ai nostri clienti la possibilità di operare in un ambiente idoneo e sicuro.

Name: InterRail Europe GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 9a An Der Mainkur, 60386
Company description: InterRail is a neutral, international transport company based in Switzerland with focus on rail freight. As operator of block trains between Europe and Asia, InterRail has the specific know-how for the transport of conventional and containerized freight. In addition, InterRail has its own locations and long-standing business relationships with companies along the new Silk Road. InterRail's services as a competent provider of transport services include the provision of conventional wagons, container wagons and container equipment. InterRail is general agent for CRCT (subsidiary of the Chinese Railways) as well as for KTZE (Kazakh Railways) and works as a neutral provider not for original shippers.

Name: Compass Transport
Company description: Door de jarenlange ervaring in transport en logistiek heeft Compass Transport zich ontwikkeld tot een volwaardig nationaal en internationaal transport- en distributiepartner binnen de Benelux en overige landen in Europa. Met het team gemotiveerde transport- en distributie specialisten dat opereert vanuit Hardenberg zijn wij iedere dag weer in staat dat stukje extra service te verlenen wat u van ons verwacht! Daarnaast zijn al onze chauffeurs ADR opgeleid dus ook voor gevaarlijke stoffen kunt u bij ons terecht... Compass Transport onderscheidt zich als transporbedrijf door zich te allen tijde vast te houden aan de waarden waar wij vanaf de eerste dag voor staan..  Bent u ook opzoek naar een betrouwbare transport- en distributiepartner voor uw zendingen in Nederland, België en Luxemburg en overige landen Europese landen? Hecht u waarde aan continuïteit? Dan kunt u kiezen uit een groot aantal transportbedrijven. Maar kiest u ook voor kwaliteit, flexibiliteit en korte communicatielijnen, dan bent u voor uw transport en distributie zendingen bij Compass Transport aan het juiste adres!  Wij komen graag met u in contact om samen met u te kijken naar de mogelijkheden waarin Compass Transport haar dienstverlening ook voor uw bedrijf kan uitvoeren.

Name: Blueline
Company description: Dun Laoghaire-Rathdown County Council in association with University College Dublin, St Vincent's University Hospital, RTE and the Sandyford Business Estates Association is promoting the development of the BlueLine Rapid Transit service. “BlueLine” will run from St. Vincents University Hospital (Nutley Lane) to the Sandyford Business Estate via University College, Dublin. It will offer a high quality, high-frequency, high-capacity public transport service featuring all the benefits of a fixed-rail tram system with the flexibility of being able to drive on the road.  The service will provide a public transport link between the DART, BUS and LUAS services. It will serve the major employment centres of St Vincent’s University Hospital, RTÉ, UCD and the Sandyford business estates. It will also improve connectivity between local communities in the area.    Ten stations will be provided along the route at the following locations: •	St. Vincent’s University Hospital  •	RTÉ •	UCD Main Gate •	UCD Central •	Roebuck Road •	Mount Anville •	Goatstown •	Kilmacud (Interchange with LUAS and ‘Park & Ride’) •	Stillorgan/ Sandyford (LUAS Interchange) •	Sandyford Central The promoters of this project have arranged for public information centres to be located at the Dún Laoghaire and Dundrum Council Offices; Beacon South Quarter; UCD main campus; the reception area of St. Vincent’s Hospital; the main canteen of RTÉ and the Merrion Centre.

Name: CER
HQ Location: Belgium, Brussels Capital, Brussels, 53 Avenue Des Arts, 1000
Company description: The Community of European Railway and Infrastructure Companies (CER) brings together around 70 railway undertakings, their national associations as well as infrastructure managers and vehicle leasing companies. The membership is made up of long-established bodies, new entrants and both private and public enterprises, representing 73% of the rail network length, 76% of the rail freight business and about 92% of rail passenger operations in EU, EFTA and EU accession countries. CER represents the interests of its members towards EU policy makers and transport stakeholders, advocating rail as the backbone of a competitive and sustainable transport system in Europe. For more information, visit www.cer.be or follow us on X, Bluesky and Instagram.

Name: TRANSRAD sa
HQ Location: Belgium, Wallonia, Fleurus, 1 Avenue De L'espérance, 6220
Company description: 𝕆𝕌ℝ 𝔼𝕏ℙ𝔼ℝ𝕋𝕀𝕊𝔼 : ✅ Transport and forwarding of nuclear, radioactive and related material for the nuclear industry over all transport modes (road, rail, air, water). ✅ Feasibility studies related to transport and forwarding. ✅ Nuclear liability. ✅ Advice and administrative support. 𝕋𝕣𝕒𝕟𝕤𝕡𝕠𝕣𝕥 : TRANSRAD organises the worldwide transport and shipping of nuclear, radioactive and related material, 7/7, 24/24, via all modes of transportation. We have a fleet of over 50 vehicles specially designed and equipped for the transport of radioactive and nuclear substances. All vehicles are followed up with a tracking system.  A dedicated team of drivers with specific training, approved by the competent authority, for the transport of radioactive material. This staff is permanently trained. ✈️🚚🚘⚓🚝 𝕃𝕠𝕘𝕚𝕤𝕥𝕚𝕔𝕤 𝕤𝕦𝕡𝕡𝕠𝕣𝕥 :  TRANSRAD organises the logistics support from the point of departure to the final destination. We compare the different possibilities of transportation. If necessary we arrange a nuclear liability insurance. We take care of all administrative aspects in terms of packaging approvals, authorizations and licenses in strict compliance with the applicable legislation. 🏥🌎👨⚕️

Name: Antonisen B.V.
Company description: Antonisen profileert zich als full-service provider. Wij zijn expediteur, transporteur en de juiste partner op logistiek gebied.  Over de gehele wereld, via land-, lucht- of zeetransport, zorgen wij ervoor dat uw missie succesvol en effectief verloopt.  Daarnaast ontzorgen wij u van alle overige zaken, zoals vergunningen en het regelen van begeleiders waar nodig. We adviseren u het meest adequate traject voor uw transport, hierbij maken we onderscheid in de volgende goederensoorten: * Reguliere goederen  * ADR  * Klasse 1  * Strategische goederen Voorbereiding is volgens ons het halve werk. Ons team exploreert nieuwe transportroutes voorafgaand aan het daadwerkelijke transport en bekijkt wat voor u de beste oplossing is. Ieder heeft zijn eigen specialiteit, zo krijgt u altijd de juiste persoon en service tot uw beschikking. Wij zijn dan ook 24/7 bereikbaar en staan u graag te woord.

Name: UNIFE | The European Rail Supply Industry Association
HQ Location: Belgium, Brussels Capital, Brussels, 221 Avenue Louise, 1050
Company description: UNIFE represents the European rail industry's interests at the level of both European and international institutions. With activities in the fields of - public affairs - railway standardisation & technical harmonisation - railway research - quality management it is our mission is to pro-actively develop an environment in which Europe's rail industry can provide competitive railway systems for increased rail traffic.

Name: Seisenbacher GmbH
Company description: Seisenbacher GmbH specializes in the design and manufacturing of exceptional interior solutions for train systems, focusing on delivering high-quality products such as ceiling systems, partition walls, and seating groups. The company is committed to innovation and sustainability, aiming to provide reliable and flexible design solutions that meet the needs of its clients in the rail industry. With a strong emphasis on collaboration and expertise, Seisenbacher GmbH partners with leading companies like Siemens, Stadler, and Alstom, ensuring that their products adhere to the highest quality standards. Their target market includes train manufacturers and operators, where they strive to enhance passenger experiences through superior interior design and functionality. The company's mission is to create exceptional interiors through a structured approach and a dedicated team, fostering a culture of excellence and responsiveness.

Name: Van Thiel Transport B.V.
Company description: Van Thiel Transport B.V. is a Forwarding company located in 1 Kleine Mheenweg, Hierden, Gelderland, Netherlands. We are committed to provide transport to anywhere in the world in the best suitable way.  It doesn't matter if you are looking for Road, Sea, Air or Rail freight or even warehousing we can help you! Our transport quality control system enables us to accurately track & trace your consignments and keep you informed of their whereabouts. You do not have to call us, because we will inform you. Once you placed a transport order, we will draw up a delivery schedule. If desired we can also keep your customers informed of the progress of the goods. We also carry out interim checks between deliveries, and if there is any deviation we will inform you of this immediately. You can sit back and relax in the confidence that we will keep you informed!

Name: ALLTRANS Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Mi, Settala, 15 Viale Delle Industrie, 20090
Company description: ALLTRANS is a private Italian Group, funded in1976, leader in logistics and international forwarding sectors.  Our business is focused on air, sea, road and rail transportation and logistics worldwide.  Endowed with a unique capacity of blending together a dynamic network with customer friendly desk assistance. We deliver flexible solutions of dedicated logistics to worldwide customers, encompassing forwarding, warehousing, customs and distribution services We bring to economic operators and goods producers, international forwarding and logistic services aimed at  quality improvement in the process of market globalization together with the complete security of processes and services . Relations with our customers are based on trust and coincidence of common objectives, aware that the success of our Customers will favor ours.

Name: Aarhus Letbane I/S
HQ Location: Denmark, Central Jutland, Århus, 311 Thomas Koppels Gade, 8000
Company description: Aarhus Light Rail became Denmark’s first light rail system in 2017. Then as now, our goal remains the same: to transport passengers easily and comfortably from A to B. With the light rail, we bring city and countryside closer together in East Jutland. Reliable and efficient, it helps connect people with nature, culture, work, and education — whenever we travel out and return home again. And this is not just an empty claim. Today, the light rail is a natural part of everyday life for many. Every day, more than 20,000 passengers’ step onto platforms across East Jutland to travel with us. It’s about reducing traffic congestion and minimising the global footprint we leave behind. Driven by electricity. Driven by collective solutions. Driven by the belief in a more sustainable future and, above all: driven by the needs of East Jutlanders for experiences and opportunities — and for a world that is better connected every single day.

Name: BTT Multimodal Container Solutions
Company description: BTT Multimodal Container Solutions is a forward-thinking logistics company dedicated to providing sustainable and efficient transport solutions. With a mission to lead the way in green logistics, BTT integrates innovative technologies, such as their first electric truck, into their operations to minimize environmental impact while delivering reliable services to clients. The company recently expanded its capabilities with a state-of-the-art terminal in Bergen op Zoom, enhancing its capacity to handle 550,000 TEU annually and facilitating multimodal transport via inland waterways and rail connections, including direct links to China. BTT's commitment to ecological responsibility is reflected in its partnerships and collaborations, as they strive to support global trade while prioritizing sustainability. Their target market includes businesses seeking environmentally friendly logistics solutions, and they believe that collaboration is key to achieving shared goals in the transport sector.

Name: Ellamp Srl
Company description: Design and assembly of Interior’s systems and components for Tourism & City buses, trains, Railway & Subway coaches

Name: COSCO Shipping Lines SA
Company description: COSCO SHIPPING Lines (Greece) S.A.  was established on FEB of 1997 in Piraeus, the country’s main harbor city and now consists of 172 employees. COSCO SHIPPING Lines (Greece) S.A.:  -Provides shipping agency services to develop brokerage, shipping, transport and commercial activities. -Undertakes to transport goods in containers by any means such as sea, land, rail and air transport -Completion of relevant connections and coordination of containers’ transport to various destinations within Greece or abroad. -Provides customs clearance, import, export, storage, packaging and shipping, cargo transshipments to other ships and freight management of goods in transit . -Taking any necessary action relating to the transfer and transit trade of goods. Additionally, factoring passenger and cargo ships, including but not limited to ships of the line and ships carrying containers. -The last development of COSCO Shipping Lines (Greece) S.A. is the new section established in January 2013, COSCO Greece Control Tower, to promote Greece and its geographical position as a gateway and transit Centre of loads for the EMEA region.

Name: Taveirne
Company description: Taveirne is al sinds de jaren 1950 gespecialiseerd in het aanleggen, vernieuwen en onderhouden van sporen. Zowel in België als in Noord-Frankrijk hebben we meegewerkt aan enkele van de belangrijkste projecten op het gebied van stationsaanleg, spoorvernieuwingen en spoorwerken, en dit zowel voor trein, tram als metro. Bovendien gebruiken we onze expertise om ook projecten in industrie- en havengebieden tot een goed einde te brengen.

Name: O&O Forwarding
Company description: The company offers the following 𝗦𝗘𝗥𝗩𝗜𝗖𝗘𝗦: 𝘼𝙄𝙍𝙁𝙍𝙀𝙄𝙂𝙃𝙏 - Regular consolidations with dedicated allotments - Rates agreement with 1st, 2nd and 3rd class Airlines - Dangerous goods Hanlding - Charter transportation - Product expertizes transportations 𝙎𝙀𝘼𝙁𝙍𝙀𝙄𝙂𝙃𝙏 - Seafreight shipments from and to Worldwide - FCL and LCL shipments - Multimodal Transportations - Dedicated Procurement to rates negotiation - Carrier selection and service improvement - Dedicated groupage service from and to Italy - Out of gauge transportations 𝙍𝙊𝘼𝘿𝙁𝙍𝙀𝙄𝙂𝙃𝙏 - Customer assistance (CMR and DDT documents ) - Incoterms 2020 - Track and Trace tools - FTL (Full Truck Load) and LTL (Less Truck Load) transportations 𝙁𝘼𝙎𝙃𝙄𝙊𝙉 - Ocean freight, Air freight, Rail, Road - Door-to-door - Goh and Flat - High value garments 𝙁𝙊𝙊𝘿 - Temperature controlled - Dedicated storage - Worldwide solutions 𝙋𝙃𝘼𝙍𝙈𝘼 - Dedicated Services - Expertise staff Air & Sea - Regular staff training 𝙄𝙉𝘿𝙐𝙎𝙏𝙍𝙄𝘼𝙇 𝙋𝙍𝙊𝙅𝙀𝘾𝙏𝙎 - Operational scheme and methods  - Specialized equipment/exception all transport - From early works to project ends

Name: Länsimetro Oy
Company description: Länsimetro Oy is a limited liability company that is jointly owned by the cities of Espoo and Helsinki. Länsimetro Oy is the owner of the modern metro infrastructure that will stand the test of time. Länsimetro Oy’s task is to own and develop the metro stations, rail line and metro systems. Länsimetro operates in the background of the public transport operators as the expert organisation for owning and developing the metro infrastructure. With its expertise, Länsimetro contributes to ensuring that the metro remains an attractive and safe transport option and serves customers for decades to come.

Name: Embassy Freight Rotterdam
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Vlaardingen, 33 Gerard Burgerlaan
Company description: Meet Embassy Freight Rotterdam; your digital freight forwarder with an open, honest and informal culture where personal contact and neutrality are key. We are solution-oriented and flexible. You can rely on our years of experience and extensive worldwide network to find a suitable solution for any logistical challenge. Logistics is in our blood and consultancy is part of our service. ALWAYS A STEP AHEAD. We can no longer imagine a world without digitization, and that rings true for the world of transport and logistics. We are an innovator, always keeping up with the latest developments. You can follow your shipments in real time with our Track & Trace system and get various reports for your records. WE KNOW THE WAY. When talking about transport and logistics, we literally know the way. Thanks to our extensive network of reliable logistic partners, we have a solution for all your logistic challenges. Our main focus is a timely and correct delivery of your goods whatever the circumstances. JUST ASK US. We always keep up with the latest regulations and legislation pertaining to logistics. Sharing knowledge with you, so you can make the best decisions, is ingrained in our DNA. With our worldwide network and extensive knowledge, we can expedite your shipment, quickly and efficiently. Just ask Embassy! TOGETHER WE’RE STRONGER. A personal touch is one of the key elements to our company culture. Knowing and trusting each other, makes the job easier. We like to think along proactively and out of the box which enables us to tackle any issues, before they can become problems. Seafreight – Airfreight – Road transport – Stowage – Warehousing – Rail transport – Customs; just leave it to us and we will take care of it all.  Contact us at sales@embassyfreight.nl or call the office at +31 10 593 33 33 and we will be happy to assist. We do it The Embassy Way!

Name: Mondial Movers
Company description: Tweemaal Winnaar van De Kristal, als Beste MKB-bedrijf in 2011 en in 2012!! Mondial Movers,het landelijk netwerk van Erkende Verhuisbedrijven en De Zorgverhuizer van Nederland is in 1990 opgericht door acht verhuisbedrijven en is uitgegroeid tot een succesvolle organisatie  die op  28  plaatsen in Nederland aanwezig is. Wij richten ons op die opdrachtgevers die wij een voordeel kunnen bieden. De lokale zelfstandige vestiging werkt voor particulieren en regionale en plaatselijke opdrachtgevers. Mondial Movers werkt voor opdrachtgevers die óf een landelijke dekking op prijs stellen óf een verhuisproject willen laten uitvoeren dat voor een enkel verhuisbedrijf een maatje te groot is. Ook is Mondial Movers het kenniscentrum voor verhuizingen binnen de zorgsector. Hiervoor is haar Unit De Zorg verantwoordelijk. Mondial Movers levert een toegevoegde waarde (contractbeheer, accountmanagement, kwaliteitscontroles) die door opdrachtgevers zeker wordt gewaardeerd. In de verkoop richt zij zich daarom op relaties die behoefte hebben aan die meerwaarde, terwijl door de kostenbesparingen die binnen het samenwerkingsverband behaald worden de ‘verkooptarieven’ van Mondial Movers minimaal marktconform zijn.  De certificaten van Mondial Movers: ISO 9001, ISO 14001, IiP, OHSAS 18001 en als MVO koploper hebben wij ISO 26000 geimplementeerd

Name: Backman-Trummer
Company description: We provide global logistic solutions.  Our customers are leaders in trade and industry and we know there’s no such thing as identical transport needs – that’s why our focus is to offer you optimized, tailored and clever overall logistic solutions.  No matter what sort of transport solution you are looking for, we’re here to help you during the whole transport chain, from order to delivery.  We concentrate on export and import transport and our operations comprise road and rail transport, air freight, shipping of containers and bulk goods, and freight forwarding services. Thanks to our network of partners covering transport hubs worldwide we have the resources to offer you tailored logistic solutions, as well as the benefits of regional and local presence in the areas where we operate.  Backman-Trummer is more than 130 years old and part of KWH Logistics. KWH Logistics is part of the KWH Group which is an Ostrobothnian family-owned company which manufactures and markets abrasives and water traps as well as offers freight forwarding and logistics services.  Read more at www.backman-trummer.fi

Name: Addicks & Kreye
Company description: Since 1908, Addicks & Kreye has stood for expertise in port logistics. As Addicks & Kreye Container Logistik GmbH & Co. KG, we are your specialized partner for container transport in the seaports of Bremen, Bremerhaven and Hamburg. Our services: 🚚 Container haulage, local & long-distance transport 🚢 Terminal logistics (customs, CPA & veterinary clearance) 🚂 Trimodal transport (road & rail) 📦 Heavy cargo transport & project logistics 🔌 Sustainable e-mobility in port operations With a modern fleet, 24/7 dispatch operations, digital processes and a strong team, we move your containers reliably, efficiently and increasingly emission-free.

Name: TMA Multimodal
Company description: Logistieke dienstverlening op maat: CTU zet zich in om logistieke processen optimaal uit te voeren en te begeleiden. Wij hebben hiervoor meerdere inland containerterminals, in Utrecht, Tiel en Lelystad.

Name: Norske Tog
Company description: Norske tog’s activities are procuring, owning and managing rolling stock, which shall preferentially be used for the execution of passenger transport by train as a public service obligation. The company’s rolling stock shall be offered on competition-neutral terms. The company shall operate efficiently. The company’s activities comprise of procuring, owning and managing rolling stock, which shall preferentially be used for the execution of passenger transport by train as a public service obligation. The company’s rolling stock shall be offered on competition-neutral terms. The company also has an advisory function with respect to the Norwegian state. The company shall operate efficiently. Norske tog AS is 100 % owned by the Norwegian Ministry of Transport and Communications and is a Category 3 company, meaning that the state has sector policy objectives for its ownership.

Name: Gemeente Asse
Company description: Zich uitstrekkend tussen Brussel en Aalst, vormt Asse een belangrijk verkeersknooppunt in het noordwesten van Vlaams-Brabant. Zo telt Asse zes industriezones, waar multinationals als Sennheiser, Mio, Michelin gevestigd zijn. Ook andere grote namen als Delhaize en Miele zijn, elk met een groot distributiecentrum, vertegenwoordigd in Asse.  Naast deze economische karakteristieken, wordt de gemeente ook gekenmerkt door haar glooiend landelijk karakter, waar natuur en landbouw elkaar nog verstaan en waar cultuur-historisch erfgoed en folklore erkenning vinden.  Het  lokaal bestuur is toegankelijk voor mensen met allerlei opleidingen en studieniveaus en biedt kansen om een loopbaan uit te bouwen. Administratieve of technische functies in de gemeentediensten, een onderwijsfunctie in een gemeenteschool, een verzorgende job als gezinshulp, begeleider bij de kinderopvang Spinibo, een opdracht in een cultuurcentrum, ...  De bevolking eist van een gemeentebestuur een uitstekende dienstverlening die een kwaliteitstoets met de private sector kan doorstaan. Ook hogere overheden verhogen de druk op lokale besturen door hen meer taken en bevoegdheden toe te schuiven. De gemeente Asse verwacht  als werkgever van ambtenaren loyauteit, klantgerichtheid, multi-inzetbaarheid, flexibiliteit tegenover politieke en maatschappelijke evoluties. Het gemeentebestuur van Asse is momenteel op zoek naar…

Name: Brant Visser Transport En Warehousing
Company description: Brant Visser is een vooruitstrevende logistieke dienstverlener die zich bezig houdt met diverse activiteiten: warehousing, nationaal- en internationaal transport over de weg van zowel deel-, compleet- als volumineuze lading. Daarvoor beschikken wij over circa 15.000 m2 opslagruimte en een modern, goed onderhouden wagenpark bestaande uit 75 eenheden. Ons werkgebied beslaat voornamelijk België, Nederland, Duitsland en Frankrijk.

Name: Raaberbahn AG
Company description: Raaberbahn AG is a modern, cross-border private railway company based in Austria, known for its commitment to providing efficient and sustainable transportation solutions. The company aims to enhance public mobility by improving infrastructure and expanding its services, with a focus on customer satisfaction and environmental responsibility. Raaberbahn serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and event participants, and collaborates with local municipalities and organizations to support regional events and initiatives. The company is actively involved in infrastructure projects, such as the modernization of the Wulkaprodersdorf station, which aims to create a barrier-free mobility hub and improve access to public transport. Through its innovative offerings and community engagement, Raaberbahn AG strives to promote the benefits of rail travel and contribute to a sustainable future for the regions it serves.

Name: Riksen Transport Arnhem
Company description: Specialist fijn distributie Belgie en Nederland binnen 24-uur van verpakte chemie. Dagelijks leveren wij goederen vanuit de magazijnen in Arnhem en Duiven en vanuit locaties van onze klanten volgens afspraak aan de eindklant. De organisatie beschikt over kwaliteitssystemen ISO 14001, 9001 en SQAS. Riksen heeft zich weten te specialiseren in complexe goederenstromen waarbij temperatuur opvolging, strikte tracking en tracing noodzakelijk zijn.

Name: Port Of Waterford
HQ Location: Ireland, Munster, Waterford, 3rd Floor Marine Point
Company description: Port of Waterford : The cargo gateway to Ireland’s South East Region. Ireland’s closest multi-modal port to continental Europe, is connected by road and rail to a national transport system that can get goods to their destination in a prompt and efficient manner.  As a port we aim to play a key role in the economic development of the region.   Location The main centre of operations is at Belview Port on the River Suir, 8km downstream from Waterford city. The Port of Waterford is a modern efficient port, operates 24 hours a day over 7 days and is the closest Irish lift-on lift-off and bulk port to mainland Europe. We have a national rail link running through the port and excellent road connections to the rest of Ireland. For more information, contact us on +353-51-899 800

Name: HM Verploegen - Internationaal Transportbedrijf
Company description: Wij zijn een eigentijds transportbedrijf en specialist in levering binnen Frankrijk en de Benelux. Met jarenlange expertise in nationaal en internationaal transport is H.M. Verploegen een betrouwbare logistieke partner. We hebben ons in de afgelopen jaren extra toegelegd op transporten van en naar Frankrijk.  We streven naar een transparant vervoersproces waarbij onze klanten de status van hun producten continu op de voet kunnen volgen en onze chauffeurs het verlengstuk zijn van hun organisatie. Met moderne kennis en materialen en uitstekende kwaliteit van onze service en dienstverlening willen wij klanten optimaal ontzorgen. Ons transportbedrijf heeft de beschikking over 50 trekkende eenheden en zo’n 80 trailers. Ons wagenpark is een belangrijk visitekaartje voor ons bedrijf en onze chauffeurs zijn er trots op dat zij in deze mooie trucks mogen rijden. 𝐎𝐧𝐬 𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦 Wij zijn trots op ons team van zo’n 80 medewerkers, die allemaal achter de kernwaarden van ons familiebedrijf staan. Onze binnendienst is 24/7 bereikbaar en onze chauffeurs zijn het visitekaartje van onze organisatie. Transportbedrijf H.M. Verploegen bestaat al sinds 1936. De broers Henri en Erwin Verploegen, die samen aan het roer staan van het bedrijf, behoren tot de derde generatie van het familiebedrijf. Ons bedrijf kent een platte organisatiestructuur waarin onze medewerkers volop de gelegenheid krijgen om zichzelf verder te ontwikkelen.  Daarnaast zet directeur Henri Verploegen zich als bestuurslid van het samenwerkingsverband Logistics Valley in voor een gezonde toekomst voor de sector Transport en Logistiek in de regio.  𝐅𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐤𝐫𝐢𝐣𝐤 𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐭 Naast de hoofdvestiging in Wijchen, nabij Nijmegen, heeft ons familiebedrijf ook een eigen vestiging en warehouse in het Franse Lyon.  Meer weten over ons bedrijf? Stuur dan een bericht via LinkedIn of kijk op onze website.

Name: Stravex Transport- Und Handels GmbH
Company description: Container cross docking, 3 PL- and bonded warehousing in Hamburg. Transports between Germany, EU, Asia, Africa and America by sea, air, rail and road. Full and part shipments, project and heavy transports. Customs clearance in Germany (EX, T1, T2, TIR, EAD, import). Containerumschlag, 3PL- und Zolllagerleistungen in Hamburg. See-, Luft-, Bahn- und LKW- Transporte zwischen Deutschland, Europa, Amerika und Afrika. Komplett- und Teilladungen, Projekt- und Schwertransporte. Zolldeklarant in Deutschland (EX, T1, T2, TIR, EVD, Import). Митний склад та перевантаження контейнерів у Гамбурзі. Перевезення вантажів між Німеччиною, Європою, Азією, Америкою та Африкою морським, авто, авіа та залізничним транспортом. Комплектні, негабаритні та збірні вантажі по всьому світу. Митне оформлення у Німеччині (EX, T1, T2, TIR, EAD, импорт). Таможенный склад и перегрузка контейнеров в Гамбурге. Перевозки грузов между Германией, Европой, Азией, Америкой и Африкой морским, авто, авиа и жд транспортом. Комплектные, негабаритные и сборные грузы по всему миру. Таможенное оформление в Германии.(EX, T1, T2, TIR, EAD, iмпорт).

Name: Zillertaler Verkehrsbetriebe AG
Company description: Zillertaler Verkehrsbetriebe AG is a prominent transportation company based in the Zillertal region, specializing in both bus and rail services. The company has demonstrated consistent growth, reporting an increase in passenger numbers on the Zillertalbahn and a successful bus operation, achieving profitability for the tenth consecutive year. Zillertaler Verkehrsbetriebe AG is committed to modernizing its infrastructure, as evidenced by the development of the new Bahnhof Zell am Ziller, while also addressing the urgent need for decarbonization in its operations. The company aims to enhance mobility in the region, serving a diverse clientele that includes local residents, tourists, and businesses. Through strategic partnerships and a focus on sustainable practices, Zillertaler Verkehrsbetriebe AG is dedicated to shaping the future of transportation in the Zillertal valley.

Name: Dahlrail
Company description: In all markets, Dahlrail is dedicated to helping partners and customers succeed by maintaining close relationships with all railway stakeholders. In order to close the value circle, Dahlrail offers top-tier local services and support to ensure that trains experience as little operational downtime as possible. With more than 100 years of experience in the railway sector, Dahlrail brings hands-on experience focused on ensuring guaranteed operation of your rolling stock equipment in our markets. Dahlrail’s robust railway industry network in Netherlands, Norway and Sweden provides the undergirding necessary to properly position our partners in their respective railway markets, resulting in maximised chances for success. We understand that delivery of the railway part or component is just the beginning of our relationship with our customers. In order to guarantee smooth and efficient operations over the lifetime of a rolling stock product, we cover ongoing service and support of the highest quality.

Name: ExTe
Company description: ExTe is the world's largest manufacturer of timber bunks and automatic tensioning devices for safe and rational transport of timber by road and rail.  ExTe has the market's broadest product range by far and can meet every demand. Progress that never compromises on safety is the very best warranty.

Name: AXXAZ Marine
HQ Location: Germany, Bavaria, Rieden Am Forggensee, 41 Faulenseestrasse, 87669
Company description: Are you looking for qualified personnel or a career in inland shipping? AXXAZ Marine invites you to get in touch. For secondment of crew we rely on trusted and qualified European and Filipino personnel. AXXAZ Marine offers: Recruitment AXXAZ Marine recruites personnel through offices and exclusive partnerships world-wide. Payment is per fixed fee and you will be the employer. Temporary Employment AXXAZ Marine manages a pool of nautical personnel. We are able to provide personnel quickly and accurately, who will work under your supervision, guidance and responsibility. Payrolling Do you prefer to select personnel yourself? AXXAZ Marine will employ your staff and rent them out to you - per working hour or any other definition as agreed. You will be completely carefree. AXXAZ Marine can provide this service in each European country and even globally. International Payroll Administration AXXAZ Marine can manage your entire payroll administration and you remain the employer.AXXAZ Marine provides nautical staff for European inland shipping - flexibly and reliably. AXXAZ Marine is a specialised division of AXXAZ Europe GmbH. AXXAZ Europe is a provider of bespoke staffing solutions for freight and passenger tranport, road transport, shipping, air and rail transport. AXXAZ Europe operates with local branch offices, joint ventures and strategic alliances in every state of the European Union. - Unique method of flexible payroll administration in the entire EU - Individual service, long-term, simple and clear - We are socially responsible entrepreneurs (CSR) Please get in touch for a quote, references or questions on +31 (0)6 11875448 AXXAZ Marine A division of AXXAZ Europe GmbH Faulenseestrasse 41 D-87669 Rieden am Forggensee Germany Tel +49 (0)8362 9263300 Fax +49 (0)8362 925936 E-m info@axxaz.eu CEO Arie Arensman Chamber of Commerce HR B AG Kempten German VAT DE296988120

Name: Special Air Services B.V.
Company description: Special Air Services bv is het eerste Nederlandse vliegbedrijf in de General Aviation (kleine luchtvaart) dat beschikt over een Europese A.O.C. (Air Operator Certificate). Voor u als klant geeft deze erkenning waarborg voor de veiligheid en kwaliteit van de vluchtuitvoering, de vloot en het personeel. Special Air Services beschikt over een eigen vloot van 12 vliegtuigen, waaronder een aantal tweemotorige. De vloot kan door de vele nationale en internationale relaties van het bedrijf snel uitgebreid worden.   WAAROM VLIEGEN BIJ SPECIAL AIR SERVICES? - Wij vliegen op een Europese erkenning (AOC).  - U heeft een compleet verzekerings-pakket, waaronder een WA- en ongevallenverzekering.  - Goed opgeleide vliegers die tevens uw gastheer/vrouw zijn.  - U vliegt met schone en goed onderhouden vliegtuigen.  - S.A.S. staat voor veiligheid en betrouwbaarheid. Met de erkenning voldoet Special Air Services aan de kwaliteitseisen van de E.A.S.A. en de Inspectie Dienst Luchtvaart van het Ministerie van Verkeer & Waterstaat.  De naam van het bedrijf geeft al aan dat het zich heeft gespecialiseerd in de verschillende takken van de kleine luchtvaart. Hierbij willen wij u uitnodigen om via deze site nader kennis met ons te maken. Heeft u toch nog vragen over een van onze diensten of wilt u een afspraak met onze sales afdeling, neemt u dan even contact met ons op per telefoon of per email. Wij staan 7 dagen per week voor u klaar. www.vlieglessen.nl

Name: 9292 REISinformatiegroep bv
Company description: 9292 REISinformatiegroep bv is a leading provider of public transport information and ticketing solutions in the Netherlands, primarily through its innovative 9292 app. The company focuses on enhancing the travel experience by allowing users to purchase etickets for their entire journey across various modes of public transport, including trains, buses, trams, and ferries. With a mission to simplify public transport access, 9292 aims to make travel seamless and efficient for its users. The app not only facilitates ticket purchases but also provides personalized travel advice, catering to a diverse clientele that includes daily commuters, tourists, and occasional travelers. Partnering with multiple public transport operators, such as NS and Arriva, 9292 is committed to promoting sustainable mobility solutions while ensuring convenience and accessibility for all users.

Name: ELL - European Locomotive Leasing
Company description: ELL - European Locomotive Leasing is a leading provider of locomotive leasing services in Europe, specializing in the rental and management of locomotives for various rail operators. The company aims to enhance the efficiency and sustainability of rail transport by offering flexible leasing solutions tailored to the needs of its clients. ELL serves a diverse clientele, including freight and passenger rail operators, and collaborates with key partners in the rail industry to ensure high-quality service delivery. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, ELL is dedicated to supporting the growth of the rail sector while promoting environmentally friendly transportation solutions.

Name: Transport Groep Gelderland B.V.
Company description: Transport Groep Gelderland B.V. houdt zich dagelijks bezig met het collecteren en distribueren van (rauwe) melk(producten) en transport in stukgoed. Dit doen we met een team gedreven chauffeurs, elke dag op pad met een stukje Achterhoekse mentaliteit.

Name: Swedtrac RailServices AB
Company description: Swedtrac provides a broad operation within the railway sector. We have well equipped  workshops in Hagalund and Tillberga. Since April 1 2013, Swedtrac  belongs to Knorr-Bremse Nordic Rail Services AB. The Knorr-Bremse Group, based in Munich, Germany, is the world’s leading manufacturer of braking systems for rail and commercial vehicles. Our headquarter is situated in Hagalund, Solna.  We work with modifications and introduction of new vehicles in our own workshops.  Our qualified technician’s team staffs entire projects with debuggers, mechanics and repairers on the premises of the customer. We drive train and shunt on our own traffic permissions and offers training courses in Traffic safety aspects of railway operations.  Swedtrac aims to be a professional partner for employees, suppliers and customers in the railway sector. Safety and quality combined with high customer value and flexible solutions are our everyday life.

Name: Topspeed Netherlands B.V.
Company description: U heeft een zending die met spoed van A naar B moet? Topspeed, met vestigingen in Panningen, Eindhoven en Asten, is een internationaal koerierbedrijf dat zich er in gespecialiseerd heeft om de uiterst urgente transportproblemen van haar klanten direct op te lossen, 24 uur per dag, 7 dagen per week. Binnen Nederland of wereldwijd maar altijd exclusief dus zonder bijlading of overslag. Over de weg of door de lucht (per On-Board Courier). Wij realiseren de kortst mogelijke transporttijd én meest zekere en aankomstgarantie van uw zendingen.

Name: Dania Connect A/S
Company description: At Dania Connect, we make the world smaller, the route shorter and the haulage of shipping containers more sustainable. Since 1938, Dania Connect’s ever-growing fleet of trains, trucks and trailers has connected Scandinavian container terminals with origins and final destinations for overseas cargo. Today, every container is handled and moved with precision – and with proven responsibility with regards to the climate, the environment, safety and working conditions. We are driven by sustainability and more than ever, it is imperative for the world that we all think carefully about the way we do things. And that we think far ahead. As nations, businesses and individuals. Some choices and actions have more impact than others and enable us to make a noticeable difference. Today, tomorrow and in the future. We base our responsible conduct on what we call our nine key concerns. For a quarter of a century, light blue blood has coursed through our company’s veins. A life force that continues to define our mind-set and actions.

Name: Alptax Taxiservice B.V.
Company description: Alptax Taxiservice BV. beschikt over een breed aanbod aan diensten. Het veelzijdige wagenpark bestaat momenteel uit 47 modern uitgeruste taxivoertuigen. Hiermee is Alptax een middelgroot taxibedrijf in de regio Zuidoost Brabant. Alptax streeft naar kwalitatief hoogwaardig vervoer. Voor elk vervoersprobleem bieden wij de oplossing! Met de hoofdvestiging in Deurne en nevenvestigingen in de gemeenten Helmond, Eindhoven, Gemert-Bakel, Asten en Someren vervoert Alptax dagelijks klanten naar alle gewenste bestemmingen in de regio en ver daarbuiten. Alptax beschikt over het TX-Keur. Waaraan herkent u een TX-Keur taxi? Een taxi die TX-keur gecertificeerd is herkent u aan de blauwe sticker rechts op de voorruit. Op de achterruit en de zijkanten van de taxi kunnen zich ook TX-stickers bevinden, de achterruit en zijkanten zijn echter niet verplicht. Een TX-Keur gecertificeerd bedrijf staat op de website van TX-keur vermeld  en voert de blauwe sticker.  Hierdoor kunt u er als consument op rekenen dat u op een veilige en comfortabele manier wordt vervoerd.  De bedrijven die het TX-Keur hebben behaald worden jaarlijks onafhankelijk getoetst. Daarnaast worden er continu tussentijdse kwaliteitscontroles gehouden op straat, bij ziekenhuizen, scholen en instellingen waar taxi's vaak komen.

Name: Drammen Havn
Company description: The Port of Drammen is one of Norway’s most efficient logistics and transportation hubs connecting sea, rail, and road. As a multimodal hub for goods handling, the port of Drammen operates across five primary segments: rolling cargo (RoRo), dry bulk, liquid bulk, containers, and project cargo. For decades the port of Drammen has been Norway's largest entry port for vehicles with a 70 % market share. The port aims to operate emission-free by 2030 and works continuously to reduce climate impacts.  The Port of Drammen is owned by Drammen, Lier, and Asker municipalities.

Name: Bilogistik
HQ Location: Spain, Basque Country, Santurtzi/santurce, 58 Avenida Iparraguirre, 48980
Company description: Bilogistik is a versatile transport company, with experience in handling all types of goods, door-to-door. We take care of the storage of goods and shipments, whatever their regime. We handle the customs clearance and related proceedings required for your goods. SERVICES: - International logistics - Multimodal transport specialised in ferro-alloys, tyres and bulk cargo. - Road transport - Rail transport - Maritime transport - Air transport - Shipping agency - Maritime charters - Open-air storage - Free warehouse - Customs clearance and port procedures

Name: Transportes Impala S.L.
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 58 Avenida De La Cañada, 28823
Company description: Impala Transportes y Logística es una empresa de carácter Familiar la cual data de la década de los años 80 , la compañía se creó para dar cobertura Internacional a los clientes que ya utilizaban la misma para realizar Transporte Nacional siendo una compañía pionera en Servicios de Largo Recorrido. En sus inicios , IMPALA contaba exclusivamente con 4 Vehículos de Gran Tonelaje , desde entonces hasta ahora los cambios han sido muchos y muy profundos , de ese modo manteniendo la calidad que siempre nos ha caracterizado y adaptándonos a los cambios en el mercado, así como,  a las necesidades de nuestros clientes hemos conseguido un alto nivel dentro de nuestro sector. Los servicios que ofrecemos actualmente son muy diversos , desde servicios Logisticos incluyendo almacenaje y Picking de productos en nuestras 3 delegaciones (Coslada , Santiponce (Sevilla) y Barcelona)y externalización de los mismos en los almacenes de nuestros Partners en Paris y Londres con la consiguiente Distribución domestica en los Paises correspondientes , Transporte Internacional en la CEE y Paises del Este incluyendo carga completa y fraccionada con salidas y llegadas regulares de toda Europa, todos estos avances han sido posibles gracias a nuestros colaboradores en Francia, Italia, Alemania , Reino Unido y Benelux , asi como al equipo humano que compone la compañía , los cuales provienen de compañías relevantes de Logística y Transporte , todo ello junto con nuestra amplia Flota propia de vehículos superior a las 300 unidades, Taut Liners de Techo Elevable, Tren de Carretera , Box de suelo simple y doble suelo, Rollerbed para carga aérea y vehículos de prenda colgada, y nuestra especialización en Tráficos de doble y triple conductor nos han hecho accesibles a compañías relevantes de Exportadores e Importadores ofreciéndonos un alto posicionamiento en nuestro sector.

Name: Nassau Sneltransport Breda
Company description: Ondernemen is de regie in handen nemen. Toekomstgericht werken en dat betekent keuzes maken om gezond en flexibel te blijven. We willen een bedrijf zijn dat aan de wensen voldoet en de verwachtingen overtreft. Een bedrijf waar klanten zich graag bij aansluiten. We komen afspraken na, zodat jij je afspraken na kunt komen. Daar draait het om! Krachten bundelen Nassau Sneltransport Breda is jong, maar toch ook weer niet. We zijn het resultaat van de krachtenbundeling van Gitrans Sneltransport en Van Dijk Expresse. Van Dijk Expresse is in 1984 opgericht, was toonaangevend, telde veel en gevarieerde klanten en profileerde zich sterk in farmaceutisch vervoer. Gitrans is in 1999 opgericht en was sterk in high value transport.  Door de krachtenbundeling is Nassau Sneltransport ontstaan. Samen zijn we sterk in het vervoer van tijdskritische-, hoogwaardige-, kwetsbare- en diefstalgevoelige goederen. Voor elke klant en elk type transport hebben wij een uitstekende oplossing. Flexibelk en dynamisch: Als logistiek bedrijf komt er van alles op je pad: verduurzaming, veiligheid, krapte op de arbeidsmarkt, drukte op de wegen, nieuwe en veranderende transportstromen. Dat zien we als uitdagingen en wij zijn dus klaar voor die uitdagende toekomst! Onze naam, Nassau Sneltransport Breda, geeft aan waar we vandaan komen en waar we voor staan. Het is een naam om trots op te zijn, met een huisstijl die trots uitstraalt! Waarbij het opvallende oranje staat voor verbondenheid, energie en dynamiek.

Name: Delft Hyperloop
Company description: For years now, the transportation industry has consisted of four modes of transportation. Society has settled on cars, trains, boats, and airplanes. In 2013, a new conceptual high-speed transportation system was introduced using near-vacuum tubes in which pressurized vehicles travel: the Hyperloop. Due to low air resistance in the tubes, the vehicles can travel at speeds of over 1000 km/h, almost the speed of sound. Delft Hyperloop IX (DH09) is a team of 43 students from Delft University of Technology, on a mission to develop the desire, technology, and infrastructure for the future implementation of the Hyperloop system. We believe that the Hyperloop, a concept that is as fast as an airplane but has a fraction of the ecological footprint, will be the fifth mode of transportation and the future of long-distance traveling. We, as a team, will build upon years of successful experience and multiple great performances in the SpaceX Hyperloop Pod Competition and the European Hyperloop Week (EHW). This year, we will be co-organizing and participating in EHW 2025, set to take place in Groningen and Veendam in July 2025. Follow DH09 on LinkedIn to see our journey and watch us achieve our goals!

Name: Roosenboom
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Brabant, Bergen Op Zoom, 5 5 Slingerweg, 4613
Company description: Roosenboom is een familiebedrijf dat in 1992 werd opgericht. Wat bij Roosenboom begon als enkel transportactiviteiten, is inmiddels uitgegroeid tot een volledige logistieke dienstverlener, met aanvullende specialisaties in warehousing, value-added logistics en customs. Roosenboom onderscheidt zich door zijn service, flexibiliteit, digitalisering en verduurzaming

Name: Logistiek.nl
Company description: Met een community van ruim 30.000 professionals is Logistiek hét multimediale platform voor logistiek in Nederland.  Logistiek richt zich op de thema's Smart Warehousing, Logistieke dienstverlening, Logistieke Arbeidsmarkt, Ketensamenwerking, Logistieke Hotspots en E-fulfilment. De focus bij alles wat Logistiek aan content brengt, ligt op het bieden van ondersteuning bij het nemen van investeringsbeslissingen.

Name: Audax Logistiek
Company description: Uw partner in E-Fulfilment en Distributie. Audax Logistiek is uw partner voor alle e-fulfilment en distributie  diensten. Bent u retailer, e-tailer of heeft u een webshop en zoekt u een partner voor uw logistieke proces? Audax Logistiek biedt maatwerkoplossingen gebaseerd op beproefde standaarden uit de markt. Wij koppelen onze back-end oplossingen aan uw front-end. Wij slaan uw producten op, verwerken uw webshop orders, verpakken ze en regelen de verzending. We werken met flexibele cut-off tijden. Daarnaast ontzorgen wij u bij een eventuele retourverwerking. Wij ondersteunen cross-channel distributie oplossingen zoals bijv. een retourenstroom via de winkel waarbij wij er voor zorgen dat het weer in uw voorraad komt, in de winkel kopen en thuis laten bezorgen vanuit een centraal warehouse en click&collect zodat de online aankopen door de consument zelf kunnen worden opgehaald in de winkel of bij een pick-up point. Dit kunnen we bieden omdat we over een eigen gespecialiseerd fijnmazig distributienetwerk beschikken in de steden, de winkelstraten, supermarkten, scholen, benzinestations, enzovoorts in Nederland en Belgie. Wij maken 6.000-8.000 stops per dag. Wij bieden de juiste schaalgrootte voor zowel de start-up als ook voor de ervaren webwinkel en e-tailer. Met 250 collegae bieden wij al meer dan 40 jaar logistieke oplossingen. Wij ontzorgen u op het gebied van warehousing, e-fulfilment, distributie en e-logistics zodat u zich volledig kunt concentreren op uw core business. Een belangrijke meerwaarde is onze mogelijkheid om producten uniek te maken, om- en her- te verpakken, om van een andere barcode te voorzien, in cadeaupapier verpakken en om bijvoorbeeld sets te maken. Dit zijn slechts enkele voorbeelden van onze Value Added Services (VAS-diensten) welke eindeloze mogelijkheden bij ons kennen. Door onze schaalvoordelen en service gerichtheid kunnen wij samen met u voor een optimale Total Cost of Ownership zorgen

Name: TCA Terminal Athus
Company description: TCA offers combined rail/road transport between the Maritime ports of Antwerp and Zeebrugge to the hinterland Saar-Lor-Lux region. (Saar (Germany), Lorraine (France), Luxembourg, Southern Belgium region) Terminal Athus is your innovative and efficient logistics partner! Combined Transport, Customs (warehouse B-E), Fumigation, VGM, Container depot Warehousing, stripping/stuffing, packaging

Name: Railexperts
Company description: Railexperts specialiseert zich in het aanbieden van dienstverlening op het gebied van personenvervoer per spoor. Zowel nationaal als internationaal. Tractie, personeel, advies, draaiboeken; Railexperts is van alle markten thuis. Railexperts offers rail services throughout Europe.  Traction, staffing, advise or operational plans; Railexperts are here to help. www.railexperts.nl

Name: Wessels Transport Rijssen B.V.
Company description: Wessels Transport Rijssen is een transportbedrijf met 80 jaar ervaring. Wij zijn een deskundig logistiek partner voor transport door heel Europa.  Wessels Transport: voor een volledige ontzorging.  Wilt u geen omkijken meer hebben naar uw logistieke vraagstuk? Van logistieke oplossing tot planning en transport: wij werken strak en vakkundig, op basis van onderling vertrouwen en betrouwbaarheid. U wordt volledig ontzorgd en kunt zich op uw core business richten.  U kunt bij ons terecht voor transport van bouwmaterialen, stenenvervoer, transport met zware autolaadkranen, prefab-transport en stukgoedvervoer. Graag vertellen wij u hier meer over.

Name: PEKO International Forwarding
Company description: 👉 We are a team of 26 experts, specializing in the organization of national and international transport 👉 For 16 years we have been organizing import-export on the route Poland ↔ world 🌍 👉 Our team consists of specialized departments for sea, rail, air and road transport 🚢🚊✈🚚 👉 We have our own customs agency with branches in 6 Polish cities! 🎯 Our goal: to transport your goods from/to any place in the world, so that you feel relieved and confident that everything will arrive as planned!

Name: Transport Martens BVBA
Company description: Wij zijn een familiebedrijf dat al jaren lang garant staat voor een persoonlijke transportservice.  Buiten transport leveren wij ook een full-service logistiek pakket aan. Bent u een klein bedrijf of een grote onderneming? Bij Transport Martens gaan we geen uitdaging uit de weg.  Wij denken graag mee met u en proberen zo een verlengstuk te zijn op logistiek vlak.

Name: HNT Schakt & Transport AB
Company description: HNT Schakt & Transport AB är ett familjeägt bolag som funnits sedan 1938. Hasse Nilsson tog över driften efter sin far och har sedan lämnat över till sina söner Håkan och Mattias Nilsson. HNTs huvudkontor är beläget på industriområdet Älvdalen i Ängelholm där närheten till E6 ger en logistiskt optimal placering. Vi har bemannade kontor i Ängelholm, Malmö och Åhus. Med stationeringsorter från Skåne upp till Mälardalen når vi snabbt de största orterna i Sverige och våra nordiska grannländer. Vårt syfte är att utföra hållbara och nära transporter med trygghet i varje uppdrag. Tillsammans genom vår erfarenhet och kunskap gör vi det trygga uppdraget hållbart. Vi leder och erbjuder kunden flexibla och nära uppdrag inom logistik- och transport samt anläggningsentreprenad. Med stationeringsorter från Skåne upp till Mälardalen utför vi uppdrag över hela Sverige och till våra nordiska grannländer.

Name: Car Drivers Chauffeursdiensten
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Amsterdam, 573 Jan Tooropstraat, 1061
Company description: Wij besparen onze klanten heel veel tijd in hun doorlopende zoektocht naar goede en ervaren chauffeurs, wij geven klanten de flexibiliteit om hun chauffeurspoule op te schalen tijdens piekmomenten en af te schalen tijdens rustige momenten, indien gewenst nemen wij alle administratie, planning en sturing van de chauffeurs over. Aan elk chauffeursverzoek koppelen wij de meest passende chauffeur die past bij de bedrijfscultuur van onze klanten.  Onze jarenlange ervaring zetten wij in om klanten te helpen om hun chauffeurs zo efficiënt mogelijk in te zetten.  Kortom, wij geven met onze chauffeurs de klanten de mogelijkheid om te groeien, te besparen en zich te focussen op hun core business.

Name: Polish Forwarding Company
Company description: Logistics services, comprehensive organization of sea, air, car and rail transport in Poland, Europe and the whole world.

Name: Łódzka Kolej Aglomeracyjna Sp. Z O.o.
Company description: Łódzka Kolej Aglomeracyjna (ŁKA) is a truck operating company from Lodz, Poland. In the near future ŁKA will establish the first railway connection in the region (lodzkie voivodeship) and until 2015 it plans to cover it entirely. In the next years it is predicted that ŁKA will expand beyond originally given boundaries. ŁKA a new company owned by the provincial government of Lodz.

Name: Vest Trans Rail
HQ Location: Romania, Prahova, Ploieşti, Nr. 119 Str. Mircea Cel Batran, 100426
Company description: Vest Trans Rail ensures availability, professionalism and trust in relationship with its partners both, for national and international transports, doing transport on public and private infrastructure of Romania. Vest Trans Rail offers a full range of services in rail freight forwarding and also other related services with railway transport of goods, including detailed analysis and advice in order to propose its clients the best transport solutions. Vest Trans Rail asigura disponibilitate, profesionalism si incredere in relatia cu partenerii sai, atat pentru transporturi nationale, cat si internationale, realizand transporturi pe infrastructura publica si privata din Romania. Vest Trans Rail ofera o gama variata de servicii in domeniul expeditiilor feroviare de marfuri, precum si alte servicii conexe acestuia, cum ar fi analize detaliate si consiliere, cu scopul de a propune clientilor sai cele mai bune solutii de transport.

Name: BPA UAB
HQ Location: Lithuania, Klaipėda County, Klaipėda, 37 S. Daukanto Gatvė, 92229
Company description: BPA, UAB – is a transport-logistics company based in Klaipėda, Lithuania. ● 20 years in the market. ● Door-To-Door transportation by any transport mode. ● Completed orders - more than 37000 ● Wide range of services including door-to-door cargo delivery Worldwide. ● Our team of professionals and years of experience allow us to find the best freight solutions and offer tailor – made logistic package. ● Working closely with our customers we optimize transport routes, delivering their freight on time and reducing costs. It  helps to gain a competitive advantage and build long-term, values-based business partnerships. Vision - create effective logistics solutions for your business in the environment where cooperation becomes easy and cargo transportation becomes efficient and high-quality. Our services: ● Warehousing. ● Port agency. ● Sea freight. ● Rail transport. ● Road transport. ● Oversized and heavy loads. ● A partial load. ● Multimodal transport. ● Unique logistical solutions and project management. Main routes:  ● Worldiwide - Lithuania, Klaipeda - Ukraine, Kazkhstan, Uzbekistan, Turkmenistan, Kirgizia, Georgia,  We are a member of both Lithuanian Shipbrokers and Agents Association (LSAA). The company is also a member of Lithuanian National Association of Forwarders and Logistics (LINEKA). The latter is a member of the International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations (FIATA). Contacts: ● sales@bpa.lt ●  +37068788317 ● www.bpa.lt

Name: Pro-Rail Alliance
Company description: In Germany’s most unconventional transport alliance, 23 non-profit organisations and over 135 companies from every part of the railway sector work closely in permanent collaboration. The motivation is the promotion and improvement of rail transport in Germany.

Name: EIM European Rail Infrastructure Managers
HQ Location: Belgium, Brussels Capital, Brussels, 1 Square De Meeus
Company description: EIM supports an open and seamless European rail network, promoting a safe and sustainable transport system. Mission: • EIM promotes the development, improvement and efficient delivery of rail infrastructure in the EU • EIM and its members are committed to make liberalisation a success in the countries where it has been implemented • EIM represents its members' political, technical and business interests to all relevant EU institutions • EIM supports the business development by providing a forum for cooperation • EIM provides an environment for the leaders of IMs for sharing best practices and efficiency tools Company Overview: European Rail Infrastructure Managers (EIM) was established in 2002 following the liberalisation of the EU railway market to promote the interests of independent rail infrastructure managers in the EU and the EEA. Based in Brussels, EIM is registered as an international, non-profit association under Belgian law. It is one of 10 European railway organisations recognised by the European Commission as a 'representative body from the railway sector'. As such, EIM supports the work of the European Railway Agency (ERA) in various working groups and occupies a seat on its Administrative Board. Description: The role of EIM is to provide a single voice to represent its members (independent infrastructure managers (IMs)) vis-à-vis to the relevant European institutions and sector stakeholders. EIM also assists members to develop their businesses through the sharing of experiences and contributing to the technical and safety activities of the European Rail Agency (ERA).

Name: WestfalenBahn GmbH
Company description: Die WestfalenBahn GmbH ist ein regional verankertes Eisenbahnverkehrsunternehmen. Seit 2007 fährt das Unternehmen mit Sitz in Bielefeld Züge des Nahverkehrs in Nordrhein-Westfalen und Niedersachsen.  Mehr als 400 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter sorgen für Sicherheit, Pünktlichkeit und Komfort in den Zügen und befördern jährlich rund 20 Mio. Fahrgäste auf 6 Mio. Zugkilometern. In dem über 600 Kilometer langen Emsland- und Mittelland-Netz verbindet die WestfalenBahn, ein Tochterunternehmen von Abellio Deutschland, die Städte Emden, Rheine, Münster, Bielefeld, Minden, Hannover und Braunschweig. Dafür werden 28 Elektrotriebzüge eingesetzt, die in eigenen Werkstätten in Minden und Rheine instandgehalten werden.  Mit der WestfalenBahn zu reisen heißt, komfortabel, sicher und schnell zu reisen. Mit modernsten Zügen und ausgereifter Technik sichern wir Ihre Mobilität. Unser engagiertes Personal bietet Ihnen bestmöglichen Service und sorgt dabei jederzeit für Ihr Wohlbefinden. Das Unternehmen hat seinen Sitz in Bielefeld in der Zimmerstraße 8 in Bahnhofsnähe. Unser KundenCenter befindet sich gegenüber vom Hauptbahnhof in der Herbert-Hinnedahl-Straße 23.  Öffnungszeiten: Mo.-Fr.: 08.00 Uhr - 18:00 Uhr Servicetelefon: 0521-55 7777 50

Name: UHH Umschlags- Und Handelsgesellschaft Haldensleben MbH
Company description: UHH Umschlags- und Handelsgesellschaft Haldensleben MbH is a leading logistics partner located at the Haldensleben port, specializing in comprehensive services for cargo handling, storage, and transportation via water, rail, and road. With over 30 years of experience, the company prides itself on its strong team and trimodal infrastructure, which ensures efficient, flexible, and sustainable logistics solutions for clients across various industries, including agriculture, automotive, and steel. UHH is committed to quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction, boasting a remarkable 98% customer satisfaction rate and handling over 1.8 million tons of cargo annually. The company's mission is to shape the future of port logistics through innovative approaches while fostering a work environment characterized by teamwork, responsibility, and integrity. UHH's strategic location provides direct connections to major seaports and hinterland terminals across Europe, making it an essential hub for national and international logistics.

Name: Bagat Sp. Z O.o.
Company description: We offer comprehensive transport solutions that includes road, rail, sea and air transport. We operate in the international market, providing freight services both from China and from Europe to CIS countries. Our most important value is reliability and dependability, so you can be sure that any cargo will be safely delivered in the shortest possible time. We are a professional company that guarantees high quality service. BAGAT- freight forwarding company you can trust.

Name: E-VAI - FNM Group
Company description: E-VAI si basa su un’idea di mobilità sostenibile: un’auto in car sharing sostituisce mediamente 6 autovetture private. Scegliendo E-VAI, diminuiscono le auto in circolazione e aumentano i parcheggi disponibili e si abbattono sensibilmente le emissioni nocive. Il parco auto di E-VAI, oltre 400 automobili a basso impatto ambientale, è composto in prevalenza da auto elettriche. Garantisce un sistema di mobilità alternativa ecologica, complementare all’utilizzo del treno e conveniente grazie alle tariffe orarie e giornaliere competitive. E-VAI offre agli utenti che arrivano o che vogliono recarsi in stazione o in aeroporto e a quelli che intendono muoversi comodamente nelle città lombarde una soluzione pratica e veloce per raggiungere in modo semplice ed economico la propria destinazione. Chiunque può iscriversi a E-VAI, il servizio si rivolge non solo ai singoli cittadini ma anche alle aziende private e pubbliche come strumento di miglioramento e diminuzione dei costi della mobilità aziendale. VANTAGGI - tariffe orarie di noleggio tra le più vantaggiose del mercato. - si paga solo per l’effettivo utilizzo dell’auto eliminando i costi di acquisto e di servizio dell'auto privata. - procedura di noleggio completamente online, senza il rilascio di alcun badge. - presenza in oltre 110 località della Lombardia con più di 300 postazioni, in corrispondenza di luoghi strategici (aeroporti, stazioni, piazze, ospedali, università). - le auto possono essere prese e rilasciate in una qualsiasi di queste postazioni. - libero accesso alle corsie preferenziali e alle ZTL e parcheggio gratis sulle strisce blu e gialle nei comuni convenzionati. - basso impatto ambientale: il parco auto è composto in prevalenza da auto elettriche.

Name: Elron | Eesti Liinirongid
Company description: Elron (Eesti Liinirongid Ltd) core business is the organization of passenger transportation using new Stadler FLIRT passenger trains in Estonia. The total length of Estonian passenger railways is 792.9 kilometres, out of which 131.6 is electrified. Total of 2.7 million travels were made with passenger trains in Estonia at the first half of 2014.

Name: MVT Michel Verscheure Transport Intermodal
Company description: GREEN LOGISTICS with top class SERVICE @ AFFORDABLE prices Intermodal transport road - rail - road: Belgium <-> Italy. Intermodal transport road - rail - road: Belgium <-> Spain.  ADR, full loads, coils, groupage, rail transport, waste (afval) transport Distribution Belgium: tautliner - crane - kooiaap - meeneemheftruck

Name: Besseling Vervoert
Company description: BESSELING VERVOERT ... goederen en personen, van klein tot groot. Besseling is een familiebedrijf en kenmerkt zich door kwalitatief, veilig, duurzaam, betrouwbaar en betaalbaar vervoer. Vanuit het midden van Nederland kan Besseling geheel Nederland bedienen.

Name: CM Transport Tachov
Company description: Transport company is concentrating in transport swab bodies, Our fleet counting 100 SB road train, more than 400 swab bodies. Other additional international and national transport services consist in the management of our customers with 100 and 120 cbm tilt trucks. CM Transport provides storage in Tachov and Sokolov.

Name: SEEHAFEN KIEL GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: The PORT OF KIEL is one of the most versatile ports in the Baltic region. Its geographic location, permanent depth for seagoing vessels and the direct link to the national rail and road network make the port very attractive for cargo and passenger traffic alike. State-of-the-art terminal facilities and a high service quality enable an individual approach. Furthermore, Kiel profits from its location at the entrance to the world's most frequented artificial waterway, the Kiel Canal.

Name: SFTL / FSTL
HQ Location: Belgium, Brussels Capital, Brussels, 115 De Smet De Naeyerlaan, 1090
Company description: Het Sociaal Fonds Transport en Logistiek (SFTL) is het Fonds voor Bestaanszekerheid voor bedrijven die behoren tot de sector wegvervoer en logistiek voor rekening van derden en tot de RSZ-categorie 083. Het SFTL is enkel bevoegd voor arbeiders en wordt gefinancierd via een werkgeversbijdrage van 8% die geïnd wordt door de Rijksdienst voor Sociale Zekerheid (RSZ).  Het SFTL wordt aangestuurd door de raad van bestuur. Deze is paritair samengesteld en bestaat uit 8 vertegenwoordigers van de representatieve werkgeversorganisaties: FEBETRA, TLV en de UPTR. En ook 8 vertegenwoordigers van de representatieve werknemersorganisaties: ACV-TRANSCOM en de Belgische Transportbond (ABVV-BTB) Het SFTL heeft 3 grote taken:  1. Aanvullende sociale voordelen bieden aan de arbeiders uit de sector van het wegvervoer en de logistiek voor rekening van derden. Deze voordelen werden door de sociale partners via diverse C.A.O.'s toegekend.  2. Stimuleren van de permanente vorming van arbeiders uit de sector. Ook beroepsgerichte opleidingen voor werkzoekenden en leerlingen ondersteunen en stimuleren.  3. De knelpunten in de sector op het vlak van werkgelegenheid en bestaanszekerheid bevorderen voor de arbeiders.

Name: Verkéiersverbond
Company description: Established in 2004 under the supervision of the Ministry for Mobility and Public Works, the Verkéiersverbond aims to assure the highest level of comfort for public transport users and to change the mentality of the general public regarding active and sustainable mobility.
