The company aims to ensure that its services meet the evolving needs of its target market, contributing to the sustainable development of the islands it serves.

Name: PKP CARGO CONNECT Sp. Z O.o.
Company description: PKP CARGO CONNECT is an international logistics operator providing comprehensive services in the field of transport, reloading, loading and customs services. PKP CARGO CONNECT belongs to the PKP CARGO Group - the largest rail freight transport in Poland and the leading one in the European Union. Extensive experience enables the implementation of complex forwarding projects in the country and abroad. The offer of PKP CARGO CONNECT includes not only rail and road forwarding, but also sea transport time and deliveries: ferry transports of wagons and cars between Poland and Scandinavia, transport of oversized and extremely heavy loads, as well as biomass and grain logistics. The company also carries out reloading in sea ports and inland terminals and provides comprehensive customs services. Moreover, PKP Cargo Connect is the operator of regular intermodal connections connecting terminals located in key points of the country with the Seaports and with the dry port of Małaszewicze, which is the first main gate on the New Silk Road.

Name: Flensburger Shipyard
Company description: Shipbuilders of advanced tailor-made vessels. Market leaders of RoRo vessels. RoRo, ConRo, RoPax, Passenger ferries, Advanced offshore vessels, Naval vessels

Name: HSL Helsingin Seudun Liikenne
Company description: HSL Helsingin seudun liikenne vastaa 66 prosentista Suomen joukkoliikennematkoista. HSL:llä on tärkeä rooli pääkaupunkiseudun asukkaiden arjessa: meidän liikenteessämme tehdään yli miljoona matkaa päivittäin bussilla, junalla, metrolla, ratikalla tai lautalla. Liikevaihtomme on noin 600 milj. euroa vuodessa. Meitä joukkoliikenteen ammattilaisia on reilu 400 ja olemme ylpeitä työstämme. Liity joukkoomme kehittämään helppoa, toimivaa ja luotettavaa Helsingin seutua. HSL Helsinki Region Transport is responsible for about 60% of all public transport journeys in Finland. HSL plays a key role in the everyday lives of the metropolitan area residents:  every day, over one million journeys are made on our bus, train, Metro, tram and ferry services. Our annual turnover is about 600 million euros. HSL employs over 400 public transport professionals that are proud of their work. Join us to develop well-functioning Helsinki region with reliable services for easier everyday life.

Name: Fjord Line AS
Company description: Fjord Line AS is a prominent ferry operator in Norway, specializing in providing seamless transportation services across the scenic fjords of the region. The company aims to enhance travel experiences by connecting travelers with breathtaking natural landscapes and cultural heritage sites, such as the Viking village of Njardarheimr and the UNESCO-protected Nærøyfjord. Fjord Line's mission is to promote sustainable tourism while offering comfortable and efficient travel options for both leisure and business clients. The company collaborates with various partners in the tourism sector, including local attractions and accommodations, to create comprehensive travel packages that cater to families, adventure seekers, and history enthusiasts. With a focus on delivering memorable experiences, Fjord Line targets a diverse market of tourists looking to explore Norway's stunning fjords and rich Viking history.

Name: Becker Marine Systems GmbH
Company description: Founded by Willi Becker in 1946, Becker Marine Systems has developed into the market leader for Manoeuvring Systems and Energy-Saving Devices for any type of ship. Alternative Energy solutions such as the LNG Hybrid Barge and Maritime Battery Systems like the COBRA Compact Battery Rack further strengthen the company's leading role in the marine industry. Becker’s products are well-established on the world market and represent the top choice for both super tankers as well as container ships, passenger ferries, large cruise ships and luxury yachts. Becker Marine Systems GmbH Blohmstr. 23, 21079 Hamburg, Germany, Tel.: +49-40-24199-0 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BeckerMarineSystems YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtq7IozuTZes0quozFd2Avg Imprint: https://www.becker-marine-systems.com/footer-bottom/imprint.html

Name: Grupa SKAT
Company description: Grupa SKAT is a leading logistics operator specializing in international road transport, ferry crossings, and TSL (Transport-Shipping-Logistics) services. With over 30 years of experience, the company is committed to providing timely and secure deliveries while optimizing transportation costs for its clients. SKAT's mission is to enhance the efficiency of logistics processes through innovative solutions, such as the Destin8 port communication system, which streamlines customs handling in British ports. The company serves a diverse clientele across Europe, including industries such as automotive, construction, consumer electronics, and FMCG, and collaborates with freight forwarders, port operators, and customs services. SKAT's vision focuses on continuous improvement and investment in modern technologies to meet the evolving demands of the logistics market, ensuring that clients receive the highest level of service and support.

Name: Easytrip Transport Services
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Dordrecht, 122 Jacobus Lipsweg, 3316
Company description: Keeping your fleet moving smoothly, across borders and through every step of the journey - that's our promise. Easytrip Transport Services, a member of 360PAY group, is an expert in delivering mobility services. As a one-stop-shop we facilitate your day-to-day journeys, providing convenience, choice and competitive pricing on a broad range of services:  -	Toll payment: Enhance your travel experience with our flexible Toll solutions designed to optimize your journeys across Europe. Benefit from extensive range of local and interoperable devices covering 29 countries. -	Parking payment:   Pay for secure parking facilities across Europe, ensuring the tranquility of your drivers and the safety of their loads with the convenience of our Toll Boxes.  -	Ferry – Train- Tunnels Bookings: Benefit from exclusive 24/7 online portal to simplify your connections between Road, Train, and Sea transports. Book across 700 lines and all Alpine Tunnels with just few clicks!  -	VAT and Excise refunds: Get your VAT & Excise Duty refunded quickly and easily! Let Easytrip team of more than 50 Experts handle the VAT paperwork for you in over 30 countries and Excise refund in 7 countries.  -	Telematics: Maximize your profitability with our Telematics solutions tailored to your fleet management needs. -	Posted Drivers support: Get your certificate for all your cabotage and cross-trade journeys in Europe and be compliant with the European Mobility Package. -	Fuel Cards: Fuel up at more than 29.000 gas stations in 36 European countries. With a wealth of over 35 years of broad knowledge and presence in the International Transports sector, we help you manage your operations with ease from mobility to financial services. With 17 local teams through Europe, serving over 16 000 customers, we have a dynamic and multilingual team constantly striving to provide you with the best service. Our aim is to exclusively treat each client to always deliver the right tailored solutions.

Name: FRS Ferry
Company description: FRS Iberia Maroc is a shipping line that navigates the routes Algeciras - Ceuta and Algeciras - Tanger Med. With its modern fleet of fast ferries and RoPax ferries, equipped with catering services, duty free and premium class, FRS is one of the largest shipping lines carrying passengers, vehicles and cargo in the Strait of Gibraltar. FRS Iberia Maroc operates the following lines: Algeciras – Tanger-MED Algeciras – Ceuta

Name: Bornholmstrafikken A/S
Company description: Danish domestic ferry operator: Ferry services to and from the island Bornholm. Managing ferry services in other parts of Denmark as well (e.g. to and from the island Samsø, Langeland, Fanø and Als)

Name: Polferries
Company description: We are Polish ferry operator. We connect Scandinavia with Poland, travel with adventure and comfort with safety. We are on the Baltic Sea since 1976 under the #Polferries brand. Our ferries connecting Poland with Scandinavia on two routes. Book ticket and check attractions on our board. We organize corporate events and business meetings at sea. Their program is fully tailored to the needs of customers. On board ferries we provide, i.a. conference room, restaurants, bars, cafes, disco. Our crew consists of nearly 1,000 employees who care about the highest standards of safety and comfort of your journey. Welcome aboard!

Name: EIS MARITIMO SA
Company description: EIS MARITIMO SA is a ship supplier committed to service excellence. As a premier firm specializing in delivering comprehensive solutions to large cruise companies, ferries, regular lines, merchant ships, navy vessels, and military operations zones, we pride ourselves on our dedication to quality. Headquartered in Madrid, with strategically located branches in Bilbao, Barcelona, Valencia, Almería, Algeciras, and Tanger, our extensive network enables us to reach any destination across all continents. This geographical reach not only facilitates efficient and timely services but also establishes us as a reliable partner in the maritime industry. We remain steadfast in our commitment to providing seamless supply chain solutions for our esteemed clients

Name: Adria Ferries S.p.A.
Company description: Adria Ferries S.p.A. is a prominent maritime transport company specializing in ferry services between Italy and Albania, with routes connecting Ancona and Bari to Durazzo. The company is committed to enhancing travel experiences by providing modern and efficient vessels, such as the newly launched AF Mia, which caters to both passenger and cargo needs while prioritizing environmental sustainability. Adria Ferries aims to strengthen cultural and economic ties between Italy and Albania, serving a diverse clientele that includes tourists, business travelers, and local communities. In addition to its core ferry services, the company actively participates in health initiatives, exemplified by the "Nave della Salute" project, which offers free medical consultations on board, promoting public health awareness. Through strategic partnerships and a focus on customer satisfaction, Adria Ferries continues to expand its offerings and improve connectivity in the Adriatic region.

Name: Copenhagen Malmö Port
Company description: Copenhagen Malmö Port, CMP, is one of the largest port and terminal operators in the Nordic region and one of the largest cruise destinations in northern Europe. CMP is one of 83 European core ports, which are considered by the EU to be particularly significant for the development of new transport corridors in Europe.  Each year the company offers efficient transport and logistics services to nearly 8,000 ships. Thanks to our strategic location in the Öresund region, CMP's facilities also serve as a hub for the entier Baltic Sea region and its roughly 100 million consumers and hundreds of thousands of businesses. CMP is a full service port, and offers transport and logistics services in cruise and ferries, RoRo, container traffic, new cars, rail cargo, logistics, liquid bulk, and dry bulk. We are operating in Copenhagen, Malmö and Visby (cruise only). We provide professional services, combining the right technology, infrastructure and professional expertise to meet the customers requirements.  Port development is vital for CMP. A new container terminal as well as a new cruise terminal will be established in Ydre Nordhavn in Copenhagen within the next few years. In Malmö, the new industrial park has been established and in april 2018 our new cruise terminal in Visby was opened.

Name: Torghatten Nord AS
Company description: Torghatten Nord AS is a prominent transportation company in Norway, specializing in ferry services that connect various islands and coastal communities. With a mission to provide reliable and efficient transport solutions, the company aims to enhance accessibility and mobility for its clients, which include both local residents and tourists. Torghatten Nord operates several key routes, such as Bodø to Værøy and Røst, as well as Moss to Horten, ensuring seamless travel across the region. The company is committed to sustainability and continuously seeks to improve its services while minimizing environmental impact. Through partnerships with local authorities and transport organizations, Torghatten Nord plays a vital role in supporting the economic and social development of the areas it serves.

Name: Kolumbus AS
Company description: Kolumbus AS is a transportation company based in Rogaland, Norway, specializing in the management and operation of public transport services, including buses and ferries. With a dedicated team of around 70 employees, the company focuses on providing efficient and accessible travel options for its clients, which include local residents and commuters in the region. Kolumbus aims to enhance mobility and sustainability in public transport, aligning with its mission to improve the quality of life for the communities it serves. The company collaborates with various partners to develop innovative solutions in transportation, including digital product development and mobility planning. Through its commitment to customer service and operational excellence, Kolumbus strives to meet the evolving needs of its target market while promoting environmentally friendly travel options.

Name: Hamburger Verkehrsverbund
Company description: Für drei Bundesländer, acht Kreise, 30 Verkehrsunternehmen und rund 3,67 Mio. Einwohner übernimmt der hvv das Management des öffentlichen Personennahverkehrs (ÖPNV) und gesamten Verkehrsangebots in der Metropolregion Hamburg, das heißt, für alle Bus-, Fähr-, U-, S-, A- und Regionalbahnleistungen im hvv.  Mit rund 90 Mitarbeitenden ist die hvv GmbH die Regieorganisation und sorgt für einen leistungsfähigen sowie benutzerfreundlichen ÖPNV und ein abgestimmtes Verkehrsangebot. Die Bundesländer und (Land-)Kreise, die als Aufgabenträger zur Organisation und Finanzierung des öffentlichen Personennahverkehrs verpflichtet sind, haben zur Umsetzung dieser Aufgabe die Hamburger Verkehrsverbund GmbH (hvv GmbH) gegründet. Impressum Hamburger Verkehrsverbund GmbH Brooktorkai 18 20457 Hamburg Telefon: 040/19 449 E-Mail: socialmedia@hvv.de Vertreten durch die Geschäftsführung Anna-Theresa Korbutt, Raimund Brodehl Aufsichtsratsvorsitzender Staatsrat Martin Bill Amtsgericht Hamburg, HRB 10497 Umsatzsteueridentifikationsnummer: DE 17 973 25 01 https://www.hvv.de/datenschutz Netiquette: https://www.hvv.de/de/netiquette

Name: Norway Yacht Charter
Company description: Norway Yacht Charter specializes in providing unique sightseeing experiences through guided mini cruises in the picturesque Oslofjord. With a mission to preserve and share Norwegian maritime history and traditions, the company operates traditional sailing vessels that date back to the early to mid-20th century. Their innovative app, available in 13 languages, enhances the guest experience by offering information about the sights and historical context during the cruise. Targeting both local and international tourists, Norway Yacht Charter aims to create memorable experiences that combine education and leisure, allowing guests to explore iconic landmarks such as the Akershus Fortress and the Oslo Opera House. The company also collaborates with local attractions, encouraging visitors to extend their journey with ferry rides to Bygdøy, where they can discover museums and enjoy scenic beaches.

Name: Aarhus Havn - Port Of Aarhus
Company description: The port of Aarhus is an active trade area with approx. 150 companies, creating the basis for about 10,000 jobs. The port of Aarhus is Denmark’s largest container port, with a market share of about 60 per cent, and also Denmark’s largest public bulk port. This implies that a very large part of the consumer goods are imported to Denmark via the port of Aarhus. Also, a significant part of the Danish export is shipped via the fine-meshed network of shipping routes to all parts of the world. In addition, the port of Aarhus is an important ferry port, serving around 1,3 million cars and around 2,9 million passengers on an annual basis - plus an increasing number of cruise passengers.  You´ll find Port of Aarhus office at Vandvejen 7, 8000 Aarhus C.

Name: Wagenborg Passagiersdiensten
Company description: Wagenborg is een onderdeel van het familiebedrijf Royal Wagenborg, waarvan het hoofdkantoor in Delfzijl is gevestigd. Jaarlijks vervoeren wij met onze veerboten, watertaxi's en sneldienst ruim 1,5 miljoen passagiers en zo’n 200.000 auto's en vrachtauto’s. Een ambitieuze veerdienst die al meer dan een eeuw ieder seizoen passagiers van en naar de Waddeneilanden Ameland en Schiermonnikoog vervoert. En dat in een ongeëvenaard dynamisch natuurgebied. Veilig en verantwoord varen op Werelderfgoed de Waddenzee met respect voor de natuur. Dat zien we terug in alles: in ons beleid, in onze werkwijze en in onze medewerkers die graag de handen uit de mouwen steken. In april 2014 heeft de Minister van Infrastructuur en Milieu aan Wagenborg Passagiersdiensten voor de looptijd van 15 jaar de Concessie Waddenveren Oost verleend. Al met al zijn wij al ruim een eeuw een betrouwbare partner van de overheid. Ook na 2029 willen wij de concessie graag behouden. Daarom leggen wij de lat steeds een beetje hoger als het gaat om het niveau van service, kwaliteit, veiligheid en klantentevredenheid. Wij willen dat onze passagiers zich prettig voelen aan boord en varen met eersteklas materiaal. Veiligheid, kwaliteit en continuïteit staan voorop. Daar kunnen onze reizigers en medewerkers op rekenen.

Name: Unity Line
HQ Location: Cyprus, Limassol, Limassol, Gr. Xenopoulou Street 17, 3106
Company description: Spółka Unity Line, założona w maju 1994 roku jest jedną z największych firm armatorskich działających na rynku bałtyckich przewozów promowych, wchodzi w skład grupy kapitałowej Polskiej Żeglugi Morskiej (PŻM). W ramach prowadzonej działalności firma zajmuje się profesjonalnym zarządzaniem promami morskimi oraz działalnością turystyczną i transportową. Struktura floty Unity Line umożliwia obsługę wszystkich grup odbiorców: pasażerów, spedytorów oraz przewoźników drogowych i kolejowych. Promy w zarządzie Spółki eksploatowane są na liniach: Świnoujście – Ystad oraz Świnoujście – Trelleborg. Za wizytówkę Unity Line uważany jest prom Polonia. Jednostka oddana do eksploatacji w 1995 roku, nadal uchodzi za jeden z nowocześniejszych i najbezpieczniejszych promów pływających po wodach Bałtyku. Rosnące zainteresowanie usługami Unity Line oraz stały rozwój oferty w bezpośredni sposób przekładają się na kolejne inwestycje podejmowane przez Spółkę. We wrześniu 2008 roku, do ruchu wprowadzona została kolejna jednostka pasażerska – m/f Skania. Dzięki temu promy pasażerskie Unity Line pokonują trasę Świnoujście – Ystad w ruchu wahadłowym. Oznacza to, że pasażerowie w jeszcze bardziej elastyczny i komfortowy sposób mogą planować swoją podróż. Obok jednostek pasażerskich – promów Polonia i Skania – w zarządzie Unity Line znajduje się pięć jednostek zorientowanych na obsługę rynku cargo – prom ładunkowy: Copernicus; promy ładunkowo-pasażerskie: Gryf, Galileusz, Wolin i Epsilon.

Name: Alilauro Volaviamare SpA
Company description: Alilauro Volaviamare SpA is a prominent maritime transport company based in Italy, specializing in ferry services that connect the islands of the Gulf of Naples, including Ischia and Procida, with the mainland. With over 80 years of experience, the company is committed to providing safe, efficient, and sustainable travel options for both tourists and locals. Alilauro's mission is to enhance the travel experience by promoting cultural and natural heritage through innovative services and partnerships, such as its collaboration with the Viola app to improve personal safety for passengers. The company actively participates in regional tourism initiatives, including the International Philosophy Festival in Ischia, reflecting its dedication to community engagement and cultural development. Alilauro's target market includes tourists seeking unique experiences along the stunning Amalfi Coast and local residents relying on reliable transportation services.

Name: Fast Ferries
Company description: Fast Ferries provides high quality ferry services, in accordance with the company's culture which means safe, fast, comfortable and reliable trips to the Greek Islands. We are operating three modern vessels, F/B Theologos P. F/B Ekaterini P. and F/B Fast Ferries Andros connecting Rafina (Attica) to Andros, Tinos, Mykonos and Naxos providing two or three daily departures from Rafina to Islands and v.v. and high quality transportation services for passengers, trucks and vehicles.  Fast Ferries implements well targeted marketing strategies and takes advantage of IT technology in order to provide a large sales network through World Wide Web as well as through the large sales network and agencies, in Greece and Europe. Fast Ferries is one of the most well known and reliable ferry operators in Greece. Fast Ferries invests not only in the unmatched  quality of ships, but also in the field of security by meeting the latest and strongest specifications. In addition, invests in high level executives and arrange to meet the requirements of passengers and public transport, in order to constantly improve at all fields. Our main goal is to offer high quality travel and  services, consistency, reliability, safety at all times.

Name: Stena Rederi A/S Denmark
Company description: Stena Rederi A/S is a consolidation of Stena AB’s Danish ferry and shipping activities in Hellerup. Within Stena Rederi there are 3 different business areas Stena Line, Stena RoRo and Stena Bulk.

Name: Port Of Oslo
Company description: Port of Oslo is a leading maritime hub focused on facilitating sustainable shipping and transportation solutions. With a mission to achieve ambitious climate goals, the port is actively engaged in the green transition, particularly through initiatives like shore power for various vessels and the development of hydrogen as a clean fuel source. The port collaborates closely with major European ports, such as Rotterdam, to establish a green transport corridor aimed at reducing emissions in the Oslo Fjord and beyond. Key partners include shipping companies like Samskip, which is pioneering hydrogen-powered container ships for this corridor. Port of Oslo's target market includes international ferries, cruise ships, and local transport services, all while fostering innovation and regulatory support to enhance green transport solutions.

Name: Finferries - Suomen Lauttaliikenne
Company description: Finferries - Suomen Lauttaliikenne is a prominent ferry service provider in Finland, specializing in the transportation of passengers and vehicles across the country's extensive archipelago and coastal regions. The company is dedicated to ensuring safe, reliable, and efficient ferry services, contributing to the connectivity of various islands and mainland areas. With a focus on sustainability and customer satisfaction, Finferries aims to enhance the travel experience for its users while minimizing environmental impact. Its clientele includes local residents, tourists, and businesses that rely on ferry transport for commuting and logistics. Through strategic partnerships and a commitment to innovation, Finferries continues to play a vital role in Finland's transportation infrastructure.

Name: SEASTEMA
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Genoa, 92r Viale Brigate Partigiane, 16129
Company description: Seastema, a global supplier of integrated marine automation & navigation technologies and provider of cutting edge integrated solutions for Naval Vessels, Cruise & Ferries and Yachts, is now fully integrated into Fincantieri NexTech to pursue the development of the next generation of Maritime & Defence Automation Technologies.  From the initial concept design through to system implementation and after-sales support, Fincantieri NexTech follows customers through the whole vessel life cycle.

Name: Crewplanet
Company description: Crewplanet is an innovative manning agency that utilizes and implements modern IT solutions to deliver high efficiency and quality to both seafarers and clients. Our aim is to provide our clients with an ongoing consultancy on the market and offer most efficient course of action. After years on the market we became trusted and regional exclusive agent for several industry known companies representing: offshore, lpg, floating hotel, cruise, ferry, container, bulker, feeder, heavy lift, chemical and oil tonnage since 2003. Give us a call +31 103-007-119 or eMail at request@crewplanet.eu to save costs and get modern solutions for your HR challanges. Our strongest points: Own crewing software and strong IT competence 100 000 CVs & 16 000 daily visitors, the biggest maritime resource Owners of the largest Russian-speaking maritime forum Morehod.ru (1 000 000 annual users)  Real-time KPI trackers on majority of processes Providing candidates almost instantly Excellent track records: 1300+ TOP4 officers deployed during the last 5 years 92% tracked retention rate of the seafarers 70% of vacancies covered on the same day, 90% within 3 days Zero certificate mistakes due to automated control system Scope of services: Full or partial crew management Market and competitor analysis  Lump sum or cost plus fee Crew at request and 24/7 support line Payroll services for EU and non EU Also covering any other customer requirements

Name: DFDS Rail GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Troisdorf, 6 Sieglarer Straße, 53840
Company description: The DFDS Rail GmbH, based in Troisdorf, is a 100% subsidiary of DFDS A/S Denmark. We strive to be the preferred provider of intermodal solutions in Europe. To this end we offer our customers a reliable and first-class transport network, which makes it an effective transport method by linking it to trucks and ferries. With our superior service and comprehensive know-how, you get the best out of a Europe-wide rail network together with the advantage of a reliable, cost-effective and CO2-efficient transport. Our contribution to decarbonized supply chains - for more "susTRAINability" Moving Together Towards 2030!

Name: Västtrafik
Company description: Västtrafik is a public transportation company that operates various transit services in the Västra Götaland region of Sweden, primarily focusing on ferry services across the Göta Älv river. The company aims to provide efficient and accessible transportation options for both residents and visitors, enhancing mobility within the region. Västtrafik operates several boat lines, including Älvsnabben and Älvsnabbare, which offer free travel options and accommodate bicycles, promoting sustainable transport solutions. Its target market includes private customers, business clients, and tourists, while collaborating with local municipalities and transport authorities to ensure seamless connectivity. Through its services, Västtrafik is committed to improving the overall travel experience and supporting the region's environmental goals.

Name: Compagnia Delle Isole spa
Company description: collegamenti marittimi veloci e con traghetti per le isole Orari sul sito e carta dei servizi e regolamenti esposti alle biglietterie ed a bordo. Sul sito puoi stampare il regolamento e acquistare i biglietti on line.

Name: ShibataFenderTeam
Company description: ShibataFenderTeam is a leading global manufacturer specializing in advanced fender systems designed to protect vessels and port infrastructure during berthing operations. With over 60 years of experience, the company is dedicated to delivering high-quality, safety-critical solutions that enhance operational efficiency and minimize liability risks for its clients. ShibataFenderTeam's mission is to support the maritime industry in its energy transition and sustainability efforts by providing innovative and environmentally responsible fender solutions that align with the latest PIANC guidelines. The company operates its own manufacturing facility in Germany, where skilled craftsmen utilize advanced techniques, such as heat lamination, to produce durable and reliable fender products. The company serves a diverse clientele, including major ports like Shannon Foynes in Ireland and the Port of Oakland in the USA, as well as offshore wind terminals in Poland, ferry operators, cruise lines, and oil and gas terminals. By partnering with engineers and port authorities, ShibataFenderTeam aims to deliver tailored solutions that enhance operational safety and efficiency while fostering a sustainable future for the maritime sector. Their holistic approach to fender design ensures that all elements of a fender system work together effectively, prioritizing safety and environmental responsibility. Through engineering excellence and value engineering, ShibataFenderTeam is committed to setting new standards in fender design and performance, making it a trusted partner in the global maritime industry.

Name: Fearnleys
HQ Location: Norway, Oslo, Oslo, 9 Grev Wedels Plass, 0107
Company description: Fearnleys A/S is a prominent shipbroking company that specializes in facilitating the sale, purchase, construction, and chartering of various types of vessels, including ocean-going ships, ferries, and rigs. The company operates as an intermediary, connecting principals such as ship owners, buyers, and charterers, while providing expert negotiation and advisory services throughout the process. Fearnleys is committed to delivering high-quality broking services with professionalism and diligence, ensuring that all transactions are conducted in accordance with industry standards and regulations. The company serves a diverse clientele, including shipping companies, maritime organizations, and other stakeholders in the maritime industry, and collaborates with various partners to enhance its service offerings. With a focus on integrity and client satisfaction, Fearnleys aims to be a trusted partner in the maritime sector, helping clients navigate the complexities of ship transactions and operations.

Name: DFDS Køletransport A/S
Company description: DFDS Køletransport A/S is a leading ferry operator specializing in cross-channel transport between the UK and northern France, particularly through its Newhaven to Dieppe route. The company aims to provide seamless and comfortable travel experiences for families, couples, and friends, with multiple daily sailings that take just four hours. DFDS Køletransport A/S is committed to enhancing customer satisfaction by offering excellent onboard facilities, including restaurants, shops, and play areas, ensuring that the journey is as enjoyable as the destination. Its target market includes leisure travelers looking to explore France's rich cultural heritage and culinary delights, as well as those seeking convenient transport options for their vehicles. The company prides itself on its strong partnerships and dedication to service excellence, which have contributed to its recognition as a leading ferry operator in Europe.

Name: Tallink Silja Line Sverige
Company description: Tallink Silja Line Sverige is a leading passenger shipping company operating in the Baltic Sea region, specializing in high-quality minicruises and transportation services between Estonia, Finland, Sweden, Latvia, Lithuania, and Germany. As a subsidiary of AS Tallink Grupp, the company is dedicated to enhancing regional connectivity and promoting tourism through its extensive ferry and cruise operations. With a mission to bring people closer together, Tallink Silja Line emphasizes sustainability and exceptional service, ensuring that every journey is not just about reaching a destination but creating lasting memories for its passengers. The company operates a modern fleet of 14 vessels, providing a range of services that include overnight cruises, passenger transport, and ro-ro cargo services. Tallink Silja Line caters to a diverse clientele, including leisure travelers, business professionals, and families, offering a variety of onboard experiences such as dining, shopping, and entertainment. The company also manages several hotels and restaurants, further enhancing the travel experience for its customers. Tallink Silja Line Sverige is committed to sustainability and aims to minimize its environmental impact through innovative practices and compliance with international regulations. The company actively engages in environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives, reflecting its dedication to corporate social responsibility. It collaborates with various partners, including travel agencies, local businesses, and tourism boards, to create a comprehensive travel ecosystem that benefits both customers and the broader community. With a successful loyalty program, Club One, boasting over 3.4 million members, Tallink Silja Line reinforces its commitment to customer satisfaction. The company targets environmentally conscious consumers and aims to integrate innovative technologies and sustainable practices into its operations. By prioritizing safety, efficiency, and enjoyable travel options, Tallink Silja Line Sverige strives to be synonymous with quality, reliability, and innovation in the maritime industry, making it the preferred choice for ferry and cruise services in the Baltic Sea region.

Name: Korkyra Shipping Ltd.
HQ Location: Croatia, Dubrovačko-neretvanska, Korčula, 2 Trg Kralja Tomislava, 20260
Company description: KORKYRA SHIPPING LTD was established in its present capacity in Spring 2003 to fill the need for reliable and efficient third party ship management. However the principals and employees have for decades been engaged in traditional shipowning and other shipping related matters, and as such have earned a reputation of professionalism, competence and excellence of service. Special experience has been achieved by working on many reefer and dry-cargo ship projects, passenger and ferry services with a special emphasis on high standards and cost efficient ship management services. The Company and its ships are fully ISM and ISPS certified, satisfying all requirements for securing highest standards of ship performance. Contact us: info@korship.com

Name: Wasaline
Company description: Wasaline transports passengers and cargo on the ferry route between Vaasa, Finland and Umeå, Sweden. Our ambition is to be the world´s most warmhearted shipping company and a great example of northern maritime know-how. We make life a dash better.

Name: Levante Ferries
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Athens, 280 Thiseos Ave. Kallithea, 17675
Company description: Levante Ferries Group, combining the noble aspects of Hellenic Naval Tradition with the modern spirit of new technologies and concepts, quickly established itself in the service of the Patras - Kyllini - Zakynthos - Kefalonia - Ithaca sea area, offering to the Passenger modern ships, as well as advanced land services. "Key" factor in the rapid development of Levante Ferries and its consolidation in passenger consciousness was the significant experience of its executives in serving citizens-passengers, as well as its pioneering approach to the evolution of the Ferry - Shipping market and the needs of the travelers in the Ionian Sea. The Levante Ferries fleet consists of four ships built to the highest standards: the brand new «Fior di Levante», the beautiful «Mare di Levante», the modernized «Andreas Kalvos» and the well-known «Kefalonia». Our ships, staffed with experienced and fully trained crews, offer passengers a completely safe, comfortable and pleasant trip, even in the toughest weather conditions. Levante Ferries has also made possible for passengers to issue an e-ticket, supported by a smartphone app, thus making queues a thing of the past. Levante Ferries, despite the warm welcome of travelers, does not rest, but closely monitors every modern technology and up-to-date specification, aiming to be present in the "next day" developments of the Ferry - Shipping market with a structured strategy and an organized plan, that lead to a stronger fleet, even more routes and new destinations. Levante Ferries' central vision is to bring “the Ionian Sea Forward” and its ferry -shipping services to become a model in the Greek and international markets. Our Company recognizes its responsibility as a universal service provider and pledges not to rest until its will for "not even one blocked islander in the Ionian Sea" becomes reality.

Name: GVB
Company description: GVB is the leading provider of public transportation in and around Amsterdam, responsible for the daily transport of approximately 800,000 passengers via its extensive network of metros, trams, buses, and ferries. The company is dedicated to creating a sustainable and accessible city through innovative technology and infrastructure projects, such as the Oranje Loper, which enhances connectivity within the urban environment. GVB's mission is to facilitate easy and accessible public transport for all, exemplified by initiatives like GVB Max, which offers unlimited travel for a fixed daily rate.  The company prioritizes a seamless travel experience for its passengers while ensuring compliance with GDPR regulations for the careful handling of personal data. GVB serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and media professionals who seek to capture the vibrancy of Amsterdam through its transport locations. To achieve its goals, GVB collaborates with various partners, including the Gemeente Amsterdam and Translink Systems B.V., to enhance mobility and improve the quality of life in the city. GVB is also committed to fostering an inclusive work culture that emphasizes diversity and equality, actively seeking driven technical professionals who wish to contribute to the future of public transport. The company values personal development and work-life balance, offering attractive employment benefits such as a 13th month salary and free public transport for employees. Through its dedication to innovation and community collaboration, GVB aims to maintain high standards of customer satisfaction while shaping the future of urban mobility in Amsterdam.

Name: Trasmapi
Company description: Trasmapi is a leading maritime transport company specializing in ferry services between Ibiza and Formentera, with over 50 years of experience in connecting the Pitiusas islands. The company is dedicated to providing a seamless travel experience, offering personalized airport transfer services to the port of Ibiza, ensuring immediate and exclusive transportation without waiting times. Trasmapi's mission is to enhance the travel experience for its clients by offering a range of services, including vehicle rentals and eco-friendly transportation options, while maintaining a strong commitment to environmental sustainability. The company caters to a diverse clientele, including tourists, families, and local residents, and collaborates with various partners to promote responsible tourism and preserve the natural beauty of the islands. With a focus on customer satisfaction and convenience, Trasmapi aims to be the preferred choice for travelers seeking reliable and efficient ferry services in the Balearic Islands.

Name: Danske Færger A/S
Company description: Danske Færger A/S ("Færgen") operates 7 ferry routes transporting over 4 million passengers a year with 13 ferries. Please follow the official company page: https://dk.linkedin.com/company/f-rgen

Name: Omega Transport
Company description: The Omega transport company has been on the market since 1993. We have experience in the TSL industry. Professional staff of over 200 employees takes care of the safety of the transported cargo and timely deliveries. We are able to handle many types of transport, and we approach each client individually. We have the appropriate licenses for domestic and international forwarding, and our drivers have all the qualifications, also for the transport of hazardous materials (ADR). We travel to countries in southern and western Europe and to Scandinavia. In our offer, in addition to road transport, you can also use air transport, ferry crossings, sea transport, and rail transport. Driving our vehicles every day will allow us to travel around the globe almost twice!

Name: Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A.
Company description: Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A. was founded in 1997 by the Venice Port Authority in order to manage and improve cruise traffic in the Port of Venice. The Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A.  operates in the Marittima and S. Basilio areas which stretch over a surface altogether of more than 244.000 sq. m. of which the Terminals occupy  53.000 sq. m. The maritime basin in the Marittima area measures circa 123.700 sq.m.   The shareholders of Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A. are the following: APV Investimenti S.p.A., Finpax S.r.l., SAVE S.p.A. (Venice Marco Polo Airport), Veneto Sviluppo S.p.A., the Venice Chamber of Commerce  and the Venice Municipality. In addition Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A. is the majority shareholder of two specialized companies: Venice Yacht Pier S.r.l. (V.Y.P.) founded to increase yachting in Venice and Venice Yachts and Ship Assistance (V.Y.S.A.) dedicated to the promotion of services for the maxi-yachts market. The growing needs of cruise traffic and Venice's appeal as a cultural and tourist attraction have given rise to the radical transformation of the Port area starting from 1997 as a result of the joint effort of Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A. and the Venice Port Authority. Such transformation is exemplified by the renovation of ancient port buildings once dedicated to the commercial traffic, which have now become modern and multi-purpose facilities. Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A.'s port facilities cater the needs of any ship berthing in Venice.  ·          The Ferry Terminal 123 assists ferries for the Eastern Mediterranean area  ·          The S. Basilio Terminal accommodates medium-size cruise ships, mega-yachts and high speed hydrofoils  ·          Cruise Terminals 103, 107/108, 117 and Terminal Isonzo in the Marittima area are multi-purpose facilities which, additionally to their original purpose, are utilised for hosting meetings, conventions and fairs.

Name: Servogear AS
Company description: Servogear AS is a leading manufacturer of Controllable Pitch Propeller Systems for high-speed workboats, fast ferries, offshore vessels and yachts. Our all-inclusive approach makes Servogear Ecoflow Propulsor™ more efficient than any other known propulsion-concepts on the market. Servogear's green technology is environmentally friendly with low NOx and CO2 emissions. Visit us at www.servogear.no

Name: SUPER CARGO SHIPPING & FORWARDING LTD
Company description: 1996 was the starting point for Super Cargo. The company was quickly established in Ferry booking and Forwarding by promoting its dynamic profile and offering its customers effective services. The flexibility and the appropriate use of an entire system of co-operators, technological and organizational infrastructure and the special interest for each case as well, consist to the comparative advantages of Supercargo. The company specializes in forwarding and shipping vehicles carrying a difficult cargo - living animals, special transports, dangerous goods - and it has taken responsibility for the majority of these transports in Greece. According to the economic indicators, Super Cargo is being steadily developed and expanded year by year. Today its field of action covers the ferry booking of all kinds of transport between Greece -italy -albania-croatia-england -scandianvia FERRY BOOKING AGENT-SPECIAL AND HEAVY TRANSPORTS SERVICES

Name: FRS Shipmanagement
HQ Location: Cyprus, Limassol, Limassol, 256 Makarios Avenue C4, 3105
Company description: FRS Shipmanagement belongs to FRS group, a passenger ferry operator with over 150 years of experience, that owns 65 vessels and transports 8M people annually.  Drawing on FRS group experience and vast maritime knowledge, not only crewing, we also provide high-standard maritime services, from technical management, procurement and admin services to highly specialized consulting, offering our broad know-how in the ferry industry. As crew managers, we have an extensive pool of candidates from EU and other regions with vast experience in the ferry field. We provide crew today to well-know ferry operators worldwide and to FRS fleet. We services ranging from recruitment to payroll. The one stop HR solution. As shipowners, we deeply understand our clients needs. If you are looking for a career opportunity check our website (Careers). If you want to be part of our pool and hear about opportunities, press the Register bottom. If you are looking for crew, get in touch!  info@frs-shipmanagement.eu

Name: BDZ Cargo EOOD
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Bg, 3 Ivan Vazov Street Sofia
Company description: BDZ Cargo is the main railway freight operator in Bulgaria providing domestic and international carriage of goods by rail. Experienced team of experts, flexible customer-oriented marketing strategy, large wagonn and traction fleet, and IT developments help the company to reinforce its position as the most capable railway freight operator in the country.  Well-developed network of customers and partners in Europe and Asia supports the presence of the company in the international market.  And last, but not least, BDZ Cargo is the only railway operator of the Ferry Boat Complex Varna – the only place in the Black Sea region with possibilities for changing freight wagon bogies from European to Russian gauge and v.v. BDZ Cargo offers the whole range of transport & logistic services: •	Transport of goods in block-trains •	Combined, inter- and multimodal transports •	Transport on specially agreed transport schemes •	Transport of heavy-load, out-of-gauge and special consignments •	Transport of goods from/to the Black Sea ports Varna and Burgas, also in large-capacity containers, processed in the terminals of these ports •	Transport of goods from/to the Danube ports Ruse, Lom, Svishtov,  Vidin •	Transport via the railway ferry lines connecting port Varna, port Caucasus (Russia), port Ilichevsk (Ukraine), ports Poti/ Batumi (Georgia), continuing the transport by rail from/to the countries of CIS, Central and Middle Asia Accompanying service: •	Customs clearance, financial guarantees, security and insurance for goods •	Routing •	Warehousing •	Tracking and tracing of wagons and trains •	Container terminals and logistic services •	Other shipping services

Name: Westerschelde Ferry B.V.
Company description: De Westerschelde Ferry verzorgt de veerdienst tussen Vlissingen en Breskens. Met twee schepen, de Prins Willem-Alexander en de Prinses Máxima, zorgen we iedere dag voor een comfortabele en betrouwbare overtocht. Tickets zijn ook online te koop.

Name: Port Of Hirtshals - Hirtshals Havn
Company description: The Port of Hirtshals is an multimodal logistics centre situated in the heart of Scandinavia. The Danish port is the northernmost port on the European Westcoast, and many Norwegians refer to it as ‘the southernmost port in Norway’.  The Port of Hirtshals’ geographical position is a competitive strength. With the port’s location, directly to the North Sea, and only a short distance to one of the world’s busiest sea lanes, the possibilities of developing transport solutions are numerous.  The Port of Hirtshals has more than 60 ferries and ro/ro calls per week, and the port has services to five destinations in Norway, and services to the Faroe Island, Iceland, Russia, and Scotland: •	Bergen, Norway  •	Stavanger, Norway  •	Kristiansand, Norway  •	Langesund, Norway  •	Larvik, Norway  •	Torshavn, Faroe Islands  •	Seydisfjordur, Iceland  •	Reykjavik (Thorlakshöfn), Iceland •	Scrabster, Scotland The Port of Hirtshals is directly connected to the European motorway network. Motorway E39/E45 takes its starting point at the Port of Hirtshals, and continues to the German border and from there to the rest of Europe.  In 2015, a new combi terminal for rail traffic was established next to the port. Scheduled rail traffic has not yet been established, but more leading European rail operators are planning to start-up of traffic between Hirtshals and logistics centres in Europe.  In 2019, more than 150,000 trucks and trailers passed through the Port of Hirtshals, and approximately 20 % of these were craneable. The number of units and the increasing cargo traffic at the Port of Hirtshals underlines the potential for rail traffic between Hirtshals and Europe.  To obtain the benefits of combined transport in the transport sector, cooperation from all parties is essential.

Name: Laziomar S.p.A.
Company description: Laziomar S.p.A., Compagnia DI Navigazione Marittima, gestisce il servizio pubblico di cabotaggio marittimo di collegamento con le isole dell' Arcipelago Pontino, Ponza e Ventotene, assicurando tutto l'anno collegamenti con i porti di Formia, Terracina e, nel periodo estivo (da Giugno a Settembre), di Anzio. Laziomar dispone di una flotta composta da traghetti ed unità veloci: Quattro navi traghetto serventi le linee: FORMIA - PONZA;   FORMIA - VENTOTENE;  TERRACINA - PONZA;  TERRACINA - VENTOTENE Tre unità veloci serventi le linee: ANZIO - PONZA;  FORMIA - PONZA; FORMIA - VENTOTENE. Email: info@laziomar.it Tel.: 0771 700 604

Name: DFDS Polska
Company description: DFDS Polska is a leading logistics and transportation company that specializes in ferry services and integrated supply chain solutions throughout Europe. The company is dedicated to providing efficient and reliable transport services, with a mission to connect businesses and communities while ensuring customer satisfaction through innovative logistics operations. DFDS Polska serves a diverse clientele, including manufacturers, retailers, and businesses in the automotive sector, all of which require dependable shipping and freight services.  The company collaborates with various stakeholders in the logistics and transportation sectors, focusing on delivering tailored solutions that cater to the unique needs of its customers. DFDS Polska's vision emphasizes sustainability and innovation, as it strives to enhance the efficiency of supply chains while minimizing environmental impact. This commitment to sustainability is reflected in its operational practices and service offerings, which aim to meet the evolving demands of the market. With an extensive network and a dedicated team, DFDS Polska plays a vital role in facilitating trade and transportation across the region. The company is committed to operational excellence, continuously seeking ways to improve its services and adapt to the competitive landscape. Through its focus on quality service and customer satisfaction, DFDS Polska continues to strengthen its position as a key player in the logistics market, ensuring that it meets the needs of its clients effectively and efficiently.

Name: TS Laevad
Company description: Offering the best travel experience in Estonia and being a long-term sound partner both to our customers and the state by providing an effective and high-quality ferry service.

Name: HOGS
Company description: We automate all areas of the transportation industry responsible for acquiring, pricing and executing transportation orders. In addition, we provide the following services: organization of ferry crossings, organization of tunnel and bridge crossings, toll facilities, transport insurance and assistance for trucks throughout Europe.

Name: Bastø Fosen
Company description: Bastø Fosen is a prominent ferry service provider in Norway, specializing in the transportation of passengers and vehicles across various routes, including the popular Moss-Horten connection. The company is committed to sustainability and aims to contribute to a greener future through its operations. Bastø Fosen serves a diverse clientele, including daily commuters, tourists, and freight transporters, ensuring reliable and efficient travel options. The company partners with local authorities and transport organizations to enhance connectivity and accessibility in the regions it operates. With a focus on customer service and operational excellence, Bastø Fosen strives to meet the evolving needs of its passengers while maintaining a strong commitment to environmental responsibility.

Name: ITD International Transport Danmark
Company description: International Transport Danmark is a private business association for the professional transport and logistics companies. We advise and create networks for our approximately 700 member companies. We watch over the political interests of the transport and logistics industry nationally and internationally. At the same time, we provide the member companies with targeted tools making a positive difference in the busy workday of the haulier. International Transport Danmark aims to strengthen the members’ professionalism, competitiveness and profitability, regardless of whether they work with national or international road transport – or both.  We believe that the future belongs to the efficient, digital and green haulier. So, we are at the forefront of the digitalisation of Danish road transport, just as we support the green transition. Furthermore, we ensure focus on traffic safety. Among other services, our commercial companies, FDE and VIALTIS, supply VAT refund and payment solutions to transport companies throughout Europe.  FDE and VIALTIS are companies committed to provide services to partners and customers with beneficial solutions within VAT refund and payment solutions for motorways, tunnels, bridges and ferries. FDE and VIALTIS deliver this with instant liquidity improvement giving administrative advantages, so the customers can focus on their businesses. The ITD Group is headquartered in Padborg, Denmark and has around 210 employees. The organisation also has offices in Copenhagen and Brussels, and we are represented in 11 other countries through our subsidiaries.

Name: AGMAR
Company description: The AGMAR company was founded in 2009. The company's main activity is transport. Long-term practice of the owner of the company in international transport and experienced staff ensures that our company contracted service will be done professionally and on time. Knowledge of the industry allows for customer service at the highest level in every field of transport. The company provides transport and shipping services with a fleet of their own, and with a broad base of subcontractors. The main directions of our countries are in Western Europe, especially Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium and the United Kingdom, in addition we offer storage and ferry between the continent and Britain.

Name: Wergeland Group
HQ Location: Norway, Sogn Og Fjordane, Dalsøyra, 75 Fensfjordvegen, 5960
Company description: Group Company in Gulen Industrial Harbour. Delivering services to customers within offshore and onshore industry and the private market. Wergeland Group's business: - Offshore equipment - Environmental services - Freighters - Cable ferries - Concrete - Mechanical services

Name: Vat Services
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 59 Calle De José Abascal, 28003
Company description: Vatservices ofrece servicios de asesoramiento y gestión financiera a las empresas dedicadas al transporte internacional por carreteras de Europa y Marruecos. Somos especialistas en gestión de peajes, tasas y recuperación de IVA intracomunitario junto a otros impuestos al transporte. Con nuestro sistema de gestión, los transportistas pueden recuperar el IVA de sus operaciones de transporte europeo, controlando los gastos de peajes y tasas en túneles y ferries de cada uno de sus vehículos. Todo de forma fácil, rápida y segura. Disponemos además de otro tipo de servicios al transporte como nuestra tarjeta de asistencia VAT-CASH en alianza con Gestrans, con la que ofrecemos servicio de asistencia 24 horas en toda Europa, países del Este y Marruecos.

Name: Eckerö Linjen
Company description: Eckerö Linjen operates car ferry services between Eckerö and Grisslehamn on board the M/S Eckerö.  We market all sorts of Åland tourism products under the Eckerö Linjen brand via our sales departments in Grisslehamn, Mariehamn and Eckerö – everything from simple overnight accommodation to various package trips, group trips, sporting holidays and conferences.  Eckerö Linjen is one of five subsidiaries owned by Rederiaktiebolaget Eckerö. The company was founded on March 2, 1961 to operate car ferry services between Sweden, Finland and Åland. Today the Group encompasses five business units: Eckerö Linjen, Eckerö Line, Birka Cruises, Eckerö Shipping and Williams Buss.

Name: ZEM - Zero Emission Maritime Solutions
Company description: With over 15 years experience with lithium Ion batteries, ZEM brings a knowledge driven approach to offering battery solutions to the maritime sector. ZEM is proud to have delivered the battery systems for the SMM 2016 ship of the Year, Vision of the Fjords (pictured above), as well as the 2018 ship of the year, the Future of the Fjords, and the latest addition, Legacy of the Fjords. ZEM was also responsible for delivering batteries to Eidesvik's "Viking Queen" and "Viking Energy" Off-shore supply vessels - the first commercial implementations of peak shaving solutions of its kind - helping to achieve more than 20% fuel savings during battery operations. ZEM's most recent line of AKAZEM solutions are also powering a new generation of smaller ships and ferries, including Norsafe's E-GES electric life boat and Moen Marin’s electric and hybrid fish farming vessels.

Name: Delamode Romania
Company description: Delamode – a leading Eastern European Consolidator  The Delamode group of companies is an innovative provider of international logistics and freight forwarding solutions. For more than 25 years we have been providing a full range of logistic services, from European groupage, distribution and logistics services to global air and sea freight services. We offer unique and specialist expertise in international road transport and consolidation of freight to, from and throughout Eastern Europe. Our network of offices provides regular and direct services linking Eastern Europe with Western Europe, as well as services between the CIS countries and Asia Republics.   Delamode as a Group employs over 250 people and has country offices in the Bulgaria, Estonia, Hungary, Lithuania, Moldova, Romania, Serbia and the UK. Overview of our international logistics and freight forwarding solutions: Pioneering consolidation services for Eastern European International part & full load freight services Complete Supply Chain Management Solutions Warehousing & Contract Logistics (3PL) Ecommerce Solutions Product Fulfilment Solutions Fashion Logistics Air & Sea Freight Services Customs Clearance Ferry Crossing Booking Service Mission Statement "We are committed to delivering bespoke end-to-end supply chain solutions that adds value to our customers’ business. We strive to achieve this through long-term pro-active relationships, supported by an innovative excellence of service, first class customer care and a responsible commitment to the environment." Delamode Group of Companies The Delamode Group of Companies offers its services in many European countries. Please select a country website to read more about the services offered locally and to other European destinations. delamode Balkans delamode Bulgaria delamode Baltics delamode Estonia delamode Hungary delamode Moldova delamode Romania delamode United Kingdom

Name: 9292 REISinformatiegroep bv
Company description: 9292 REISinformatiegroep bv is a leading provider of public transport information and ticketing solutions in the Netherlands, primarily through its innovative 9292 app. The company focuses on enhancing the travel experience by allowing users to purchase etickets for their entire journey across various modes of public transport, including trains, buses, trams, and ferries. With a mission to simplify public transport access, 9292 aims to make travel seamless and efficient for its users. The app not only facilitates ticket purchases but also provides personalized travel advice, catering to a diverse clientele that includes daily commuters, tourists, and occasional travelers. Partnering with multiple public transport operators, such as NS and Arriva, 9292 is committed to promoting sustainable mobility solutions while ensuring convenience and accessibility for all users.

Name: LUTZ Elevators
Company description: Whether on a cruise liner, a container ship, a ferry or a yacht: LUTZ Elevators is your partner for marine elevators.  We offer: Marine Elevators  Marine Elevators Service Periodic Inspections Spare Parts Offshore Elevators You can find information on data protection here: https://api.lutz-aufzuege.de/fileadmin/user_upload/Dokumente/Lutz_Datenschutzerklaerung_LinkedIn__12_09_23_en.pdf

Name: Nowhere Networks
Company description: We bring the internet to ships. At scale, with speed, and without compromise. Nowhere Networks is a Swedish high-tech company building the world’s most powerful land-based maritime broadband network. We deliver fast, reliable, and cost-effective internet connectivity to ferries, cruise ships, and cargo vessels - across Europe and expanding globally. But we’re not just a connectivity provider. We’re a full-stack operator. We design, build, install, and run everything ourselves. From our smart antennas and cloud-based network platform to onboard Wi-Fi portals and traffic management software. Our hybrid approach - combining land-based radio, LEO satellite, LTE, and port connectivity- is unmatched in the industry. Trusted by some of the biggest names in shipping and cruising (Stena Line, Tallink/Silja Line, DFDS, Irish Ferries, Gotland Alandia Cruises and more), we connect over 150 vessels and serve more than 100 million passengers annually. Whether it’s crew comms, passenger Wi-Fi, or real-time fleet operations, we make sure it all runs smoothly - and fast. We’re engineers, entrepreneurs, and problem-solvers who love building great tech and solving real-world challenges at sea. If you do too, come work with us.

Name: International Road Ferry B.V.
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Rotterdam-albrandswaard 3165 Am, 81 Abel Tasmanstraat
Company description: About International Road Ferry  Services: * Transportation between Benelux/Germany & England(Full Loads & Part Loads)  * Distribution of palletised goods * General Forwarding * Warehousing 350 units own equipment: * Euroliners * Dedicated trucks

Name: MORANDI GROUP
HQ Location: Italy, The Marches, Ancona, 4/e Via Xxix Settembre, 60122
Company description: Le origini di Morandi Group risalgono al 1913, anno in cui il broker marittimo Gustavo Morandi - insieme ai suoi fratelli - fonda ad Ancona la F.lli Morandi & C., agenzia marittima e casa di spedizioni che in pochi anni diventa punto di riferimento per il settore dello shipping e per il mondo armatoriale internazionale.  Oggi alla guida del Gruppo ci sono Chiara e Andrea Morandi, la 4° generazione. Il core business è lo shipping con  servizi ampiamente diversificati alle merci e ai passeggeri. Fanno parte di Morandi Group:  - le storiche agenzie marittime F.lli Morandi & C e Maritransport, entrambe casa di spedizioni e spedizioniere doganale,  - l'impresa portuale ASE (Adriatic Services Enterprise) dedicata ai servizi inerenti la terminalistica portuale, la logistica e l’autotrasporto,  - il Tour Operator e agenzia di viaggi Webtours  - l'impresa portuale Co.m.m.p.a., concessionaria del terminal rinfuse nel porto di Ancona.  - l’Agenzia Marittima Le Navi Ancona, che rappresenta MSC Cargo nel porto di Ancona, nata in partnership nel 2015 con l’Agenzia Marittima Le Navi, agente Generale di Mediterranean  Shipping Company  (MSC)  in  Italia. Sul fronte passeggeri, da oltre 20 anni, Morandi Group - attraverso l’agenzia marittima F.lli Morandi & C. - è agente generale e rappresentante in Italia di Attica Group, gruppo armatoriale greco di riferimento nel settore traghetti con le compagnie Superfast Ferries, Blue Star Ferries, AML e Hellenic Seaways.

Name: Zeehaven IJmuiden NV / Port Of IJmuiden
Company description: De zeehaven van IJmuiden, een dynamische haven aan de monding van het Noordzeekanaalgebied. Altijd toegankelijk zonder belemmeringen in welke vorm dan ook. Een open zeehaven met een reputatie op het gebied van op- en overslag van verse en diepgevroren vis, offshore, ferry- en cruisevaart en bouw van windmolens op zee. Zeehaven IJmuiden NV is de eigenaar en exploitant van de havens van IJmuiden. Sinds 1989 een private onderneming. Een uniek bedrijf op een unieke locatie.

Name: Carus Ferry
Company description: Carus is a global supplier of information technology to the travel and transport industry.  We design, build and support systems critical to the operation and sales of ferry and cruise businesses around the world. Our objective is to take care of the full 360 degrees of the passenger journey.   Carus’ reservations system meets the demands of today’s fully digitalised ferry operations, providing mobile reservations, self-service check-in and boarding as well as digital cabin keys and lounge access control.   Carus’ onboard solution supports the management of all onboard services; fine-dining, bars, cafes, and retail. And our range of port automation solutions smooths the journey on approach to and within the port for foot-passengers, passenger vehicles as well as for cargo vehicles and units.   Carus’ clients operate throughout the Baltic, Europe, the United Kingdom, the United States, Africa, and Australia. Our clients represent every aspect of the passenger vessel industry and operate virtually every type of vessel, proving the versatility and flexibility of our solutions. Learn More: info@carus.com www.carus.com

Name: Mammoet Ferry Transport
Company description: Mammoet Ferry Transport was founded in 1983, a division of the heavy transport company ‘Mammoet Transport’, owned by Royal Dutch Nedlloyd. It was set up specifically to deal with Continent to UK haulage needs. Starting with two offices located in the Netherlands and England, the company later added subsidiaries in Belgium, Scotland, Germany, France and Austria. In July 2000 the heavy transport parent company ‘Mammoet Transport’ was sold by Nedlloyd to van Seumeren Holland. The ferry transport division was transferred into the hands of the Dutch management team through a management buy-out. Today Mammoet Ferry Transport BV operates with a staff of 80 highly motivated employees. Using a modern fleet of 400 trailers operating from seven subsidiaries, the company is confidently handling 30000 shipments annually. Activities The main activity of Mammoet Ferry Transport is the rapid transportation of freight from Continental Europe to the UK and vice versa, providing an effective transport link between industrial centers on both sides of the North Sea. Mammoet Ferry Transport offers a door-to-door operation, servicing Holland, Belgium, France, Germany, Austria, Luxembourg and the United Kingdom.

Name: Stena Line Polska
Company description: PROMY DO SZWECJI, BILETY PROMOWE, REJSY TURYSTYCZNE - LINIE STENA LINE Posiadamy nowoczesną flotę promową oraz rozległą siatkę połączeń składającą się z 22 linii promowych w Europie Północne. Promy Stena Line oferują transport morski trzy razy dziennie na trasie Gdynia - Karlskrona. Bezpieczne i tanie promy Stena Spirit, Stena Vision oraz Stena Baltica odpływają codziennie do Szwecji. Jeżeli szukasz połączeń z Pomorza Zachodniego, sprawdź też ofertę linii Stena Line z niemieckiego Sassnitz do Trelleborga. Mieszkańcom wschodniej części kraju polecamy linię z łotewskiego Ventspils lub Liepaji do Nynashamn, miasta niedaleko Sztokholmu. Podróż promem to najbardziej ekonomiczny i wygodny sposób na dotarcie do Skandynawii. Zabierz samochód, zapakuj wszystko czego potrzebujesz i ruszaj w drogę! Zapraszamy na http://www.stenaline.pl lub http://wyjazdygrupowe.pl

Name: Petrans d.o.o.
Company description: We specialize in the provision of international transport and related comprehensive logistic services.  Our main objectives are business excellence, high-quality services, competitive prices, and tailoring our services completely to the needs of our customers.  Our activities include: -    International transport in the territory of Western Europe, particularly Great Britain, -    Sale of KÖGEL trailers, -    Sale of HUMBAUR trailers, -    Goods storage and transhipment, -    Sale of ferry tickets, -    Transmission, storing and archiving of data from digital tachographs

Name: Weiße Flotte GmbH
Company description: For the last 60 years, Stralsund based company Weiße Flotte has been operating day-trip and ferry services in the Federal State of Mecklenburg-West Pomerania jointly with its subsidiary Reederei Hiddensee.  Modern passenger vessels of the “Boddenkreuzer” type, a cargo ferry as well as fast water taxis make up the fleet that connects the two islands of Hiddensee and Rügen all year round. During the summer months, the timetable is supplemented with sailings from Stralsund, Wiek Dranske, Barth and Zingst. New or modernised passenger/ car vessels are deployed for ferry services in Warnemünde (Hohe Düne), Wittower Fähre (Rügen) and Stahlbrode – Glewitz (Rügen). A larger programme of harbour trips rounds off the products on offer.  Weiße Flotte and Reederei Hiddensee carry annually 3.4 million passengers and 846,000 vehicles.  The Weiße Flotte also operates a rowing boat ferry on behalf of the Berliner Verkehrsbetriebe (BVG) in Berlin. The group’s smallest vessel, the “Paule III”, entered service in 2015 and is able to transport 8 passengers or 4 passengers plus 4 bicycles.  Weiße Flotte  is one of the ventures of the FRS Förde Reederei Seetouristik, an internationally business group base in Northern Germany with a portfolio that comprises twenty-one subsidiaries located in Europe, North Africa and North America. In addition to numerous international ferry and catamaran lines, a shipmanagement company and the operation of a port complete the product range.

Name: Gruppo Giovani Federagenti
Company description: 🛳 Una nuova generazione di giovani agenti e mediatori marittimi in Italia.  Siamo oltre cinquanta iscritti, con attività in circa 144 porti nazionali, da più di dieci anni contribuiamo alla vita della nostra federazione di categoria, Federagenti, con idee, attività formative, eventi e momenti di networking. Lavoriamo con ogni tipologia di nave: container, tanker, bulk carrier, yacht, traghetti e crociere.  Se il novanta percento di tutto viaggia via mare, possiamo dire di essere al servizio dell’economia del Paese.  Curiosi, entusiasti, sempre in movimento. Se vuoi salire a bordo, scrivici qui 👉🏼 gruppogiovani@federagenti.it

Name: Ystad Hamn Logistik AB / Port Of Ystad
Company description: Port and Logistics solutions. The port is Sweden's largest port for ferry traffic to Poland and Bornholm. In comparison with other Swedish ports, Port of Ystad is ranked third concerning ferry passengers, fifth concerning trucks and trailers and eleventh when it comes to the total amount of goods tonnage yearly. For several years, the port has broken new records and, despite the pandemic,   in 2020 a new all time high regarding personal cars to Bornholm was set. In the beginning of 2021, Port of Ystad opened two new ferry berths for vessels up to 250 meters, a great possibility for current as well as new partners. You are welcome too!

Name: Hundested Propeller A/S
Company description: Hundested Propellers are manufacturers of Controllable Pitch Propellers, Controllable Pitch Gear Boxes and Thrusters, meeting the needs of Fishing boats, tugs, ferries, coasters, smaller tankers and pleasure boats. Hundested manufacture CP Propellers from 150 HP to 4500 HP, CP Gear Boxes from 300 HO to 4500 HP and Thrusters as tunnel units from 25 HO to 2700 HP and retractable swing units in four models from 25 HP to 200 HP. Hundested is represented in US by Hundested Propeller US. Part of the BSI Marine Equipment Group.

Name: CoCo Yachts B.V.
Company description: CoCo Yachts is specialised in designing high speed vessels, including aluminium catamarans, which can be used as motor yacht, water taxi, ferry, fast ferry, etc. CoCo Yachts can offer a wide range of high speed vessel designs from basic up to detailed design. The focus of our vessels is on functionality versus appearance, but always with the lowest possible Cost of Ownership. CoCo Yachts is able to assist buyers and builders with the preparation of tender documents, including evaluation, reporting and advice.

Name: Smeets Ferry B.V.
Company description: Smeets Ferry B.V. is a carrier specialized in transports between Germany, Benelux and UK. With a main office in Alblasserdam (near Rotterdam), the Netherlands and offices in UK and Germany.  With our modern fleet of 450 trailers we are daily internationally present and ready to serve our customers.

Name: Integrity Trawlers
Company description: The company's factory is situated in Guangzhou in China,only two hour sailing by ferry from Hong Kong. The Integrity ships are available in sizes from 30 - 80 feet. There are 12 different models and designs, all built in polyester. There is a choice of the models, Eurotrawlers , Coastal Express  Grand Sedan ,Lobster and Cruising. All ships are spacious and very well finished with seaworthy hulls and an economic fuelconsumption.The Integrity company is a reliable and very experienced company and deliver her ships with CE certificates A or B. Swanta-yachting is the exclusive importer and listen to your special wishes regarding style and specifications to built your own Integrity (Semi custom built). All ships are tested by the international marine certification institute, IMCI and comply to the international standards as written in the recreational craft directive 94/25/EC in conjunction with the essential safetyrules 3.2 for stability and hullsize and 3.3 for buoyancy and flotation. Each ship has its own IMCI report and a declaration of conformity. Also there will be a guarantee given on hullconstruction,equipment and osmosis(5 years). Our slogan; seaworthy,comfort and luxury.

Name: PKS TORM
Company description: PKS TORM - is an experienced company providing the full range of cargo transport from A to Z. We always meet a due date in:   -- FTL international and national transport (MEGA semi-trailers, standard 13.6m, 15.4m sets, firm outlays, joloda, coilmulde) + LTL (transport up to 1t, transport up to 7t); -- EXTL – express cargo (double crew); transport with temperature control; international Carriage of Dangerous Goods (ADR), waste and SENT shipping + oversized transport; -- railway, maritime and air transport; booking ferries, bridges, tunnels all over Europe; -- logistics services (storage, transshipment, repackaging)

Name: Irish Ferries Freight
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, Alexandra Road, d01 w2f5
Company description: Irish Ferries (www.irishferriesfreight.com) is the market leading ferry operator to and from the Republic of Ireland and is part of Irish Continental Group (ICG) plc (www.icg.ie).  Irish Ferries owns and operates eight vessels across eight strategic RoRo routes between Ireland - Britain, Ireland - France and the UK - France catering for passengers, vehicles and roll-on roll-off freight units. We also operate as a tour operator, selling inclusive package holidays in both the Irish and British markets. As a key contributor to the tourism economies of Ireland, Britain and France, and as a strategic connector in business supply chains, we are committed to delivering reliable, timely and high quality travel experiences for all our passengers. With a committed and passionate team, we will achieve success by anticipating our customers’ needs and matching those with superior services through constant innovation and the rapid application of new proven technology. We measure our success through the quality of our service, as seen by our customers, which should result in delivering sustained and profitable growth for the benefit of our shareholders and staff. •	Key freight positions on short sea routes between the Republic of Ireland and the UK. •	Inclusive package holidays to the Republic of Ireland and the UK. •	Modern fleet of multi-purpose ferries operating between the Republic of Ireland and the UK and France. •	667,800 passengers carried in 2021 on up to 27 daily sailings. •	203,600 cars and 290,000 freight units carried in 2021.

Name: Porto Di Livorno 2000 S.r.l.
Company description: Porto di Livorno 2000 s.r.l. is the Cruise & Ferry Port located in Livorno, Tuscany, Italy. Livorno Port for Tuscany- is a destination port but partial turnaround calls are increasing. The Port of Livorno hosted in 2016 403 cruise calls bringing 807.935 passengers of wich 9274 disembarking and embarking (about 18% more than 2015). The Alto Fondale Terminal building was recently subject to an important restoration and now offers wide spaces for the passengers turn-around, luggage handling and Custom clearing. Livorno, despite its vocation as destination port, can propose itself as Home-Port, thanks to the peculiar geographical position at the centre of the Mediterranean, only few kilometres far from the International Airport “G. Galilei” well connected to many European destinations in UK or Germany.  World famous vineyards in Bolgheri, beaches and natural parks and Etruscan ruins represent alternatives to classic Tuscany tours. Porto di Livorno 2000 is also an important ferry terminal, connecting Italy to Corsica and Sardinia Islands. In 2016 were embarked and disembarked about 2.194.000 passengers and 837.000 vehicles, about 19% more than 2015.

Name: Security Label | A Paragon ID company
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Sarstedt, 10 Am Boksberg, 31157
Company description: Security Label are proud to be part of the Paragon ID family of companies having joined in 2021. For our many customers, those wishing to be successful require reliable and innovative products and customer-tailored service. And Security Label provides precisely this with its tried, tested and proven special print solutions in the fields of  - Air travel,  - Cruiser and ferry travel,  - Accompanying documents,  - Hotel requirements and for  - Applications in the processing industry and logistics.  Our market leading eezeetag baggage tag being a prime example of innovation and working with partners across the aviation market. Due to its specialisation in the market segments baggage and product labelling and identification, personal access documents and accompanying documents, Security Label has become the market leader in baggage tags and boarding passes to the aviation market. Our core competence In the field of air travel, we are currently working with more than 400 airlines and airports in over 150 countries, and are globally accepted as long-standing strategic IATA partners.
