With over 100 different products – for the air travel sector alone - Security Label is able to consistently fulfil the individual requirements of its customers to their complete satisfaction through specific adaptations in layout, material, innovative technologies and customer-orientated logistics.

Name: Hyke
Company description: Hyke, is a Norwegian zero-emission waterborne mobility start-up. It aims to help cities solve pollution and congestion problems by deploying networks of zero emission electric, autonomous ferries for mobility and last-mile logistics.  Hyke is a member of the Eker Group, Norway’s leading industrial design and product-development company with over 35 years of experience, including Hydrolift, the recognized leader in professional and pleasure boats. For more information, visit www.hyke.no and www.ekergroup.com

Name: Int. Transportbedrijf H.J. Van Bentum B.V.
Company description: H.J. van Bentum bv specialises in the transportation of dry bulk products, both powders and granules. Our fleet of silo trailers consists of both food and non-food trailers with a capacity from 61 to 63 m3. Depending on the freight and the location of its loading and unloading, we have what it takes to offer you the most efficient solution, using whatever mode of transport you prefer – road, water or rail. Our vehicles are equipped with an on board computer, which means that we know at any given moment the location of our drivers and your goods. With our fleet of curtainsider trailers and flatbed trailers, we operate a daily service between the United Kingdom and the continent for groupage and full loads. For the crossing to and from the United Kingdom we use various ferry services and the Channel Tunnel. All our curtainsidet trailers are built according to the TUV XL code, which ensures safe transit packaging. The kerb weight of these TUV XL trailers, which are generally heavier than standard trailers, has remained below the target weight thanks to various technical innovations. This makes us into the industry's leader capable of loading 28.4 tonnes in the UK legally. We handle both FTL and LTL freight shipments for the following sectors: • petrochemicals and chemicals (ADR and non-ADR) • soft drinks and foodstuffs  • paper and office supplies • automotive industry • construction materials industry • packing industry

Name: Border Trans Service
HQ Location: Italy, Friuli Venezia Giulia, Udine, 16 Piazzale Dell'agricoltura, 33100
Company description: Border Trans Service is a freight forwarding company providing logistic, shipping and added value activities through branches in Italy and Austria. Border Trans Service was established in 1866 in Pontebba, border town between Italy and Austria; since the beginning the core activity was focused on transportation developing through the years a great expertise in custom clearance starting from Austria, reaching Eastern Europe, Baltics, and the Black Sea. In 1920 Border Trans Service opened its own office in Thörl Maglern were today is the Head Office controlling from 1997 the italian branches in Pontebba, Udine, Rovigo, Fernetti and Monza where provides freight forwarding, assistance to VAT and taxes rebate, highway, gas ferry and tunnel discounted payments in many European countries. Since the beginning satisfing our customer needs with top class service is our mission; our multilanguage team is at our customers disposal handling fully the business with efficiency and professionally. Versatility and flexibility are our strenghtnesses; ready to manage and effort international markets and their fast changes being always On the right way.

Name: HADAG Seetouristik Und Fährdienst AG
HQ Location: Germany, Hamburg, Hamburg, 28 St. Pauli Fischmarkt, 20359
Company description: Welcome to Hamburg’s harbour and HADAG, which has been operating a scheduled boat service in and around Hamburg's docks since 1888. Nowadays HADAG is responsible for all ferry traffic in Hamburg’s harbour in co-operation with the HVV Transport Alliance - a great opportunity to obtain a close-up impression of activities in the docks.

Name: Wyker Dampfschiffs-Reederei Föhr-Amrum GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Schleswig-holstein, Wyk Auf Foehr, 1 Am Faehranleger, 25938
Company description: Since more than 125 years, Wyker Dampfschiffs-Reederei Föhr-Amrum GmbH (The Wyk Steam Ship Company Limited, W.D.R.) constitutes a vital part of daily life on the islands and holms off the coast of Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. Established as a shipping company by local interests back in 1885, W.D.R. operates two year-round commuter ferry services linking Dagebüll with Wyk (Föhr Island) and Wittdün (Amrum Island) as well as Schlüttsiel with Hallig Hooge, Hallig Langeneß and Wittdün. Both ferry services form a vital part of traffic infrastructure in the Nordfriesland Region and have lifeline function for its islands and holms. Moreover, they constitute an essential basis for the region's prospering tourism industry. On an annual basis, W.D.R. records roughly 1.8 million passengers, 275,000 private cars and 36,000 trucks carried on its ferry services. Ferry operations form Wyker Dampfschiffs-Reederei's core business. Apart from that, the company operates one passenger excursion vessel, M/V "Rüm Hart", which is trading on day excursions from Wyk during summer.  Last but not least, the company operates public transportation on the islands of Föhr and Amrum: A fleet of 8 modern busses and coaches carry approximately 885,000 passengers annually.

Name: Bunkeroil
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Livorno, 11 Via Pietro Paleocapa, 57123
Company description: Since 1980 we have been supplying solutions for all needs in the marine field, combining the international dimension with the flexibility of a local partner. Our goal is to provide customers with a real competitive advantage through the best maritime transport services, delivery and sale of petroleum products and the relationship between shipowner and port operators, with a high added value in terms of operational flexibility and financial conditions. OUR SERVICES • Shipping. We specialize in transporting petrochemical products in the Mediterranean, with a fleet managed by an expert team of professionals. • Lubricants. We work with the main international lubricating oil manufacturers to supply high quality products at competitive prices in all the world’s ports. In 2018 we have been appointed as leading Distributors for small vessels by ExxonMobil in the territory of Italy and Malta: thanks to the high quality products and our operational and technical support, we help to improve the performance and efficiency of each type of vessel and to anticipate the future needs within the sector. • Bunkers. We have a consolidated experience in supplying high quality marine fuels for some of the most important shipping companies in the Mediterranean. • Clearing and Shipping Agency. We operate as clearing and shipping agents in the port of Livorno, particularly within the tourism sector for cruise ships and ferries.

Name: Easytrip Transport Services Netherlands
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Dordrecht, 120-122 Jacobus Lipsweg, 3316bp
Company description: Convince yourself! Our services do not only offer you high discounts on fuel, tollroads and tunnels, but also reduce the administrative hassle. This way you can focus on your core business. That is what we do as well. 1 - VAT Refund - We bring back your foreign VAT money! 2 - Excise duty Refund - Irrespective of the recovery of the foreign VAT; it is also possible to request the refund of diesel fuel tax in a few countries. So you can save even more money if you fill up in Belgium, France, Spain and Slovenia! 3 - Fuel Cards - We provide a number of credit cards for European transport businesses. 4 - Toll Devices - Keep on rolling! We provide you with toll devices for Europe 5 - Ferry bookings - Do you need to take a ferry with your truck? We will organize it for you! 6 - Fine Service - You get stuck on the roads with a fine? We will help!

Name: Stena Glovis SE
Company description: “Combining the strengths of our parent companies, Hyundai Glovis and Stena – Stena-Glovis’ ambition is to become Europe’s Leading Finished Vehicle Logistics Provider of Short Sea, Ferry and Deep Sea services. With over 100 vessels trading across a Global Deep Sea and European Short Sea & Ferry Network, Stena-Glovis is uniquely placed to build a best in class finished vehicle logistics operation and delivering a unique value proposition to our customer base. Headquartered in Hamburg, Germany, with a sales office in Bremen, Stena-Glovis is currently ramping up for the next phase in our growth.”

Name: Marnavi spa
Company description: Marnavi S.p.A. is a distinguished maritime company that specializes in passenger and freight transportation across the Mediterranean Sea, with a strong emphasis on providing high-quality ferry services. The company is dedicated to enhancing the travel experience for its clients by ensuring safety, punctuality, and customer satisfaction. Marnavi's mission is to deliver reliable and efficient transport solutions while its vision focuses on expanding its network and improving service offerings to adapt to the evolving needs of travelers.  Catering to a diverse clientele, Marnavi serves tourists, business travelers, and freight operators, making it a versatile choice for various transportation needs. The company collaborates with numerous partners to bolster its operational capabilities, ensuring seamless connectivity across its routes. Marnavi's target market includes individuals and businesses seeking dependable maritime transport, particularly on routes that connect Italy with other Mediterranean destinations. In addition to its Mediterranean operations, Marnavi S.p.A. also operates Marnavi Spa, a premier maritime service based in Vigo, which offers elegant ferry services to the stunning Cies Islands and other picturesque locations along the Galician coast. Marnavi Spa is committed to providing travelers with unforgettable experiences, combining comfort and convenience to transform every journey into an opportunity to enjoy the breathtaking views and natural beauty of the region. The company caters to both adventurous tourists and locals in search of efficient travel options, while partnering with various transport services to enhance accessibility. With a focus on exceptional customer service, Marnavi's onboard staff is dedicated to meeting every passenger's needs, ensuring that each voyage is memorable and enjoyable.

Name: Port Of Naantali Ltd
Company description: During last 15 years, Naantali has become one of the most important Roro ports in Finland. Due to  the port´s significant investments in ferry traffic, the utilized cargo is increasing rapidly. Naantali is one of the largest Roro/Ropax port in Finland for trucks and trailers. Half of all truck and trailer transportations between Finland and Sweden are carried via Naantali by Ropax vessels.  The quick and fast sea route for cargo between Finland and Sweden. The Port of Naantali is an important link in the logistics chain of the Baltic Sea, which role is emphasized by its inclusion in the TEN-T traffic network, which covers the whole of Europe. The TEN-T core network links the Port of Naantali to both the Nordic Triangle and the Motorway of the Baltic Sea. The Port of Naantali is defined one of those four TEN-T core ports in Finland. Measured in tonnes of cargo, the Port of Naantali is one of the largest port in Finland. In recent years, total annual traffic at the Port of Naantali has averaged more than 7 million tonnes. With annual 1600 vessel calls the Port of Naantali is one of the most busiest ports. TEN-T core port with excellent logistical location on the European route 18 and well known Nordic triangle and Scandinavian-Mediterranean traffic corridor.  Naantali is long time known as a significant centre for dry bulk goods operations, thanks to excellent storage facilities and all-round value-added services.  Naantali is one of the largest ports eg. for grain and cement cargo handling in Finland. The port handles and stores also fertilizers, feed stuff and other other bulk materials as well as different type of recycling materials.  Currently Naantali offers several daily connections to Scandinavia with RoRo/Ropas vessels. There fast and regular connections ensure efficiency required by modern logistics and professional cargo transportation. Easy ice conditions. One of the deepest channels and quays in Finland.

Name: I.S.T. 2007 S.A.
Company description: IST, S.A. desde 2007 al servicios del transporte. Agencia de Transporte Nacional e Internacional. Sistemas de pago de carburante y autopistas. Reservas de Ferries, trenes y túneles. Servicios de gestión y asesoramiento de seguros, multas y recuperación IVA UE. Tacógrafos digitales.

Name: North Quay Associates
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, Alexandra Road Extension, d01
Company description: North Quay Associates Ltd is an Irish company focused on providing manpower solutions to the cargo handling, shipping and ferryport management industry. Our focus on providing fully qualified, trained and certified personnel has enabled NQA to secure contracts with other companies operating in Dublin Port. These include, MSC Shipping, Hamilton Shipping, Celtic Link Shipping and Irish Ferries. In 2007, North Quay Associates Ltd secured a contract with Seatruck Ferries to provide all dock personnel for their cargo and vessel handling requirements. North Quay Associates Ltd are also contracted with hamilton shipping to provide certified personnel to assist the cruiseline operations at Dun Laoghaire port. NQA - Your Partner in Manpower

Name: Pulchra Mare d.o.o.
Company description: A company operating as shipping management and agents incorporated and based in Koper, Slovenia. The company offers Full Commercial, Technical, Crewing & Purchasing management to shipping groups and owners. The management team have operated in the Maritime industry for 20 years covering a wide scope of projects but with specific experience of all European territories (but not restricted to this geography) with niche expertise in RoRo passenger ferry ships and line operations.

Name: FRS Helgoline GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: FRS Helgoline services the connection with Germany’s only offshore island, Heligoland, since 1984. The HSC “Halunder Jet” is the fastest vessel to Heligoland and the only high-speed catamaran to this destination. The catamaran connects Hamburg, Wedel and Cuxhaven with the island’s port every day between April and October. FRS Helgoline is the market leader in ferry rides to Heligoland with 186,000 passengers annually. The Heligoland route will receive a new catamaran beginning sailing season 2018. The 56.4 m long newbuilding which is an absolute premium product has been especially designed for the Heligoland traffic and can carry up to 692 passengers who can look forward to the generous sundecks. With a speed of 35 knots and a state-of-the-art motion damping system, the journey across the open North Sea will be a fast and comfortable maritime experience even at rough sea. FRS Caribbean is one of the ventures of the FRS Förde Reederei Seetouristik, an internationally business group base in Northern Germany with a portfolio that comprises twenty-one subsidiaries located in Europe, North Africa and North America. In addition to numerous international ferry and catamaran lines, a ship-management company and the operation of a port complete the product range.

Name: JH Logistik Group
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Delmenhorst, 1 Willy-brandt Allee, 27753
Company description: THE RIGHT SPECIALIST FOR EVERY TRANSPORT.  || JH Logistik GmbH  -  JH Heavy Logistik GmbH  -  JH Ferry GmbH || We are a group of companies, dedicated to our passion for logistics, driven by challenges, delivering solutions.  Using our expertise from all three companies, we craft an individual concept for your unique transport.  No matter how big or small - it is important to you, which makes it important to us. You have our undivided attention.  We care. We share. We deliver.  FROM ROAD TO SEA.  With our eyes set on sustainability, we are looking for transport solutions on water. Barge, ferry, coaster or ocean vessel - we find out for you if your transport can be optimized by including waterways. WE ARE YOUR LOGISTICS ENGINEERS. You'd be surprised how much time and money you can save with a structured logistics concept from the get-go.  From spare parts to entire wind parks - we deliver it door-door, worldwide. We evaluate all possible alternatives - especially the ones you haven't thought about, yet - and present you with a solid, smooth and reliable transport plan.  We take you from the early stages of planning to the successful completion of your transport project.  STRONG PARTNERSHIPS AROUND THE GLOBE.  We consider our clients, partners, agents and subcontractors as integral members of our team. We all share the same goal: To give you the best transport solution possible. High quality and reliable, lasting partnerships are paramount to our success. Teamwork makes the dream work! OUR SERVICES : Trucking Terminal Handling Ocean Freight Chartering Barge Freight (Germany - Netherlands - Belgium - France - Danube - others) Break Bulk High & Heavy (Trucking - Handling - Ocean Freight) Seaworthy Packaging Storage Stevedoring - Lashing - Securing - Welding Works on Board Container Logistics Customs Clearance  Ferry Bookings (all European Connections) Support with Customs documentation under Brexit conditions

Name: Nordic Ferry Infrastructure
HQ Location: Norway, Oslo, Oslo, 20 Henrik Ibsens Gate, 0255
Company description: Nordic Ferry Infrastructure is the leading private passenger and freight sea transportation company in the Nordic region. We provide critical ferry and express boat infrastructure across a route network of floating bridges, connecting people and regions. This makes NFI an essential part of the domestic transportation system with more than 25 million passengers annually.

Name: Albis Marine Performance
Company description: Albis Marine Performance offers powerful software and hardware as well as in-depth data analyses for vessel operation optimization. Our products for cargo ships, ferries and workboats in offshore wind farms provide safer and more efficient shipping. This not only saves emissions but also reduces fuel consumption and financial expenses. We build custom solutions by tailoring our software, hardware and service modules to meet our customers' exact needs. Our service relies on a crew of highly experienced marine data analyzing experts, software engineers, service technicians and management experts – all providing valuable ongoing support for the continuous improvement of ship operations and business processes.

Name: Minoan Lines S.A.
Company description: Minoan Lines S.A. is a prominent maritime transportation company specializing in ferry services across popular routes in Greece and the Adriatic Sea. The company is dedicated to providing high-quality travel experiences for its clients, which include both leisure and business travelers. Minoan Lines aims to enhance customer satisfaction through various initiatives, such as offering discounts for vehicle owners using alternative fuels and special bonus programs in partnership with Alpha Bank. With routes connecting key destinations like Heraklion, Piraeus, Corfu, and Ancona, Minoan Lines targets a diverse market of travelers seeking reliable and comfortable ferry services. The company's mission reflects a commitment to innovation and customer loyalty, as evidenced by its Bonus Club program that rewards frequent travelers.

Name: Aegean Speed Lines
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Glyfáda, Vouliagmenis Ave. 85 Antheon, 16674
Company description: Aegean Speed Lines was incorporated in 2005 with the cooperation of the Eugenides Group of Companies and the British Group of Companies “Sea Containers”. Aegean Speed Lines was the first Greek company to employ a European Union flag vessel in the Greek cabotage, SPEEDRUNNER I, in the scope of deregulation of ferry services in our country. In 2006, Aegean Speed Lines changed its shareholders synthesis following the divestment of Sea Containers while the Eugenides Group of Companies maintained its significant share holding. This new scheme resulted from the synergy of well respected investors who consider Greek coastal shipping as a sector of the Greek Economy with high prospects. This new alliance provided Aegean Speed Lines with enhanced dynamics, feature at the needs of the modern passenger and the development of the islands. In the same respect, Aegean Speed Lines covers the transportation needs of the western Cycladic islands, because the company strongly believes that by offering a multitude of transportation solutions is catalytic to the growth and prosperity of all residents of the region. Staff of Aegean Speed Lines think and act as passengers themselves, so as to predict plans and offer on a daily basis, high standard services. Since 2009 till 2011, except the routes of Piraeus-Western Cyclades (Serifos, Sifnos, Milos, Kimolos, Folegandros), the fleet of Aegean Speed Lines served the Piraeus-Syros-Tinos-Mykonos, Piraeus-Thira-Ios - Sikinos and Piraeus-Paros-Naxos routes. In order to serve these schedules Aegean Speed Lines used three ultra-modern high-speed vessels: SPEEDRUNNER II, SPEEDRUNNER III, and SPEEDRUNNER IV which meet leading comfort, quality and safety requirements.  Just 5 years from its inception in December 2009, the company was granted the honours by Lloyds List, characterized as " The best shipping company of the year ", for its commitment and dedication to providing high quality services. Aegean Speed Lines has limited the schedule since 2015, attending to West Cyclades with SPEEDRUNNER III, which executes schedules to Piraeus - Serifos – Sifnos – Milos - Kimolos - Folegandros - Sikinos.

Name: All About Boats
Company description: All About Boats is a banking company based out of 5772 Shadburn Ferry Rd, Buford, GA, United States.

Name: Žemeda UAB

Company description: We offer freight transportation on domestic and international routes.  Since 1995 company is a member of Lithuanian National Road Carriers Association Linava. Our route network ranges from Lithuania to Latvia, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Belarus, Russia. Over 10 years we are working with Scandinavia, mostly Sweden. The company owns 12 vehicles. We use ferry lines of the Baltic Sea operators. We provide delivery of freights on time from door-to-door or to terminals. We put all the efforts to meet customers‘ needs and to ensure the freight is safely delivered.

Name: Lantimar Group
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Palma, 8 3º A B Calle De Porto Pi, 07015
Company description: The three companies LANTIMAR SHIP AGENT-YACHTING-LOGISTICS&CUSTOMS merge with the aim of continuing to offer the best services in the reference sectors.  From Superaychts to Cruise Liners, Ferries, Tankers, Bulk Carriers, Fishing Boats, Oil Rigs, Scientific Vessels, Tugs,Naval Ships,and as a global supplier of logistic business, we strive for efficient, uncompromised, sincere, tailor-made, caring and exceptional service (as close to perfect as possible).  With more than 20 years experience in the shipping and logistics scene, we are passionate about service and offer you a single point of contact for all your shore-based and shipment requirements.

Name: ESPO
Company description: The European Sea Ports Organisation was founded in 1993. It  represents the port authorities, port associations and port administrations of the seaports of the Member States of the European Union and Norway. ESPO has also observer members in several neighbouring countries to the EU. The European Union simply cannot function without its seaports. 90 % of Europe’s cargo trade in goods passes through the more than 1200 seaports existing in the 23 maritime Member States of the EU and more than 400 million passengers pass through Europe’s ports every year using ferry and cruise services. Without seaports, the European Union would not exist as an economic world power. Without seaports, there would be no internal market. ESPO ensures that seaports have a clear voice in the European Union. The organisation promotes the common interests of its members throughout Europe and is also engaged in dialogue with European stakeholders in the Port and Maritime sector. ESPO works through a permanent secretariat in Brussels, a General Assembly, an Executive Committee, and 8 specialised committees.

Name: Ausmar
Company description: Establecida desde 1968, Ausmar enfoca su actividad hacia la seguridad náutica, contando con la red más amplia de revisionistas de balsas salvavidas en España. Además de ser fabricantes de la prestigiosa marca de balsas Duarry, ofrecemos un amplio porfolio de productos relacionados con la seguridad marítima tales como chalecos salvavidas, radiobalizas, material de seguridad y trajes de supervivencia, entre otros. Nuestra empresa de seguridad marítima cuenta con un equipo de profesionales altamente cualificados que nos permite ofrecer una amplia gama de servicios y productos relacionados con la seguridad náutica para todo tipo de embarcaciones.

Name: RTR Holland B.V.
Company description: Al meer dan 40 jaar is Refrigerated Trailer Rentals (RTR) gespecialiseerd in de verhuur van geconditioneerde opleggers. Met vestigingen in Barendrecht en Antwerpen bestaat de totale verhuurvloot uit meer dan 700 trailers. De organisatie hiervan is in handen van slechts 14 medewerkers waardoor met recht kan worden gezegd dat RTR groot is door klein te blijven. Binnen het beroepsgoederenvervoer is koel- en vriestransport echt een vak apart. Nog meer dan elders draait het in deze sector om tijd, snelheid en betrouwbaarheid. RTR verhuurt diverse soorten koel- en vriestrailers voor verschillende toepassingen. Het geconditioneerde vervoer in Europa neemt in de toekomst alleen maar verder toe. Dit heeft te maken met het aanbod van verse producten zoals voedingsmiddelen, bloemen en planten. Ook komen er steeds meer producten bij, die volgens de wetgeving of op wens van de klant onder bepaalde condities vervoerd moeten worden. Medicijnen, verfwaren, apparatuur en instrumenten zijn hier mooie voorbeelden van. Onze trailers zijn geschikt voor elk product en iedere vorm van transport. Ook voor onbegeleid ferry transport. Kijk voor meer info op http://www.rtr-trailer.com

Name: Candela
Company description: Candela is a pioneering company in the marine industry, known for developing the world's first electric hydrofoil ferry, the Candela P12. This innovative vessel operates a pilot commuter line between Gothenburg and Öckerö, showcasing the potential for faster, more comfortable, and completely emission-free travel in the archipelago. Candela's mission is to revolutionize public transport on water by leveraging advanced electric propulsion and hydrofoil technology, which significantly reduces energy consumption and travel time compared to traditional vessels. The company collaborates with partners such as Västtrafik, Styrsöbolaget, and Öckerö Municipality to explore the benefits of its technology for commuters. Targeting environmentally conscious travelers and public transport systems, Candela aims to enhance the user experience while contributing to sustainable maritime practices. With a focus on innovation and efficiency, Candela is set to transform the future of maritime travel.

Name: Virtu Holdings Limited
Company description: Virtu Holdings saw its origins as a ship owning company in 1945 operating cargo vessels between the Mediterranean and northern European ports. Currently the company’s core business is that of owners and operators of High Speed Passenger/Car Ferries on various routes, including Malta-Sicily and ports in the Adriatic. Other maritime services include bunkering and ship management. A number of other interests include real estate with a portfolio of commercial, industrial and residential properties in some of the island’s prime sites and a holding in one of Malta’s leading 5 Star Deluxe hotels.

Name: Consulmar Group
Company description: The CONSULMAR Group comprises firms specializing in marine services in Spain, Morocco, and Guinea Bissau. We provide services in Bilbao, Castellón, Algeciras, Cadiz, Ceuta, Tanger Med, and Bissau ports. The primary services provided are the following: - Supply and transportation with launches and barges - Supply services to vessels Off Port Limits (OPL) in The Strait of Gibraltar - MARPOL waste collection with launches and barges - Marine lubricants supply and distribution - Fresh water supply to vessels by barge and from quay - Oil Spill Response (OSR) - Mooring and Unmooring - Loading master and operations at oil, chemical, and gas terminals - Shipping agency services - Crew management agency - Passengers' transportation by ferry  - Tourist boat services Our companies: - Consulmar: www.consulmar.es  - Workboat Services: www.workboat.es  - Amarres Ceuta: www.amarresceuta.es - Atlas Petroleum: www.atlasportsevices.com - Consulmar Bissau: www.consulmarbissau.com

Name: Fitalog Service Soc. Coop.
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 28 Via Giovanni Severano, 00161
Company description: FITALOG SERVICE, con sede a Roma e varie rappresentanze fiscali nei principali paesi europei, eroga da oltre 20 anni servizi alle imprese di autotrasporto, sia italiane che estere con l'obiettivo di:       •   fornire un valido supporto alle esigenze di servizi delle imprese di autotrasporto.       •   concorrere alla crescita delle imprese ed alla loro qualificazione       •   ridurre i costi di esercizio e aumentare la redditività delle imprese Con il passare degli anni e grazie agli sforzi fatti dal suo gruppo dirigente oggi 4000 aziende di autotrasporto, con un parco veicolare globale di oltre 30000 mezzi, usufruiscono dei servizi e dei vantaggi offerti da FITALOG per un fatturato globale che supera i 100 milioni di euro. Negli anni la gamma dei servizi è notevolmente cresciuta ed oggi FITALOG è in grado di poter esaudire qualsiasi richiesta di fornitura di servizi a 360 gradi: autostrade in tutta Europa, Eurovignette, tassa Svizzera, trafori del Frejus e del Monte Bianco, traghetti, treni, assicurazioni, apparati satellitari, soccorso stradale, ricorso ai verbali in Italia ed Europa, assistenza legale in Italia ed in Europa, recupero TVA e accise. Collaborano alla crescita di FITALOG  un gruppo di validi professionisti sempre a disposizione delle aziende per ogni problema, per spiegare i servizi che FITALOG eroga e soprattutto i vantaggi che le imprese possono avere.

Name: Grenaa Skibsværft
Company description: 24 timers service – 365 dage om året Vi er nemlig skarpt fokuserede på vores kunders drift, og ved hvor vigtigt det er, dels at minimerer antallet af stop via korrekt service – men derudover naturligvis også, en hurtig og god udbedring hvis uheldet er ude. Grenaa Skibsværft blev i 2010 købt HSM Industri A/S. I dag arbejdes der ikke bare i træ men også i stål og glasfiber. Flere mindre færger og en række orlogsfartøjer hører også til den faste kundekreds der ved, at kvalitetskrav og leveringsterminer bliver overholdt på Grenaa Skibsværft. Grenaa Skibsværft er udelukkende et dansk reparationsværft. Værftet servicerer omkring 60 skibe på deres beddinger hvert år, samtidigt med at der langs værftets monteringsbro, repareres og moderniseres forskellige skibstyper. Af arbejdsopgaver kan nævnes: Aluminiumsarbejde Stålarbejde Skibstømrerarbejde Ombygning Reparation Smedearbejde Malerarbejde Svejsearbejde Alle reparations- og vedligeholdelsesopgaver udføres ikke bare i træ, men også i stål og glasfiber. GSV har lager af skibsplade- og bulbstål i grade A- kvalitet med 3.1 certifikat. Store kvantum af DNV skibsstål skaffes fra andet lager som dag til dag leverance. Ligeledes holdes der lager af aluminiumplader og rør samt rustfrit stål. Hvis der er krav herom, kan der holdes 100% sporbarhed på alle materialedele. Beddingskapacitet: Bedding 1 Længde beddingsvogn: 46 meter Skibslængde: Op til 65 meter Bredde beddingsvogn: 7,5 meter Løftekapacitet: ca. 1.000 tons Dybgang over agtervogn: ca. 5 meter Dybgang over forvogn: ca. 2 meter Bedding 2 Længde beddingsvogn: 36 meter Skibslængde: Op til 45 meter Bredde beddingsvogn: 7 meter Løftekapacitet: ca. 400 tons Dybgang over agtervogn: ca. 4 meter Dybgang over forvogn: ca. 1,8 meter

Name: FRS Syltfähre GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: A ferry crossing has been in existence here since 1963: connecting List on the island of Sylt with the Danish Havneby on neighbouring Rømø, connected to the mainland via a road dam.  The crossing became part of the FRS Group in 1979. In 2005, the Rømø-Sylt Line (RSL) deployed a new modern double- ended ferry on this route, the MF "SyltExpress". This vessel, which is particularly suited to carrying vehicles of all kinds, strengthens not only RSL’s year-round supply service for Sylt, but offers tourists the unique maritime experience of arriving and departing via the sea.  On this line, which is extremely popular with day tourists, around 400,000 passengers are moved every year, together with 100,000 vehicles. Syltfaehre is one of the ventures of the FRS Förde Reederei Seetouristik, an internationally business group base in Northern Germany with a portfolio that comprises twenty-one subsidiaries located in Europe, North Africa and North America. In addition to numerous international ferry and catamaran lines, a ship-management company and the operation of a port complete the product range.

Name: Magdeburger Weiße Flotte GmbH
Company description: Wir, die Magdeburger Weiße Flotte GmbH sind ein etabliertes Unternehmen im Herzen Magdeburgs mit 3 Fahrgastschiffen und 2 Fähren. Jährlich fahren ca. 100.000 Fahrgäste von nah und fern mit unseren Schiffen und Fähren und erleben mit uns die Ottostadt Magdeburg von einer ganz anderen Seite kennen und lieben.

Name: Navis Engineering Oy
Company description: We design and manufacture dynamic positioning and manoeuvring control systems for different types of the ships - offshore vessels, cruise and ferry, workboats and special ships, super and mega yachts. For each type we offer systems engineered to your specific operational needs or requirements. Regardless of the type of the ship or the product we deliver, we share with you our knowledge which is one of our main assets. We provide lifetime support of our equipment and service where it is needed.

Name: E-Dea Transport Technology
Company description: E-Dea is a leading cutting-edge solution provider for Ferry Companies, RoRo, Ports and Terminals.  Our technology is used to manage more than 40 M passengers and 15 M vehicles

Name: Traghettionline
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Genoa, 4 Via Brigata Liguria, 16121
Company description: Portale dedicato al trasporto marittimo che offre all'utenza le informazioni relative alle disponibilità dei posti (real time), agli orari, alle tariffe ed ai servizi di bordo di tutte le principali compagnie di traghetti che collegano più di 80 porti in tutto il Mediterraneo. Acquisto biglietti con carta di credito.

Name: Gradski Parking
Company description: Gradski parking d.o.o. was founded in 2001. with the aim of establishing the regulation of traffic at a standstill. Constant activities to find new space , capacity expansion and refurbishment of new premises , Gradski parking d.o.o. from the very beginnings of action has a significant positive impact on life in Sibenik . Gradski parking d.o.o. manages over 1,500 parking spaces , bus station and ferry - Brodarica Krapanj . By purchasing a bus station in June  2003rd, Gradski parking d.o.o. expanding its activities. Our target is to be a leader in city  parking business, give the highest standard in bus station services and ferry services on the line 501 Krapanj-Brodarica. We are trying to be competitive and politically correct in sensitive social problems always  in disposed to our customers. Our helpful employees will help them in any way possible.

Name: Port Of Frederikshavn
Company description: The Port of Frederikshavn is one of the most important commercial harbours in Denmark today. The port is among the ten largest in Denmark and includes a traffic harbour, a ferry harbour and a versatile service industry. It is a modern, centrally located, commercial port with good facilities and a service set-up, which ensures fast and efficient handling of ships and cargo. The port has an ambitious investment plan and a clear strategy to offer the best facilities and world calibre maritime services – now and in the future. #portoffrederikshavn #portofopportunities #portexpansion #maritimeservices #cargo #ferrytraffic #greenrecycling #sustainability Frederikshavn Havn er i dag en af Danmarks mest betydningsfulde erhvervshavne. Havnen er blandt Danmarks 10 største havne og omfatter færgehavn, fragthavn, og en alsidig serviceindustri.  Det er en moderne erhvervshavn med central placering, gode faciliteter og et service-setup, der sikrer hurtig og effektiv håndtering af skibe og last. Havnen har en ambitiøs investeringsplan og en klar strategi om også i fremtiden at tilbyde de bedste faciliteter og maritim service i verdensklasse.

Name: Ulmatec Engine Solutions
HQ Location: Norway, Møre Og Romsdal, Fosnavåg, 10 Mjølstadnesvegen, 6092
Company description: Ulmatec Skipsservice foretar alt av overhaling, service og reparasjoner på hovedmotorer, hjelpemotorer og generatorer innen fiskeri, offshore, akvakultur, ferger og på landbaserte anlegg. Vi er autoriserte partnere på Caterpillar, Cummins og Mitsubishi, og våre erfarne mekanikere reiser både i innland og utland for å bistå kunden der de befinner seg. Vårt samarbeid med slike store aktører betyr at vi har et ekstra solid apparat i ryggen når vi skal holde dine maskiner i drift.

Name: Tunderman
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Dordrecht, 33 Van Leeuwenhoekweg, 3316
Company description: Tunderman is established in 1972 and since then, we have been providing our customers with daily services to and from the United Kingdom and Ireland with Europe mainland as our home base. Through the development of our business, we have grown into a privately owned company with two offices and warehouse facilities in both Rotterdam and Glasgow of 2000m2. Our Dutch office is based in Barendrecht, on an ample distance of the main ferry ports of Rotterdam. Our second office is based in Glasgow, Scotland, close to the motorways that connect the North and South of the United Kingdom. Tunderman Netherlands BV and Tunderman Scotland Ltd are part of the VBE Group. VBE Group is founded in 1974 and is a leader in the logistics industry through its various business units.

Name: Redwise - DCP BV
Company description: Deep Sea Pilots & Coastal Pilots The shipping lanes carrying global trade to- and from Europe’s main ports, come together and disperse at the entrance of the English Channel. This traffic is  funnelled into the Dover Strait from the North and the South. The narrow passage between France and the United Kingdom counts up to 500 shipping movements every day, ferries crossing the English channel not even taken into account.  Deep Sea Pilotage offers the best operational support and assistance for Masters, Officers, Owners and Shipmanagers to manage these risks in the dense North-European waters. With the extensive knowledge Deep Sea Pilots of Redwise – DCP, risks are brought down to an as low as reasonably practicable minimum. All Deep Sea Pilots of Redwise – DCP are highly experienced and certified. Vessel Traffic Services Deep Sea Pilots of Redwise – DCP are being deployed both voluntarily and mandatory in the capacity of Offshore VTS Pilots. A VTS Pilot can be placed on board pipe- and cable laying barges, offshore oil & gas platforms and survey vessels. With the knowledge and experience off navigating vessels through the North European waters, these experienced Pilots observe and guide the specific traffic safely in the vicinity of the projects. Observing the traffic around the projects 24/7, broadcasting safety information regularly and in-time intervention, prevents potentially dangerous situations. This provides added safety for the people working on projects, the environment and can prevent damage to materials, ships and structures. It significantly reduces the risk of down-time and major catastrophes. Information will be provided to the involved project management in close cooperation with the responsible authorities of the specific area

Name: Bakro International Transport B.V.
Company description: The main function of Bakro International Transport B.V. is to transport goods via the ferry in Rotterdam to the United Kingdom. With years of experience from our offices in Milton Keynes, Felixstowe and Spijkenisse, our knowledge is amply present to see us as specialists for transport to and from the United Kingdom.

Name: Irish Ferries
Company description: Irish Ferries is the market leading ferry operator to and from the Republic of Ireland and also on Dover – Calais, connecting Britain to the Continent.  We're a division of Irish Continental Group (ICG) plc (www.icg.ie).  Passenger & Tourism business at:     www.irishferries.com  Commercial & Freight business at:   www.irishferriesfreight.com [NOTE: Recruitment for positions onboard ships is handled by our partner Matrix Ship Management Ltd. Apply here for seagoing careers: https://matrixshipmanagement.com/app/seagoing-careers.php ]   Irish Ferries operates cruise and fast ferry services across 4 strategic RoRo routes between Ireland - Britain, Ireland - France and UK - France, catering for passengers, their vehicles and roll-on roll-off freight units. We also operate as a tour operator, selling package holidays in both the Irish and British markets. We measure our success through the quality of our service, as seen by our customers. Irish Ferries - Sea Travel Differently.

Name: Shannonferry Group Limited
Company description: Shannonferries saving you miles and miles. Cross the Shannon Estuary in just 20 minutes on the Wild Atlantic Way on the Killimer/Tarbert and save 85 miles (137 km) from ferry terminal to ferry terminal.  This is a lovely experience for visitors who would like a short break in their journey to relax as they sail across the majestic Shannon Estuary.  As the only vehicle ferry trip on the main spine of the Wild Atlantic Way, this invigorating journey allows you experience the rugged nature of land and sea as you breath in the fresh salty sea air that encapsulates Irelands Wild Atlantic Way.

Name: Green City Ferries
Company description: Green City Ferries (GCF) is a Stockholm based designer and integrator of innovative maritime technologies. Delivering complete solutions for cost-effective zero-emission high-speed commuter ferries. GCF is committed to speed up the transition to zero-emission waterborne mobility and our state-of-the-art ferry, the Beluga24, is a game changer for sustainable waterborne public transportation. The Beluga24 is a standardized zero-emission foil-supported carbon fiber catamaran, designed for comfortable high-speed operations. It is powered by either batteries or the newly developed hydrogen fuel cell system.

Name: Aboa Mare
HQ Location: Finland, Finland Proper, Turku, 21 Juhana Herttuan Puistokatu, 20100
Company description: Aboa Mare offers Bachelor and Master level education at Novia UAS and secondary education at Axxell vocational institute. We educate Sea Captains, Marine Engineers, Watchkeeping Officers and Watchkeeping Engineers. Aboa Mare Training Center offers a wide range of courses both for professional seafarers and leisure-time boaters. In order to be able to offer a wide range of courses and satisfy the requirements of our clients, we have a large network of experts on diverse fields within seafaring. Today we have several international customers and we have a close co-operation with Wärtsilä and ABB which give us the knowledge of training international crews. Aboa Mare is STCW audited by the Finnish Transport Safety Agency. Part of our education is audited by the DNV ISO 9001 standard. Aboa Mare offers training in safety at sea and environmentally sustainable development issues related to seafaring. We focus on providing simulator-based training for maritime students, shipping companies, authorities including pilots and sea rescuers as well as for leisure boating. In the simulations we use different shipmodels, e.g. large cruise ships, tankers and smaller archipelago ferries. The simulations are conducted on Finnish coastal areas and lakes as well as on the most heavily trafficked routes worldwide. The simulation resources consist of 9 simulator bridges, engine room simulators, VTS simulator, DP simulator and radio simulator. We can offer training on Consilium, Furuno, Wärtsilä, Transas and Sperry Marine bridges in our simulator. With the simulator interface we have developed we can generate technical faults to the real navigational instruments on the bridges.

Name: Ferry Easy
Company description: Een wandeling door een natuurgebied kan meer dan eens onderbroken worden door water. In veel gevallen is er dan een bemande voetveer om toeristen naar de overkant te brengen, maar dat komt steeds minder voor. Ferry Plan speelt hier op in en brengt u naar de overkant. Ferry Easy. Ferry Easy biedt uw passagiers (maximaal 12 voetgangers) een veilige en duurzame overtocht. Het minimalistische design van Ferry Easy, zorgt er tevens voor dat alleen noodzakelijke componenten op het voetveer aanwezig zijn. Hierdoor blijft Ferry Easy licht en dat bespaart weer energie. De stroom die Ferry Easy nodig heeft wordt opgewekt uit de zonnecellen op de overkapping. Daarnaast is Ferry Easy ook nog eens gemaakt van duurzaam aluminium. Aan wal staat aan iedere zijde een paal met een knop. De passagier drukt op de knop en Ferry Easy komt vanzelf naar de kant. De passagier stapt op het voetveer en vaart duurzaam en veilig naar de overkant. Volledig automatisch en zeer gemakkelijk. Het ontwerp van Ferry Easy zorgt er voor dat het voetveer onderhouds- en vandalismevrij is. Een camera aan boord zorgt mede voor de veiligheid van de passagiers.

Name: SEA-Tech Evolution Limited
Company description: Based in Ireland, SEA-Tech provides technical expertise to the Maritime and Agricultural Sectors. Highly specialised, we offer our clients tactical ICT consulting, technical professional services (integration), project management from inception to completion and technical support. Our solutions include primarily : Environmental data (IoT) with realtime delivery for weather stations and vision systems and any connected research scientific equipment. Wireless and cabled Marine data communication system providing:           • Seaport and Coastal high speed network wireless connectivity           • Self-contained, offshore private network (WMAN)           • Communications platforms for crews/passengers of visiting vessels.           • Bespoke applications e.g. boarding parties; naval operations; customs   Established in 2007, we have a reputation for excellence which has ensured our direct and continued involvement in a large number of public and private sector  projects. Our engineering power and consulting are the backbone of successfull projects. Dealing with top manufacturers like Lambrecht, Campbell Scientific, Davis Instruments, Orlaco, Hikvision, Mikrotik, Ubiquiti, PoE Texas and Victron we are also Rittal Ireland strategic partners for the marine industry in Ireland. Since 2013, SEA-Tech has developed its own cutting edge ship to shore data communication system. Able to hold a large bandwidth connection 15 nautical miles from the shore while a ship is evolving at top speeds, SeaFi solves a communication deficit for:           • Port authorities           • Naval Services & customs           • Commercial shipping & fishing           • Energy industry           • Ferry companies Since 2018, SeaFi holds the world record for the furthest maritime broadband transmission (no satellite or GSM) between a vessel offshore and a shore. This record was set to raise awareness on affordable alternative marine data-communication systems.

Name: Insail.
HQ Location: Spain, Canary Islands, Santa Cruz De Tenerife, 38000
Company description: — Regenerative Ocean Mobility — Rethinking maritime mobility for resilient islands and living oceans. InSail is a regenerative maritime initiative based in the Canary Islands. We design and co-develop wind-powered vessels and strategic frameworks to transform how island territories connect—reducing environmental pressure while enhancing local sovereignty, biodiversity protection, and climate resilience. Our work goes far beyond decarbonization: it’s about building mobility systems that respect ecosystems, empower communities, and regenerate what has been harmed. Our Strategic Axes: We collaborate with shipyards, ferry operators, energy actors and hotel groups to co-develop wind-powered and circular mobility solutions tailored to island territories—designed for sustainable operations, long-term durability, and deep local integration. We also support island governments, international agencies, and conservation organizations with regenerative maritime strategies—feasibility studies, transition roadmaps, and turnkey pilots—focused on ecological balance, energy sovereignty, and territorial resilience. Education & Citizen Engagement: We foster ocean awareness and public participation through educational programs, scientific outreach, and collaborative storytelling initiatives. 💡 A regenerative model for high-value marine and island ecosystems From the Canary Islands to global ocean territories, we deliver “Impact-as-a-Service” tools and vessels adapted to the challenges of fragile archipelagos—merging innovation, engineering, science, and long-term vision. Let’s sail differently. Respectfully. Together.

Name: European Permit Service BV

On top of our service to take care of exemptions and permits, we also take care of the efficient escort of exceptional transportations through all European countries, as well as crossings by Ferry. We understand very well the importance of timing. Our employees do everything within their reach to take care of your requests as fast as possible. Thanks to the many years of European experience, the concrete knowledge of the rules and legislation within those countries and the tight relationship with authorities and administrations, we enable solutions which cannot be realized by individual transporters. As such, we take away most of the burden from transportation companies and we, literally and figuratively assure the shortest track.

Name: Berger Maritiem
Company description: We are Berger Maritiem, a trading and consulting company who would like to provide you with practical and realistic advice by improving the sustainability of your ship or fleet. Thereby we strive to come up with sustainable solutions that not only lower the environmental footprint, but the ones that also lower the operational cost and finally contribute to a better competitive edge. Whereby we mainly focus on helping ship owners and shipping companies, which have often find it difficult to make space with in-house capacity, knowledge or expertise for greening their business. Since its foundation in 2012, we have carefully put together a comprehensive package of sustainable products and services with special focus on efficient propulsion and emission reduction. Within the maritime sector we are active in the seagoing market, short sea shipping, cruise shipping, fast ferries, offshore, inland waterway, dredging, fishing, navy, yachting and others. And besides having the knowledge and experience to make newly to built vessels more efficient and environmental friendly, it is our greatest passion to improve the efficiency and sustainability of the current fleet and especially giving the old ships a second life.  Please have a look around our website to see how we can be of help to you; read for example our business cases to learn more about our experiences. In case you would like to stay informed about our latest developments, we would like to ask you to follow Jeroen's personal LinkedIn channel (https://www.linkedin.com/in/jeroenberger89/).

Name: Reederei Hiddensee
HQ Location: Germany, Mecklenburg-vorpommern, Insel Hiddensee, 4 Achtern Diek, 18565
Company description: Reederei Hiddensee, a shipping company subsidiary of the Weiße Flotte, was founded in 1995 to operate all the regular services from Zingst, Wiek, Stralsund and Schaprode to the island of Hiddensee. Through the establishment of Reederei Hiddensee the area of operations of the Weiße Flotte expanded to include ferry services (Glewitz - Stahlbrode, Warnemünde - Hohe Düne, Wittow Nord - Wittow-Süd) and excursions on the Baltic Sea. Weiße Flotte and Reederei Hiddensee carry annually 3.4 million passengers and 846,000 vehicles. Modern passenger vessels of the "Boddenkreuzer" type, a cargo ferry as well as fast water taxis make up the fleet that connects the island of Hiddensee with the island of Rügen all year round. During the summer months, connections from Stralsund, Wiek and Zingst are offered additionally. New or modernised passenger/car vessels are deployed for ferry services in Warnemünde (Hohe Düne), Wittower Fähre (Rügen) and Stahlbrode/Glewitz (Rügen). A large program of harbor trips complete the services offered.  Reederei Hiddensee is one of the ventures of the FRS Förde Reederei Seetouristik, an internationally business group base in Northern Germany with a portfolio that comprises twenty-one subsidiaries located in Europe, North Africa and North America. In addition to numerous international ferry and catamaran lines, a ship-management company and the operation of a port complete the product range.

Name: Polar International AS
Company description: World leading manufacturer since 1938.   The company  Polar International AS is a Norwegian-owned company. Established in 1938 and a world market leader for the last 70 years both in research towards non-chemical water treatment and as a manufacturer of advanced water treatment equipment and systems for industrial and marine applications, intuitions and private homes.  Ready and able to help whenever our customer wants to avoid the many costly water related problems.   Polar International is represented in 12 countries around the world  Polar sails the seven seas and has been installed in more than 3000 ships owned by over 600 shipping companies. Polar sails the oceans of the world. On board every type of ship, from gigantic supertankers and luxury liners to small ferries. In brief, the Polar Water Treatment is represented, tested, and used by thousands of satisfied customers and installations world wide. Name: Danish Shipping
Company description: Danish Shipping is a business and employer organization for Danish shipping, which is Denmark's largest single export industry.   Danish Shipping was founded in 1884 and has since been a meeting point for the Danish shipping industry. Danish Shipping looks after the interests of the industry and acts as an employer organization for the members with registered ships under the Danish flag. Today, Danish Shipping plays an active role in relation to authorities and decision-makers both at home and internationally. In addition, Danish Shipping collaborates with international shipping organizations. The organization is therefore involved in all relevant contexts and has a permanent office in Brussels. In addition to its own members, Danish Shipping 's secretariat serves the ferry shipping companies, which is an industry organization for the Danish ferry companies.

Name: Exilator - For Greater Comfort And A Cleaner Tomorrow
Company description: Exilator designs and produces the award winning Exhaust Purification System "ExLencer" for the maritime industry. Through the unique design, which includes a built-in silencer, particle filter and NOx reduction catalyst, it eliminates black smoke, soot particles, diesel smell and oily water, while reducing NOx emissions and exhaust noise from engines and/or gensets by minimum 35 dB. The system is modular and can be fitted on boats, yachts, inland barges, coastal ships and ferries.   So if you want to ensure every journey is a first class experience - then upgrade today !  Give us a call + 45 60 54 17 57 or write to info@exilator.com

Name: Rederij Wadden Transport
Company description: Welcome to Rederij Wadden Transport! We operate an established maritime transport service with more than 35 years of experience in the Dutch Wadden Sea region. We sail primarily between the mainland port of Harlingen and two Wadden Sea islands, Terschelling and Vlieland. Our company distinguishes itself in its ability to plan and execute maritime transport in accordance with the specific requirements of our commercial clients. We react quickly to new developments, and are not afraid to face a challenge. In addition to our regular freight service we also enjoy providing a wide range of exceptional transport (extremely heavy or wide) services. We are well known throughout the region for our ability to transport heavy commerical cranes (+100 ton) without having to dismantel them before transport, and for moving mobile homes and prefab structures up to 10 meters wide to their island destinations. Our ferry m.s. Terschellinger Bank has 150 meters asfalt dek available for her customers with a 250 tons maximum load capacity. She is outfitted with her own freight ramps, allowing her additional mobility for the process of freight charging/discharging. As opposed to other commercial ferries currently operational in the Dutch Wadden Sea, the Terschellinger Bank can load or offload freight directly onto a pier in a commericial harbor. In addition, she is also fitted to dock at the same public loading bridges used by other ferries, and does so regularly.  What are we strong in?     - schip charters : 150 meter asphalt car deck, 250 ton maximum load per trip    - developers / contractors : transport scheduling in collaboration with your supervisors    - delayed return : we can if necessary schedule the ferry to hold at the island untill your project's completion     - hazardous substance transport : fuels, explosives, ammunition, fireworks    - heavy transport : maximum 32 ton per axle     - wide transport : maximum 10 meter

Only 20-25 minutes from Stavanger/Tananger/Dusavik. We want to get in touch with companies that need terminal and storage services. This is a unique opportunity for your company to get involved in a project that will support the future logistics needs of the region.

Name: ANEK LINES
Company description: H ANEK LINES είναι μέλος της Attica Group.  Λίγα λόγια για τον Όμιλο Αttica Ο Όμιλος Αttica με πολυετή παρουσία στις ελληνικές και διεθνείς θάλασσες, ηγείται του ελληνικού κλάδου επιβατηγού ναυτιλίας και αποτελεί έναν από τους κορυφαίους ναυτιλιακούς Ομίλους διεθνώς. Μέσω των δημοφιλών, εμπορικών σημάτων Superfast Ferries, Blue Star Ferries, Hellenic Seaways και ΑΝΕΚ Lines, με στόλο που αριθμεί πάνω από 40 πλοία και ανθρώπινο δυναμικό που ξεπερνά τους 2.500 εργαζομένους σε ξηρά και θάλασσα, συνδέει καθημερινά περισσότερους από 55 προορισμούς, προσφέροντας υψηλού επιπέδου μεταφορικές υπηρεσίες στην Ελλάδα και στις γραμμές εξωτερικού (Ελλάδα – Ιταλία). Τα τελευταία έτη, ο Όμιλος διευρύνει την παρουσία του στον τουριστικό τομέα, με την απόκτηση ξενοδοχειακών μονάδων στα νησιά της Τήνου (1) και της Νάξου (2) όπου δραστηριοποιείται, με στόχο την παροχή ολοκληρωμένων υπηρεσιών στους πελάτες του. Με σαφή δέσμευση για την ενσωμάτωση των αρχών της βιώσιμης ανάπτυξης σε όλο το φάσμα της επιχειρηματικής δραστηριότητας και των λειτουργιών της, η Attica Group αποτέλεσε την 1η εταιρεία στον κλάδο της επιβατηγού ναυτιλίας σε παγκόσμιο επίπεδο, που εξέδωσε Απολογισμό Υπεύθυνης και Βιώσιμης Ανάπτυξης το 2009, σύμφωνα με τις κατευθυντήριες οδηγίες GRI. 14 χρόνια μετά, η αξιολόγηση Standard & Poor’s Global Corporate Sustainability Assessment (CSA) 2023, κατατάσσει τον Όμιλο στο 25% των κορυφαίων εταιρειών παγκοσμίως για τον κλάδο Transportation Infrastructure.

Name: Navitalia.com

Company description: S E M P L I C I T A'  e  S I C U R E Z Z A ►  Navitalia è una piattaforma per prenotare traghetti in modo facile ed indipendente: attraverso pochi step guidati è possibile eseguire la prenotazione desiderata e procedere al pagamento  con carta di credito nella massima sicurezza (il nostro programma e-commerce è prodotto egestito dal Consorzio Triveneto). ►  Il nostro Booking on line è sempre attivo; in alternativa è possibile eseguire opzioni, prenotazioni o ricevere assistenza contattandoci . ►  Siamo una vetrina costantemente aggiornata che:      •  anticiperà le bellezze dei porti di partenza e di quelli di arrivo di tutte le Compagnie di Navigazione operanti nel Mediterraneo;      •  stuzzicherà la mente con allettanti pacchetti vacanze. C O M P E T E N Z A Da oltre 50 anni nel settore dei trasporti e dei tour operator internazionali e nazionali, abbiamo unito conoscenze e capacità di diverse generazioni, certi di poter offrire al pubblico un servizio altamente competitivo. A garanzia ci sono le ottime doti di problem solving che caratterizzano l'intero staff: il nostro capitale umano, con la sua esperienza, è ogni giorno al servizio del cliente per la sua massima soddisfazione. P A S S I O N E L'amore per il mare e la passione per le navi sono stati tramandati da padre a figlio dando vita all'Agenzia Marittima Maurino Shipping, raccomandataria della Compagnia Marittima Tirrenia di Navigazione, e al marchio Navitalia.com, dedicato alla biglietteria marittima passeggeri/merci ed ai viaggi. Questo amore e questa passione si fondono in un team che lavora con la consapevolezza e la gioia di svolgere uno dei lavori più belli al mondo. La richiesta di preventivo per una partenza è il primo passo per far viaggiare la mente oltre i confini del proprio campo visivo. Troveremo noi la migliore soluzione per trasformare il preventivo in una prenotazione. Non resta che preparare le valige...

Name: Harmelink Trucking & Transport
HQ Location: Netherlands, Overijssel, Hardenberg, 22 J. C. Kellerlaan, 7772
Company description: Harmelink Trucking & Transport is a trusted name in Europe for moving trailers and hangers. With a fleet of 20 powerful trucks, they specialize in one-way transport, ensuring quick and efficient deliveries across the continent. When a customer needs a trailer moved, the dedicated team jumps into action. They plan the best route, coordinating ferry crossings and road travel. As the trucks cruise along scenic roads, the drivers enjoy the beauty of the landscape, knowing they are connecting businesses and communities. Each journey is a promise kept, showcasing their commitment to excellence in transport.

Name: BilbaoPort
Company description: BilbaoPort is a leading multimodal logistics hub located in northern Spain, recognized as the fourth largest port in the country. The company facilitates the transportation of goods and passengers, handling an impressive annual traffic of 32 million tons of cargo and over 179,000 passengers. BilbaoPort's mission is to enhance maritime and intermodal transport services while embracing technological innovation and sustainability, exemplified by its collaboration with AllRead to automate access control and improve operational efficiency. The port serves a diverse clientele, including shipping companies, freight forwarders, and logistics providers, and offers a wide range of services, including shortsea shipping and ferry connections to the UK. With a commitment to continuous improvement and expansion, BilbaoPort is well-positioned to meet the evolving needs of the logistics industry.

Name: HMTA AB
Company description: HMTA offers flexible car transportation all over Sweden. We personally collect and deliver new cars, cars for reparation,  leasing cars, special transports and much more. We also offer a wide range of complementary services such as parking space and vehicle storage.  We assist car dealers who wishes to buy used cars from different parts of Sweden - we inspect the car on site and wait for the financial transaction and the change of ownership to be done before we transport the car to the new owner.  For our international customers we offer drop-off service at the ferry terminal, for further transportation abroad with our international transportation partners. Contact us and we will tell you more! info@hmta.se One booking- our system handles everything. Our intelligent logistic system automatically combines all sorts of transportations, from personal pick-up, onto a car carrier for longer distances, and final personal delivery to the customer. This way, you can just relax, feeling reassured that your car is on its way to you safe and secure. You tell us when and where - we collect and deliver your car to your perferred location.

Name: Thunship Ltd
Company description: Thunship Ltd is an independent Finnish shipping company specializing in brokerage of merchant vessels. Thunship Ltd was established in 1954 and is today one of the oldest Shipbroking companies in Finland.   Thunship Ltd offers professional and high integrity shipping services. In the shipping industry Thunship Ltd is well known as competitive Chartering and Sale & Purchase brokers of Roro-, Ropax/Ferry-, Container- and MPP/Coastal Vessels, with extensive knowledge of Ice-classed tonnage.   We aim to serve with first class performance leading us to be the preferred choice for our clients.

Name: Zeabuz
Company description: Zeabuz provides intelligent navigation solutions to the maritime industry, with flexible and modular software solutions built to integrate with any vessel. We launched the world’s first autonomous urban passenger ferries, and are now deploying solutions for intelligent self-sailing and remote supervisory control for conventional vessels. Our vision is to provide the experience of a thousand seafarers on every ship, enabling a future-proof maritime industry with energy efficient, safe and cost-effective operations.

Name: Hapag-Lloyd Cruises
Company description: Hapag-Lloyd Cruises gilt im deutschsprachigen Raum als führende Kreuzfahrtmarke im Luxus- und Expeditionsbereich. Zur Flotte gehören aktuell fünf Schiffe. Unsere Schiffe sind klein, individuell und herausragend in ihrer Klasse: Die weltweit besten Luxusschiffe EUROPA und EUROPA 2, die als einzige vom Berlitz Cruise Guide mit der Höchstnote 5-Sterne-Plus* ausgezeichnet sind, bilden zusammen die EUROPA-Klasse von Hapag-Lloyd Cruises. Sie steht für ein Reiseerlebnis auf höchstem Niveau mit hervorragender Servicekultur, vielfältiger Kulinarik und außergewöhnlichem Routing rund um die ganze Welt. Im Expeditionssegment sind wir mit drei modernen Schiffen auf Wachstumskurs: Die HANSEATIC nature und HANSEATIC inspiration, die ersten zwei der aus drei Schiffen bestehenden neuen Expeditionsklasse, sind 2019 in Dienst gestellt worden. Im Jahr 2021 vervollständigte die HANSEATIC spirit die Flotte. Die neue Expeditionsklasse verfügt über moderne Umwelttechnik wie SCR-Katalysatoren und ist für die Nutzung von Landstrom ausgestattet. Die höchste Eisklasse und ein niedriger Tiefgang ermöglichen sowohl Routen in die polaren Regionen Arktis und Antarktis, als auch in Warmwasser-Destinationen wie den Amazonas.

Name: NCL Bahamas Ltd.
Company description: NCL Bahamas Ltd. is a prominent cruise line company that specializes in offering unique and immersive travel experiences to some of the world's most sought-after destinations, particularly Hawaii and French Polynesia. With a mission to provide exceptional vacation experiences, NCL Bahamas Ltd. aims to create unforgettable memories for its guests through innovative itineraries and top-notch service. The company is recognized for its year-round cruises to Hawaii, featuring the only home-ported cruise ship in the region, allowing travelers to explore multiple islands in a single week. Its target market includes adventure-seeking travelers and families looking for a blend of relaxation and exploration in tropical paradises. NCL Bahamas Ltd. partners with various hotels and local attractions to enhance the overall travel experience, ensuring that clients enjoy a seamless journey from ship to shore.

Name: Norwegian Travel
Company description: Norwegian Travel is a premier provider of high-quality experiential tourism in Norway, specializing in a diverse range of activities that highlight the country's stunning natural landscapes and rich cultural heritage. The company operates year-round, offering unforgettable experiences that cater to both summer and winter enthusiasts. From exhilarating dog sledding and snowmobiling in the winter to serene kayaking and fjord cruises in the summer, Norwegian Travel ensures that adventure seekers and nature lovers alike can immerse themselves in the breathtaking beauty of Norway. With a mission to deliver authentic experiences, Norwegian Travel partners with local guides and activity centers, providing guests with expert knowledge and a genuine connection to the region's culture and wildlife. This collaboration not only enhances the quality of the experiences offered but also supports local communities and promotes sustainable tourism practices. The company is committed to environmental responsibility, utilizing electric transportation options and promoting eco-friendly practices throughout its operations. Norwegian Travel's target market includes adventure seekers, families, and cultural enthusiasts from both local and international backgrounds, all looking for memorable experiences in Norway's picturesque environments. The company’s offerings also include unique cultural encounters, such as interactions with the indigenous Sami people and their reindeer, further enriching the travel experience. With a user-friendly online booking system and a strong presence on social media, Norwegian Travel strives to inspire travelers to explore the majestic fjords, vibrant city life, and serene wilderness of Norway. By focusing on customer satisfaction and safety, Norwegian Travel aims to create lasting memories for its clients, making it an ideal choice for those seeking to discover the wonders of Northern Norway.

Name: Grupo Pullmantur
Company description: Grupo Pullmantur is a prominent cruise company that specializes in offering unique travel experiences across various destinations, including Denmark, the Caribbean, and the Mediterranean. With a mission to provide unforgettable journeys that blend cultural exploration with leisure, Pullmantur aims to showcase the beauty and diversity of the places it visits, such as the vibrant cities of Copenhagen and Aarhus. The company caters to a diverse clientele, including families, couples, and adventure seekers, who are looking for enriching travel experiences. Pullmantur partners with local tourism boards and service providers to enhance the travel experience, ensuring that guests enjoy a seamless and memorable journey. The company's vision is to be a leader in the cruise industry by delivering exceptional service and creating lasting memories for its passengers.

Name: Wilhelmsen group
Company description: Wilhelmsen Group is a leading player in the maritime industry with over 50 years of experience, specializing in ship management and a wide array of maritime services. The company is dedicated to shaping the future of the maritime sector by delivering exceptional customer experiences, with a strong emphasis on innovation, sustainability, and the continuous development of its workforce. Serving a diverse clientele that includes ship owners and operators across various sectors such as bulk carriers, cruise ships, and LNG carriers, Wilhelmsen ensures safe and efficient operations while adhering to international regulations. With a presence in over 70 countries and access to more than 2,200 ports, Wilhelmsen offers a comprehensive range of services and solutions that enhance the efficiency and safety of maritime operations. The company’s mission is to provide exceptional customer experiences through innovative solutions, while its vision is centered on driving sustainability and digitalization within the maritime sector. Recognizing that the dedication and expertise of its employees are central to its success, Wilhelmsen places significant importance on its workforce. The company is committed to fostering long-term partnerships and contributing positively to global trade and environmental stewardship. By leveraging its extensive distribution network and expertise in regulatory compliance, Wilhelmsen aims to reduce operational complexity for its partners, allowing them to focus on their core business. Additionally, through initiatives like the Motion Ventures Fund, Wilhelmsen actively invests in technological advancements that support decarbonization and operational efficiency, reinforcing its role as a catalyst for change in the maritime industry.

Name: Tallink Silja Oy
Company description: Tallink Silja Oy is a leading maritime transportation company based in Finland, specializing in passenger and cargo ferry services across the Baltic Sea. As a subsidiary of AS Tallink Grupp, the company operates a modern fleet of vessels that connect key destinations, including Finland, Sweden, Estonia, and Latvia. Tallink Silja Oy's mission is to deliver high-quality travel experiences while ensuring safety, reliability, and environmental sustainability in its operations. The company caters to a diverse clientele, including leisure travelers, business professionals, and freight customers, providing a range of services that encompass mini-cruises, ferry transport, and onboard amenities. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction, Tallink Silja Oy aims to enhance the travel experience through innovative solutions and comprehensive service offerings. The company collaborates with various partners in the tourism and hospitality sectors, including local hotels and attractions, to create memorable travel packages that appeal to both individual and corporate clients. Tallink Silja Oy is committed to sustainability, actively working to reduce its environmental impact through eco-friendly technologies and practices. The company serves millions of passengers annually, reflecting its significant market presence in the Northern Baltic Sea area. Tallink Silja Oy's vision is to be a market pioneer in Europe, continuously adapting to changing market demands while maintaining a competitive edge. By prioritizing safety, customer experience, and environmental responsibility, Tallink Silja Oy strives to foster cultural exchange and connectivity among the regions it serves, positioning itself as a leader in sustainable maritime transport.

Name: TUI Cruises
Company description: TUI Cruises is a prominent cruise line that specializes in offering unique and memorable travel experiences across various destinations, including the Bahamas and Western Europe. The company is dedicated to providing exceptional service and creating unforgettable moments for its clients, who primarily consist of leisure travelers seeking adventure and relaxation. TUI Cruises partners with local excursion providers to offer a diverse range of shore activities, such as snorkeling, cultural tours, and beach experiences, ensuring that guests can fully immerse themselves in the beauty and culture of each destination. With a mission to deliver high-quality cruise experiences, TUI Cruises aims to cater to a wide target market, including families, couples, and solo travelers looking for both relaxation and exploration. The company’s vision is to be a leader in the cruise industry by prioritizing customer satisfaction and sustainable tourism practices.

Name: EDreams ODIGEO S.A
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 35 Calle López De Hoyos, 28002
Company description: eDreams ODIGEO is one of the world's largest online travel companies and one of the largest European e-commerce businesses. Under its four leading online travel agency brands – eDreams, GO Voyages, Opodo, Travellink, and the metasearch engine Liligo – it offers the best deals in regular flights, low-cost airlines, hotels, cruises, car rental, dynamic packages, holiday packages and travel insurance to make travel easier, more accessible, and better value for the more than 18,5 million customers it serves across 43 markets. eDreams ODIGEO is listed in the Spanish Stock Market. Because we are growing rapidly globally, we are covering more and more regions. As a result, we are culturally diverse, with more than 65 different nationalities represented throughout the group. #WE FLY HIGH #WE SET THE PATH #WE JOURNEY TOGETHER #WE EXPLORE ... GROW AND DISCOVER!

Name: TIRRENIA - Compagnia Italiana Di Navigazione
Company description: Tirrenia, Moby e Toremar sono Compagnie del gruppo Onorato Armatori, leader del trasporto marittimo passeggeri e merci da cinque generazioni. Primo al mondo per numero di letti e primo in Europa per capacità passeggeri, il gruppo occupa fino a 4.000 dipendenti, tutti italiani, inclusi gli stagionali.  Con le tre compagnie, il gruppo Onorato collega Sardegna, Sicilia, Corsica e l' Arcipelago Toscano. Attraverso Moby Spl, il Gruppo opera nel Mar Baltico offrendo un servizio di crociere tra i porti di San Pietroburgo Helsinki, Stoccolma e Tallinn.

Name: Administração Do Porto De Lisboa
Company description: Administração Do Porto De Lisboa (APL) is the governing body responsible for the management and development of the Port of Lisbon, a key maritime hub in Portugal. The organization is dedicated to enhancing the port's operational efficiency while prioritizing sustainability and environmental stewardship. APL's mission is to align with the highest ecological standards in the maritime industry, as evidenced by its collaboration with luxury cruise lines like Explora Journeys, which emphasizes a commitment to reducing carbon footprints and promoting energy transition. The port serves a diverse clientele, including cruise operators, shipping companies, and tourism stakeholders, positioning itself as a premier destination for luxury cruises and contributing significantly to the local economy. Through strategic partnerships and a focus on innovation, APL aims to reinforce Lisbon's status as a leading port of call while fostering sustainable practices within the maritime sector.

Name: Lowland International
Company description: Drawing on over 30 years of experience and operating via an in-house network of ten offices worldwide, Lowland International offers tailor-made crewing solutions for all types of offshore vessels, merchant ships, and cruise ships.  Established in the Netherlands in 1993. We are your reliable partner, serving our clients working across time zones and continents. Proud of the positive feedback we receive from our clients, we continually improve our performance and enhance our tailored services to adapt to market needs, led by our core values based on respect, integrity, and drive.  Across the globe, whether you are a client or a seafarer looking for a job, Lowland is your trusted compass for success.

Name: Samer & Co. Shipping
Company description: Samer & Co.
