Shipping today is a leading company in shipping and forwarding, with over 600 employees and overseas companies in Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Hungary, Montenegro, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Turkiye.  Established back in 1919, it is headquartered in Trieste, whose port is known as the gateway to Europe, and offers services covering four business areas:  1. Ship agents & brokers for liner and tramp vessels, cruise ships, mega yachts, providing assistance to crew, vessel clearance, dry-docking operations, and acting as General Agents for the most important Mediterranean Sea Highway, connecting Europe and Turkey. 2. Port terminal operators in the Customs Free Port of Trieste, specializing in ro-ro vessels, intermodal trains, heavy lifts, project cargoes and reefer goods. 3. International freight forwarders: As FIATA and IATA agents, Samer provides turnkey solutions, from the sea/air/land freight, groupage, storage (general and reefer), to the door-to-door delivery, worldwide. It also specializes in heavy lifts and project cargoes, owns logistic warehouses and gives assistance as customs broker and providing cargo insurance.  4. Claims settling agents, Lloyd’s of London agents since 1932, P&I correspondents for the most prestigious clubs, performing surveys and inspections with own personnel.  P.I: IT00047110325

Name: Apollo Member Of DERTOUR Group
Company description: Apollo is one of the Nordic region’s leading travel agencies, with almost 300 employees and a million travellers annually. With us, customers can travel all over the world, regardless of whether they want a relaxing and sunny beachside holiday, a warm-weather fitness getaway, or a weekend in an exciting major city. We arrange travel packages, fitness trips, cruises and city trips. We also offer secure flight and hotel bookings separately for customers who prefer to assemble the trip themselves.  Apollo actively works for sustainable travel and social responsibility, and we collaborate with SOS Children’s Villages, Ecpat and the Swedish Olympic Committee (SOK). Apollo has been Travelife-certified since 2016. Read more at www.apollo.se  We are proud to be a member of DERTOUR Group, a leading international tourism company with over 100 years of history. DERTOUR Group encompasses 180+ companies across the world and employs around 13,000 international travel experts. The network includes around 20 tour operators, approximately 30 specialized travel providers, and about 2,000 travel agencies, serving millions of guests each year. For further information, visit www.dertour-group.com. Do you share our passion for travel, our feel for service, people and great travel experiences?  We are always looking for those who are bold enough to act in new ways and who are motivated by working together and with partners to fulfil our travellers' dreams. Come work for us or tell a friend! Look out for open opportunities in the Nordics or our travel destinations.

Name: NRV
Company description: NRV is a leading travel company based in the Netherlands, specializing in unique round trips and cruises to a diverse array of global destinations. Founded in 2006, NRV has established itself as the largest round trip specialist in the country, offering approximately 500 meticulously curated journeys to over 50 destinations worldwide, including Africa, Asia, Europe, the Middle East, and the Americas. The company's mission, encapsulated in its name "Nederland Reist Voordelig," is to provide travelers with the best value for their money, ensuring a balanced mix of cultural and natural experiences. NRV caters to a wide demographic, including families, groups, and individual travelers, offering various travel options such as group tours, private trips, and family vacations. With a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction and service, NRV partners with reputable cruise lines like Holland America Line, known for its exceptional service and diverse dining options, to enhance the travel experience. The company is dedicated to creating memorable journeys that combine adventure and relaxation, allowing travelers to immerse themselves in the rich biodiversity and culture of destinations like Panama, Costa Rica, and the Caribbean. NRV's target market primarily consists of Dutch-speaking travelers who seek both cultural exploration and leisure in their travels. In addition to its focus on providing unforgettable experiences, NRV is committed to promoting responsible tourism practices and minimizing the environmental impact of its cruises. The organization works closely with various partners, including hotels and excursion providers, to offer a wide range of accommodations and activities tailored to the desires of its clients. With over 15 years of experience in the travel industry, NRV continues to innovate and expand its offerings, ensuring that every journey begins with comfort and enjoyment while creating lasting memories for its clients.

Name: Costa Crociere
Company description: Costa Crociere is a leading cruise line that specializes in providing unique and immersive travel experiences across a variety of global destinations. With a mission to inspire travelers to "Live Your Wonder," the company focuses on delivering exceptional service and memorable adventures both at sea and on land. Costa Crociere caters to a diverse clientele, including families, honeymooners, and groups, offering tailored experiences that ensure accessibility and enjoyment for all. The company partners with local experts to create authentic excursions that enhance the travel experience, while also emphasizing safety and environmental responsibility. With a commitment to diversity and inclusion, Costa Crociere fosters a multicultural workforce that enriches the onboard experience for its passengers.

Name: Rolfs Flyg & Buss
Company description: With over 3 500 groups and serving 120 000 travellers per year Rolfs Flyg & Buss is the leading group tour operator in Sweden. Established in 1975 today we offer over 450 different itineraries all over the world. Main focus is cultural tours but also including cruises and active travel.

Name: D-reizen
Company description: D-reizen is a leading travel agency in the Netherlands, specializing in personalized travel planning services. Established in 2011 by Marc van Deursen, the company has grown to become the largest travel retailer in the country and a significant player in the European travel industry. With locations in Winterswijk, Kerkrade, Halsteren, and Winsum, D-reizen is dedicated to helping clients find their dream vacations, whether they are seeking sun holidays, cruises, or tailored round trips. The agency's mission is to provide a stress-free booking experience, offering a wide range of travel options while delivering expert advice and competitive pricing. D-reizen collaborates with various partners, including airlines and tour operators, to ensure the best deals and guarantees through recognized organizations like ANVR and SGR. The agency serves a diverse clientele, including leisure travelers looking for unique experiences, families seeking convenient holiday packages, and groups wanting memorable trips. With a strong emphasis on customer-centric service and innovation, D-reizen aims to exceed customer expectations by combining quality service with attractive offers. The company maintains a robust presence in both online and physical retail environments, reflecting its commitment to growth and market leadership. D-reizen is focused on enhancing the customer experience and has plans for further expansion and improvement in the future. Through its dedicated teams of experienced travel advisors, D-reizen continues to prioritize a personal touch in its services, ensuring that every client receives tailored support in planning their ideal getaway.

Name: Welcome Travel Group S.p.A.
Company description: Welcome Travel Group S.p.A. is a prominent player in the travel and tourism industry, specializing in providing comprehensive travel solutions that cater to a diverse clientele. The company is dedicated to enhancing the travel experience through a range of services, including vacation packages, cruises, and personalized travel assistance. With a mission to deliver exceptional customer service and memorable travel experiences, Welcome Travel Group aims to be a trusted partner for travelers seeking both adventure and relaxation. The company collaborates with various partners in the hospitality and transportation sectors, ensuring a seamless journey for its clients. Targeting both leisure and business travelers, Welcome Travel Group focuses on popular destinations, offering tailored packages that meet the unique needs of its customers.

Name: MYS
Company description: MYS is a Registered Yacht Agency providing 24/7 global assistance to Super Yachts. Founded in 2006 in Sanremo (Italy) with the mission to offer basic services to the yachts cruising in the Ligurian Mediterranean area, MYS has developed over the time to become one of the most reliable Worldwide Yacht Agents.  Today we count several offices in Italy, Monaco, Spain, USA & Bahamas, thus operating not only along the Med but also covering the entire Eastern Seaboard, the Caribbean, as well as Central and South America. MYS can support you for the entire duration of your cruise through only one  dedicated contact, ensuring you to take advantage from a global service, under the mission “Sailing above expectations”.

Name: DERTOUR Online GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Hesse, Frankfurt Am Main, 6 Emil-von-behring-straße, 60439
Company description: DERTOUR Online GmbH is a leading European tourism company dedicated to making travel dreams a reality. As a trusted partner for travelers, the company prioritizes safety, stability, and carefree vacation experiences, supported by a team of approximately 1,800 travel experts across over 400 DERTOUR travel agency locations in Germany. DERTOUR's mission is to provide personalized advice and exceptional service, ensuring that each client receives tailored travel solutions from a diverse range of offerings, including flights, cruises, and additional services from renowned tour operators. The company embraces an OmniChannel strategy to connect with customers through various communication channels while maintaining a strong focus on personal consultation. DERTOUR Online GmbH seeks passionate individuals to join its team, fostering a motivating work environment that encourages personal responsibility and success within the travel industry.

Name: Juniper Travel Technology
Company description: Juniper Travel Technology is a leading provider of innovative travel technology solutions tailored for online travel agencies (OTAs), destination management companies (DMCs), bedbanks, airlines, and cruise operators. With a strong global presence, the company serves over 550 clients across more than 50 countries, including regions in the Americas, Asia, the Middle East, Africa, and Europe. Juniper's mission is to empower travel businesses by offering cutting-edge technology that enhances operational efficiency and customer experience. The company partners with a diverse range of clients, from established DMCs like Journeys Travel & More in Brazil to rapidly growing firms like Touring International in Egypt, ensuring they have the tools necessary to thrive in the competitive travel industry. Juniper's commitment to quality and innovation positions it as a cornerstone in the travel technology landscape, driving the industry forward with its comprehensive solutions.

Name: CSMART - Center For Simulator Maritime Training
Company description: CSMART, Center for Simulator Maritime Training, is the international maritime training center of the Carnival Corporation & plc Group.  With its scale, technology and equipment, and training approach, CSMART is the most progressive maritime center of its kind in the world for training and continually improving industry-wide safety, sustainability and operational excellence.  CSMART's mission is to be a leader in developing and delivering the best professional training, and set the global standard in maritime training by: • Providing high quality maritime training services for industry-wide safety, sustainability and operational excellence  • Developing training courses that optimize learning and maximize cost-effectiveness  • Researching and developing training courses to meet the changing needs of the maritime industry  • Providing the latest relevant simulation and training equipment • Using stringent quality assurance criteria to determine concepts and procedures for training courses  In June 2018, CSMART Academy has been recognized as the world's first Center of Safety Excellence by DNV-GL, the world's leading classification society and a recognized advisor for the maritime industry. The CSMART Academy and corresponding CSMART hotel are both located at the Arison Maritime Center in Almere, The Netherlands. About Carnival Corporation & plc Group: Carnival Corporation & plc Group is the largest leisure travel company in the world, with 9 cruise brands worldwide consisting of: Carnival Cruise Line, Holland America Line, Princess Cruises, Seabourn, AIDA Cruises, Costa Cruises, Cunard, P&O Cruises Australia and P&O Cruises UK. Together, these brands operate 100+ ships visiting over 700 ports around the world and welcoming over 11.5 million guests annually.

Name: Norway Yacht Charter
Company description: Norway Yacht Charter specializes in providing unique sightseeing experiences through guided mini cruises in the picturesque Oslofjord. With a mission to preserve and share Norwegian maritime history and traditions, the company operates traditional sailing vessels that date back to the early to mid-20th century. Their innovative app, available in 13 languages, enhances the guest experience by offering information about the sights and historical context during the cruise. Targeting both local and international tourists, Norway Yacht Charter aims to create memorable experiences that combine education and leisure, allowing guests to explore iconic landmarks such as the Akershus Fortress and the Oslo Opera House. The company also collaborates with local attractions, encouraging visitors to extend their journey with ferry rides to Bygdøy, where they can discover museums and enjoy scenic beaches.

Name: SÜDWEST PRESSE + Hapag-Lloyd
Company description: The SÜDWEST PRESSE + Hapag-Lloyd travel agencies are your experienced travel provider and event agency for congresses and conferences. From reader trips to cruises to day or cultural trips, whether for business, in groups, or with family, we offer attractive travel deals of the highest quality at our locations in Ulm, Göppingen, and Düsseldorf. In addition, we develop specialized events for various companies, such as pharmaceutical clients, conduct exciting virtual events, and offer a variety of other event concepts. With our many years of experience and know-how, we cover a wide and high-quality range of services. Our employees bring the knowledge and requirements of the event sector, and the specialized departments ensure smooth execution within your event.

Name: Euvia Travel GmbH/sonnenklar.TV
Company description: Euvia Travel GmbH, operating under the brand sonnenklar.TV, is a leading travel shopping channel based in Munich, Germany, specializing in a comprehensive range of travel services, including flights, hotels, cruises, and vacation packages. With an impressive annual revenue exceeding 500 million euros, the company has established itself as the market leader among travel shopping channels worldwide, broadcasting live for 60 hours per week and reaching up to 2 million viewers daily. Euvia Travel's mission is to provide exceptional travel experiences while making travel accessible and enjoyable for everyone, offering competitive prices and a diverse selection of destinations. The company emphasizes customer satisfaction and reliability, ensuring that clients receive high-quality services tailored to their needs. Euvia Travel GmbH caters to a diverse clientele, including families, couples, and solo travelers, and collaborates with numerous partners in the travel industry, such as major cruise lines and hotel chains. The company has recently expanded its workforce by integrating employees from partner companies, enhancing its expertise and customer service capabilities. Euvia Travel is committed to sustainable tourism and social responsibility, supporting various charitable initiatives, including educational projects in developing countries through the Fly & Help foundation. With a focus on popular destinations like the Canary Islands, Turkey, and Greece, sonnenklar.TV aims to create memorable travel experiences that contribute positively to society. The company's vision is to be recognized as a leading provider in the travel industry by continuously offering innovative solutions and top-notch customer service. By combining modern technology with personalized service, Euvia Travel GmbH strives to deliver stress-free vacation experiences and attractive deals that meet the diverse needs of travelers.

Name: Carnival Maritime GmbH
Company description: Carnival Maritime: Where maritime excellence thrives!     We are a proud member of Carnival Corporation, responsible for the maritime operations of AIDA Cruises and Costa Crociere.    Founded in 2015, Carnival Maritime is dedicated to enhancing communication between ship and shore. We are committed to strengthening collaboration and cross-functional coordination with our brands.    Our Hamburg-based team comprises a diverse group of professionals with expertise in Marine and Technical operations, HESS, and Technical Procurement. Our employees create an open, rich, and vibrant working environment through their varied backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences.  As part of Carnival Corporation, we honour the integrity of every ocean we sail, embedding this commitment in everything we do. Anchored in safety, efficiency, and innovation, we empower our brands to meet the highest standards and deliver unforgettable journeys.

Name: Aarhus Havn - Port Of Aarhus
Company description: The port of Aarhus is an active trade area with approx. 150 companies, creating the basis for about 10,000 jobs. The port of Aarhus is Denmark’s largest container port, with a market share of about 60 per cent, and also Denmark’s largest public bulk port. This implies that a very large part of the consumer goods are imported to Denmark via the port of Aarhus. Also, a significant part of the Danish export is shipped via the fine-meshed network of shipping routes to all parts of the world. In addition, the port of Aarhus is an important ferry port, serving around 1,3 million cars and around 2,9 million passengers on an annual basis - plus an increasing number of cruise passengers.  You´ll find Port of Aarhus office at Vandvejen 7, 8000 Aarhus C.

Name: Hapag Lloyd
Company description: Hapag-Lloyd Reisebüro is a renowned travel agency with over 155 years of experience, dedicated to providing high-quality travel services characterized by trust, safety, and reliability. The agency specializes in offering personalized travel planning and expert advice, ensuring that clients receive the highest level of service tailored to their individual needs. With a mission to make travel dreams a reality, Hapag-Lloyd Reisebüro caters to a diverse clientele, including families, groups, and corporate travelers, focusing on creating memorable experiences across various destinations. The agency prides itself on its commitment to exceptional customer service, making it a preferred partner for those seeking both leisure and business travel solutions. Through its extensive network of partners, Hapag-Lloyd Reisebüro offers a wide range of travel options, from all-inclusive vacations to unique cruise experiences, ensuring that every traveler finds their perfect getaway.

Name: BSM Cruise Services
Company description: Bernhard Schulte is a leading, independent, family-owned shipping company with a proud 135 year history in the shipping industry. Headquartered in Hamburg, Germany, Bernhard Schulte has offices in 26 locations around the world and focuses on two core business areas, ship owning and ship management. The group owns about 100 vessels and manages about 600 ships through the employment of 18,000 seafarers and 2,000 shore staff.  BSM Cruise Services was formed to expand the Schulte Group’s service offerings to the cruise sector. The dedicated company was developed to meet the complex and unique requirements of the cruise market. Our experienced owner’s perspective combined with our ship management infrastructure and extensive value-added services will contribute to the successful and economic operation of your vessel. We provide tailor-made services to all our clients as per their requirements, ranging from newbuilding supervision to technical and crew management to software solutions.

Name: Tour America
Company description: Tour America: Travel Agency of the Year - Irish Travel Industry Awards. Tour America, a 100% Irish owned travel company, is celebrating 28 years in business next October.  During this time we have seen many changes in our industry from online bookings to world tragedies. We are proud to have stood the test of time thanks to our extremely dedicated team of travel experts and you, our loyal customers.  Tour America started up in the Managing Director sitting room with a team of 3 and we currently employ 50. Tour America not only offers holidays to North America but also cruises throughout the world with our Cruise Holidays brand.   Our Mission Statement is very clear, To Have a Raving Fan Club, and our team are willing and able to exceed all your holiday expectations. Our Vision is to be different, and provide you, our customer, with new and unique ways to enjoy your holiday.  We are the only Tour Operator or Travel Agent that offers a 24 hour service to all our clients. We are licensed and bonded by the commission of aviation which protects all our customers.  We are a member of the ITAA (the Irish Travel Agent Association).  Tour America have won Deloitte's Best Managed Company for the 12th consecutive year and in January 2021, our marketing team scooped up two prestigious marketing awards at the Irish Travel Industry Awards 2019, for Best Bricks and Mortar Marketing Campaign and Best Digital Marketing Campaign. Mary McKenna also scooped the TAB Excellence in Business Award 2019. This success follows on from a very successful previous few years.  Tour America is licensed by the Commission for Aviation Regulation, TA 0443.

Name: Cruise Port HaminaKotka
Company description: Cruise Port HaminaKotka is a key player in the maritime industry, providing comprehensive port services to facilitate cruise ship operations in Finland. The company is dedicated to enhancing the cruise experience by ensuring efficient traffic management and high-quality services for its clients, which include cruise lines and their passengers. With a mission to promote sustainable tourism and support the local economy, Cruise Port HaminaKotka aims to be a leading destination in the Baltic Sea region. The port collaborates with various partners, including local businesses and tourism organizations, to create a seamless and enjoyable experience for visitors. Targeting both international cruise operators and local tourism stakeholders, the company is committed to fostering growth and innovation in the cruise sector.

Name: Port Of Oslo
Company description: Port of Oslo is a leading maritime hub focused on facilitating sustainable shipping and transportation solutions. With a mission to achieve ambitious climate goals, the port is actively engaged in the green transition, particularly through initiatives like shore power for various vessels and the development of hydrogen as a clean fuel source. The port collaborates closely with major European ports, such as Rotterdam, to establish a green transport corridor aimed at reducing emissions in the Oslo Fjord and beyond. Key partners include shipping companies like Samskip, which is pioneering hydrogen-powered container ships for this corridor. Port of Oslo's target market includes international ferries, cruise ships, and local transport services, all while fostering innovation and regulatory support to enhance green transport solutions.

Name: SEASTEMA
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Genoa, 92r Viale Brigate Partigiane, 16129
Company description: Seastema, a global supplier of integrated marine automation & navigation technologies and provider of cutting edge integrated solutions for Naval Vessels, Cruise & Ferries and Yachts, is now fully integrated into Fincantieri NexTech to pursue the development of the next generation of Maritime & Defence Automation Technologies.  From the initial concept design through to system implementation and after-sales support, Fincantieri NexTech follows customers through the whole vessel life cycle.

Name: Legero International Group
Company description: With over 35 years of experience we as Legero offer tailor-made Global Logistic Solutions for the Marine, Geophysical and Offshore Industry.   OUR SOLUTIONS:   World Wide ship spares distribution management  Track & Trace  Sea & Air charters  Cruise liner assistance  Crew transportation  Special projects  Storage bonded & free  Consolidated road freight   Special truck delivery  Computerized stock control  Airfreight forwarding  Ocean freight forwarding  Custom & Insurance brokerage  Neutralizing and re-packing  Purchase assistance  Launches & Barges  Lubricant deliveries ( Bulk & packed )  Bunkering Why Choose our Company ? Besides Know-how and saving money.   •         No intervention of other parties which reduces both cost and handling errors •         Around-the-Clock service which makes us more flexible than most of our competitors •         Fixed rates leaving out the possibility of unpleasant surprises •         A partner handling the total logistic package with know-how and creativity •         Own trucks, barges and warehouse facilities •         Own Custom warehouse fully licensed to store bonded and community goods together •         IATA/CAS member enabling us to negotiate with the airlines directly

Name: Crewplanet
Company description: Crewplanet is an innovative manning agency that utilizes and implements modern IT solutions to deliver high efficiency and quality to both seafarers and clients. Our aim is to provide our clients with an ongoing consultancy on the market and offer most efficient course of action. After years on the market we became trusted and regional exclusive agent for several industry known companies representing: offshore, lpg, floating hotel, cruise, ferry, container, bulker, feeder, heavy lift, chemical and oil tonnage since 2003. Give us a call +31 103-007-119 or eMail at request@crewplanet.eu to save costs and get modern solutions for your HR challanges. Our strongest points: Own crewing software and strong IT competence 100 000 CVs & 16 000 daily visitors, the biggest maritime resource Owners of the largest Russian-speaking maritime forum Morehod.ru (1 000 000 annual users)  Real-time KPI trackers on majority of processes Providing candidates almost instantly Excellent track records: 1300+ TOP4 officers deployed during the last 5 years 92% tracked retention rate of the seafarers 70% of vacancies covered on the same day, 90% within 3 days Zero certificate mistakes due to automated control system Scope of services: Full or partial crew management Market and competitor analysis  Lump sum or cost plus fee Crew at request and 24/7 support line Payroll services for EU and non EU Also covering any other customer requirements

Name: Reisecenter Alltours GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Goch, 5-7 Am Steintor, 47574
Company description: Reisecenter Alltours GmbH is a dynamic travel company that offers a wide range of vacation options, including package holidays, last-minute trips, city breaks, and cruises. With a mission to turn travel dreams into reality, the company emphasizes personalized consultation and tailored solutions to meet the diverse needs of its clients. The corporate culture at Alltours fosters innovation, diversity, and teamwork, which is reflected in the passion and commitment of its employees. The company caters to a broad audience, including families, couples, and solo travelers, and collaborates with numerous renowned tour operators to provide a comprehensive selection of destinations and services. Reisecenter Alltours specializes in popular vacation spots such as Mallorca and Gran Canaria, offering various accommodations, from self-catering options to family-friendly hotels and adult-only resorts. By focusing on customer satisfaction, the company partners with various airlines and local service providers to ensure seamless travel experiences. Their target market consists of individuals seeking both relaxation and adventure in beautiful coastal settings. Ultimately, Reisecenter Alltours GmbH is dedicated to creating unforgettable holiday experiences and assisting clients in planning their ideal trips.

Name: Nauticad
Company description: Nauticad è una società di proprietà del Gruppo Trefin nata nel 1985. Eccellenza nella progettazione di scafo e impianti di tutti i tipi di nave, dai megayacht alle navi da crociera, fino alle portaerei, Nauticad coniuga l’esperienza nel naval design con il know-how in ambito software development.  Capace di offrire ai propri clienti soluzioni innovative in grado di rivoluzionare il settore, sia in fase di progetto che sul cantiere: tra i maggiori contributori dell’ingresso del naval nell’Industria 4.0, Nauticad oggi è partner affidabile ed esperto dei maggiori costruttori di navi mondiali.

Name: Simwave
Company description: Simwave is a company active in operating comprehensive maritime simulation training centres equipped with simulators based on world-leading simulation technology.  Our customers require training or assessing on simulators and do not choose to develop and maintain own in-house simulators for various reasons. By using our own naval architects and a team of 3D modellers, Simwave offer you facilities where you can use your own mathematical ship models in your own port-environment. Bring your own instructors, we take care of all technical, operational and hospitality support. Simwave centres are flexible centres, it adapts to your own corporate branding.  Our focus is not only on the navigation, engine and ship management related training but also on the emergency response training on board of cruise ships, such as advanced firefighting -and crowd control training. Because of the fast-growing technology, we have made it possible to integrate these applications.  Simwave operates global and independently and will fully relieve customers by running best-of-class facilities. It is a one stop shop for certified maritime training and we can offer the full scope of possibilities: hiring our facilities or a turnkey solution, all tailor made to your requirements and expectations. Your crew will love to train!

Name: ShibataFenderTeam
Company description: ShibataFenderTeam is a leading global manufacturer specializing in advanced fender systems designed to protect vessels and port infrastructure during berthing operations. With over 60 years of experience, the company is dedicated to delivering high-quality, safety-critical solutions that enhance operational efficiency and minimize liability risks for its clients. ShibataFenderTeam's mission is to support the maritime industry in its energy transition and sustainability efforts by providing innovative and environmentally responsible fender solutions that align with the latest PIANC guidelines. The company operates its own manufacturing facility in Germany, where skilled craftsmen utilize advanced techniques, such as heat lamination, to produce durable and reliable fender products. The company serves a diverse clientele, including major ports like Shannon Foynes in Ireland and the Port of Oakland in the USA, as well as offshore wind terminals in Poland, ferry operators, cruise lines, and oil and gas terminals. By partnering with engineers and port authorities, ShibataFenderTeam aims to deliver tailored solutions that enhance operational safety and efficiency while fostering a sustainable future for the maritime sector. Their holistic approach to fender design ensures that all elements of a fender system work together effectively, prioritizing safety and environmental responsibility. Through engineering excellence and value engineering, ShibataFenderTeam is committed to setting new standards in fender design and performance, making it a trusted partner in the global maritime industry.

Name: Klaipėdos Uostas/Port Of Klaipėda
HQ Location: Lithuania, Klaipėda County, Klaipėda, 24 J. Janonio Str., 92551
Company description: The Port of Klaipėda is the most important national transport hub. It connects the sea, land and railway routes, it serves as the gateway of the State of Lithuanian to the world. Klaipėda port is also a particularly important part of the Lithuanian economy, generating annual returns for every Lithuanian citizen and creating competitive conditions for business development. Continuous investment of the Port of Klaipėda Authority in development and modernisation of the port has brought it into the ranks of the most advanced and competitive ports. The Port of Klaipėda is directly connected with 70 countries worldwide. Klaipėda receives 6,000 ships each year, bringing in and out around 40 million tonnes of cargoes, and up to half a million tourists and passengers arrive to Lithuania by cruise and passenger ships.

Name: Autoridad Portuaria De La Bahía De Cádiz
Company description: El Puerto de Cádiz se encuentra formado por cuatro dársenas especializadas para el tráfico marítimo de contenedores, graneles sólidos y líquidos, transporte Ro-ro, escala de cruceros y pesca.

Name: Fred. Olsen Marine Services
Company description: Fred. Olsen Marine Services AS is a dynamic ship and project management company providing high quality services to our internal Clients.   The organisation has a history of innovation and long term value creation, with strong roots in the Norwegian maritime industry dating back to 1848. The Company is currently engaged in technical management and projects within offshore wind and cruise. For more information, please visit our website http://www.fredolsen-marine.com/

Name: Fjordline
Company description: Fjordline is a prominent cruise company that specializes in offering unique day trips between Kristiansand, Norway, and Hirtshals, Denmark, particularly during the festive season. The company aims to provide an unforgettable holiday experience at sea, combining relaxation, delightful dining, and entertainment for families and friends. With a focus on creating a magical atmosphere, Fjordline features a beautifully decorated ship where guests can enjoy a traditional Christmas buffet, shop for unique gifts, and participate in various onboard activities, including quizzes and live entertainment. The target market includes holiday travelers looking for a stress-free way to celebrate the season, as well as families seeking memorable experiences together. Fjordline partners with local suppliers to enhance the onboard offerings, ensuring a blend of Norwegian and Danish culinary delights. The company's mission is to deliver joy and festive spirit through exceptional service and memorable experiences on the water.

Name: Tallink Silja Line Sverige
Company description: Tallink Silja Line Sverige is a leading passenger shipping company operating in the Baltic Sea region, specializing in high-quality minicruises and transportation services between Estonia, Finland, Sweden, Latvia, Lithuania, and Germany. As a subsidiary of AS Tallink Grupp, the company is dedicated to enhancing regional connectivity and promoting tourism through its extensive ferry and cruise operations. With a mission to bring people closer together, Tallink Silja Line emphasizes sustainability and exceptional service, ensuring that every journey is not just about reaching a destination but creating lasting memories for its passengers. The company operates a modern fleet of 14 vessels, providing a range of services that include overnight cruises, passenger transport, and ro-ro cargo services. Tallink Silja Line caters to a diverse clientele, including leisure travelers, business professionals, and families, offering a variety of onboard experiences such as dining, shopping, and entertainment. The company also manages several hotels and restaurants, further enhancing the travel experience for its customers. Tallink Silja Line Sverige is committed to sustainability and aims to minimize its environmental impact through innovative practices and compliance with international regulations. The company actively engages in environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives, reflecting its dedication to corporate social responsibility. It collaborates with various partners, including travel agencies, local businesses, and tourism boards, to create a comprehensive travel ecosystem that benefits both customers and the broader community. With a successful loyalty program, Club One, boasting over 3.4 million members, Tallink Silja Line reinforces its commitment to customer satisfaction. The company targets environmentally conscious consumers and aims to integrate innovative technologies and sustainable practices into its operations. By prioritizing safety, efficiency, and enjoyable travel options, Tallink Silja Line Sverige strives to be synonymous with quality, reliability, and innovation in the maritime industry, making it the preferred choice for ferry and cruise services in the Baltic Sea region.

Name: SAB-TOURS Reisebüro Und Autobusbetrieb Gesellschaft M.b.H.
Company description: Starten Sie mit sabtours in Ihren Urlaub! Wir bieten, Rundreisen, Flugreisen, Kreuzfahrten, Kunst- und Austellungsreisen, Gartenreisen und vieles mehr...

Name: Luise Group
Company description: The Luise Family, since 1847, is a leader in the yachting industry, the result of combining the extensive professional experience of both J.Luise & Sons Ltd and Luise International Srl. This has created a single point of reference in Italy for owners, captains, management companies, charter brokers and all other entities involved in the yachting business. Luise Group’s most important feature is that it offers a complete and all-encompassing assistance throughout the yachting cruise, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and provides a wide range of services to customers (shorebased as well as onboard) in a timely and efficient manner.

Name: Eckerö Line
Company description: Rederi Ab Eckerö -konserniin kuuluva Eckerö Line Ab Oy on kotimainen laivayhtiö, joka tarjoaa matka- ja rahtipalveluita Tallinnan ja Helsingin välisessä säännöllisessä reitti-, risteily- ja rahtiliikenteessä. Eckerö Linen molemmat laivat m/s Finlandia ja Finbo Cargo liikennöivät Helsinki–Tallinna-reitillä Suomen lipun alla. Eckerö Linellä on myös oikeus käyttää suomalaisesta palvelusta viestivää Avainlippu-tunnusta. Yhtiö tarjoaa päivässä kymmenen lähtöä ja vastaa myös päivän ensimmäisestä yhteydestä Tallinnasta Helsinkiin. Eckerö Linella on yhteensä yli 40 hotellikumppania Virossa ja Suomessa, ja se operoi merkittävän osan Helsingin ja Tallinnan välisestä rahtiyhteydestä. Lisätietoja www.eckeroline.fi

Name: Reisebüro TUI Reisecenter
Company description: Reisebüro TUI Reisecenter ist ein engagierter Anbieter von Urlaubsreisen, der eine breite Palette an Reiseoptionen für verschiedene Zielgruppen anbietet. Das Unternehmen spezialisiert sich auf Last-Minute-Angebote, Pauschalreisen, Cluburlaube und Familienurlaube, wobei es Reisen zu attraktiven Preisen, einschließlich Angeboten bis zu 299 Euro, bereitstellt. Mit einem Fokus auf Kundenservice und persönliche Beratung strebt das Reisebüro danach, jedem Reisenden ein unvergessliches Urlaubserlebnis zu ermöglichen. Die Zielgruppe umfasst sowohl Familien als auch Einzelreisende, die nach Erholung und Abenteuer suchen, und die Partnerschaften mit renommierten Hotelketten wie allsun Hotels sowie Kreuzfahrtanbietern wie AIDA und TUI Cruises erweitern das Angebot. Das Reisebüro bietet zudem umfassende Dienstleistungen wie Flugbuchungen, Mietwagen, Ferienhäuser und Reiseversicherungen an, um den Bedürfnissen seiner Kunden gerecht zu werden.

Name: Torqeedo
Company description: Torqeedo is a leading provider of electric propulsion systems for boats, specializing in innovative and sustainable solutions that enhance the boating experience while minimizing environmental impact. The company's mission is to revolutionize marine mobility by offering high-performance electric motors, batteries, and charging equipment that cater to both recreational and commercial markets. Torqeedo's products, such as the Cruise models and Power 485000 systems, are designed for efficiency and ease of use, featuring integrated displays and Bluetooth connectivity for real-time monitoring. The company serves a diverse clientele, including boat manufacturers, marine enthusiasts, and eco-conscious consumers, and partners with various stakeholders in the marine industry to promote sustainable boating practices. With a commitment to quality and innovation, Torqeedo aims to lead the transition to electric propulsion in the maritime sector.

Name: Riccardo Sanges & C.
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, Trapani, 19 Via Libica Primo Piano Int.1, 91100
Company description: La società Riccardo Sanges & c. è stata fondata nel 1929.  Da quella data Riccardo Sanges & c. esercita la propria attività d’impresa nel territorio nazionale e internazionale. Riccardo Sanges & c. S.r.l. svolge oggi fondamentalmente due tipi di attività d’impresa.  Una commerciale riguardante il commercio degli idrocarburi ed una industriale e di servizi legata all’industria marittima, portuale e dei trasporti. Più nel dettaglio con riferimento all’attività commerciale Riccardo Sanges & c. è concessionaria “Eni gas gpl” per le provincie di Trapani ed Agrigento ed anche concessionaria “ENI fuel” con la gestione diretta di 5 impianti nel porto e nella città di Trapani. Con riferimento invece all’attività industriale e di servizi Riccardo Sanges & c. è impresa portuale autorizzata (terminal operator) per lo sbarco, imbarco e movimentazione di merci nei porti di Trapani e Mazara del Vallo. Riccardo Sanges & c., inoltre, sin dal 1929 esercita l’attività di agenzia marittima, broker marittimo, spedizioniere e doganalista con ormai una consolidata presenza in tutti i porti del territorio nazionale. Infine attraverso l’insegna “Panfalone viaggi”, Riccardo Sanges & c. dal 1990 opera con l’attività di agenzia di viaggi e turismo e di tour operator. Nell’ambito di queste ultime attività d’impresa, recentemente si è acquisita un’interessante specializzazione nelle escursioni riguardanti le navi crociere.

Name: Norac AS
Company description: Norac AS manufacture quality fire rated walls, ceilings, doors, prefabricated wet units, glazed partitions and doors, floating floors and windows for use on board cruise ships, ferries, commercial vessels and offshore installations. Norac AS offers a “one-stop shop” for interior systems with cost effective solutions at competitive prices.

Name: CZECHOSLOVAK OCEAN SHIPPING S.r.o.
Company description: CZECHOSLOVAK OCEAN SHIPPING, s.r.o. was founded in 1999 as a maritime and shipping company that builds on the maritime traditions of its predecessor (Československá námořní plavba), in order to utilize and further develop maritime business in our country. The company later became the founder of the CZECHOSLOVAK OCEAN SHIPPING GROUP.

Name: Ticket Feriereiser AS
Company description: Ticket Feriereiser AS is the largest travel agency chain in the Nordic region, offering a comprehensive range of travel services through physical stores, phone sales, and online platforms. The company collaborates with leading charter companies, travel organizers, cruise lines, airlines, hotels, and car rental services, providing customers with access to over 400 travel options. With 68 stores across Norway and Sweden and online sales in ten countries under the brands Ticket, AirnGo, and Charter, Ticket aims to deliver exceptional travel experiences. Owned by the investment company Braganza, Ticket Feriereiser is committed to an omnichannel strategy that combines personalized service with the convenience of online booking. The company targets a diverse clientele, including families, young travelers, and adventure seekers, while continuously adapting to market trends and customer preferences.

Name: Dreamlines GmbH
Company description: Dreamlines GmbH ist ein führendes Unternehmen im Bereich Kreuzfahrten, das seinen Kunden eine breite Palette an Reiseangeboten und Dienstleistungen bietet. Mit einem Fokus auf unvergessliche Erlebnisse am Wasser, ermöglicht Dreamlines die Buchung von Kreuzfahrten zu traumhaften Zielen wie dem Great Barrier Reef und anderen beliebten Reisezielen in Australien und darüber hinaus. Die Mission des Unternehmens ist es, Reisenden eine stressfreie Planung und Buchung ihrer Kreuzfahrten zu ermöglichen, während die Vision darin besteht, als vertrauenswürdiger Partner in der Kreuzfahrtbranche anerkannt zu werden. Dreamlines arbeitet eng mit renommierten Reedereien wie Princess Cruises und Celebrity Cruises zusammen, um seinen Kunden exklusive Angebote und erstklassigen Service zu bieten. Die Zielgruppe umfasst sowohl erfahrene Kreuzfahrer als auch Neulinge, die die Schönheit und Vielfalt von Kreuzfahrten entdecken möchten.

Name: Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A.
Company description: Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A. was founded in 1997 by the Venice Port Authority in order to manage and improve cruise traffic in the Port of Venice. The Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A.  operates in the Marittima and S. Basilio areas which stretch over a surface altogether of more than 244.000 sq. m. of which the Terminals occupy  53.000 sq. m. The maritime basin in the Marittima area measures circa 123.700 sq.m.   The shareholders of Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A. are the following: APV Investimenti S.p.A., Finpax S.r.l., SAVE S.p.A. (Venice Marco Polo Airport), Veneto Sviluppo S.p.A., the Venice Chamber of Commerce  and the Venice Municipality. In addition Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A. is the majority shareholder of two specialized companies: Venice Yacht Pier S.r.l. (V.Y.P.) founded to increase yachting in Venice and Venice Yachts and Ship Assistance (V.Y.S.A.) dedicated to the promotion of services for the maxi-yachts market. The growing needs of cruise traffic and Venice's appeal as a cultural and tourist attraction have given rise to the radical transformation of the Port area starting from 1997 as a result of the joint effort of Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A. and the Venice Port Authority. Such transformation is exemplified by the renovation of ancient port buildings once dedicated to the commercial traffic, which have now become modern and multi-purpose facilities. Venezia Terminal Passeggeri S.p.A.'s port facilities cater the needs of any ship berthing in Venice.  ·          The Ferry Terminal 123 assists ferries for the Eastern Mediterranean area  ·          The S. Basilio Terminal accommodates medium-size cruise ships, mega-yachts and high speed hydrofoils  ·          Cruise Terminals 103, 107/108, 117 and Terminal Isonzo in the Marittima area are multi-purpose facilities which, additionally to their original purpose, are utilised for hosting meetings, conventions and fairs.

Name: John Ripard & Son Ltd
HQ Location: Malta, Il-belt Valletta, Valletta, 22 Lascaris Wharf
Company description: John Ripard & Son Ltd was established in Malta in 1901 acting as general passenger and cargo agent for Prince Line Ltd. During the 20th century we evolved as one of Malta's leading ship agents and in the mid 1970's, as agents for Manchester Liners, we were the first ship agent in Malta to introduce containerisation. Through investments, acquisitions, mergers and today is invested in ship agency, ship operating, container feedering, regional liner services, container m & r depot, worldwide forwarding, cruise liner husbanding, groupage & warehousing handling. The group is made up of a multitude of different companies but the essence of our success is belief and investment in our people, our information systems and our relentless focus on our customers.

Name: Costa Crociere S.p.A.
Company description: Costa Crociere S.p.A. is a leading cruise company renowned for delivering unforgettable travel experiences across the seas, particularly in the Mediterranean and Northern Europe. The company is dedicated to its mission of bringing happiness and creating lasting memories for its guests, which is reflected in its exceptional service and diverse itineraries. With a modern fleet of cruise ships, Costa offers a wide range of travel options that cater to various markets, including families, couples, and adventure seekers.  Costa Crociere fosters a diverse community of over 20,000 employees from 70 different countries, emphasizing the importance of human connections and cultural collaboration. This commitment to inclusivity and sustainability is deeply embedded in the company's corporate culture and initiatives, ensuring that every journey is enjoyable and responsible. The company partners with various travel agencies and tourism boards to enhance its offerings, making it a preferred choice for travelers seeking unique maritime adventures. Targeting a market that values exploration and leisure, Costa Crociere highlights the beauty of cultural and natural landscapes, appealing to those who seek both adventure and relaxation at sea. Through its innovative approach and dedication to customer satisfaction, Costa Crociere S.p.A. continues to solidify its position as a leader in the cruise industry, committed to providing enriching journeys that create unforgettable moments for its guests.

Name: Donau Touristik
Company description: Donau Touristik is a premier travel company specializing in unique cycling holidays and river cruises along the picturesque Danube River. With a mission to provide unforgettable travel experiences, the company focuses on creating stylish and memorable journeys for its clients, including solo travelers and groups. Donau Touristik offers exclusive benefits such as single cabins for solo travelers and group discounts, making it an attractive choice for diverse clientele. The company partners with high-quality accommodations, like the Palace Hotel Città, ensuring guests enjoy comfort and excellent service during their adventures. Targeting nature enthusiasts and culture seekers, Donau Touristik aims to connect travelers with the stunning landscapes and rich history of the regions they explore.

Name: MUNDO MARINO CATAMARANS
HQ Location: Spain, Valencia, Denia, 17-i Calle Del Templo De San Telmo, 03700
Company description: Turismo náutico sostenible y accesible en el Mediterráneo En Mundo Marino somos líderes en experiencias marítimas únicas desde los principales puertos del Mediterráneo: Valencia, Gandía, Dénia, Jávea, Calpe, Altea y Málaga. Nuestra flota de modernos catamaranes de vela y motor, junto con embarcaciones especializadas (barcos con fondo de cristal, lanchas rápidas, parasailing, hidrofoils…), nos permite ofrecer desde paseos relajantes hasta actividades llenas de adrenalina. Organizamos excursiones para particulares, familias y grupos, así como eventos a medida para empresas e instituciones: bodas, team building, celebraciones privadas y actividades educativas. Comprometidos con la sostenibilidad, la inclusión y la innovación, trabajamos cada día para acercar el mar a todas las personas y promover un turismo responsable que protege nuestros ecosistemas marinos. ⸻ 🌍 English Sustainable and Accessible Nautical Tourism in the Mediterranean At Mundo Marino, we are leaders in creating unforgettable maritime experiences from the main Mediterranean ports: Valencia, Gandía, Dénia, Jávea, Calpe, Altea, and Málaga. Our fleet of modern sailing and motor catamarans, together with specialized vessels (glass-bottom boats, speedboats, parasailing, hydrofoils…), allows us to offer everything from relaxing cruises to thrilling adventures. We design excursions for individuals, families, and groups, as well as tailor-made events for companies and institutions: weddings, team-building activities, private celebrations, and educational programs. With a strong commitment to sustainability, accessibility, and innovation, we bring people closer to the sea while promoting responsible tourism that protects our marine ecosystems.

Name: Ultramar Transport
Company description: Ultramar Transport: No. 1 in tourist services. Ultramar Transport is the first Spanish company specializing in discretionary transportation and tourism services, and currently manages the transport of 10% of tourists visiting Spain each year. Ultramar Transport offers to major national and international tourism industry operators a wide range of specialized services in the sector: transfers, excursions, ground transportation services for cruises, tours, transportation to the MICE sector, and tailor made solutions for Golf holidays. Ultramar Transport currently has a fleet of over 180 vehicles with an average age of 3.5 years and a staff of over 400 professionals who provide comprehensive transport services operating from their 8 available bases in the main tourist destinations: Mallorca, Costa del Sol, Costa Blanca, Costa de la Luz, Gran Canaria, Tenerife, Fuerteventura and Lanzarote.  This logistical capacity is reinforced with five operational sub-offices in Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Sevilla and Almeria, and a broad network of partners that extend the geographical coverage throughout the country.

Name: Albatros Expeditions
Company description: Welcome to small expedition cruising with Albatros Expeditions. We are part of the Albatros Travel Group and are still a family-owned business today. Albatros Expeditions is a market leader in our home country Denmark, but also in China and Singapore, with top 3 market positions in Sweden, Finland, Norway, Poland, and Japan, and a growing presence in Australia, the UK, and the US.  Next to operating expedition cruise vessels, we also own and operate accommodations, sightseeing boats, kayak centers, activity centers, and a DMC in Greenland, adding to our Arctic expertise.  Outside Scandinavia, we only sell BtoB via a network of travel professionals. If you want to join our network of partners globally, email us at sales@albatros-expeditions.com and sign up for our travel agent newsletter for more information https://albatros-expeditions.com/newsletter

Name: DERPART Reisevertrieb GmbH
Company description: DERPART Reisevertrieb GmbH ist eine der führenden Reisevertriebsorganisationen in Deutschland, die ein starkes Franchise-System mit rund 290 Reisebüros und 60 Business Travel Agenturen bildet. Das Unternehmen hat sich der Mission verschrieben, seinen Franchise-Nehmern als vertrauensvoller Partner zur Seite zu stehen, um deren unternehmerische Ziele zu erreichen, während sie ihre Individualität und Freiheit bewahren. DERPART bietet ein umfangreiches Leistungspaket, das Marketing, IT, Weiterbildung und Unterstützung im Shop-Konzept umfasst, um den Partnern zu helfen, ihre Erfolgspotenziale zu maximieren. Die Zielgruppe des Unternehmens umfasst sowohl private Reisende als auch Geschäftsreisende, wobei die Agenturen maßgeschneiderte Lösungen für verschiedene Reisebedürfnisse anbieten. Als Teil der DERTOUR Group, die zur REWE Group gehört, profitiert DERPART von einer starken Markenbekanntheit und umfangreichen Ressourcen, die es den Partnern ermöglichen, in einem wettbewerbsintensiven Markt erfolgreich zu sein. Das Unternehmen bietet eine breite Palette an Reiseleistungen, darunter Urlaubsreisen, Geschäftsreisen, Kreuzfahrten und Gruppenreisen. Mit einer starken Ausrichtung auf Kundenservice und individuelle Beratung hat sich DERPART als vertrauenswürdiger Partner für Reisende etabliert.  Die Mission von DERPART ist es, unvergessliche Reiseerlebnisse zu schaffen, indem sie ihren Kunden maßgeschneiderte Lösungen und erstklassigen Service bieten. Um dies zu erreichen, arbeitet das Unternehmen eng mit renommierten Fluggesellschaften, Hotels und Reiseveranstaltern zusammen, um seinen Kunden die besten Angebote und Reiseerlebnisse zu garantieren. DERPART richtet sich an ein breites Publikum, von Familien über Geschäftsreisende bis hin zu Gruppen, und ist gut positioniert, um den wachsenden Anforderungen des Reisemarktes gerecht zu werden. Mit mehreren Standorten und einem engagierten Team von Experten ist DERPART bereit, die Zukunft des Reisens aktiv mitzugestalten.

Name: SALÉN SHIP MANAGEMENT AB
HQ Location: Sweden, Västra Götaland, Göteborg, 52 Östra Hamngatan, 411 09
Company description: Expert Management of Small Expedition Cruise Ships

Name: Birka Cruises
Company description: Birka Cruises erbjuder skärgårdsinspirerade kryssningsupplevelser sedan 1971. Rederiet kryssar alla dagar i veckan från Stockholm via Mariehamn med kryssningsfartyget M/S Birka. Sommartid görs dessutom långkryssningar till utvalda destinationer runt Östersjön. Kryssningsverksamheten är miljöcertifierad enligt ISO14001. Mer information finns på birka.se  Birka Cruises ingår i Eckerökoncernen med 1 350 anställda och en årsomsättning på 240 miljoner euro.  För koncerninformation, se www.rederiabeckero.ax

Name: MARTEC MARINE S.P.A
Company description: MARTEC MARINE is part of an Italian privately owned Group active in the Defense and Integrated Safety solutions for Navy, Cruise ships and Mega Yachts since 1994. From the early beginning of its activities Martec has deeply invested in the design and development of safety systems, being awarded, at present, as one of the most skilled companies in an international context, in this field. More than 12 Navy ships and more than 80 Cruise liners and Mega Yachts have Martec Damage Control Systems installed. Product range vary from hardware (Damage Control Systems, Electronic Incident Board, Fire Detection System, Emergency Shutdown System, Automatic Fire Sensing and Suppression System) to software packages (Damage Control, Decision Support, On Board Stability, Personnel Tracking, Security and Technical Patrol Management, Injured Treatment). Innovation, Integration and Flexibility are the key words for MARTEC: development of new solutions based on customer requirements, integration with third parties’ Ship Automation Systems and any type of safety subsystems, flexibility to implement any customization are our strength. All native MARTEC Systems are designed for integration in a Total Safety concept. Software packages are designed to present all different subsystem (regardless of the manufacturer) through a unique Vectorial Man Machine Interface, with zoom, pan and touch screen features. Software modules can be provided with the hardware or embedded in the Automation software. On-board safety centers, remote control shore safety centers as well as shore based simulation and training rooms complete the range of solutions. The Group organization include 2 branch offices in Italy for Italian Navy and 1 subsidiary in the US for customer support, 1 R&D branch office in Italy, a Software House and a Hardware Design and Production company.

Name: Confitarma - Confederazione Italiana Armatori
Company description: CONFITARMA Raggruppa imprese di navigazione e gruppi armatoriali italiani  che operano in tutti i settori del trasporto merci e passeggeri, nelle crociere  e nei servizi ausiliari dei traffici. Promuove lo sviluppo della marina mercantile italiana, nel quadro di una politica che valorizzi il trasporto marittimo. Tutela le imprese armatoriali nazionali nei rapporti con le istituzioni e le amministrazioni, nonché con le organizzazioni economiche, politiche, sociali e sindacali a livello nazionale, comunitario e internazionale. Stipula accordi in ambito sindacale ed economico, nonché contratti collettivi di lavoro.

Name: Swan Hellenic Limited
Company description: Iconic 70 year old British cultural and expedition cruise brand is proud to return to the world’s waters with two brand new expedition ships.

Name: ALOSCHI BROS.
Company description: Aloschi Bros, founded in 1932 by Adolfo and Alessandro Aloschi, is a leading tour operator in Italy, specializing in providing comprehensive travel services tailored to the needs of tourists. With over 90 years of experience, the company has established itself as a pioneer in the tourism industry, offering a wide range of services including luxury transfers, authentic excursions, and cruise-related programs across more than 100 destinations in Italy. The third generation of the Aloschi family continues to expand the business, which now encompasses multiple brands and serves over 500,000 international tourists annually. Aloschi Bros is dedicated to enhancing the travel experience by personalizing vacations and ensuring high-quality service, making it a trusted partner for both travelers and cruise lines alike.

Name: Eckerö Linjen
Company description: Eckerö Linjen operates car ferry services between Eckerö and Grisslehamn on board the M/S Eckerö.  We market all sorts of Åland tourism products under the Eckerö Linjen brand via our sales departments in Grisslehamn, Mariehamn and Eckerö – everything from simple overnight accommodation to various package trips, group trips, sporting holidays and conferences.  Eckerö Linjen is one of five subsidiaries owned by Rederiaktiebolaget Eckerö. The company was founded on March 2, 1961 to operate car ferry services between Sweden, Finland and Åland. Today the Group encompasses five business units: Eckerö Linjen, Eckerö Line, Birka Cruises, Eckerö Shipping and Williams Buss.

Name: MARINE HVAC DESIGN
Company description: MARINE HVAC DESIGN offers over 30 years’ experience in the design of HVAC systems for all types of vessel across the entire spectrum of maritime sectors. Dedicated & Independent As a dedicated service provider, independent of any equipment suppliers, we specialise in the delivery of efficiency, custom-made solutions based entirely on our clients’ requirements.  Track Record Our track record speaks for itself. We are very proud of our work on prestigious projects across the industry and notably in the defence & security and cruise sectors – where strong performance is demanded.  Flexible support across the lifecycle of a vessel Our scope of work covers the design of HVAC systems for both newbuild vessels and refit and conversion projects. We provide flexible support for any phase of a design, engineering or installation process.  Consultancy We are able to assess third party designs, carry out surveys & inspections, provide a network of suppliers and offer a detailed breakdown of price.  MARINE HVAC DESIGN is a part of www.KNUDEHANSEN.com with main office in Denmark.

Name: Port Of Kristiansand IKS
Company description: Port of Kristiansand is strategically located at the southern tip of Norway with proximity to major European ports. It is one of the premier Norwegian ports, and handles transport of passengers, freight, cruise and offshore activities.

Name: SailaWave
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, Nº69 Diego De León, 28006
Company description: The inception of SailaWave was brought alive in Europe by a team of sailing enthusiasts, antenna specialists and connectivity technologists who have devoted to innovating, designing and engineering wireless connectivity solutions. We extend our vision and expertise to the maritime industry. Implacable enthusiasm about sailing paves the way to bringing our 5G technology on board globally.  Whenever and wherever you are sailing or cruising to, SailaWave ensures uninterrupted connectivity for everyone from the moment when the yachts, boats, and cruises depart from the land. Safety is guaranteed, and passengers' experience is elevated.

Name: Flagship Amsterdam
Company description: Flagship Amsterdam is a premier provider of unique canal cruise experiences in the heart of Amsterdam, specializing in themed tours that highlight the city's rich artistic heritage, such as the Rembrandt Cruise. The company aims to offer an immersive journey through Amsterdam's historic canals, combining luxury and comfort with engaging storytelling from knowledgeable local guides. With a commitment to sustainability, Flagship Amsterdam operates 100% electric boats, ensuring a quiet and eco-friendly exploration of the city's iconic waterways. Their target market includes both tourists and locals seeking memorable experiences, with offerings that cater to families, couples, and groups. The company collaborates with various partners, including cultural institutions like the Rembrandt House, to enhance the overall experience for their clients. Flagship Amsterdam is dedicated to providing exceptional service, with a focus on customer satisfaction and flexibility, including free cancellations up to 24 hours before a cruise.

Name: LUTZ Elevators
Company description: Whether on a cruise liner, a container ship, a ferry or a yacht: LUTZ Elevators is your partner for marine elevators.  We offer: Marine Elevators  Marine Elevators Service Periodic Inspections Spare Parts Offshore Elevators You can find information on data protection here: https://api.lutz-aufzuege.de/fileadmin/user_upload/Dokumente/Lutz_Datenschutzerklaerung_LinkedIn__12_09_23_en.pdf

Name: Nowhere Networks
Company description: We bring the internet to ships. At scale, with speed, and without compromise. Nowhere Networks is a Swedish high-tech company building the world’s most powerful land-based maritime broadband network. We deliver fast, reliable, and cost-effective internet connectivity to ferries, cruise ships, and cargo vessels - across Europe and expanding globally. But we’re not just a connectivity provider. We’re a full-stack operator. We design, build, install, and run everything ourselves. From our smart antennas and cloud-based network platform to onboard Wi-Fi portals and traffic management software. Our hybrid approach - combining land-based radio, LEO satellite, LTE, and port connectivity- is unmatched in the industry. Trusted by some of the biggest names in shipping and cruising (Stena Line, Tallink/Silja Line, DFDS, Irish Ferries, Gotland Alandia Cruises and more), we connect over 150 vessels and serve more than 100 million passengers annually. Whether it’s crew comms, passenger Wi-Fi, or real-time fleet operations, we make sure it all runs smoothly - and fast. We’re engineers, entrepreneurs, and problem-solvers who love building great tech and solving real-world challenges at sea. If you do too, come work with us.

Name: Skagen Havn - Port Of Skagen
Company description: HELE SKANDINAVIENS HAVN Skagen havn er en global erhvervshavn og Danmarks største fiskerihavn. Vi har en unik placering på toppen af Danmark ved et af verdens mest befærdede stræder og en optimal beliggenhed i forhold til fiskepladserne i Nordsøen, Skagerrak og Kattegat. Skagen havns erhvervsstruktur er centreret om fire kerneforretningsområder: Fiskeri & forarbejdning, maritim service, gods & bunkring samt krydstogt & oplevelsesøkonomi. I tæt samspil med hinanden udgør de fire forretningsområder en komplet maritim erhvervsstruktur med stærke værdikæder, hvor alle relevante aktører er til stede. Det skaber en yderst stærk erhvervsklynge med stor synergi og samarbejde, der gør Skagen Havn til et af skibsfartens fortrukne business hubs i Skandinavien.

Name: Carus Ferry
Company description: Carus is a global supplier of information technology to the travel and transport industry.  We design, build and support systems critical to the operation and sales of ferry and cruise businesses around the world. Our objective is to take care of the full 360 degrees of the passenger journey.   Carus’ reservations system meets the demands of today’s fully digitalised ferry operations, providing mobile reservations, self-service check-in and boarding as well as digital cabin keys and lounge access control.   Carus’ onboard solution supports the management of all onboard services; fine-dining, bars, cafes, and retail. And our range of port automation solutions smooths the journey on approach to and within the port for foot-passengers, passenger vehicles as well as for cargo vehicles and units.   Carus’ clients operate throughout the Baltic, Europe, the United Kingdom, the United States, Africa, and Australia. Our clients represent every aspect of the passenger vessel industry and operate virtually every type of vessel, proving the versatility and flexibility of our solutions. Learn More: info@carus.com www.carus.com

Name: COLUMBIA Cruise Services
Company description: Your partner in the maritime leisure industry COLUMBIA Cruise Services is an internationally recognized ship manager with more than 35 years of experience in world-class cruise ship management. Operating out of Hamburg, Germany, CCS offers the full range of services required to achieve long-lasting customer satisfaction. Take a moment to experience our dedication and passion for the cruise ship industry!

Name: Atlânticoline S.A.
HQ Location: Portugal, Horta, 31 Rua Conselheiro Miguel Da Silveira, 9900-114
Company description: Empresa de transporte marítimo de passageiros e viaturas na Região Autónoma dos Açores, sediada na Horta, ilha do Faial.  Mantém uma frota de quatro navios (Gilberto Mariano, Mestre Jaime Feijó, Cruzeiro das Ilhas e Cruzeiro do Canal) e uma embarcação (ARIEL).  Possui 6 linhas com diferentes itinerários, a saber:  - Azul: Horta - Madalena; - Verde: Horta - Madalena ou São Roque - Velas; - Rosa: Vila do Corvo - Santa Cruz das Flores; - Lilás: Horta - Madalena - Calheta - Angra do Heroísmo; - Branca: Horta - São Roque - Velas - Vila da Praia - Praia da Vitória; - Laranja: Velas - São Roque. A nossa missão é assegurar um serviço de transporte marítimo de pessoas e veículos, com segurança e fiabilidade, contribuindo para o desenvolvimento económico e social dos Açores enquanto região e de cada uma das suas ilhas em particular.

Name: DDSG Blue Danube Schiffahrt GmbH
Company description: DDSG Blue Danube Schiffahrt GmbH is a premier river cruise company based in Vienna, specializing in scenic cruises along the Danube River, particularly in the stunning Wachau region. Operating from March 30 to November 3, 2024, the company offers a diverse range of sightseeing cruises that cater to both leisure travelers and families. With a modern fleet of nine well-equipped ships, DDSG Blue Danube is dedicated to providing unforgettable experiences on the water, combining relaxation, culinary delights, and entertainment for its guests. The onboard dining experience is managed by three partner businesses, ensuring high-quality, seasonal cuisine that enhances the overall cruise experience and highlights local Wachau specialties. The company targets a wide audience, including local and international tourists, families, groups, and individuals seeking unique leisure activities along the Danube River. As a successor to the historic Erste Donau-Dampfschiffahrts-Gesellschaft founded in 1829, DDSG Blue Danube continues to uphold a legacy of excellence in river navigation and hospitality. Its mission is to provide memorable and enjoyable experiences on the water, emphasizing quality service and customer satisfaction. By collaborating with various partners, DDSG Blue Danube enhances the overall travel experience, allowing guests to explore the region's rich cultural heritage. Through its commitment to excellence, DDSG Blue Danube Schiffahrt GmbH aims to be a leading choice for river tourism in Austria, inviting guests to discover the beauty and charm of the Danube River.

Name: NMS Group - Nordic Maritime Solutions
HQ Location: Latvia, Riga, Riga, 31 Kaķasēkļa Dambis, lv-1045
Company description: NMS Group aims to provide one stop shop solutions and deliver full services to the Cruise, Yacht, Offshore & Merchant vessels.  Our office locations carefully cover most important ports and offshore structures, this make our client life easier just because we are always on time and without damage for goods.

Name: Nicko Cruises Schiffsreisen GmbH
Company description: Nicko Cruises Schiffsreisen GmbH is a prominent cruise company specializing in river and ocean cruises across Europe, offering a diverse range of travel experiences. With a mission to provide memorable journeys that combine comfort, exploration, and cultural immersion, the company aims to cater to a wide audience, including families, couples, and solo travelers. Nicko Cruises partners with various local and international entities to enhance the travel experience, ensuring high-quality service and unique itineraries. Their target market includes both seasoned cruisers and first-time travelers seeking adventure and relaxation on the water. The company is committed to sustainability and responsible tourism, striving to minimize its environmental impact while delivering exceptional customer satisfaction.

Name: Windrose Finest Travel GmbH
Company description: WINDROSE Finest Travel GmbH specializes in creating bespoke luxury and exclusive group travel experiences, catering to discerning clients seeking unique and memorable journeys. With a mission to provide exceptional service and personalized travel solutions, the company offers a wide range of travel themes, including private tours, cruises, and family vacations, across diverse global destinations. WINDROSE collaborates with luxury hotels, private yacht services, and event organizers to ensure a seamless and high-quality travel experience for its clients. The company targets affluent travelers who value exclusivity and personalized service, making it a preferred choice for those looking to explore the world in style and comfort. With a commitment to integrity and customer satisfaction, WINDROSE actively seeks feedback to continuously enhance its offerings and maintain transparency with its clients and partners.

Name: Sea Marine
Company description: Installation- and renovations services for the Finnish boating people. Every work on a customers boat is done as if it would be an own boat being prepared for a blue water cruise. Sea Marine comes to customers boats for evaluations and performs the majority of works without the boats leaving their home harbous.

Name: Gruppo Giovani Federagenti
Company description: 🛳 Una nuova generazione di giovani agenti e mediatori marittimi in Italia.  Siamo oltre cinquanta iscritti, con attività in circa 144 porti nazionali, da più di dieci anni contribuiamo alla vita della nostra federazione di categoria, Federagenti, con idee, attività formative, eventi e momenti di networking. Lavoriamo con ogni tipologia di nave: container, tanker, bulk carrier, yacht, traghetti e crociere.  Se il novanta percento di tutto viaggia via mare, possiamo dire di essere al servizio dell’economia del Paese.  Curiosi, entusiasti, sempre in movimento. Se vuoi salire a bordo, scrivici qui 👉🏼 gruppogiovani@federagenti.it

Name: DS Freight Forwarding IKE
Company description: DS is a freight forwarding company, located in Greece, specializing in fresh and frozen goods transportation and tailored deliveries to cruise ships. Over a decade now we serve across Europe and we are building long-standing partnerships and expanding our network to bring you more innovative services and solutions.

Company description: Electro Technical Officer (ETO) or Electrician on Ship is key person to maintain Ship Electrical Systems.   Whatever it is robust Cargo ship power system or extremely massive cruise ship electrical plant Electro Technical Officer (ETO)  is key person Ship Electrical System.
