Name: DETEGASA
HQ Location: Spain, Galicia, Narón, 5 Rúa Condesa Cavalcantti, 15540
Company description: Detegasa is a leading provider of advanced water and fuel management solutions, specializing in Ballast Water Management Systems (BWMS), water treatment systems, and refueling solutions for marine applications. The company's BWMS is recognized for its compact design, energy efficiency, and chemical-free operation, utilizing UV technology to ensure compliance with international standards such as IMO and USCG. Detegasa is committed to quality, holding certifications from ISO 9001, Bureau Veritas, DNV, and ABS, which underscores its dedication to delivering reliable and durable products. The company serves a diverse clientele, including Navy ships, megayachts, cruise vessels, and research ships, providing tailored solutions that enhance operational efficiency and environmental sustainability. With a focus on innovation and customer support, Detegasa aims to contribute to cleaner water resources and effective waste management, ensuring a better future for marine ecosystems and human communities alike.

Name: Cruise Service AS
HQ Location: Norway, Møre Og Romsdal, Ålesund, 4 Skansekaia, 6002
Company description: Cruise Service AS is a total supplier of experiences at sea. We deliver tours combined with food, entertainment, activities and the beautiful surroundings that Norway has to offer. We customize each event for our guests to have the best possible experience.

Name: Porto Di Livorno 2000 S.r.l.
Company description: Porto di Livorno 2000 s.r.l. is the Cruise & Ferry Port located in Livorno, Tuscany, Italy. Livorno Port for Tuscany- is a destination port but partial turnaround calls are increasing. The Port of Livorno hosted in 2016 403 cruise calls bringing 807.935 passengers of wich 9274 disembarking and embarking (about 18% more than 2015). The Alto Fondale Terminal building was recently subject to an important restoration and now offers wide spaces for the passengers turn-around, luggage handling and Custom clearing. Livorno, despite its vocation as destination port, can propose itself as Home-Port, thanks to the peculiar geographical position at the centre of the Mediterranean, only few kilometres far from the International Airport “G. Galilei” well connected to many European destinations in UK or Germany.  World famous vineyards in Bolgheri, beaches and natural parks and Etruscan ruins represent alternatives to classic Tuscany tours. Porto di Livorno 2000 is also an important ferry terminal, connecting Italy to Corsica and Sardinia Islands. In 2016 were embarked and disembarked about 2.194.000 passengers and 837.000 vehicles, about 19% more than 2015.

Name: OLIVER DESIGN
HQ Location: Spain, Basque Country, Getxo, 33 Estrada Diliz, 48993
Company description: OLIVER DESIGN es una compañía especializada en diseño y arquitectura naval, fundada en 1990 por el ingeniero naval Jaime Oliver. Graduado en 1964, inició su trayectoria con el diseño de grandes buques para el histórico astillero La Naval de Sestao (Bizkaia), para posteriormente fundar su propia empresa de construcción de embarcaciones de recreo, Yates Revilo, que a lo largo de casi una década llevó a cabo cerca de una treintena de proyectos. En 1978 creó su propia oficina técnica, desde la que continuó desarrollando proyectos innovadores para armadores y astilleros de todo el mundo. A partir de 1990 puso en marcha la nueva firma OLIVER DESIGN, con el objetivo de potenciar su proyección internacional. En pocos años la empresa multiplicó y diversifico su actividad para abarcar no sólo el proyecto, sino la habilitación de interiores e incluso superestructuras completas, buscando proporcionar un servicio integral a sus clientes. Iñigo Oliver, Director General se incorporó a la empresa en el año 1987 y su hijo Iñi Oliver lleva trabajando en Oliver Design desde el año 2015 después de graduarse con honores como Arquitecto Naval en la Universidad de Southampton OLIVER DESIGN está en disposición de asumir todas las tareas previas a la puesta en servicio de buques de cualquier tipo. Su catálogo de servicios incluye labores especializadas en diferentes áreas desde el diseño conceptual hasta la supervisión de obra pasando por todo el desarrollo del proyecto arquitéctónico y diseño de interiores. El principal valor añadido de OLIVER DESIGN es la creación de proyectos singulares con un alto grado de innovación y diseño contando con un catálogo de proyectos con más de 400 barcos de la más variada tipología a lo largo de 25 años: desde buques escuela a yates de recreo y de turismo, pasando por barcos de transporte, pesqueros, dragas, ferris, cruceros, etc. La trayectoria de la empresa está avalada por múltiples reconocimientos y galardones internacionales, entre ellos varios Premios Shippax de diseño naval. OLIVER DESIGN ocupa un emplazamiento singular. Alejada de polígonos industriales y de oficinas en el centro de la ciudad, la empresa proyectó y construyó una sede integrada en su entorno natural. Se ubica en Getxo (Bizkaia), a muy poca distancia de los acantilados de la Galea, una atalaya sobre el Golfo de Bizkaia que da acceso al Puerto de Bilbao, el más importante del Norte de España desde su fundación en el siglo XIII. La compañía cuenta también con delegaciones en Santander y Cádiz.

Name: Koninklijke Spido BV.
Company description: Koninklijke Spido BV is a prominent cruise company based in Rotterdam, specializing in harbor tours and themed cruises that showcase the dynamic Port of Rotterdam, one of the largest ports in Europe. The company aims to provide unique and educational experiences for all ages, allowing guests to explore the impressive maritime landscape and iconic architecture from the water. With a diverse range of offerings, including family brunches, seafood dinner cruises, and special holiday events, Spido caters to both local residents and tourists seeking memorable adventures. The company is committed to accessibility and customer satisfaction, ensuring that every guest enjoys a safe and enjoyable experience aboard its fleet. Through partnerships with local attractions and a focus on community engagement, Spido continues to enhance its reputation as a leading provider of maritime experiences in the region.

Name: Transcoma Cruises
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 120 Carrer De L'atlàntic 112, 08040
Company description: Transcoma Cruises is one of the leading Cruise-related companies in Spain, attending over 750 calls per year. Our aim is to build long-term relationships, based in trust and honesty, two principles that we apply in all our activities, both with customers and partners/suppliers. Since 1965, our Company offers proved reputation and first call services; combining our expertise together with the know-how and acknowledge of the cruise sector; We are proud to be related to all cruise companies and Groups world-wide. We cover all the possible needs of a vessel in the main Spanish Ports, offering 24/7 service, 365 days a year and this is what it makes the difference. Our Organization has a close liaison with Port Authorities as well as with the rest of the Port’s stakeholders, enabling us to work smoothly and to ensure a fast and efficient clearance and services to all our represented companies.

Name: Frachtcontor Junge & Co. GmbH
Company description: Founded in Hamburg in 1905, Frachtcontor Junge & Co. GmbH is one of Germany’s leading shipbrokers, offering global expertise in dry bulk and tanker chartering, sale & purchase, project finance, and port and shipyard agency services. With over 120 specialists across 10+ international locations, we combine over a century of maritime heritage with forward-looking solutions for today’s evolving shipping industry. Our Services Chartering: Deep expertise in dry bulk and tanker markets, powered by data-driven insights and long-standing client relationships. Sale & Purchase: Strategic support for second-hand and newbuilding transactions, linking shipowners, shipyards, and financial institutions. Project Finance: Frachtcontor Capital Partners serve as the vital link between capital seekers and capital providers, specializing in institutional, long-term debt capital solutions. Port Agency: Comprehensive 24/7 port agency services for all vessel types—including tankers, bulkers, cruise, offshore, and naval vessels—across the European North Range, supported by nine strategically located offices from Rotterdam to Gdansk. Shipyard Agency: Via our CombiTrade division, we offer global support in yard selection, project coordination, and technical supervision. Rooted in tradition and driven by innovation, Frachtcontor Junge continues to be a trusted partner in global shipping—committed to efficiency, resilience, and a more sustainable maritime future.

Name: Vision Yachting
Company description: Vision Yachting is a company, specializing in luxury Motor Yacht Cruises and charters around Corfu and nearby islands. Vision Yachting offers the comfort and pleasure of luxury personalised cruises around the beautiful island of Corfu-an exceptional and unforgettable experience. We guarantee a superb day in a relaxed atmosphere, while we take care of all practical aspects of the trip efficiently and in response to customer needs, demands and wishes. Within this spirit, Vision Yachting team was born to fulfill a common passion,to excel in a most heartfelt way in attending to her guests on board whether on a daily charter to the green blue crystal waters of Corfu and nearby Ionian island or to other destinations. This unique direct approach ensures the most memorable holiday perfectly suited to your needs.  Because . . . whatever we do  . . .we do it with Vision

Name: Transfeero
HQ Location: Italy, Sicily, San Giovanni La Punta, Via Fiuggi, 95037
Company description: At Transfeero, we take pride in offering a seamless travel experience with our top-notch private transfer, shuttle service, and chauffeur services. Understanding the stress and hassle that often accompanies travel, we provide you with a reliable solution for getting from point A to point B in comfort and style. Our user-friendly online booking platform, available at www.transfeero.com, allows you to effortlessly arrange transportation options tailored to your needs. Whether you require an airport pickup, a ride to a cruise port, or a transfer from a train station, our extensive network of professional drivers is ready to serve you in destinations worldwide. One of the hallmarks of Transfeero’s service is our commitment to customer satisfaction. We take the extra step to ensure that your journey is smooth and hassle-free from start to finish. Our services encompass a wide variety of vehicles equipped to cater to individual travelers, families, or large groups. Safety, punctuality, and comfort are the cornerstones upon which we build our reputation. For those who demand a higher level of service, our Chauffeur service goes above and beyond. Our chauffeurs are knowledgeable, courteous, and discreet, providing more than just a ride—they offer a bespoke travel experience that is as luxurious as it is reliable. Choosing Transfeero means stepping into a world of convenience and reliability. From the moment you book with us, you can rest assured that every detail of your transfer will be meticulously managed. Our support team is always on stand-by to assist with any inquiries, ensuring a responsive and personalized experience. When it comes to getting you to your destination, Transfeero is not just a service provider; we are your travel ally. Visit us today at www.transfeero.com and embark on a journey defined by elegance, comfort, and peace of mind.

Name: MTH - Marine Technik Hamburg
Company description: MTH was founded in July 2014. MTH is a team of highly skilled project managers, service technicians and design engineers, all of whom have been working in the shipbuilding industry for many years. Based on its team’s expertise and experience MTH’s intention is to be a reliable partner for turnkey services in the fields of HVAC, refrigeration and automation. The design and system integration work makes MTH a full turnkey contractor with very competent and responsible personnel. The present MTH personnel has been involved as the core team in a number of large scale modernisation projects for whole-ship HVAC contracts in the cruise and navy ships as well as the yachting industry.

Name: Running On Waves
Company description: The Company owns a luxury state-of-the-art passenger sailing vessel RUNNING ON WAVES, a 3-mast 3-deck barquentine of +100 A5 Ocean Class (can sail anywhere but glacial zones), length 64 m,  takes on board up to 42 pax in 18 cabins. Launched in 2011.  Fully SOLAS-certified.  Maximum speed 18 knots on engine and 16 knots under sail. Diving and water sports centre on board. Premium quality cuisine.  Regular cruises in the Mediterranean and charters anywhere. Flag of Malta.

Name: Madeira Travel
HQ Location: Portugal, Madeira, Funchal, Caminho Da Penteada N71, 9020-105
Company description: Welcome to Madeira Travel Taxi. Book now our Taxi Service, private Tour or Cruise Trip around the island. Our professional drivers speak English, Spanish, German and French. We look forward to your reservation and welcome your arrival.

Name: Lisbon Cruise Port Lda
Company description: LCP is a privately owned company that since the 26th of August operates the arrival of cruise ships at the Port of Lisbon. With the concession of the cruise ship terminal operation, a new terminal has been built and entered into full operation in the second semester of 2017. As a contemporary interpretation of the vibrant lifestyle of Lisbon. On floor space of some 13,000 sq. meters the terminal houses the full representations of the competent authorities, as well as tourist services, shops and food and beverage services for the comfort of all visitors and passengers. Flexibility and affordability of the operations were one of the criteria for the design of the building, so that it can grow in terms of visits and cruise passengers. The new facility is served by a pier of 1,425 meters long with a multi-length ship capacity for ships with a draft up to 12 meters.

Name: Hull Blyth Araouzos Ltd
Company description: Hull Blyth Araouzos Ltd is proud to be among the first shipping companies in Cyprus involved in vessel operations with 85 years of experience within the Shipping industry. As an organization, we handle a diverse line of services and products along with being committed to build mutually beneficial partnerships and associations in diverse areas of business endeavour, while constantly searching out for new opportunities. 85 years of trading have not been achieved only by diversifying and adapting to the ever-changing modes of transport, but also by investing in experienced staff giving a professional and assured quality service. We handle all type of vessels, Ro-Ro, cruise ship, tankers, naval, PSVs, Rigs, containerships, reefers, livestock, etc.  An established company within the local market for over eight decades, offering the best one stop solution for our clients.

Name: Neander Shark GmbH
Company description: Neander Shark is a cutting edge outboard engine developer and manufacturer. We used state of the art software and processes to develop the turbo diesel 50 hp Dtorque outboard, which with its double crankshaft has been a success in terms of reliability and efficiency since it went into serial production back in 2018. The end users of the Dtorque are commercial operators in the oil & gas, cruise ship, super yacht, harbour patrol, fish farming and tourist industries and therefore rely on being able to use their boats uninterrupted on a daily basis. While we are encouraged by the success of the Dtorque so far, customers seem to be pleasantly surprised by its quietness, low fuel performance and its 111 Nm of torque, we are excited to continue investing in R&D to offer new solutions to an industry we believe will not just continue growing but will evolve more in the following 10 years than it has done in the past 30.

Name: Meridian4People - Portugal & Spain
HQ Location: Portugal, Porto, Maia, 505 Rua Augusto Simões, 4470-147
Company description: Empresa de Transporte e Turismo em Portugal, especializada em tours privados ou partilhados, bem como cruzeiros privados em iates no Rio Douro.

Name: Tomaz Do Douro
Company description: Tomaz do Douro has been sailing on the Douro River for more than 25 years, being one of the pionner companies in this sector. With several boats of its own, all equipped with the most modern navigation systems, we provide cruises between the 6 bridges of the Douro River, as well as a bigger course from Porto to Barca d'Alva. We also organize social and corporate events in exclusive spaces, while sailing through the most astonishing landscapes. If you want more customized and exclusive cruises, Tomaz do Douro also has boats for this purpose that allow you to enjoy unforgettable trips. For more radical activities, we are the only company to have cruises in Jet Boats that can offer moments of adventure and pure adrenaline. For more relaxing option, the Ribeira do Porto Hotel provides you with the best ambience. We create unique and memorable experiences!

Name: Piraeus Marine Services S.A.
HQ Location: Greece, Attica, Piraeus, 1 Charilaou Trikoupi Street, 18536
Company description: Piraeus Marine Services S.A. was founded in 2008 with the goal to provide efficient solutions to clients and partners, covering a wide range of marine services and forming solid strategic alliances in the shipping market whilst maintaining an action-oriented management culture. Located in Piraeus at the heart of one of the greatest shipping centers, P.M.S. employs a team of qualified naval architects, marine engineers and consultants who provide clients with comprehensive, effective service, combining wide-ranging experience with modern technology. The founders of P.M.S. have 30 years of experience in the shipping business, including over 15 years of technical management in a cruise vessel company. We have an excellent reputation in providing quality services with reliability, trustworthiness and dedication. P.M.S. works closely with an impressive list of principals serving clients based around the globe as we strive to enhance our reputation in a competitive marketplace. Our experienced and highly qualified personnel are always at your service for any requirement you may have. Our Quality Management System is certified according to ISO 9001:2008 (No: 1550/Δ) ISO certificate.

Name: Atlantides Group
Company description: In 1987, was established “ATLANTIDES TRAVEL” in Piraeus as a personal business entity. In 1995 “ATLANTIDES TRAVEL & SHIPPING CO. LTD.” was incorporated as the successor of “ATLANTIDES TRAVEL”.  Both companies have been distinguished in the shipping and tourism industry in Greece and abroad. In 2005 Ioannis Kardaris incorporated “ATLANTIDES SHIPPING CO. LTD” of Marshall Islands, which established a shipping and management office in Piraeus, in 2014. These two companies together form “Atlantides Group”. Atlantides Group is situated in the heart of Piraeus, one of Europe’s largest ports, in its privately owned offices. Apart from its headquarters and branch offices, the Group is the owner of a number of properties (commercial offices, flats, houses and land properties) all over Greece.  The activities and expertise of the Group are: •	General Shipping •	Ships’ Management •	Sale & Purchase  •	Brokerage  •	Cruise Vessels & Yachts Chartering •	Shipownership  •	General Tourism  From 1987 until 1990 Atlantides Group was mainly involved in tourism activities such as hotel booking, ticket issuing, excursions and daily cruises operation. Starting from 1991 Ioannis Kardaris and the founding members of the Group have been actively involved in the chartering and sale & purchase of vessels and cruise ships.

Name: GilsanBus
Company description: At GilsanBus, we take pride in being leaders in the bus transportation industry in Sevilla and beyond. With a decades-long track record, we have set a standard of excellence in the sector. Our passion for buses goes beyond the industry; it is a fundamental part of our identity. As the Gilsan Brothers, we have dedicated our lives to providing quality transportation solutions that connect people to exciting and memorable destinations. We specialize in a wide range of services, from unforgettable weddings to educational school trips, cruise transfers in Sevilla, MICE tourism, national and international tours, and participation in world-renowned tourism fairs. Our fleet of high-end buses, coupled with a dedicated team, ensures customer satisfaction on every journey. We are certified with ISO 9001-UNE13816, ISO 39001-ISO 14001, ISO 45001, and the "Q de Calidad," demonstrating our commitment to safety, quality, and sustainability. As members of the Sevilla Congress & Convention Bureau, we actively promote Sevilla as an event and conference destination, and our presence at international tourism fairs has established us as an industry leader. Our dedication to excellence and innovation has led us to explore new technologies, such as augmented reality applied to bus tourism, positioning us at the forefront of the industry. Joining GilsanBus means joining an unparalleled travel experience. Connect with us on LinkedIn and discover how we can make your journeys unforgettable!

Name: SeaMed24
Company description: SeaMed24 Medical Solutions, offer a comprehensive range of Medical Management solutions for all sectors of the Maritime industry, from merchant shipping, to offshore, leisure and niche expedition cruises.

Name: FRS Finland
Company description: FRS Finland Oy, formerly known as Suomen Saaristokuljetus Oy, is a company founded in 2013 in Helsinki, Finland. Currently, the company operates 13 vessels of various sizes, most of them being water busses. Finland is known as the land of the thousand lakes but it is also the land of the thousand islands. In the Helsinki area alone there are dozens of beautiful and interesting island destinations. FRS Finland operates routes to several of these islands. Among these is Suomenlinna fortress island (UNESCO world heritage), the former bastion island of Isosaari and a canal cruise line that stops at six small islands. In addition, the company operates two lines in the nearby city of Espoo and a line from Loviisa to the the Svartholm sea bastion. FRS Finland operates several restaurants and saunas, a golf course, lodging and other activities.  Since 2020 former Suomen Saaristokuljetus is part of the FRS Group (www.frs.world) and has hence now moved under the umbrella of the well known FRS brand.

Name: Silver Star Agencies B.V.
Company description: Silver Star Agencies is a rapidly-growing independent agency for tramp, scheduled and cruise services. The company’s home base is Amsterdam, and SSA has offices in Rotterdam, Antwerp, Riga and Ventspils. With thirty years combined experience, SSA is no newcomer to the world of shipping agencies. We are however an ever growing company.

Name: Urbe Drive Roma Tour
HQ Location: Italy, Latium, Roma, 568 Viale Dei Caduti Nella Guerra Di Liberazione, 00128
Company description: Discover Rome and beyond, with the all the conforts.  Urbe Drive is a private car rental with driver. Book on line, chose your destination, your car and price. Urbe Drive is a new chauffeur service for tourists, groups and business. Special services from Rome Fiumicino and Ciampino Airports and from Civitavecchia port for cruises passengers. We offer tours in Rome area (Colosseum, Vatican City, shopping districts, Tivoli Villas and many others) and around (Tuscany, Pompei, Positano & Amalfi).  A convenient choice, compared to the taxi, from or to the airports of Rome Fiumicino and Ciampino as well as from or to Civitavecchia cruise ship port. Urbe Drive is the best tours in and around Rome. Discover Rome and the wonderful territory with a car with driver. It’ll be a pleasure for us to take you to discover Vatican City and Sistine Chapel, the ancient Rome, the Roman Forum, the shopping street, Rome by night, Trastevere, Fontana di Trevi, Tivoli Villas and other marvellous places. You can also rent a Urbe Drive car with a driver for tours to Florence and Tuscany, discover the wine in the Tuscany streets, the ancient ruins of Pompei, take a tour to Malfi and Positano as well as Naples. We will accompany you to discover the wonders of Italy in total safety and comfort.

Name: Pilade Giani Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Livorno, Via Eugenio Sansoni
Company description: La Pilade Giani Srl, casa di spedizioni internazionali ed agenzia marittima, è fra le certificate Imprese Storiche della Camera di Commercio di Livorno e a breve festeggerà i 138 anni di attività nel palazzo ottocentesco sugli Scali D’Azeglio.  La Pilade Giani è specializzata nei traffici containers, nei reefer per prodotti deperibili come frutta o congelato, nelle spedizioni di prodotti liquidi e solidi che si muovono in Iso Tanks containers,nei traffici rinfusi ( break bulk) come pure nel project cargo. Fra gli addetti che vi lavorano, un intero settore è riservato ai servizi doganali che la azienda svolge per propri traffici ma anche per conto terzi, fornendo servizi anche di consulenze doganali, consulenze in materia di merci pericolose. Assieme alle altre società del gruppo Giani, la azienda svolge attività di agenzia marittima, assistenza e raccomandazione per navi tramp, per navi di linea (protecting agency) e per lo yachting, mentre per il settore cruise, il Gruppo Giani fornisce assistenza di provviste di bordo e shipchandling.

Name: ESPO
Company description: The European Sea Ports Organisation was founded in 1993. It  represents the port authorities, port associations and port administrations of the seaports of the Member States of the European Union and Norway. ESPO has also observer members in several neighbouring countries to the EU. The European Union simply cannot function without its seaports. 90 % of Europe’s cargo trade in goods passes through the more than 1200 seaports existing in the 23 maritime Member States of the EU and more than 400 million passengers pass through Europe’s ports every year using ferry and cruise services. Without seaports, the European Union would not exist as an economic world power. Without seaports, there would be no internal market. ESPO ensures that seaports have a clear voice in the European Union. The organisation promotes the common interests of its members throughout Europe and is also engaged in dialogue with European stakeholders in the Port and Maritime sector. ESPO works through a permanent secretariat in Brussels, a General Assembly, an Executive Committee, and 8 specialised committees.

Name: Slovenská Plavba A Prístavy A.s.
Company description: Slovenská plavba a prístavy a.s. is active in the the field of river transport, transshipment and storage of goods, forwarding services, repairs and reconstruction of vessels.

Name: Cleanmarine GmbH
Company description: Cleanmarine is a company doing professional protection and cleaning service since 2008 for the cruise and yacht industry.  We are using products which are specially created to meet maritime requirements to make your ship shine like new and protect all surfaces against damage during the refit process. A wide range of materials allows us to protect nearly all types of interior and exterior of private yachts, cruise ships and also hotels. With our specialist expertise and extensive experience of cleaning and protection, we can extend the life of your furnishings and ensure that the site environment is kept clean and non-hazardous.

Name: Szekla - Turystyka Aktywna
Company description: Jesteśmy wiodącym organizatorem szkoleń żeglarskich i motorowodnych, a także obozów oraz rejsów turystycznych na Mazurach i w Gdańsku  Prowadzimy kursy i obozy żeglarskie z podziałem na grupy dorosłych oraz dzieci i młodzież w zbliżonym wieku.  Organizujemy również rejsy dla firm, szkół oraz grup zorganizowanych. Nasza flota liczy obecnie ponad 40 nowoczesnych jachtów, które spełniają najwyższe standardy bezpieczeństwa. Współpracujemy z doświadczoną i wykwalifikowaną kadrą instruktorów, przygotowaną do pracy zarówno z dorosłymi, jak i z dziećmi oraz młodzieżą. Nieustannie wyznaczamy nowe standardy w branży szkoleń i obozów żeglarskich, stanowiąc wzór do naśladowania. Stale rozwijamy naszą flotę oraz poszerzamy zakres i jakość oferowanych usług. Żeglarstwo to nasza pasja od wielu lat, a dzielenie się nią z innymi daje nam ogromną satysfakcję. Zespół Szekli tworzą ludzie zafascynowani żeglarstwem – to pasjonaci, którzy w swoją pracę wkładają całe serce.

Name: Navis Engineering Oy
Company description: We design and manufacture dynamic positioning and manoeuvring control systems for different types of the ships - offshore vessels, cruise and ferry, workboats and special ships, super and mega yachts. For each type we offer systems engineered to your specific operational needs or requirements. Regardless of the type of the ship or the product we deliver, we share with you our knowledge which is one of our main assets. Established in Rome on the 11th of June 1996, by a collaborative agreement between 18 ports in seven different countries, the MedCruise membership spreads today to 22 countries in three different continents, Africa, Asia and Europe. Name: Irish Ferries
Company description: Irish Ferries is the market leading ferry operator to and from the Republic of Ireland and also on Dover – Calais, connecting Britain to the Continent. Passenger & Tourism business at:     www.irishferries.com  Commercial & Freight business at:   www.irishferriesfreight.com [NOTE: Recruitment for positions onboard ships is handled by our partner Matrix Ship Management Ltd. Apply here for seagoing careers: https://matrixshipmanagement.com/app/seagoing-careers.php ]   Irish Ferries operates cruise and fast ferry services across 4 strategic RoRo routes between Ireland - Britain, Ireland - France and UK - France, catering for passengers, their vehicles and roll-on roll-off freight units. We also operate as a tour operator, selling package holidays in both the Irish and British markets. We measure our success through the quality of our service, as seen by our customers. Irish Ferries - Sea Travel Differently.

Name: Neander Marine
Company description: We are Neander. We develop, produce & distribute the Dtorque 50, the world’s only 50 HP diesel outboard engine — designed for professionals who demand power, efficiency, safety, and durability. Why Choose the Dtorque 50? ✔ Maximum Safety at Sea – Diesel is far less flammable than gasoline, reducing fire risks. ✔ Unmatched Torque – Equivalent to a 90 HP gasoline engine. ✔ Fuel Efficiency – 40% less fuel consumption than gasoline outboards. ✔ Less Downtime – 60% longer service intervals = more time on the water. ✔ 60% Lower Operating Costs – Break-even on TCO after just 9 months. ✔ Proven Reliability – 1.5+ million engine hours in real-world applications. Designed for Professionals Developed in Germany, the Dtorque 50 is trusted by search & rescue teams, offshore operators, fish farms, superyachts, cruise lines, and military fleets. Built for Extreme Conditions 🛡 Enhanced Safety – Diesel’s low flammability reduces fire hazards at sea, making it the safest fuel choice. ⚙ Unmatched Durability – 1.5M+ engine hours, built to withstand the harshest conditions. 🌊 Reliable Offshore Performance – Handles extreme temperatures, rough waters & demanding workloads. 🌱 Eco-Friendly & Future-Proof – Compatible with HVO & carbon-neutral fuels, supporting global emissions reduction. Torque Matters – Power When You Need It For marine professionals transporting equipment and crew over long workdays, torque ensures efficiency, durability, and smooth operation. The Dtorque 50 delivers maximum thrust at low RPM, providing the power you need when it matters most. Global Support & Service We work with a trusted global network of marine experts to provide comprehensive service & support —so you can operate with confidence, wherever you are.

Name: FRS Portugal

Company description: Welcome to FRS, your experienced ferry shipping company for boat trips on the Tagus River in Lisbon, Portugal. Enjoy our relaxing river cruises in our modern convertible vessel under the open sky.

Name: Seaman Solutions
Company description: Empowering Seafarers. Supporting Crew Managers. Ensuring Flag Compliance. Seaman Solutions is a digital platform that simplifies seafarer certification and training , offering fast, flag-approved services for Panama, Liberia, Malta, The Netherlands, and others as we continue expanding globally. We serve all sectors of the maritime industry, with tailored solutions for the cruise industry, oil & gas sector, commercial shipping, and superyachts. What We Offer: • All-in-One Platform – Manage seaman books, STCW courses, and maritime documents in one secure place • Flag-State Approved – Fast-track processing with full compliance for multiple registries • Digital STCW Training – Accredited online courses, accessible globally • Smart Payments & Tracking – Easy online payments and real-time application tracking • Crew Manager Benefits – Referral partnerships and tools to streamline compliance • Data Security, Encrypted, reliable systems protecting user and company data 💡 We’re building the future of maritime certification , making it faster, smarter, and more connected for crews and operators worldwide. Follow us for updates or message us to explore partnerships.

Explore the beauties of the Greek islands on a private yacht charter with Yacht Rentals Greece.

Name: Cossutti Ganz Yacht Design
HQ Location: Italy, Friuli Venezia Giulia, Udine, 17 Via Rialto, 33100
Company description: Cossutti Yacht Design Studio is one of the world's most interesting and appreciated design studio of the last 20 years both for racing and cruising yachts.  Founded by Maurizio Cossutti and Alessandro Ganz, it was born in 2008 when Maurizio, one of the most representing Italian yacht designer with over 20 years of experience,  decided to start his own design activity. In 2009 Alessandro joined the studio to then becoming a partner in 2013,  so the name of the studio became “Cossutti Yacht Design – Cossutti & Ganz Partners”. In the last few years the several partnerships with major international boatyards, confirmed Cossutti Yacht Design as one of the world most interesting and appreciated design studio of the last 20 years both for racing and cruising yachts. The pleasure of navigation is the real focus of every Cossutti Yacht Design project. Whether she is a racing boat, or a cruise model, for us a good boat can only be a fast one, with excellent maneuverability and which ensures a sail experience as pleasant as possible.

Name: Royal Line Oy
Company description: Royal Line offers both cruise and catering services in Helsinki, Finland. The company operates seven ships and one event venue in the Helsinki area.

Name: Sabtours Holding GmbH
Company description: Sabtours Holding GmbH ist ein etabliertes Familienunternehmen mit über 60 Jahren Erfahrung in der Touristik, das sich auf drei Hauptgeschäftsbereiche spezialisiert hat: Busbetrieb, Reisebüros und Reiseveranstaltungen. Mit einer Flotte von 193 Bussen bietet das Unternehmen sowohl Busreisen als auch Linienfahrten im regionalen Verkehr an, während die Reisebüros an 13 Standorten in Wien sowie Nieder- und Oberösterreich individuelle Reiseangebote für Privatpersonen, Firmen und Vereine bereitstellen. Die Mission von Sabtours ist es, Qualität und Kundenzufriedenheit in der Touristik zu gewährleisten, indem sie ein breites Spektrum an Reisearten und -zielen anbieten, darunter Gruppenreisen, Kreuzfahrten und spezielle Themenreisen. Das Unternehmen engagiert sich auch für den Klimaschutz, indem es CO₂-Emissionen durch verschiedene Klimaschutzprojekte kompensiert. Sabtours richtet sich an eine vielfältige Klientel, darunter Reisende, die an individuellen und Gruppenreisen interessiert sind, sowie Unternehmen und Vereine, die maßgeschneiderte Ausflüge und Veranstaltungen suchen.

Name: Zadar Cruise Port
Company description: With a modern highway network and proximity to the international airport, the brand new state-of-the-art and multi-award winning Zadar Cruise Port is an ideal Adriatic port for both transit and turnaround cruise operations.  Situated in the center of Adriatic, the port offers its guests a vibrant historical town with Roman ruins, medieval churches and fortifications, all intertwined with an array of charming cafes, wine bars and Mediterranean gastronomic experiences. Explore more breath-taking sites in its surrounding areas, because whether it is relaxation or adrenaline rush that you are seeking, you will certainly find it here.

Name: Cruise Control Chauffeursdiensten
Company description: In 1997 is Cruise Control Chauffeurs Diensten opgericht door twee studenten uit Groningen. Hun doel was om vernieuwingen door te voeren op het gebied van mobiliteit en daarnaast hun medestudenten aan een leuke bijbaan te helpen. Cruise Control levert tegenwoordig haar chauffeursdiensten aan diverse bedrijven in en rondom Groningen. Met een geselecteerde chauffeurspoule van representatieve en professionele studenten leveren wij onze afnemers maatwerk. Cruise Control Chauffeursdiensten is voor veel bedrijven onmisbaar geworden in de dagelijkse mobiliteitsvoorziening. Wij zorgen er immers voor dat reistijd wordt omgezet in effectieve werktijd! U wilt gebruik maken van onze diensten? Een chauffeur van Cruise Control Chauffeursdiensten kunt u al inzetten tegen het scherpe tarief van €21,45 per uur. Stuur een mail naar info@cruise-control.nl of bel met +316 10735006 om een chauffeur te reserveren. Eerst meer informatie? - Kijk op www.cruise-control.nl om meer informatie te krijgen over onze diensten.

Name: RB
Company description: Rhebergen Composites is your reliable specialist in custom made composite turnkey (deck) solutions for luxury superyachts and cruise ships, but also for special projects. Based at the heart of the premium Dutch yachting industry in the Netherlands, our company focuses on custom made components for luxury superyachts. We can take care of every stage of your project, from development, design and engineering to building, painting, transport and mounting: we are your turnkey partner.

Name: AS-Tech Solutions S.c.

Answering our customers needs in 2009 became privately held company AS-Tech Solutions and  provides comprehensive solutions for Teekay Shipping Norway, recently Altera Infrastructure for Altera Shuttle Tankers and Altera Infrastructure Production. Paralel to Recruitment activities, based on years of experience resulted on creation of ODMS software delivering solutions for PMS, Crew Management, Ship’s Documentation and various others other marine industry driven needs. PMS expertise on building, implementation, data optimization on General Cargo, Cruise,  Container vessels, Oil & Gas Tankers, Off-Shore installations.  Advanced training in IT solutions for shipping industry.  Professional Marine Management, recruitment & HR administration services.

Name: Cruise Ship Brokers
Company description: Cruise Ship Brokers is an ship brokerage firm which is specialised in the brokerage, purchase, sale and valuation of existing inland passenger vessels, coasters, hotel ships, round-trip boats, party boats and ferries. We also act as mediators and advisors in the field of operation, charters and financing.  Cruise Ship Brokers is your professional partner with full knowledge of the market and all developments in the field of passenger ships. Name: AUTOS RICO
Company description: Calidad e innovación, son signos distintivos de nuestra actividad contribuyendo a lograr una capacidad competitiva perdurable en el transporte de viajeros en autocar. Autos Rico pone a su disposición un equipo humano altamente cualificado unido a una flota equipada con las máximas prestaciones de confort y seguridad. Transporte Adaptado. C/ Galileo Galilei, 54 - A Coruña (España)  Tel. +34 981 138 262 - Fax +34 981 289 401 info@autosrico.com

Name: Cagliari Cruise Port
Company description: Located in the western Mediterranean sea, halfway between the Iberian coasts to the west, Italian coast to the east and North African coast to the South, Cagliari Cruise Port has the advantage of being included on different routes while offering unforgettable experiences to cruise passengers and fuel efficiency to cruise lines. Its interesting geographical location and its proximity to Cagliari-Elmas International Airport, further strengthens its position as a homeport. Both a transit and turnaround port, Cagliari Cruise Port is conveniently located near the Cagliari city center, along the waterfront, and can safely accommodate even the latest generation of large cruise ships in its three docks in the Rinascita pier, whose total length of over 1000 meters is reserved exclusively for cruises. Cagliari, the City of the Sun, amazes everyone with its calm and sunny beauty. Capital of the island of Sardinia, home of the oldest civilization in the Mediterranean and known for the beauty of its sea and its naturalistic richness, the city is one of the most appealing on the island and is close to several sites of historical, naturalistic and archaeological interest. Thanks to the mild climate and to the numerous excursions available, Cagliari is the ideal cruise destination during all seasons of the year.

Name: Nautica Assistance
Company description: Nautica Assistance is a mega yacht agency and supplier based in the North East of Sardinia. Our mission is to give full support to yachts and mega yachts in all their challenges during their cruises all over the Mediterranean, particularly in Sardinia and Corsica islands. Always ready with a prompt feedback, our departments are shaped to work in sinergy as a crew extextension ashore. We always garantee to our clients complete support and high standard of service with top class concierge services, logistic and technical assistance, top quality provisioning and the most exclusive range in stock of marine supplies available in the whole island.

Our fleet holds the latest executive Mercedes sedans and minivans.  All vehicles are fully insured, periodically inspected and they are equipped with several amenities, like complementary bottles water and WiFi.  Specialities: - Airport Transfers - Roadshow Services - Events - Cruises - Sightseeing - Maritime and Offshore Crew Transportation

We also offer a global 24/7 assistance service in port and in navigation.

Name: Ship System Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, Genoa, 16/4 Via Xx Settembre, 16121
Company description: Ship System, distribuisce e realizza componenti e accessori dei migliori marchi al mondo per il settore nautico.  Dalla consulenza all'assistenza post vendita passando per la progettazione, la realizzazione e il commissioning, Ship System rappresenta per i propri clienti un partner di assoluta fiducia. Ship System, rappresenta e distribuisce in esclusiva in Italia i seguenti prodotti - Rilevazione incendio con il partner Autronica - Convertitori di frequenza con il partner Atlas Marine System - Drive motor per la gestione delle valvole di flusso con il partner Eltorque - Automazione nave, soluzione per la gestione dell'energia, sistemi di     propulsione ibridi o elettrici con il partner Hoglund. - Sistemi di soppressione incendio a bassa pressione di propria produzione. Ship System, accompagna i cantieri navali e gli armatori dalla scelta del proprio equipaggiamento fino alla fine di una crociera serena e rilassata. Per maggiori informazioni: info@shipsystem.com

Name: Catania Cruise Port
Company description: A pochi passi dal centro della città e a 10 minuti di auto dall'aeroporto, Catania Cruise Port può essere considerato il crocevia dei principali itinerari crocieristici grazie alla sua posizione al centro del Mediterraneo, equidistante dal Canale di Suez, da Gibilterra e da tutti i porti africani ed europei. Porto di transito e turnaround, Catania Cruise Port è situato sul lungomare cittadino, e nelle sue banchine sul molo Sporgente Centrale, riservate esclusivamente alle crociere, può ospitare tranquillamente anche le grandi navi da crociera di ultima generazione. Catania è la seconda città più grande della Sicilia, sita sulla sua costa orientale prospiciente il Mar Ionio, in una posizione strategica che favorisce la visita di numerosi siti storici e note città di mare, come la romantica Taormina e la bianca Siracusa. Il clima mite e le scarse precipitazioni ne fanno una meta ideale per il turismo durante tutto l'anno, e la presenza di una forte armatura turistica territoriale, costituita da una vivace e moderna rete di trasporti, strutture ricettive e attività disponibili, la rendono perfetta per la realizzazione di pacchetti pre e post crociera.

Name: Taranto Cruise Port
HQ Location: Italy, Porto Mercantile Molo S. Cataldo
Company description: Welcome to Taranto Cruise Port! Discover Taranto, a destination ready to offer, in addition to the beauty of its millenary territory, also cutting-edge services for cruise ships and their passengers.

Name: CapaseccaYacht
Company description: Barefoot luxury on the sea, set sail to explore Sorrento, Capri, Positano and Amalfi Coast. The best charter company between the Gulf of Naples and Salerno including isles. Costumize your private cruise to discover the highlights of the mediterranean sea. We have been sailing the coastlines between Sorrento, Capri and Amalfi for three generations, and our century of history and decades of experience guarantee unforgettable days at sea to our guests. Thanks to Capasecca Yacht you can savor a once-in-a-lifetime sail on the Mediterranean, marked by the breathtaking beauty and "La Dolce Vita" lifestyle of this corner of southern Italy.

Name: Nordic Gateway AS
Company description: Nordic Gateway AS is a full scale service provider to the cruise industry for all Norwegian ports. Headquartered in Bergen, but represented by our own staff in all Norwegia ports,  we deliver excellent customer service. We are now hiring in the region of Leknes, Norway. Available positions: Guides We are now hiring in the regions of Stavanger, Bergen and Ålesund / Åndalsnes /Geiranger. Available positions: Guides

Name: Aboa Mare
HQ Location: Finland, Finland Proper, Turku, 21 Juhana Herttuan Puistokatu, 20100
Company description: Aboa Mare offers Bachelor and Master level education at Novia UAS and secondary education at Axxell vocational institute. We educate Sea Captains, Marine Engineers, Watchkeeping Officers and Watchkeeping Engineers. Aboa Mare Training Center offers a wide range of courses both for professional seafarers and leisure-time boaters. In order to be able to offer a wide range of courses and satisfy the requirements of our clients, we have a large network of experts on diverse fields within seafaring. Today we have several international customers and we have a close co-operation with Wärtsilä and ABB which give us the knowledge of training international crews. Aboa Mare is STCW audited by the Finnish Transport Safety Agency. Part of our education is audited by the DNV ISO 9001 standard. Aboa Mare offers training in safety at sea and environmentally sustainable development issues related to seafaring. We focus on providing simulator-based training for maritime students, shipping companies, authorities including pilots and sea rescuers as well as for leisure boating. In the simulations we use different shipmodels, e.g. large cruise ships, tankers and smaller archipelago ferries. The simulations are conducted on Finnish coastal areas and lakes as well as on the most heavily trafficked routes worldwide. The simulation resources consist of 9 simulator bridges, engine room simulators, VTS simulator, DP simulator and radio simulator. We can offer training on Consilium, Furuno, Wärtsilä, Transas and Sperry Marine bridges in our simulator. With the simulator interface we have developed we can generate technical faults to the real navigational instruments on the bridges.

Name: Ruefa
Company description: Ruefa is a leading travel agency based in Austria, dedicated to creating tailored travel experiences that cater to clients seeking both adventure and relaxation. The agency primarily serves leisure travelers, families, and adventure seekers, and collaborates with a network of partners that prioritize sustainability, aligning their offerings with ethical travel practices. Through personalized service and expert advice, Ruefa aims to inspire and facilitate unforgettable journeys for all its customers, making it a prominent player in the travel industry. By fostering a commitment to responsible travel, Ruefa not only enhances the travel experience but also contributes to the well-being of the planet and its communities.

Name: Brim Explorer
Company description: Brim Explorer is a premier tour company based in Tromsø, Norway, specializing in unique and immersive boat experiences in the stunning Arctic fjords. The company offers an unforgettable Aurora Dinner Cruise, where guests can enjoy a locally-sourced seafood dinner while sailing silently through the dark waters, all while learning about the rich culture and breathtaking landscapes of Northern Norway. Committed to sustainability, Brim Explorer operates a hybrid-electric vessel that minimizes environmental impact, allowing guests to appreciate the natural beauty of the region responsibly. The company caters to a diverse clientele, including tourists seeking adventure and locals looking for a unique dining experience, and partners with renowned local chefs to curate a menu that highlights traditional Norwegian cuisine. With a mission to provide memorable experiences that connect people to the Arctic environment, Brim Explorer aims to create lasting memories while promoting awareness of the region's natural wonders.

Name: Smidtje Canal Cruises - Haarlem
Company description: Met de schepen van Smidtje Canal Cruises varen we rond onze historische binnenstad en laten wij u onder leiding van ervaren schippers en gidsen alle mooie plekjes van de oude stad zien. Vanaf het Boothuys aan het Spaarne tegenover het beroemde Teylermuseum vertrekken wij dagelijks met onze schepen voor een rondje door onze historische binnenstad. Via de rivier het Spaarne, de grachten en singels bieden wij u een prachtige kijk op de stad. U kunt aan boord genieten van hapjes en drankjes die wij aanleveren bij vertrek. De vaart wordt verzorgd door de ervaren staf die al jaren lang over de Haarlemse wateren vaart. Geniet van een dagelijkse rondvaart of boek de privé tour bij Smidtje Canal Cruises Haarlem. Wij varen dagelijks vanaf 12.00 uur en in het weekend om 11:00 uur met de rondvaart. De afvaarten met de Frans Hals zijn op ieder heel uur. In het weekend, bij mooi weer, varen wij met de sloep BAVO, vanaf 11.30 uur, ook ieder uur. Tijdens deze tocht van 50 minuten ontdekt u de binnenstad van Haarlem vanaf het water. U vaart langs de vele mooie bezienswaardigheden zoals molen de Adriaan, het Teylershofje en de Kathedrale Sint Bavo

Company description: Sea and Syros have always been our two great loves. Our aim is to share with you our passion for motor-yacht sailing and show you all the known and unknown beaches of our beautiful island. Gather wonderful experiences and collect colourful memories while sailing around the Lady of the Cyclades! -------------------------------------------------- Η θάλασσα και η Σύρος ήταν ανέκαθεν δύο μεγάλες μας αγάπες. Έτσι, αφού ικανοποιήσαμε την πρώτη ταξιδεύοντας τα μήκη και τα πλάτη των ωκεανών του κόσμου, στρέψαμε το βλέμμα προς το σπίτι και αναζητήσαμε έναν τρόπο να τη συνδυάσουμε με την δεύτερη. Αυτό γέννησε την Galaxy Cruises. Σκοπός μας είναι να μοιραστούμε μαζί σας το πάθος μας για τη ναυσιπλοΐα και να σας δείξουμε τις γνωστές αλλά και άγνωστες παραλίες του όμορφου νησιού μας. Σαλπάρετε μαζί μας και απολαύστε τον περίφημο Ελληνικό ήλιο ενώ πλέουμε στα κρυστάλλινα νερά του Αιγαίου. Name: Sail With Us

Also, we can arrange your guide in some destinations and you can taste healthy Mediterranean local food. Our basement is located in the port of the city of Volos, under Pelion mountain, in Central Greece. You can arrive in Volos either by the airports of Skiathos (SKG) and Nea Anchialos (VOL) with charter flights during summer or using public transportation, such as bus and train, from Athens (331 km) or Thessaloniki (212 km).

Company description: The Aloschi and Bassani Groups have combined forces in 2009 and formed a Joint Venture company under the brand Aloschi & Bassani. The new company operates in both the marine and travel industries providing services throughout the country. Under the new Joint Venture, the Aloschi team operates services in the Western coast of Italy through its offices in Livorno, Rome, Civitavecchia, Naples and Salerno.  At the same time the Bassani team looks after the Eastern Coast through its offices in Trieste, Venice, Ravenna and Bari.  Sicily and Sardinia are handled by the Naples office, coordinating dedicated teams located in Messina, Palermo, Catania, Cagliari, Olbia and Alghero. Port agency service is handled by the Venice office acting as central hub, coordinating an exclusive network of experienced cruise agents throughout Italian ports.

Name: Sailingbcn
Company description: SAILINGBCN es una marca comercial especializada en los servicios de carácter náutico. Ponemos a tu disposición barcos para pequeños y grandes grupos, para las vacaciones con la familia y amigos, para la celebración de eventos o paseos de carácter turístico. Catamaranes a vela, goletas, yates clásicos, grandes esloras, catamaranes a motor, veleros, motoras, yates de lujo. Organizamos regatas de veleros en todo el litoral del mediterráneo. La duración de la regata "tipo" es de entre 2 y 4 horas dependiendo de las condiciones meteorológicas y se puede adaptar al horario disponible y a la necesidad del cliente. Nuestro equipo recibirá al grupo en el puerto, tras un briefing de bienvenida, se asignarán un grupo a cada patrón y velero. A bordo, se explicará a la tripulación las normas de seguridad a bordo del barco a vela, las funciones que deberán desempeñar a bordo para conseguir el mejor de los resultados y se les asignará el rol a desarrollar a cada participante. Las regatas se realizan en barcos de clase crucero.

Ibiza...with its globally renowned music scene, its world class night life, dramatic and beautiful coastline and of course its iconic sunsets. Careful attention to charter design detail, special arrangements with Top Restaurants Juan Y Andrea, Blue Marlin and El-Chringuito, special snorkelling sites known only to local Ibiza divers and a detailed knowledge of the local coastline have enabled Mamboats to put together the first truly imaginative charter itineraries in these magnificent craft. From fully planned luxury day cruises to Formentera to watersports safaris...to affordable day charters to romantic sunset experiences...this is the unique contribution Mamboats has delivered already in 2012. Mamboats combine their unique expertise in boats with a special empathy for their customers’ needs. With this in mind, Mamboats add several new charters for 2013, including private Stag and Hen charters to specially chosen secret locations, a new adventure to Benirras (The Spirit of Ibiza) and the totally new Wake Camp event, hosted by British Wakeboard Champion and Professional Instructor Matt Crowhurst, suited to beginners and experienced enthusiasts alike.

Name: NESW SRL

Il suo fondatore, Marco Morana, scelse l’acronimo NESW, North East South West, perché in barca ci si muove riferendosi a questi 4 punti cardinali: il suo obbiettivo è stato quello di creare un vero e proprio riferimento per la Nautica a Milano, la Patente Nautica con Esami in Sede a Milano. Chi si iscrive in NESW non viene considerato un cliente ma una persona amica con cui condividere esperienze, con umiltà viene accompagnata “per mano” nella rotta giusta verso la meta prefissata, dando priorità alle sue esigenze. Diceva Lucio Anneo Seneca: “Non Esiste vento favorevole per il marinaio che non sa dove andare”: la Scuola Nautica NESW è il tuo punto di riferimento per la nautica a Milano e, grazie alla collaborazione con partner illustri, soddisfiamo davvero ogni esigenza con serietà e professionalità. Formiamo i futuri Comandanti di unità da Diporto, preparandoli per sostenere l’esame di patente nautica o per condurre un’unità, a vela o a motore, in crociera o in regata. Lo svolgimento dei corsi patente nautica a ciclo continuo e l’estrema elasticità degli orari delle lezioni, sia in aula che in barca, permettono ai corsisti di partecipare in qualunque momento e/o periodo dell’anno a seconda dei propri impegni lavorativi e familiari. Ecco perché NESW è anche sinonimo di Patente Nautica con Esami in Sede a Milano!

Name: Connected Boat
Company description: ConnectedBoat is an innovative solution that allows remote monitoring of key parameters of the boat. All data is available in the user-friendly application on your mobile phone, tablet or computer. It increases safety of the boat while staying on board as well as when miles away Installation of the ConnectedBoat system allows to: - monitor boat parameters during cruise: location, speed, direction, ignition status,       battery voltage, engine hours and battery level of the ConnectedBoat device; - receive notifications in case of: smoke, gas, exceeded water level in the bilge,     door or window openings, movement on board, theft of outboard engine,     triggered anchor alarm, tracker low battery level; - remotely control devices on the boat (e.g. lighting, bilge pump or air conditioning); - create zones and receive information about the boat leaving a user-defined area; - create zones and receive information about the boat entering into a user-defined     area; - have access to the complete history of cruises and boat parameters; - create charters and add crew members; - share cruise data with crew members and i.e. with service companies; - share cruise details using social media

Company description: Smart Sail nasce da un’idea di giovani tecnici esperti di tecnologie e gestione aziendale, aspiranti imprenditori e dalla volontà di valorizzare competenze tecniche nel settore nautico e della meteorologia presenti in Liguria e dalla collaborazione di un circolo storico in un posto bellissimo per la vela: Lerici. LE REGATE: Poche sono le regate che prevedono la competizione a "tempo reale", il più delle volte sono a tempo compensato: ogni barca ha un rating e il tempo reale viene corretto con tale modalità e la classifica viene fatta con il valore finale del tempo compensato. Smart Sail utilizza il rating quale migliore stima delle prestazioni di ogni barca LA PROSPETTIVA: Smart Sail propone tecnologie innovative per la vela e combina previsioni meteo personalizzate con le rotte. Un mondo che coinvolge tutti gli amanti del mare, siano essi semplici amanti delle barche a vela per crociere in sicurezza o fanatici delle competizioni e delle regate. LA SOLUZIONE: Smart sail propone due nuove applicazioni per gli amanti della vela: “smart regatta” che consente la previsione in tempo reale delle prestazioni specifiche di ogni barca da regata. "easy sailing" che aiuta a stabilire le migliore rotta della crociera, in sicurezza e utilizzando al massimo le vele.

Company description: Azores sailing adventure trips & expeditions. We guide exclusively small groups around the Azores islands by sailboat.  During our multi-day trips, we let the wind define the route of each adventure and it is possible to book as a shared cruise or as a private boat for you, your friends, or your family.  We maintain a professional, still familiar crew of two members, captain & cook/mate aboard.  Our experience recommends a minimum of 6 days and ideally 10 days for the duration of each trip.  Share with us your ideas and together we will trim them into a nature-connected lifetime experience.  #gowherethewindwilltakeyou

Name: Propulsion Equipment
Company description: Service We are accessible and approachable; our 24/7 working mentality applies to our commercial contacts, production & service team. Our quickly produced equipment can be shipped anywhere in the world. The world-wide operating service team is ready to serve you anywhere, anytime. Business expertise Our track record from last decades shows many (types of) vessels, like navy, fishing, dredging, inland ships, cruise liners, etc. Our experience from projects is always integrated in the continuous product development, assuring the best possible solution for customer’s needs. Quality We have always stood out since our inception for the quality and reliability of our products which possess all the required certifications and are produced in Europe.

Name: Matern Yachting M.C.P.Y.
Company description: The Company Matern Yachting M.C.P.Y. is a commercial charter company with a seat in Thessaloniki, Greece. We operate our own Bali 4.1 Catamaran named Iris. We will started chartering in 2020 in the Northern Aegean Sea region offering cruises in Kavala area, Chalkidiki and Northern Sporades. Our company is a legal entity, special purpose company - Maritime Company for Pleasure Yachts (NEPA) for managing leisure yachts under Greek flag and operating with a Greek commercial license. Our berth harbour is Kavala, Greece.

Name: Sicily Boat Rentals
Company description: Sicilyboatrentals.com, brand of Your Boat Holiday Srl, is the global leader in the boating activities in Sicily specialising in the charter and management of the finest boats and yachts in all the south of Italy. Furthermore, our team of professional charter brokers and yacht managers all have a genuine passion for boating with an exceptional experience. Tailor made cruises, customized as per your demands. You will discover enchanting destinations and wonderful seas, aboard excellent boats with amazing crews, or enjoying fully the privacy of your bareboat charter. Fun, relax, comforts, entertainment and culture, all this during the most exceptional sailing charter you have ever had.

Name: Aydow
Company description: Aydow has been established to help the cruise and river cruise industry driving their passenger experience to the ultimate.

Name: Rent A Boat - Boat Tours And River Cruises
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, Doca De Belem Av. Brasilia Av De Brasilia, 1400-038
Company description: Rent a Boat offers a wide range of boat tours, private tours, and personalized cruises in Lisbon. Our Tours are specifically designed for those who want to escape the crowds and experience new adventures ensuring that quality is never compromised. These events are always accompanied with a Portuguese wine of choice. Welcome aboard and DISCOVER LISBON WITH US.

Name: Blue Cruise
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Chioggia, 2 Via San Felice, 30015
Company description: l miglior lavoro del mondo, è essere al tuo servizio… Intuizione vincente che la Società di charter nautico “Blue Cruise” offre, progettando con te itinerari su misura, in modo che la tua crociera sia un’esperienza splendida. Operiamo tra le Venerzia e il Gargano, con noi potrai vivere un’esperienza giornaliera o della durata di un weekend o una splendida crociera. I nostri yacht sono a sua disposizione anche per pernottamento ed eventi speciali.

Name: PassageWeather.com
Company description: PassageWeather specialises in Sailing Weather Forecasts, and was developed out of the need for reliable, easy to use weather information and forecasts. We provide 7-day Wind, Wave and Weather Forecasts to help sailors with their passage planning and weather routing. Both before and during deliveries, ocean races, regattas, cruises and all other types of offshore passages, we have your whole route covered.

Name: Denzzo Taxi
Company description: Nationaal & internationaal Zakelijk vervoer Gelegenheidsvervoer Airport- en cruiseterminalservice Rondritten Zakelijk sneltransport National & International Business transport Event transportservice Airport and cruise terminal service Tours / sightseeing Business fast transportation

Name: Columbia Shipmanagement Rijeka
Company description: Columbia Shipmanagement Rijeka (CSM Rijeka) began its operations in Croatia in April 2002 with the main purpose to provide direct crewing services to Columbia Shipmanagement Ltd.  Being a CSM branch office, we play an important role as a crewing agency for the whole Adriatic region, which is well known for its long history of seamen culture, enabling us to continuously present a variety of competent seafarers to our principals. At CSM Rijeka we mainly recruit officers for dry cargo fleet for our associated companies - head office Columbia Shipmanagement Cyprus, Columbia Shipmanagement Deutschland and Columbia Shipmanagement Singapore. We also recruit officers and personnel for cruise vessels, expedition passenger vessels and mega yachts in cooperation with our partner COLUMBIA cruise services. From 1 May 2017 for the Adriatic region, Columbia Shipmanagement Rijeka became the authorised supplier of recruitment services for Seatrans Ship Management.  Be a part of the Adriatic Region by getting on board with us at CSM Rijeka.

Name: Harmelink Trucking & Transport
HQ Location: Netherlands, Overijssel, Hardenberg, 22 J. C. Kellerlaan, 7772
Company description: Harmelink Trucking & Transport is a trusted name in Europe for moving trailers and hangers. With a fleet of 20 powerful trucks, they specialize in one-way transport, ensuring quick and efficient deliveries across the continent. When a customer needs a trailer moved, the dedicated team jumps into action. They plan the best route, coordinating ferry crossings and road travel. As the trucks cruise along scenic roads, the drivers enjoy the beauty of the landscape, knowing they are connecting businesses and communities. Each journey is a promise kept, showcasing their commitment to excellence in transport.
